product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Best gadget I've bought in a long time. The 4K footage is great and comparable with some other cameras I use.,Got this camera as a cheap toy for a trip and I've been using even for work. It is terrible in low light, but will do great win good lighting conditions.,Good Stuff:,It records great footage in 4K.,Pictures are good looking for a consumer camera.,Awesome image stabilization.,Great quick autofocus.,Easy to use Auto Settings.,GREAT ZOOM for this price.,Small compact camera.,Bad Stuff:,Manual Settings are complicated to adjust (hard to focus or change exposure manually).,Bad in low light (pretty normal with cameras with small sensor and small/cheap processor).,Feels cheaply made (also probable because it is cheap).,No live VIDEO output (the camera will output prerecorded footage or photos),No continuous Video recording (It will stop at 4 GB or close to it),Overall. It is a great camera, it will depend that you want to do with it. I use it to shoot nature video. and it's been great.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I purchased the Panasonic Lumix FZ80 because of its zoom lens.  With the long range zoom lens there is no need to purchase another lens.  This camera is replacing my Canon Power Shot SX20 which would no longer hold its focus.,The Panasonic Lumix FZ80 has every thing I need to take excellent picture up close and at a distance.,I am still learning all of the features of this camera and have learned that it can take good pictures in dim light with the right settings.  It can also take close up pictures and will be able to take even closer pictures since I purchased 4 magnification lenses.  The more I learn about this camera and how to properly operate it, the more I am impressed and satisfied with my purchase.  While one can just point and shoot with this camera and get decent pictures, this camera was made to do far more.  If you purchase this camera, check out the dozens of YouTube videos to help you to get the most from your purchase.  And remember that what applies to one camera regarding the settings also applies to all cameras.,The only thing I miss from my Canon Power Shot SX20 camera, is the moveable viewing screen.  The Panasonic Lumix FZ80, has a fixed screen.  I would definitely purchase this camera again because of its rich features and zoom lens.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I'll state at the outset that I am not a camera guru or expert so I won't even attempt to provide a lot of technical detail about this camera. There are a lot of folks out there who do an excellent job of providing that sort of detailed information. In fact, I read a number of those reviews and found them very helpful. My decision to purchase the Lumix FZ80 was based almost entirely on the long telephoto lens. What I got in doing so was a heck of a lot more than a great zoom. I couldn't be more impressed with the picture quality even when using it in maximum telephoto. Our home has a glassed-in porch that overlooks a lake, so most of the time I have the FZ80 set up on a lightweight tripod. Virtually all my picture taking is through the porch windows, and the results are stunning. I am continuously blown away at how sharp and bright the pictures are even when shot through triple-paned windows. The FZ80 is small, but not too small, light, and very comfortable in my hands when off the tripod. I love the FZ80 and highly recommend it for those like me who are rank amateurs but love taking nature and wildlife pictures. I realize that the FZ80 can do a lot more than what I'm doing with it, but I use it basically as a point and shoot camera and boy does it point and shoot. The FZ80 is exactly what I was hoping it would be and does exactly what I was hoping it would do.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I did a long and extensive amount of research before purchasing this camera, and am most pleased with the resulting quality, perfection and overall design of the product.  I am literally amazed at the quality of pictures just with using the factory settings to get started.  The capabilities for going further into post image modifications of the better photos are so far advanced over what is possible with the older technologies, and that will be a continuing learning curve......but because this camera has such built-in potential in all of its features, I will probably not have to think about a replacement camera for years to come.  One thing that REALLY pleases me is that I do not have to lug around another large bag of supplementary lenses to get what this camera is capable of already.  The price-point, the simplicity, and the light weight (comparatively speaking) all add up to one whale of a deal. Unless you are on the staff of National Geographic, or other high tech demanding job, this suits every need and then some.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I wanted to love this camera. I was looking for a step up from my Canon Powershot pocket-sized point and shoot, but a step down from my bulky DSLR. The camera is just awful. There's so many settings and yet even in manual I've got noise, blur, etc. I was hoping for great clear photos of my kids but so far I've gotten barely any. I regret spending so much on this piece of junk.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love this camera so far. It has excellent range, the tracking works well on small far away objects, pictures are clear and crisp. I would however note that when extended all the way out, it is best to retract the lens a tiny bit for a clearer picture. I am quite pleased with using this camera for bird pictures. There is one small defect however and I don't know if Amazon can help with this. The lettering on the buttons is already wearing off. I've taken about 500-600 pictures and the menu button is rubbed off and the af/fn button is almost rubbed off. Apparently they are just some cheap silver substance that rubs off after continued use. I don't know if I'd remember all those buttons if they all rub off.  Amazon should this camera be replaced?

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is an amazing camera with an incredible zoom. I use this daily for interior home photos, as it has an excellent wide angle lens allowing for most of the room to be captured and is also great for taking sports photos AND video. This is the best camera I've ever owned. Attached is just a sample of the zoom capability.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: THIS IS FOR EXPERIENCED PEOPLE. SUPER FRUSTRATING FOR THE AVERAGE PERSON. EVERYTHING IS WAY TO HIGH RES SAVING VIDEO FILES ARE HUGE AND YOU CAN'T GET THEM DOWN THAT SMALL. PICTURES ARE 4K AGAIN SUPER,HIGH RES.  I WAS LOOKING TO FILM AT LOW RES BUT I CAN'T FIND ANYTHING THAT WILL DO THAT. JUST TOO MUCH CAMERA FOR THE "REGULAR PERSON" TRYING TO VIDEO A FEW MINUTES OF TRAINING. WISH IT WOULD BE SIMPLE TO OPERATE.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: The DMC-FZ70 is all the camera you need.  It comes with a lot of features and accessories that may surprise you.  The built in lens goes from 20mm (Wide Angle Lens) to a 1,200mm telephoto lens.  There is no need to pay for or carry extra lens when they are built in.  I have rental units and interior pictures never capture the whole room, until now.  I can use the 20mm setting to take 1 picture instead of 3.  It shows so much better when you can see all the features in a room in 1 or 2 pictures instead of 6.  The 1,200 mm lens means that I can photograph a license plate or suspicious person from more than 250 feet away or more when needed.,The camera comes with a great case, branded carry strap, built in flash, built in microphone, and is tripod mountable.  Sorry to say you will have to buy your own tripod.  There are several settings on the camera that make filters unnecessary, but it will take any standard 55mm filter you may want to use.  Don't even consider accessories until you have the camera and use it a couple of times.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is a great camera! I bought one almost a year and a half ago and have used it on average more than once per day. It still looks and works like new (the only sign of use is the letters of two of the buttons have rubbed off. The camera is well balanced and has a study grip. Although you can take pictures one handed with it, I find it better with two, especially when zooming. The batteries last a long time as well, considering how much I have used them (I can do over an hour of time lapse before the battery runs out). There are many great features about this camera that I like for bird photography.,Amazing zoom-60x optical zoom,Stabilization- The stabilizer allows full zoom shots while keeping them steady,Control modes- aperture/shutter priority settings,Raw,Bursts- the ability to take rapid bursts of pictures is useful,Flexible focus- the focus locks on an object (such as a moving animal) and refocuses if the object moves,Function buttons- these can be very useful for changing settings quickly, there are several function buttons that can be assigned a certain setting change each,Touch screen-also useful for changing settings quickly and focusing on specific points, another useful aspect is for deleting pictures rapidly,Eye Viewfinder- great for sunny days or for saving battery,Those are features great for wildlife photography, but other features make the camera great for other types of subjects.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Been a week but so far, so good.  Very easy to use and the photos have been great.  Including the zoom.  A lot of options for photos tho and the book will travel with me at all times. There was a wrist strap included in the bundle but it is too large for this camera.  Trying to figure out what else I can use it for.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: We are very pleased with our camera!  We needed to replace an old camera because it no longer worked, and didn't want to spend a lot of money.  However, we still needed something that would take great pictures.  This is perfect.  Reasonably priced and meets our needs.  Not to mention the accessories!!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Excellent camera. convenient and easy to use

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: The camera is good but the screen isn't very clear so at first I thought maybe it was messed up but it takes good picture but I wish the screen on the camera was better quality so you can view it easier. IT doesn't shoot very fast so if you want a camera that shoot instantly this isn't the one. I'm using to take photos of my signs for my business so it will work but not sure I'm happy about the price so haven't decided if it is worth it for the price when there are other camera out there that could be better.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: i bought this as a multi-person use work camera. we only needed the camera, but it was a STEAL OF A PRICE with all the add-ons included for free. i searched for 2 weeks for this specific camera, on various sites and i came to this seller. i would absolutely recommend not only this product, but this seller as well to future customers. it shipped faster than expected, and arrived sooner than anticipated. thank you!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this on for a trip as a very inexperienced photographer. I happily started snapping pictures until I realised that those that I took with my Samsung S9 phone were of far superior quality. I reverted to just using it for videos, but a camcorder I obtained did a significantly more fantastic job.  I ended up not using it at all for the rest of the trip, or for nothing else afterwards for that matter. Would recommend if you are not looking for serious High Quality pictures... The bundle was good though...

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I haven’t used it too much yet but it’s replacing an older Canon & i’m Sure it will be just as good or better.  I mainly use it for videos & when I travel for snapshots.,It's easy to use & set up.  Haven't tried loading pics to computer, yet but don't anticipate any trouble.  Just been extremely busy & haven't officially used it yet.  But the tests I've been doing have come out well.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I find the menus are confusing and non-intuitive, and the auto mode takes terrible pictures with blurry focus and confused lighting. I just wanted a basic point-and-shoot camera. I've had them before, a Sony and another Canon before that. By comparison this one is very difficult to use.  Also, they don't really make it obvious but the cable you need to download pictures from camera to computer is NOT included, and you must buy it separately. Annoying.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Does the picture quality match my EOS T5i, not quite.  However, it is close enough to that camera it is fine for everyday use. I like the small form factor. It does make some of the settings a little troublesome for my hands and fingers. I find my self grabbing this camera far more often than the T5i. Good value for the money.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Was a little disappointed, I expected it to be a little bigger. Got it to replace my Sony Cybershot because of its picture quality and hard to find replacement chargers. But the Canon takes decent pictures, just takes way too long to actually snap the picture, you are liable to lose your 'picture perfect' shot. Trying to work my way through all the menu and function options which are not being user friendly but in all fairness I have only briefly looked through the manual. But all in all, I find it a bit on the pricey  side.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: We purchased these items for our early childhood center as we are not allowed to have cell phones out, however we like to capture activities with our kids so we bought these cameras. They have worked great and come in handy in and out of the classrooms. The picture quality is not bad but of course if you are used to using cell phones it can't compare. It's a nice alternative though and of good quality overall. We bought 4 of them.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: The shipping was great - well packed and arrived ahead of schedule.  Problem is I need a simple point and shoot camera to replace my old one.  This one took me an hour just to install the battery and memory card and set the date and time.  I downloaded all 111 pages of the manual to get this far.  The directions are not good - says to use the  < > keys which I can not locate -- I wish could have bought it from a camera store - none available here - so I could get in person help.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Bought camera for upcoming European trip, all ok , lite for travel, cannot find place for USB cable, directions not at all clear for reviewing previously taken pictures!  Otherwise great.  Lots of emities, extra battery and charger , nice case and hand held tripod.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Great seller - product just as described - would recommend to others.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Received the complete package of camera and accessories as promised. The Canon camera was easy to set up and the pictures turned out beautiful. The easiest point and shoot camera I have ever had. Also, downloading both the operating manual and software was just as easy as downloading the pictures to my computer.,The small size of this camera makes it convenient to carry around in your pocket or a ladies purse.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Easy to use, great photos, and small enough to easily take everywhere I go. The seller is great and followed up on the package after it was sent!!!!!!  I will definitely purchase from The Imaging World again when I am in the market for similar products!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Finally a quality camera, easy to handle and understand. No fumbling around with Android, especially for us older maybe not so savvy with cell phones and also not constantly with our noses stuck into one. This is a handy little camera for those of us who are aware of our surroundings and wish to capture this very special moment, maybe even as a video. All of this at a most reasonable price!!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: The camera works great and takes nice pictures, BUT the drive to download them stopped working after the first time I tried it!  It is frustrating because it didn't come with a USB cord to hook up to the computer, so I had to purchase one separately, so I am pretty frustrated with my purchase!  What good is a camera when you can't do anything with the pictures!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: The booklet that came with it had very little information.  To get a manual, I had to go to the Canon website and down load a 200+ page manual.  I wish that the instruction booklet had at lea some information about what each button was for and how to use them.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: The accessories that came with the kit, specifically the Imaging World card reader, do not work. It does not come with a cable (although there is a spot on the camera for one) so getting the photos off the card is a challenge.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Underwater Camera for Snorkeling Full HD 1080P 24.0 MP Waterproof Point and Shoot Digital Camera Dual Screen Action Camera
review: I am so happy I purchased this camcorder, the item arrived quickly & promptly. It is definitely worth it! I am so happy to capture memories in this form.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Underwater Camera for Snorkeling Full HD 1080P 24.0 MP Waterproof Point and Shoot Digital Camera Dual Screen Action Camera
review: I think this is the best decision I have made to have a waterproof high-quality camera.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Underwater Camera for Snorkeling Full HD 1080P 24.0 MP Waterproof Point and Shoot Digital Camera Dual Screen Action Camera
review: It is kind of small but its asy to use.It really worksGreat product that is the lowest price you could find on amazon this is the best one to get

product_name: Waterproof Camera Underwater Camera for Snorkeling Full HD 1080P 24.0 MP Waterproof Point and Shoot Digital Camera Dual Screen Action Camera
review: Bought this for my daughter's 11th birthday. She loves it! Couldn't be happier! Good price compared to others we've seen.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Underwater Camera for Snorkeling Full HD 1080P 24.0 MP Waterproof Point and Shoot Digital Camera Dual Screen Action Camera
review: The express arrived in good time.I can take this camera to play on the beach, I am very happy.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Bought as a birthday gift for my mother, who prefers point and shoot cameras to cell phone ones. And I can't blame you, even though new phones have pretty competitive cameras.,She is a Canon fan and her old cam was dropped just too many times so the zoom lens would not come out.,This one was a hit. Bright red color is so important for the ladies. Zoom is good, Resolution is great and picture quality is out of this world. Slim enough to carry in ladies purse.Battery lasts a while, so please make sure your SD card is large enough to accomodate all the GB of data. Menu is extensive, but once you read the manual and memorize a few things, it is not that bad. Super happy

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: It was a good camera for two weeks then it died to work no more.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: It's not so good and the description is misleading. This camera does not have Optical Image Stabilization like it says in the opening description. I contacted Canon directly and they said:,The image stabilization in the PowerShot ELPH 180 is electronic, not optical.,So it goes back. The pictures are clear as long as you're outdoors, kinda fuzzy indoors. The video is clear but it's shaky. See sample. Just like a smartphone without image stabilization. You can tell it's not 1080. It's just not worth the price, $115 with tax. I got the , on order.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Bought this camera to make high quality photos. After having it about 6 months I find it produces pictures no better in quality than my iPhone 5, perhaps a bit less. Pictures are not sharp, camera modes are difficult to discern and adjust, no exposure adjustments. Do not buy this camera, spend a little more and get the good optics. My partner has an older Nikon, cost about $60 more and produces superior photos, especially when enlarged.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: What an useless piece of equipment!  I owned six!! PowerShot cameras since 2000, my pastime exploring slot canyons and backpacking in the desert southwest means that my cameras die from "sand inhalation" way earlier than from anything else, so I had to buy a new point-and-click frequently. But this one ... is the low-low end of what I had used over the years. It feels cheap to start with, but is also a supremely lousy camera in low light conditions. Bottom line, after one week out there hiking, I ended up ignoring the camera, and only using the iPhone SE. It gives me better pictures, by far.,Sounds like the age of compact cameras has definitely come to an end. Byebye, Canon. There is a museum corner right next to Kodak, Agfa and Polaroid reserved for you.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This is a great tiny camera, it functions very well and has a few fun features to play with. I have a complaint about it though, it has no port to connect a USB wire for picture transfer or charging. It seems that with constant removal of the Memory card and battery (requires supplied charger to be recharged) contacts on either the card or battery will eventually break, it would be much better if Canon added a port even if it required making the camera a little larger plus then they wouldn't be required to supply a charger, I would have given this tiny camera 5 stars if it had a USB connection. I have found the USB connector, it won't charge the Battery thru it but I can download pictures using a USB cable, sometimes ya just gotta read directions! Don't ecpect it to do more than the requierd point and shoot takes nice pictures at fhort distances but blurry at long range low light situations, focuas just goes where it wants to, a camera may even take better pictures in this situation. Ovtside or close photos indoors are great however.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: The little camera is easy to use and carry.  It takes good enough pics for sight seeing for me.  I do have to be careful with the little metal slide that opens and closes over the battery/memory card holder, I think it might break easily.  Other than that, it is a good little camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I am a fan of Canon products. This review is simply because I cannot get a reply out of their customer service. I purchased this camera last fall for my mom. I was having a friend build her a new computer, so had it shipped to him. So she didn't get it for several weeks. By then I could not return it, and it did not power on out of the box. So my friend mailed it in to a repair center after I found the correct one to mail it to on the Canon website. This was in October, and there is still no word. With my work schedule, I cannot sit for hours on hold waiting for someone to answer the phone. I am very frustrated at all of this and just want either the camera fixed or replaced so I can get it to my mom. The one I was seeking to replace has since stopped working, so that makes things even more frustrating. I'll delete this once I have the repaired or replaced camera in hand.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I started having focus problems with this camera early on. For a while, if I turned the camera on and off, I could get it to focus. It is now permanently out of focus. The camera has never been dropped, gotten wet or had any sort of damage. This is simply a defect that is inherent in the camera. I will not buy any more Canon cameras.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: UPDATE: I am disappointed in this camera after using it extensively every day for 2 weeks. Takes some very good pictures but many not so good. Seems to be an issue with too much light being let into the lens so some pics look sort of "flashed out" even when taken outdoors without flash. Also doesn't seem to focus as easily and quickly as my old SX600. But, I suppose for the price it is okay.,Got this as an inexpensive option to replace my now broken Canon Sure Shot SX600 IS which I happily used for about 5 years. Was shocked to see the price had not gone down in that time, but up! So... money being short, I am giving this Canon Elph a try. Set up much the same as the SX600 so very easy to use right out of the box and the pictures seem of good quality. Miss my 18x zoom, but... for the money, I cannot complain.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Very nice, sturdy case. Helps protect my camera from damage and is easy to use. I have gotten quite a few comments about how nice it looks and how it looks 'old school'.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: I like the look (the old style look ‘50-‘60). Mega Gear Protective Black Leather camera case fit well with my Nikon D5200 and keep the rain/dust off my camera very well. The price is just right and the shipping from Amazon was very fast.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: It was just what I expected, arrived on time without any damage or defect, as the seller had predicted, had other things on my interest in the product from the seller would certainly buy it, the quality of the products.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: I wanted a little extra protection for the camera when I was carrying it around my neck or in the purse. This case is nicely made and will add an extra level of protection when on. But - you can't just unsnap it and let it hang from the snaps while you use the camera - to use the camera, you have to remove the case completely.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: I wish it were easier to put on and off when there is a lens filter added.  It is really great for me to be able to drop the camera into my purse rather than to have to have a separate bag as with my DSLR camera.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: When I don't want to carry my camera bag, this is an inexpensive and durable to protect my Nikon P520. Highly recommended item and seller.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: This is a real QUALITY PRODUCT. The leather is smooth and the packaging is awesome. The bag comes with it's own protective case. This is a professional quality case at a very affordable price .A must have if you want to protect your camera.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Very prompt delivery. Product is exactly as described. Very good quality and very well constructed. This leather case fits my Nikon P520 perfectly. It was a good purchase and a good purchase experience.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Fits the camera well and i can snap off the cover face and let it hang on with the bottom snap if i need to shoot a quick photo. Provides excellent protection.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Molded just right for my p520 Nikon!  protects my camera with the thick leather and stitched very well! couldn't be happier with this purchase or the delivery!  thanks Mega Gear!

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Light and slim. It’s super easy to use and has a long record time for such a small device. I’m giving it 4 stars for customer service was good and prompt for payment

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: I bought this camera for my daughter. She loves taking pictures and it is perfect for her. Picture quality is really good and has a nice zoom and long lasting battery. It’s compact which is excellent for young kids. She loves taking pictures of her friends and family with it!

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Camera came in defective. Will not turn on after charging almost a day. Flimsy construction. You get what you paid for. Will not recommend. You’re better off buying previous old models ir ysed units of branded models around the same price.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: i got this camera for my son to take on vacation and it is perfect for him. Easy to use and handle, good quality pictures, and great price!

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: You sold a camera without the SIM card which is essential for use of the camera! And the print I’m your instruction booklet print is too small to read.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Bought it for my 5 and 4 year old sons! They love it!

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: It fits in a shirt pocket and is very light weight.  Easy to recharge the battery.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Great quality. Pictures are clear. Doesnt die fast. It doesn't take batteries so thats a plus to plug and charge. I purchased for my grandbaby and she loves it. Perfect for a kids first camera, to play and learn how to use it.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Used a little, so far I like it

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: After just a couple weeks the camera started freezing up after a picture was taken and I had to remove the battery to even get it to turn off. Now the battery will not even stay in the slot - apparently that is broken too.  It is completely unusable after 2 months.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Even better than I expected!

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Battery is bad. Just heats up and can't even touch the camera

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
