product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: This will be very helpful item for our road inventory

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Shipping was fast, the product was exactly as I expected.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Very great product. Comes with everything as listed in description.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: I used this product for travel and video, the picture quality is great however the battery life is not too long.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: I didnt receive the extra battery or the memory card.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Excellent video quality

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Bundle arrived without SDCH card as stated in the description.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Complete crap! I’ve seen original flip phone cameras take better pictures!!! Returning this piece of junk!!!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This camera managed to corrupt every SD card I tried to use.  This made it essentially useless to me, and I had to return it.  It seems to have decent features and whatnot for its size and price, but the inability to actually save the pictures taken, safely, is kind of a show-stopper for me.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I recently purchased this camera for an upcoming trip, and due to limited space I wanted a camera about as good if not a little better than my phone with dedicated memory, and a lightweight build.,This camera right out of the box comes with its own little carrying bag which is a nice touch. The camera itself at first felt cheap and extremely lightweight, but don't be fooled; after using this camera it does a fantastic job for it's price and has an easy to use UI for adjusting settings to your likings.,While the zoom is digital (terrible), the battery charged quickly and I have yet to use the entire thing. Do be sure to use an SD card, or a micro SD card in an SD card Adapter.,Lastly, getting photos off of this camera wasn't too difficult because using the charging cord it comes with plugged into your pc will allow you to access the photos. Please do note this is not a camcorder, and the video quality of this camera is abysmall; however I did not purchase this camera for video.,If you need something small and cheap for a travel, that you aren't too afraid to lose, I'd recommend picking one of these up!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This camera takes absolutely awful pictures.  Even using Image Stabilization the pics are fuzzy.  I had three different people takes pics with this and every one was bad.  We can't all have that much shake with our hands!,I worked with the camera for over an hour, taking pics indoors and out, with and without flash.  I was using a brand new memory card, which worked fine...until suddenly, after using it for an hour, the camera suddenly wouldn't work and kept giving me a CARD LOCKED notification.  I tried re-formatting but it wouldn't do it - kept getting the same CARD LOCKED message.  Aside from the crummy photo quality, a camera that won't recognize its memory card is fairly useless.,The camera could have been damaged, since it was sent in its retail box inside a larger shipping box with absolutely NO PROTECTIVE PACKAGING MATERIAL.  The camera box was just bopping around in its shipping box.  Since the camera box was small and packed tightly that shouldn't have made a difference, but who knows?  And besides, should any electronic equipment be shipped WITHOUT proper packing material?,I'm glad some reviewers found this camera worthy of 4 stars.  As for me, I'm returning this thing for a refund.  I'll find something that actually works.  Highly disappointed.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I bought this camera for my daughter. It takes extremely poor quality photos and doesn't hold a charge. Can't return it now. Don't waste your money.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: If you have to take a shot of a mountain or a forest or a wide vista, then this camera is for you, provided you hold it in a stable way. I have not yet tinkered with all of the features, but I bought this camera to take close up shots of flowers. Sadly, I have not yet been able to get a clear and sharp picture of anything close up. The instruction manual is for a camera that is a previous version of the current camera, and unfortunately, I will have to experiment with the camera to learn how to use it properly. I would have been much happier if I had a manual that was for the specific camera that I purchased. I guess you get what you pay for.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I was looking for a simple and compact camera. This is camera is definitely those things, however the picture quality is TERRIBLE! The full photo of my dog was taken without the zoom, and I could even tell on the camera display screen how grainy and pixelated it was. The other two photos were using the zoom, and the quality was even worse using the zoom! I knew not to expect much with only having to spend 50 on the camera, but my goodness. If you care at all about quality and not having pixelated and grainy pictures, then do not purchase this camera.,If you do not care about those things, and only need a cheap and easy camera, then go for it. But for any person who would bother buying a camera and not use a smart phone or something instead, it just really is not worth it.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I have serious cameras, but thought this would be good for what they say, popping into a backpack. Online says it's Mac compatible. Just received camera today, instructions do not indicate Mac compatible, only Windows, there are 3 little instruction booklets offering 6 different languages. Consequently, the print is so tiny that you need a magnifier to read, but when magnified, the print is fuzzy. There is a compact mini CD with the driver on it. Well, Macs have no mini CD capacity. I already took it to PO for return. I should stick with known brands, not something made in China that I never heard of. I rated the features neutral in the middle only because you have to put something there to continue your review.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Super fun camera. Bought it for my daughter. So simple to use, did not require instructions but good to have. Camera is  small and light weight. Charging is simple, and the battery and storage card fit easily. Storage card required. Zoom and function buttons are  Industry standard and simple. Screen is large and bright. Nothing not to like!,Seller was helpful and proactive with questions

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: The camera was light weight, easy to carry in loose pants pocket, and appeared to take good photos!  Now to the bad part- I was unable to download the software and register the product due to GordVE 2.7" digital camera.  I was under the assumption I had downloaded the software and that I could download my pictures.  Well, I attempted to download and lost over 250 pictures of our Italy vacation.  Nothing indicated I had trashed (trash can icon) or deleted my pictures.  I have repeatedly attempted to download the software with no success.  I am unable to contact the manufacturer to troubleshoot or register the software or the camera and I'm extremely frustrated with lack of support.  By the way I do have a computer that is suitable and compatible to the software.  If I could work out issues with software and registering I might be willing to give this a much higher rating.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Was a bit more complicated to use than I wanted. I had to read the entire booklet to figure it all out. Even after figuring out the camera I had difficulty getting a decent quality photo out of it. Most pics were grainy unless just the right lighting and zoom were used. Found the super zoom to be very grainy and unusable. Maybe was too complicated or it may have been defective because I have heard good things about this camera. Customer service was good and I received my refund quickly.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This camera takes amazing handheld shots while zoomed all the way out.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Initially, bird pics were soft. Lowering the Noise Reduction setting to -2 gives more sharpness and detail but still with good noise control. If needed, noise reduction is done in pp. I really like the rendering in the FZ70 pics. It doesn't have the fast lens and other features of my FZ200, but noise control is better, IMO, so you can use higher ISOs. Also, compared to the FZ200, iZoom performs much better, fewer artifacts, very usable pics. The camera focuses very fast. A great birding camera.,I do wish it had an articulating screen, remote shutter socket, larger buffer, but you can't have everything at this price.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I purchased this camera not long after the birth of our firstborn son. It is so much better than the one we had been using. I am able to get a lot of good nature shots, as you can see in the pictures I have provided. The coloring and saturation is great! The only thing I do not like about the camera is that the focus for zooming in is not always very good. If I want a crisp picture, I often have to get VERY close to the subject, which can often be a bit inconvenient (see spider picture). While fairly close, if I try to zoom in the slightest bit, the picture gets all blurry, no matter what setting I use. Other than that, I am able to get some really nice, high quality pictures to share with my family and friends. They have all complimented me on my picture taking skills, but I know that I owe it all to the Panasonic Lumix!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I had to practice a lot to learn how to use this camera for it is more complicated than any I have ever used before.  Manual settings are available for almost anything I want to do, but I've had to refer to the digital manual a great many times.  This is no point and shoot camera, although it works great for that too.  I had much difficulty learning how to get macro photos without blurring, but eventfully got great photos. The macro-zoom is something I did not expect and I'm super-pleased with that.  I can adjust the lighting, color, focus and get almost any type of photo I want, though for general use I leave it at Auto-focus +.  I like to take photos of insects, flowers and birds, so the manual settings are of great importance to me.  I also wanted to do time exposures, and although I would prefer to be able to set long time exposures, the longest exposure in this camera did permit me to photograph the aurora borealis with the use of a tripod, and the touch-up function.  The 60x zoom is very useful to me and I've photographed quite a few birds already.  It is very difficult to hold the camera still at the 60x level, but using a tripod for a bird is impractical when they are moving around.  I have to take several hand-held shots to get a good one, but usually succeed.  I am very pleased with this camera and it is everything I hoped for.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Pros:  Light weight bridge camera with super wide angle and ridiculous zoom.  I didn't have time to do a full battery of tests but I did test for ease of use, low light noise, macro, and OIS - I'm impressed with all of these.  The fact that this camera has a 20mm wide angle makes it worthy of adding to my equipment line up, I wanted something light for hiking so I bought the Canon SX280HS.  I'm marginally disappointed with that camera because it's slow and too noisy in low light but at the time of purchase I was pleased with it's zoom (25-500mm).  Four short months this camera was released and as it's the only light weight camera with a 20mm wide angle I just had to try it.  Despite the fact I can't just slip it into my pocket the FZ70 is very light.  I'm 6' tall and the palm grip doesn't strike me as overly diminutive so I can see myself carrying this around with out a strap and not experiencing hand cramps.,Despite reading a number of negative reviews, initially, I'm very pleased with the quality.  Low light for a 1/2.3" sensor'd camera is better then I expected, in fact it's better then the SX280HS (same size sensor) I purchased just a few months prior.  The negative comments surround picture quality, I could not duplicate a scenario that yielded a photo of "poor" quality.  While the images are not perfect they are better, IMO, than other point and shoots and perhaps equal to prosumer options from say five or six years ago.,Cons:  Finding a bargain - This camera's price seems to be jumping around from the original retail price so be careful.  Thanks to the super zoom and the uninitiated's inability to get a steady shot there are plenty of these as "used" which are in fact open box.  Be sure to read the descriptions when sorting through the used vendors as some are missing accessories.  I purchased mine as "used" and it arrived with all accessories, repacked in the original box, fulfilled by Amazon Warehouse Deals for nearly 30% off the already on sale price.,Summary:  I consider myself an avid enthusiast.  I know how to use a camera in full manual, how to get a steady shot even with out OIS; in fact, I use a full size DSLR (5D mkiii) most times.  I will be using this for my upcoming vacation and leaving the bulky lenses and accessories for my DSLR at home.  I'll still take my jean pocket worthy Canon SX280HS with me but will use this for excursions and killing time on ship.  If you are looking for telephoto capability my recommendation is walk before you run - this camera is good but only if you are familiar with bracing techniques, manual ISO setting, and tripod use.  If you aren't comfortable with say, shooting in full manual mode go with a less expensive shorter range compact zoom.  Check DPReview's site for a great comparison tool.  IMO this camera is as good as it gets for size, zoom range, and low light quality.  Not considering the value of the total package this would be a good camera to have at any price point within it's class of capabilities so if it's not on sale don't mark it off your list.,11/22/2013 UPDATE:,Add some Pros & Cons:,Pros:  I've shot 354 photos, about 150 outdoors, some with fill flash and the remainder inside, most with flash.  I'm very impressed with the battery life, the display indicates I have full battery life remaining even after all that use.  My indoor use consisted of walking around at the convention center here in San Antonio for the Auto Show.  The cameras display stayed on for about 1.5 hours during the time I was taking photos.  Also I wanted to point out the OIS is amazing.  I shot most of my shots today, indoors, in manual mode most at 1/25th of a second some at 1/20th at ISOs between 100 & 400.  Hand held sometimes zooming up to 16 or 18x and the shots came out crystal clear.  I believe out of about 200 shots I may have had two that were not usable due to camera shake.  I don't believe I would have achieved this with my heavier 5Dmkiii with the 24-105mm with IS.  I did have to employ bracing techniques, holding breath, gently pressing shutter and using any railing I could find to lean up against, but no tripod or mono pod.,Cons:,Pano mode, while it works great, does not have a manual exposure control.  Indoors it forced me to use ISO2000 which leads me to the next con, poor image quality in low light.  I don't know if its a sensor problem or a compression issue as I was using jpg.  It's not terrible but even at ISO400 it's noticeable.  I had spend most of the day yesterday photographing my dogs between ISO 400 & 1600 while indoors and first noticed it but inside the house it's a bit darker then at an auto show.  I knew to try and avoid ISO800 but after today I'd say if you can get the shot somehow with a lower ISO setting, say 200 or the lowest of 100 you'll appreciate the results - so a tripod, mono pod, or bracing techniques are a must.,A side note regarding perception of the camera itself.  Last year I used my 5D mkiii at the auto show and I went unnoticed.  This year, with the FZ70, arriving early to the auto show I was approached by some of the presenters who thought I was the official photographer - go figure...,As soon as I knew I liked the camera I ordered a spare set of batteries and charger.  Considering how great the battery life is I sort of regret getting two extra batteries.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This enabled me to get some spectacular shots sight seeing in Arizona - shots that would have either required 2 hour hikes or just not possible otherwise were easy with 60x optical zoom,I'm not a photography expert, and at the moment I don't want to have to learn about / spend the money on a DSLR and all the associated lenses, etc - however I still wanted a camera that had manual features like shutter speed, sensitivity, etc so that I could grow into the camera over time,The electronic view finder is surprisingly useful to help get level shots,Tips/advice:,- If you're going to use manual focus, try the same shot with automatic focus as well - I used manual focus for a number of extreme distance shots that looked ok on the LCD screen but are blurry on larger screens, where shots of other scenes I used automatic focus and came out great - this means many of my extreme distance shots at the Grand Canyon North Rim were blurry when they probably would have been fine in automatic focus mode,- If you want to use manual exposure times I recommend getting a tripod, since I did not have one the long exposure time shots I took were just blurry,- Instead of having to walk further away from / closer to the scene, it is extremely helpful to have the easy to use and plentiful zoom control, even for close range shots (few inches to 10ft) - just zoom in a bit to crop out what you don't want and put more of an emphasis on the subject in the photo

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Bought this camera a little less than a month ago to take with me on our family vacation to Hawaii.  Camera came in a timely fashion since we have Prime.  I would not be happier with this camera.  This is the largest camera we have bought ever (we had previous lumix point and shoot cameras, but nothing this big).  The Auto/Intelligent option works very well and we are very happy with the pictures we were able to take with this camera, especially in the Botanical Garden near Hilo.  There were a lot of people with much larger cameras than this taking detailed pictures but I don't know how much better they are than those taken by this Lumix camera.  Overall, love this camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I bought this as main camera for my Z47 and I was disappointed. It has a shooting in raw which I would like to have but the camera took pictures that were blurry. I tried every setting possible to correct this and nothing worked. the shutter speed was way to slow and it was hard to change the f stop. After using it for several days I gave up,  My Z47 is much better and has  everything I need except the RAW feature.  Because I was so disappointed I returned it.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Update: 11/17/2014.  I have used the camera for several months now and love it.  I really like the zoom range of the camera from 20mm to 1200mm and it is my main daily carry camera.  It takes great detailed photos and the noise levels are very good.,The is going to be a quick review on the camera and I will add more as time goes on.  The FZ70 takes really good sharp photos, but hand held might be a problem in lower light levels.  I went out yesterday evening and took some shots hand held and they all came out blurry.  I should have paid more attention to the shutter speed.,The camera works fantastically in iA, which is the auto mode. I mainly use Aperture but was impressed with the auto settings.,It will go with a 60 second exposure in the Starry Sky Mode, which is under the SCN mode on the main dial.,The lens thread is 55mm so if you plan on using your filters from any other Pany camera, you will need a 55 to 52mm Step Down Adapter.  Amazon has them for cheap.  I don't think vignetting will be a problem using 52mm filters as the lens is way smaller than the filter threads on the camera.  Here is the 55 to 52mm Step Down Adapter.,The camera has no shutter remote cord jack, so a shutter release cable will not work.  My Yongnuo YN-560 flash will not work on the camera either.  It physically hits the camera flash housing, which is raised a little.  The answer to that is to use a wireless flash trigger with the Yongnuo Flash and that works fine.,Addition:  I looked at the Yongnuo flash again and it will fit on the camera, but it is a tight fit between the camera flash and the Yongnuo flash housing.  I modified the Yongnuo flash by taking some of the plastic off the flash housing where the camera flash is hitting, with a pencil grinder.  It doesn't take much, and it is right in the middle of the housing.  You could remove some of the plastic in the flash housing with sandpaper, but it would take longer, but will also give you more control of how much plastic you are taking off.  Now my Yongnuo Flash works perfectly on the FZ70 camera!,The video does not have a progressive setting.  Interpolated is the best you are going to get with this camera.,The FZ70 does not have a jack for a shutter release cable and does not have an infrared input either.  The camera has to be set to a timer delay within the camera for 2 or 10 seconds.  If it was a Sony or Canon, the timer is set and stays on till you shut it off.  Unfortunately this camera requires you set the timer delay for each and every photo.,The longest the camera will go on exposure under the Shutter or Manual Mode is 8 seconds.  In the Starry Sky Mode it will go 15, 30, and 60 seconds.,Like I said the lens thread is 55mm so your filters will have to be that size or use an adapter.  The camera will use a teleconverter with the DMW-LA8 adapter, which is not available yet.  Addition:  Those LA8 adapters are available on Ebay now.  They are being sold out of Japan though.  I had that happen with the FZ200 camera as well and had no problem getting one from a Japanese Ebay member.  There are several teleconverters that work well with this camera, but may not be needed as this lens rocks as far as zoom goes!,Update:  An aftermarket adapter is now available for a good price.,It will take Raw pictures, but no one is supporting the FZ70 Raw files yet.  It will come.  Added: I found that FastStone will support the Raw files from the FZ70 and it is much better than Silkypix, in my opinion.  Just Google FastStone and download and install the software.  It is free.,Upadate: Raw for the camera is now supported in Lightroom and Photoshop.,Start up time is very fast.  I was able to take a picture in one second after turning the camera on.,The focus button is on the top of the camera now.  The AF/MF/Macro button is on the right side of the LCD instead of on the camera lens.,One thing I have noticed with this camera is the noise, or should I say the lack of noise!  The shots I took at ISO 800 and ISO 1600 still look pretty good, and at ISO 100 noise is hard to find.,The camera will zoom to 60X (1200mm 35mm Equivalent) in the 16mp picture size.  Setting the picture size to 10mp will give you 75X zoom, setting the size to 7mp will give you 90X, at 5mp you get 108X and at 3mp is 135X.  This is Extended Optical Zoom.  If you need more zoom than that, under IResolution, use I-Zoom for an additional 2X at all picture sizes and digital will give another 2X, but image quality will suffer. I took some shots at the 10mp picture size with I-Zoom on, and the photos in my photo software are showing 3030mm zoom and they look amazingly good! I will post a link to some shots in the first comment on the review.,There are two FN buttons on the camera that can be set the way you want them to be.  I set FN 1 button to Bracketing and FN 2 button to Flash Control.  I may change them as time goes on, but I find it really great to be able to get Bracketing with the push of a button.,I don't care much for the lens cap, and ordered a better 55mm one on Amazon.,I use filters as it seems more often than not, I end up with my fingerprints on the lens filter.  It also keeps dirt and grime from getting to the lens.  It might offer some protection in an accident too. I would stay away from Hoya UV filters on this camera.  I was using one for a while and noticed the photos look fuzzy at full zoom.  I discovered it was the Hoya HMC filter I was using.  I now use a Sigma UV filter on the camera and it works great with no distortion at high zoom.,The camera does not come with a lens hood and none is available in the Accessories on the Panasonic web site either.  It seems there is no lens hood for this camera at this time.,This is it for now.  I will add to this review as time goes by, so check back often.,Addition:,I had a chance to check out the high speed picture mode with the camera and found this:  At 2 fps (frames per second) all works as advertised and it takes 2 fps for an extended period of time. 5 fps - it takes 5 frames per second for 3 shots and goes back to the 2 fps rate.  I tried it in Auto Focus mode and the regular mode with the same results.  9 fps - Once again, 3 shots and then the 2 fps rate.  H Mode - the camera took a very fast rate of speed (at least 9 frames per second) for 9 shots, or 1 second.  I have since found in the manual that at that speed the picture size is 2.5 or 3 mp.  I forgot which.  That is excellent.  The last mode is the Flash and it will take 5 quick photos with flash before stopping.  That could come in very handy at times.,I really like this camera.  I like the menu system on the Panasonic Cameras too.  I have the Canon SX50 as well, and still have problems with the menu settings and I have had that camera for 6 months.  The menu system just doesn't make sense to me on that camera.,I did a shootout with the Canon SX50, the Pany FZ200, the FZ70, and a Sony Nex 6.  The FZ70 images look about the same as the Canon SX50, and in my mind better than the Pany FZ200 camera.  The last shot is a Raw shot from the FZ70 camera converted to JPG.  The picture files can be seen in the Comments on page 12, the 7th post.,Added:  After using this camera for a while now,  I am even more impressed with it.  It takes great pictures and I really like the Panasonic Menu, which is laid out well and easy to use.  I am getting lots of keeper photos and the lack of noise in the shots is really appreciated!,Addition 10-29-13  I sent the first FZ70 back because the photos at high zoom were soft.  To make a long story short, it turned out that the Hoya UV filter I was using on the camera was responsible for the soft photos.  I have changed to a Sigma DG 55mm filter and the results are outstanding.  Sharp clear photos at all zoom levels.  This camera takes photos every bit as sharp and detailed as the Panasonic FZ150 or FZ200 camera and is as good as the Canon SX50 in sharpness as well.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This little camera is perfect for the point and shoot photos we want to take when we are on vacay, pics of the kids etc. It's small enough to fit in your pocket, has a great quality picture, all the accessories to easily upload to your computer for printing and social media posting. Can't beat that quality for the price and the added bonus I'm not constantly maxing out my phone storage space.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Excellent camera for my 11 year old daughter. It's small and compact which makes it easy for her to take with her.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Camera arrived quickly with everything included. I bought the camera to take on a trip out west in May, so I have only taken a few pics in the house to get a feel for how it works. So far I'm content with the pictures that it takes. Most of my photos on the trip will be outdoors during the daytime, so I'm not expecting any issues as far as clarity or lighting. Love that it came with a memory card as well as a nice sturdy case for the camera!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Pretty nice camera for size and price.. I am happy with the quality pics.. Better than most of these small point and shoot cameras. Much better quality screen and I like having a little more zoom.  Kinda disappointed there was not a usb cord for the computer thou.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Just got the camera so I'm still learning how everything works. So far, I'm extremely pleased. The pictures are great. The zoom is great. My expensive camera is old and heavy and I wanted something small and light that would take just as good a picture. This is perfect.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I am a petite female with small hands. The Canon Power Shot 180 is smaller than my Lg g7, although more than about an inch or two in width. Perfect for me! Was looking for an easy to take anywhere camera. The pics so far are great! Will will update after my trip.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Regular point and shot, without zoom, are good, clear and natural. The bundle has many nice things. But any photos taken on zoom were blurred, indistinct and seemingly without the aid of any image stabilisation. I sent the camera back after 1 day of field testing and will order the Cannon SX730HS.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Perfect for vacation travel.  Easy to use for those spontaneous, quick-capture photo ops.  Small and convenient to carry with you.  And I really love the red!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I love this little camera, it takes way better quality pictures than I thought it would for the price and its just so conveniently small to put in your pocket when traveling. Very happy with it!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I haven't been able to use the camera yet, as the user guide is a pdf file and I can't print it out or better  to print selected pages rather all 111 pages. I would be glad to pay for a microsoft word version or an already printed version. It is very hard to try to learn how to use something from a computer page. Is there some way of getting the guide as a word or some way to convert the pdf file?

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I love this camera.  My Cell takes 15mp  but nothing takes a really terrific pic but a good camera like this one.  I am very happy with this purchase.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: the camera is defective!  It will not return on and no buttons etc work.  I charged the battery as directed.  The compartment where the battery goes does not close either!  I was thrilled when i saw it as the size was perfect for my use.  I am so disappointed as i wanted it for a cruise i am going on this weekend!!!,Please let me know what you can do for me!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Camera didn't power on. Defective right out of the box. (Yes, we charged the batteries!)  Had to return.  Shoddy product.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I'm very disappointed in the picture quality.  I usually shoot photography with my Nikon 5500D but I wanted a small camera to fit in my pocket.  My cell phone pictures actually turn out better than this camera.  I tried all the settings (preset and manual), but I'm very disappoint.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Bought this camera for a vacation. Comes with a lot of stuff ! Battery life was great. Quality is good, would definitely recommend.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Bought this as a gift for my niece who is going to be traveling to Paris.  Haven't used it yet.  I've used Canon's before & they are a great camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Very nice camera.  Takes nice pictures and very clear.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: A lot of extras with this compact camera - a great bundle for the money.  I have an SLR, but don't want to drag a big camera while traveling, so this small camera is perfect & takes quality pictures.  This is a great deal for the money.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: We use this camera for capturing casual/unrehearsed moments while traveling. The wide variety of settings, the beautiful zoom, the enhancements all combine to produce wonderful memories.,This is a recent purchase, so we still have more to learn.,Only one minor problem....the wrist strap in this package did not fit the camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: My daughter loves her camera. We were so surprised with how much came with this kit. Definitely worth it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Loses focus some times.  Video gets purple lines if too bright back ground lighting.  Not acceptable of course.  Returned.  What's with Canon cameras lately?  Tired a couple and they are all sub-par,

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I bought this camera for my 11yo son's trip to Paris and he took almost 1000 great pictures with it. Almost all were in focus and image quality is very good for just over 100$. We also took the camera on a river trail mountain biking trip and got several complements on how beautiful our trip pictures were. Color of trees were a tiny bit faded but waterfalls and green/blue from river shots was true. Was all fine once I auto adjusted in software. It did fairly well with night photos in Paris. I like how compact it is and battery lasts a long time. Zoom also does not cause pixilation. I can recommend the Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 to anyone looking for an affordable portable camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I dropped my first one off a ladder several times and it just kept working. I once shut a car door on the shutter barrel while it was out. I snapped it back in place and it kept working. It finally croaked but it wasn't from a blow. I bought another. I dropped it off a second story roof onto the first story roof. It busted into several pieces. It then rolled down the roof and dropped 12' to the concrete driveway and busted into more pieces. I put them all back together except the two lens cover pieces. They're spring loaded and I can't figure out how they go back on. Even without those pieces the camera still works! Though it still works I ordered another for a backup. I expect this one to perform just as well. I take hundreds of photos a day for work. Nothing but powershots for me!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I took some test shots and video with this camera since its a gift and I don't wanna be giftin' no broken down gifts.,Right away I noticed that the screen is a bit fuzzy, but this does not correlate with the clarity of the photos.,The photos were clear and true to color.,The camera does not have built-in storage like I've experienced with other camera. Not a big deal, but it will fake you out and let you take photos, without a card, that ultimately aren't stored.,It's a reasonable weight. Not bulky or weirdly light.,The video was clear. It does have a built-in speaker. Sounds from a 4ft distance where hardly audible during a replay.,Overall, I think it will make a reasonable vlogging camera for my daughter.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Third ELPH camera I'd bought, as a replacement for another I'd thought I'd lost.  Picture quality was not as good as the first two I've owned.  Was glad I found the lost one so I had another option on my trip.  Also the settings were not easily manipulated and some were missing from the previous version.  I gave it to some of the kids on our mission trip to use and they broke the lens mechanism so the lens would no longer contract. they weren't that rough with it, but the lens became bent.  Pretty cheaply made and not worth repairing.  Won't order again.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This handy little camera is not going to take national geographic photos but it will fit in your pocket, take decent shots and will be easy to use.  The only problem you will have is that you still have to use a  memory card and there are less and less places to use those for removing photos off the camera.  It was perfect to take on vacation and not a big deal if it got lost or broken.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: The only thing I was disappointed in was there is no steady shot when taking a video!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: A decent camera but, like many compact cameras (and some larger, more expensive ones), not easy to set for particular shots (low light, flash, telephoto, etc.). For close-up snapshots, it's fine. I carry it with me and, over time, I may figure out ways to get better photos--but I shouldn't have to. Controls should be intuitive and easy to use.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I was truly disappointed with this camera, but in all fairness I shouldn't have expected much based on the price.  I really just wanted a good point and shoot camera without having to fidget around with a bunch of settings.  I've since bought a Samsung Note 9 that takes excellent photos.  I've giving this camera 3 stars only because it looks nice and the quality of camera body seems good.  Quality of photos and too many controls I can't remember what to do with knocks off the other two stars.  I've had plenty of cameras over the years so I'm not new to cameras, but this one was really for a child.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I bought the red version of the Canon power shot Elph 180 and added the USB cord that was advertised for downloading photos. I am very disappointed that the only way to download photos is by removing the memory card and inserting in the computer slot. This is really poor advertising. I also wish there was a way to send the photos to a cell phone or ipad. I should have bought a more expensive model, but I wanted something simple to use. It is simple to use, but the memory card is difficult to access and it was not as advertised. Perhaps the silver version has the USB connection?

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Used this product for a little over a month and now it doesn't work. It won't come on and if it does it won't take a picture and shut down. Fully charged. Will not order again and have to buy another camera since this one decided to stop working.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: It’s ok not really good quality, but ok for price

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: The camera is small enough for any bag or purse. It is great for traveling and easy to use.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Works great for my needs.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Good

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: My teenage daughter has been wanting a small lightweight camera for pictures rather than using her phone.  I scrolled though here and found this one which was PERFECT!!! And i got it at the perfect time for Christmas!! Not only was it compact, lightweight, the picture quality is great.  We did have to purchase the memory card separate, but that's with all cameras.  She is very excited about the camera since she's the historian for Student Council and their job is to take pictures of all school events!!,Can't wait to see how it is once school starts.  I may have to get her a 2nd SD card for personal pics.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Check out the photo to get an idea on size.  This compact camera comes with a rechargeable battery and charging cord.  It also has a carry pouch and strap for the camera.  Be sure to grab a memory card when you buy it because there is no memory space on the camera.  Very user friendly.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: I bought this to take on vacation with me. I tried it out a few times because I wanted to make sure it would be good for pictures while in Vegas. Its a great camara. I did buy an SD card for $9.99 off amazon so I could save all my pictures. I am impressed with this camara. It takes great quality pictures.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: I like how this camera is compact enough to put it in my purse. I don't always want to use my phone for pictures because the quality isn't the greatest. This has great quality and I can blow up the picture with a clear resolution, unlike cell phone pictures. It's simple enough that even my kids love to use it!

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: I bought this camera for my daughter. She loves taking pictures and it is perfect for her. Picture quality is really good and has a nice zoom and long lasting battery. It’s compact which is excellent for young kids. It’s also good for adults, fits nicely right in my purse when I borrow it from her.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Good quality in images and video

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Great Product!

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: great product

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: You troubleshoot their software for them. 4 hours of my life because the camera locks up during initial setup when uploading the inevitable software.  You have to rinse repeat until it can complete. THis on good wifi, solid bluetooth and a s9 phone.,They waste peoples time instead of software testing, and customers shouldnt troubleshoot their stuff for free. Don't accept this. Return it. It's the only way they'll be incented to invest in a reasonably dependable product.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: When the camera works its great but the problem is its hit or miss. I live in AZ where its hot.  My Hero 4 Black never had ANY ISSUES. So i recently upgraded to the Hero 7 Black. BAD IDEA. It worked GREAT for the first week then all of a sudden the BS began. Camera wouldn't turn off, would over heat and freeze constantly. I keep my settings at 2.7k60. As soo as i switch to 2.7k 120, 1080p 240 and 4k 60 everything turns to s***.  When it works the footage i get is AMAZING but the CONS outweigh the PROS right now. I will be returning to AMAZON. Guess I will have to wait and see how the Osmo Action does. Might be jumping ship. SO BEFORE YOU BUY DO YOUR RESEARCH

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: What a disaster it was depending on this for our vacation photos.  It was never able to connect to my Galaxy S7 or S8 or my girlfriends IPhone.  Spent hours w chat and on the phone - they told me to do all the obvious stuff that I tried numerous times - they were stumped.  After 2 hours of getting nowhere, I had to do other things - having accomplished nothing.  They emailed me, I replied, never heard from the again.  I REPEAT:  they emailed me, asking me questions:  I answered them:  NEVER HEARD FROM THEM AGAIN.  Not only that, but in my desperate attempt to get things to work, I signed up for the premium service.  Naively, I figured since it never connected in the first place, I simply deleted it from my phone not realizing I needed to go through the Play store.  You can imagine my dismay when I saw that they had been charging me for several months for a service they were entirely unable to provide - so far they got $550 from me and provided me with nothing, other than sucking my time and energy and failing to deliver on our once-in-a-lifetime trip to Hawaii.  I will never use GoPro again - at no point did these idiots think to apologize and replace the clearly non-functioning unit, they'd rather waste hours of my life telling me to do obvious things I'd already tried doing numerous times.  When you guys are baffled just as much as I am - its TIME TO STEP UP AND PROVIDE A SOLUTION.,I recommend checking out the Insta360 One or really anything else.  but obviously my experience is not the norm - if it was they'd be out of business.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: I purchased this GoPro for a trip to Thailand, and I am SO happy I did. It is compact, easy to use, and takes amazing photos and videos. I can’t believe I’ve ever traveled without one, but now I never will again. Other bonuses, the shipping was super fast with Prime, and packaging original and new.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Update: returned, tried again with another, this time no glitches. Works great. Good to keep in mind that there are faulty ones out there and if you have any trouble with camera freezing, exchange it right away.,Bought this go pro, I am new to go pro, 5 of us tech savvy people couldn’t get the dumb thing working. It asks to do an update, after the update nothing works. What a sad result, so much promise, but unusable product. Stick with the older models, this new one is a rush product release full of problems.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Took the camera on vacation to New Zeland. The weather was beautiful, but the ocean was COLD. This resulted in the lens fogging up so bad that the camera was inoperable. When I contacted GoPro they stated that although this was not unusual, it was not covered under their warranty. Although most users will not experience this, GoPro should at least clearly state this in their user and warranty manuals.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: I love my GoPro! I take this every time I go to the Caribbean! I've got perfect footage of Stingrays, Mantas, Sea Turtles and tons and tons of tropical fish. The clarity is amazing. Now, to get a drone to mount my GoPro on!!!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Bought this for a trip to south america because I broke the camera on my galaxy phone. I am not a professional photographer so I was looking for something simple and good. I would buy this if you are looking for the same thing. The photos are all made with this camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: For the price I paid for a slightly used one, this is a steal. For its full new price, you can do better. The buttons are too small, and Sony should take a cue from Canon with the zoom controls. Having it on the back makes it impossible to do one handed easily. The pictures are decent, but nothing special. Same with the videos. The display needs a bit of work. It looks very washed out, but thankfully, the actual images/videos are not like that. I don't think people would be too upset with a purchase at full price, but they won't be ecstatic either. Shop around. If it goes on sale, pick it up. But if you can't get it for under $125, you should go somewhere else.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: When I first got this camera I was wondering if I made a mistake.  Yes I was looking for the impossible, an inexpensive digital camera with a fairly descent zoom and good features.  Can this camera take pictures in rapid succession?  No.  In continuous mode it will do 3 shots at 1 FPS.  Can you zoom in on the pictures and see good detail?  Yes and No.  Even set at 20meg the images sometimes do not bear close scrutiny if taken under low light, like indoors at night. But with enough light on the subject it takes excellent images. Did I experience a lag when taking pictures?  Well yes and no.  The camera takes a little getting used to.  While the closest focusing distance on full wide is 5 inches, once you start to use the zoom, that close focusing distance extends out to 5 feet.  So if what you want to take a picture of is within 5 feet, just keep the camera on wide and walk up to take the shot.  If you can't walk up to take the picture then use the zoom.  Until I figured this out I was very frustrated wondering why the camera would not lock focus on the subject.  So after all of these faults why have I given this camera 5 stars.  Well you get what you pay for.  I have a Sony DSLR and a Sony all in one.  Both cost about $1,000 at the time of purchase.  Those take fantastic pictures but you can't fit them in a shirt pocket.  It is unfair to compare a camera that costs a little over $100 to those.  But for what I intended, this little DSC-W830 is fantastic.  I get very descent shots which I view on my 27" monitor.  It fits conveniently in a pocket and (once you understand the controls and get used to how it handles) takes pictures quickly and accurately enough for my needs.  If I need better I get out my more expensive cameras.  But for convenience and ease of use this little camera is a gem.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: My wife loves this camera! It is the only one she will use. She can take professional quality pictures just as good if not better than the professionals. Plus she can capture lighting bolts with the continuous shooting mode.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Okay camera.  I am really not happy with how long this camera takes to process a photo.  It is incredibly slow.  I took it on vacation and someone else on the trip had the same exact camera and has the same complaint.  It takes a long time to process a photo before you can take another photo.  I am using high capacity SD cards.  I would not recommend this camera.  I read the review before I bought this, and no one mentioned this fault.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Let me start off by saying that I have cerebral palsy which makes fine motor skill activities difficult. I am not the person that you want to call if you need a delicate touch for something because I am all ram and bam. I bring this up because this particular camera has smaller buttons to perform a lot of the cameras functions and with my rather ham fisted way of doing things I spent the first several times using the camera hitting the on/off switch rather than the button to take a picture.,I also had difficulty getting the battery and memory card into place because these actions require a very precise touch which I don’t have. I had to get help from my mom to make sure everything was in proper place. As people with disabilities have done with pretty much everything, I have adapted by changing finger positioning, so that I am not so close to two buttons. None of this is the fault of the camera of course, but thought it was worth a mention.,I will say the one camera thing that specifically bothers me is that it has a really quick trigger with my slower finger movements, I can probably end up taking 3-4 pics in a matter of seconds and that button seems pretty pressure sensitive. I can’t tell you how many interesting hockey pictures that’s lead to. It’s a solid camera, just a bit more of a challenge than I expected.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I have purchased several Sony Cyber-shots over the years. I like that they take warmer quality photos, and are affordable. What I don't like so much with this model, is that the body is now plastic, where in the past it was metal. I fear dropping this one, as with an all plastic body it will be prone to cracking, etc.,There's an improvement in this model- with the fact that you can now charge your battery IN the camera. You just plug your camera into an outlet or computer to charge. In past models you always had to remove the battery and what would happen was the door latch would eventually break and you would have to tape it shut. I'm really pleased that I can now charge the battery in the camera so it will prevent wear and tear on the battery door.,The quality of photos and macros, etc is still really nice. You can set it to automatic or custom settings. I use my camera a lot on the macro setting because I am a beauty blogger and take photographs of nail polish color on my nails. Aside from the body being plastic on this model, everything else I'm happy with.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Well made, nice looking. If you are looking for a "quick shot," though, keep the top off.  It takes too much too long to take it off.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: So this camera could have lasted longer November 2015 - February 2018. We take pictures of inventory in our motorcycle shop. The camera was well taken care of and used about once every few months. A few weeks ago I noticed while taking still shots the image was distorted with lines going through them. I wiped the storage disk clean and reformatted it and I also reformatted the camera to factory settings. None of this helped. The camera is capable of taking panoramic photos, and video but not still shots. It's very strange.,It was a decent little point and shoot for the cost but didn't hold up even with minimal use.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I really want to like this camera, I love the size, the features and the simplicity of it. It takes really good pictures, but it's stink'n slow when it writes to the memory card. I usually shoot with a Canon 50D, but I wanted something that I could keep in my pocket to capture spur of the moment things. This camera does it, but you can't be in a hurry to get the follow up shot. I've tried several different speeds of SD cards including the fastest on the market.,My wife used it for her trip to Germany and Italy. The pictures she took of static objects (castles, Alps, fountains, etc) all turned out very nice. But she complained about not being able to shoot quickly.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I just got this camera today. I have been using a Canon EOS 40D for years, and I love it. However, many times it is just too big to have with me when I see a chance for a photo shoot. This camera seems to be an excellent low-cost model, with fast shots, sharp photos, and a nice range of wide angle and zoom for a little carry-along. It will take a while to get used to using the settings and finding out the capabilities of this camera, but the photos I've taken today are pretty nice. I am hopeful it will be a wonderful addition to my photo-taking life.,I will post updates as I learn more about how well it does its job.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: 1. Cased does NOT fit camera.,2. You have to remove lens cover completely in order to use camera.,3. Only provides protection when camera is packed in carry on.,4. Snaps don't snap or pop off

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Protects my investment, keeps it free from dust and looks great.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: I returned this product for full refund.  It does not fit a Nikon Coolpix P610 without using force, which for me is unacceptable.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: It is not very functional

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: I use it for my Nikon L830--good product

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Fits Nokon perfectly! Very comfortable to use while on camera

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Fits the camera perfectly and the quality of the case is excellent.  Arrived quickly and packed with a bag to protect case for storage or travel.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Very sharp and expensive looking, easy to install on camera,. Great improvement over the lunch bag looking case provided by original.

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: This is a great 1st camera at a good price for someone young or just getting started taking photos. I bought it for my 8 yr old who likes to take pictures. She is a little young but her 9 yr old brother has it too and he loves it. Easy to use, good general photos

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: This does the job and picture quality is very good. I am pleased with this camera and have recommended it to others.

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: Very happy with this camera, excellent value for money. Comfortable to hold and really good video pictures. I highly recommend it! Great for anyone just looking to casually record or capture family moments, or for anyone looking to record to upload to social media outlets.

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: It has WiFi Function to connect to the phone. The picture quality is amazing as well as the video recorder, overall it was a very good purchase, would definitely recommend to everyone.

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: This was a holiday gift for my 12 year old daughter. The camera takes a decent picture. She loves it and it is a great starter camera for her.

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: This camera has exceeded expectations. Due to its size, features and ease of use it was perfect for our trip to Disney World.

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: Everything about this camera is perfect. Very small, tremendous quality of pictures and enough features to suit my wife who uses it and knows nothing much about photography.

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: Takes decent quality photos. Good quality build. Small so really handy, easy to carry. Recommend.,"

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: This camera is great for the price. It has all the basic needs for a great starter digital camera. Takes great pictures! I bought it for my daughter and she loves it! Would buy again!

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: Nice camera and I've used it several times now. Fits easily into pocket or handbag and is easy to operate. Picture quality very good for a small camera.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This was for a granddaughter who loves it, but it's been a struggle figuring out the details of how to use it.  The directions in the package were worthless, but the company sent a pdf file with directions that were helpful on request.  Focus is the major remaining issue as there is no push-and-pause autofocus feature as with most digital cameras and she does get some blurry pictures.  I was also on my own figuring out spare batteries and external chargers.  The battery stuff is fine now, and we'll see what the pictures look like when she comes back from camp.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I was so scared to put it in the water because I don’t know what made it water proof. But I did. And it still works! The picture quality was poor at the beginning and then I realized I can adjust the quality. It doesn’t come with SD card so I have to order a card to see the quality. But so far it works great!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Good portable solution with great battery life. I recommend its use for casual photography. Please note that its a good camera but by any means, it is not a professional camera. It's a good option to give as a gift for older or/and younger people. Please keep in mind you will need a small SD card too.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is perfect for travel because it one thing less to worry about during the trip because it's not the end of the day if you lose it not like these few hundred dollars camera you gotta be so careful about. This thing is so compact so light and picture quality wise is actually pretty good, yes pretty good not super great but your paying 80 bucks for a recording camera don't expect too much. The attachment picture shows this camera is laying on an iPhone 6Plus so to give you an idea how small this thing really is, the only downside of this purchase is that it doesn't come with any mini SD card so you have to purchase one. Have fun recording!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I Love this Wide Instax it camera, both the Instax 8 and the wide work great but I do enjoy the size of this photos, it's not much bigger but it does make a difference at least for what I needed it for. For my wedding I did a scrapbook at the entrance instead of a signing book, So I had guest take a selfie( or had someone else take pic) and then they would write a message on white portion of pic. So with this size I was able to appreciate it better specially when it was a couple of guest versus just one person. Great Product.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Camera itself is really small which means all buttons were really small and difficult to press with average size fingers. I returned camera because it was not compatible with my laptop to download pictures even after upgrading software, etc. which in itself was a big consuming project. Certainly not worth my time or money or aggravation and not getting the results I wanted.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I love the budget price, easy for kids to use, front facing camera for selfies and video, lightweight, great color, lots of setting, zoom works well. No water got in on my test. A waterproof camera is a must for vacation, rain, or any water activity. I did not like that the battery compartment was a bit hard for me to open, had to buy a separate micro SD card, no carry strap, and most of all the microphone is not that great and no way to attach an external mike for videos. Great camera for kids, around water, and good price!

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I originally purchased this camera only to use when I went to the beach it arrived and I am happy to say this camera has already shown its many uses! My kids went to the splash pad and I was able to get some really good pictures while they're having fun And didn't have to worry about ruining the camera. I am looking forward to bringing it to the beach and the lake. It is very lightweight which is perfect for my little guy and I don't have to worry about it banging around too much.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: received this bundle about a month ago but have not flown it yet due to the bad weather up here in PA. Everything looks good except for the light kit connectors. they are very very thin and broke off both sets trying to set up the lights, the company was very helpful when I had a question about hook up. They emailed me very good pics of how to set them up. in the mean time I will use a 3s 1000mah lipo to run them mounted in back if the camera. will make my final review after the maiden flight......well the maiden flight went extremely well. This platform is very good for a beginner and can grow into it. Landings do take a little practice but with the prop guard s no worry so. again very happy..

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I love this camera so much!!! I'm still learning how to use it but i'm mostly glad that this deal is 100% real and not a scam! I read everything this camera came with and still couldn't believe how much stuff it came with until it arrived!! Highly suggest this package if this is the camera you're looking for!!!!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: It fits well with what the web displays. As I bought this for my 13 years old nephew as a birthday gift. I am surprised by how well it works for how little it costs. Actually, it was better light weight and the video was clearer than I expected. Moreover, the remote control makes it more interesting in operation. My nephew love it and I am really happy.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I did not like the quality of the camera.  lack of focus and clear picture.  I thought it was protected when i went to water park.  I was pushed under the falls at lazy river and it was shot.  I only used it one day and it was not this day.  My vacation was ruined because of this... not worth the buy

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Our family was so excited to see how it works in the pool yesterday. Really happy with the performance of this, Yes you get what you pay for, and battery life and sound quality are not as good as the top of the range, but thats easy to work around and the images are good quality. For a camera likely to see hard use and abuse, the price versus quality makes it a great choice.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: At first, I was wondering why my pics all turned out blurry. Then I pulled out the little instruction manual. I needed to turn it to mountain mode. After that, the photos came out good. The camera is surprising light weight.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I was looking for a simple camera for my boyfriend, who recently love to take a picture while swimming. He loves this camera--it's easy, and it's waterproof.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I had hopes for this camera as something that would be short on features but at least have decent image quality. The zoom is worthless. You can't half-press the shutter to focus and overall image quality on test pics were horrific. I ended up returning it and spent the extra $40 for a cheap Sony  DSCW800 which is amazing for the extra $$.  Don't waste your time on this GordVE camera, it really is a bad buy.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This thing takes horrible photos!  First trip to Europe and I have very few good photos (out of 1200 taken).  They're way too dark, blurry, etc.  I'm not a photographer (or I wouldn't be buying a simple point and click) but this camera was a huge disappointment and memories will be forever lost.  Boooooo  :(
