review: My fiancee got this for my birthday, the GoPro is fine so far, but it did NOT come with an extra battery or SD card as advertised. Upon contacting seller they told us there was nothing they could do about it. Bad Business. Buy elsewhere!!!

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I bought this camera for a child about a year ago.  I wanted to take time to get to know it before submitting a review.  I was looking for an inexpensive camera that took decent pictures and was from a brand that is known for cameras or at least electronics.  There are few cameras that cost less than $100 from a reliable brand.  The only cameras geared toward kids are more like toys and are about 1 Mp so this was our best find.  The camera is compact, easy to use, and takes decent pictures, especially for the price.  The video is choppy and you can hear the auto focus constantly.  While i didn't buy the camera for its video capability that is one of the favorite features of the child, so it's important to know if you care about the video.,As other reviewers noted, the battery life is ridiculously short, even from taking it out of the box.  We quickly bought rechargeable batteries.  I would say that the battery life lasts 15-20 minutes, even with regular non-rechargeable batteries.  It's fine for playing around the house, but if we were out taking pictures on a vacation or a hike, it would be extremely frustrating.  Don't buy this camera if you intend to use it for any length of time to take pictures.  If you're looking for a first camera for a child (5-9) that will be okay using it for short time periods, it's okay.  I do agree with other reviews that leaving the batteries out in between uses also helps prolong the life of the batteries, which is ridiculous.  Too bad the battery life isn't better, I was hoping we'd be able to use this camera for a long time.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Nice information from the seller. And easy to buy all items

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I have owned three of these cameras and they are really good inexpensive cameras to keep with you for special moments.,The first one after about a year had noise in the video sound so I purchased another with an extended warranty and at about,the one year point had some display problems. Seems Sony does not want to fix it and accused me of abusing it so I will try,the extended warranty instead. While it is in for repairs I bought another. It is a good camera for around $100 even if it only lasts,about a year. I just made sure on the third one to get the square deal extended warranty because Sony wanted me to pay over $200,to fix my second one that was ten months old and still in the warranty period. So buyer beware.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Nice camera but has some serious problems. I compared the photos from this 20.1 MP camera to my Nikon S4000 12 MP camera. The DSCW830 (in landscape mode) has a problem with bright sun as it causes washout. That does not happen with my Nikon. We have gravel walkways and if the sun is shining the DSCW830 has a problem photographing the gravel, the Nikon does not. My 5 MP phone camera also does not. Other areas that are in the sun also get washed out. It appears that the brightness overloads the image sensor. I have been taking photos of our yard for years as we have lots of flowers and stuff that blooms from Spring to Fall. I compared a lot of previous photos taken with other cameras/phones and the comparison to the DSCW830 was disappointing. The color and clarity were not what I had hoped for.,However, if you are not doing outdoor photos then this might be a good camera as it is easy to use and easy to setup.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I'm no expert, so this is a good camera for me.  I also hate reading a lot of directions, but that was no problem.  This was easy enough to figure out between a bit of reading and a few minutes on YouTube.  PROS: Easy to figure out, small as a deck of cards, has a lens protector, can look up more detailed directions online (for trouble-shooting); CONS: Doesn't come with a protective case, doesn't come with a memory card, a little on the slow side -but that doesn't bother me.  It took Rembrandt a lot longer.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I honestly am considering returning this camera if I still can... I loved my Sony Cybershot cameras in the past which is why I purchased this and I assumed this one would yield *relatively decent* pictures. I wasn’t naively hoping for super crisp, professional shots considering the price, but I am very disappointed with the quality of the pictures this camera takes.... even with a flash, the pictures just aren’t any good. The speed of the shutter is super slow so if you’re trying to take even slightly low light photos without a flash, they will be, with no doubt, super blurry and grainy... and with a flash, the picture is washed out and everyone has red pupilsz The camera is lightweight, which is nice but I honestly don’t even bother bringing it with me places because the photos it takes aren’t worth the time or energy.... I was hoping for a light weight, quality point and shoot to use when I don’t want to carry around my SLR... and to replace using my iPhone all the time. No such luck with this lil guy, unfortunately... Perhaps I’ve lost my touch with using these little cameras, but I truly feel this products isn’t worth the money, especially for someone without any background in photography, which is who this ideally would be perfect for... in a perfect world.. anyway, don’t bother. And I’ll just add, writing this review makes me want to see if I can return it even more now.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I bought his camera for my tech challenged parents who wanted a small easy to use camera for their vacations. There is a setting in the menu "easy" that they can leave and get automatically the best settings without them having to change much. There is also an easy slider botton that changes between photo, panorama and video... so far so good. The only downside is the battery life, I felt that they ran low fast. I bought a 2 pack and car charger in addition to the original items in the pack and that was perfect for them.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Update March 9, 2019.,This camera is a white elephant since 4 months ago. very sad. my last sony lasted for years and was my best companion device everywhere i travelled around the world. I even get comments like "cool, someone with a real camera!". This lousy replacement is so bad i ended up like everyone else using my iphone instead. Disappointed,.,Original review:,Purchased this to replace my Sony DSCWX9 which i loved until it is acting up after many years (plastic battery lock fails which i held up with a piece of tape) and it is not restarting properly upon pressing start button.,I want another Sony. I had had two previous DSC generations with Carl  ZEISS lens and i like to stick with it. After researching and reading the reviews, I thought Sony DSCW830 would be good replacement but NO.,1. Picture quality not good - the colors does not come close to the true colors that my old sony takes. The old sony takes sunsets for example, showing vibrancy in the hues,I take many photos for real estate properties and compare with my old sony, this one pales in comparison. it does not capture good ANGLES like the old one does. I took photos of the same rooms from same position, the DSCW830 cannot capture as much and as wide.,2. Smaller display LCD screen. I knew that before buying from the specs but usually when  they change a newer model, it is an upgrade. in this case, they reduce screen size for what? save cost of manufacture???,The only positive thing i like is that the video recording is quick and good. And, it is lighter and smaller so fits in my pocket without much weight. but these do not compensate for poor quality photos.,I do not recommend this camera. wish i can return it for a better one.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Gorgeous camera case; well made.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: PO'D...DOES NOT COME WITH A/C WALL ADAPTER! PC CHARGING ONLY!.. So I bought this camera for a special event TOMORROW, Jan 25th, 2019. It arrives, looks OK, BUT, where is the AC ADAPTER it says and shows comes with it? Missing item? YES, but it's MORE than just that. The little square box, which has 2 inputs, 1 for the USB connection(other part of the USB, a micro USB, connects to the camera itself to CHARGE IT, WHEN the AC Wall adapter is plugged in) ...and the other "2-port" connection, the "POWER CORD(Mains lead) which IS NOT Included in the US/Canada/China VERSION of this camera),  Look at the Instruction manual, 2nd page, and it shows For Customers in the USA/Canada/China, a square box, that has an AC Adapter that pulls out from the side so you can plug it in and charge it. NOPE! NOT WITH THIS CAMERA!...I was sent this yesterday, spent 30 minutes on the phone being apologized too. The Rep said he'd send out another camera, and I am too take out the AC Adapter from that camera, and return the rest...I said PLEASE MAKE SURE it has the AC ADAPTER, because if I get this again, and there's no AC adapterfor me to plug in, I'm gonna be really PO'd....After being put on hold, I'm told, YES IT DOES, and we'll overnight it for FREE!...OK, TY!!...Well it just came, and it's the same damn thing, NO AC ADAPTER to plug into the wall...Now, you CAN charge it via the USB using your PC & supplied USB Cable. Now for some, that is perfectly A-OK....But, for myself, and/or others who may not own a PC, or only have an older PC with a lot less USB Ports too access, it's not OK!...Now I won't do that ever again because in the past I did that with another small item that said I can charge it via my PC and supplied USB Cable and it F'd up my PC within a few minutes, so never again. I fought for months with those companies to get the money to fix my PC, and finally did!  So again, this HAS NO AC OUTLET w/ "PRONGS (if you will) to plug into the wall...IF you wanna charge this via your PC, and that is OK with you, godspeed....It's Not hard listing the ACTUAL CONTENTS, how it charges etc...IF this ad said, CHARGING THE BATTERY VIA THE USB & YOUR PC ONLY, IN THE US/CANADA/CHINA...OK, not a problem then I look for a different camera....So i blame Amazon, and Sony for this BS and utter nightmare...Just look at the image in the Instruction manual! I did that before I bought it, and I also read other customers questions and replies, and YES it comes with a charger and AC ADAPTER.....While I guess, technically true, if the camera's INSTRUCTION MANUAL SHOWS THE AC ADAPTER THAT PLUGS INTO THE WALL, THERE BETTER BE A DAMN AC ADAPTER THAT PLUGS INTO THE GODDARN WALL!

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Beautiful for the price it looks I would have paid at least $100 for it!! I will have to see how it will hold up over the years but out of the package it's beautiful!!

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Size is great, lay out is great, quality is great....I would highly recommend this camera bag for anyone needing one this size.,Thank you

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The camera is small and compact and the pictures are good. However, it takes a very long time for the pictures to be taken. Whenever you need to take pictures quickly, this camera will fail an you end up with blurry pictures. I purchased the camera to capture my child in a competition and it took so long for the pictures to be taken I ended up not having any pictures of the event. This was so so disappointing. the person has to stay still for a long time for you to capture images. i even try adjusting the settings and this did not help.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: honestly, this is an o.k. camera. nothing too complicated, but not super user friendly either. too many options, which may or may not be a good thing for you. however, i find the camera on my microsoft lumia 950 blows this out of the water, especially with night pictures. it does take very sharp pics, but so does my lumia 950, and these days, i found my lumia brand new, although listed as refurbished on ebay for the same price as this camera, and thats also obviously a phone which i have on me everyday anyways. so, why need this? these types of cameras are becoming obsolete.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: The case is of excellent quality; the fit and construction are nearly perfect.  I was quite surprised to see this quality for such a low price!

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Good quality, excellent performance. Easy to use. Recommended for various occasions. Appropriate design for easy handling. Recommended accessory that can not miss.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: this is a replacement to a sony pocket camera that has been used for over a decade.  I wanted the same camera, but this seems to be the upgrade to it.,it seems that pictures that you think have been shot, have not actually processed.  there is a length of time for the photo to process prior to clicking the shutter again.  the continuous mode will miss/skip photos.  this was extremely frustrating, as I missed a few photos that can not be recaptured.,although this camera has a panoramic mode (which I thought was going to be sooo fun!!), the quality of the picture is not what I want.  the height of the picture decreases due to the length of the picture.  so, It's difficult to see the picture.,the auto focus does not work very well, as the shutter speed is really slow !!!  so when trying to capture a moving target, you will end up with a blurred picture.,the movie mode sees to work pretty well.  however, changing modes is awkward, not a smooth transition, so you might miss out on something.,I feel like I would rather have paid less and had the same results; however, I missed the return date by 2days :(

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Case fits perfectly however inserting the hold-down screw initially first time took some time but overall the case Is alright.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: This is a great bag. I can fit my P520 camera. Everything was shipped in good condition and in a timely manner. I would recommend it to everyone.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: It is built quite good and fit my camera perfectly

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Case  fit the camera. Service was very quick.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Excellent description, fits camera perfectly. Fast shipping!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This camera is small and cute.  It is very easy to set up and use.  The picture quality is really good.  I just love how small it is cause I can just put it in my pocket and take it anywhere with me.  This camera came with 2 Li-ion Batteries and these are rechargeable.  It also comes with a charging cord that you can plug into your computer.  Batteries do last for quite a while before needing to be recharged.  For the price you get a really neat little camera.  The instruction manual is easy to use once I used a magnifying glass.  The print is very small and I am very old.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I bought this low-cost camera for my husband who is not at all tech savvy. I needed something simple for him and this fits the bill. I was really surprised by the quality of the pictures. They are, in fact, quite good. Sure, it doesn't have all the bells and whistles of the expensive cameras, but it is great for a beginner or for a child's first camera.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: How can you go wrong with a $40 digital camera. This camera takes adequate pictures and is great for taking photos on trips where your running around. No need to worry about loosing the camera @ this price point it's easily replaceable. It's not going to rival a Pro DSLR but for a quick trip to the Zoo, fine.. OR even better give this camera to your up and coming Photographer.. This is perfect for agest 12+, that exactly how I view it... IT works..

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Got this student camera just in time for my daughter's camping trip this week. After learning from the manual, this compact HD digital camera turns out to be very functional, yet simple and lightweight enough for a kid to handle. The switch on the side of the camera controls close up shot vs landscape shot, while only in landscape shot mode, you can use the digital zoom option. As for the image sizes, there are over a dozen image / pixel sizes to choose from. Also there are various scene options for different scenarios on the go, all managed from the menu setting. It comes with a wrist strap, a camera pouch, wall charger with USB cable, and TWO rechargeable lithium batteries. My daughter can't wait to take it to the camp and capture precious moments with her friends!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I just got this today and can't really say much about the camera except that it's very nice and surprisingly lighter than I had expected (which is good) everything else you get with it is ok. My favorite is the large tripod. The screen protectors do not look good on the screen so I didn't use them (see pic) The flash is by Vivitar so is the camera bag and table top tripod (which was not able to hold the camera) The extra lenses and lens filters provided are by a different company so you need to purchase an adapter to connect them if you want to use them with the camera. I took a few pictures of sunflowers on here to show you the amazing detail. Customer service is wonderful and super to deal with. The cleaning kit came with a soaked box and empty bottle but said they'd send me another one. So far so good, I think it's great! I'll update this review if I need to, in the meantime I'll try to answer anyone's questions if you have any.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: If you are looking for a good quality camera thats easy to use this is your camera. Must say I definitely got what I wanted. The best part about it is thay it brings a USB wire and for a bonus 2 batteries. It does not come woth a memory card but you can get one at any pharmacy or almost any store. I bought it as a gift and when I set it up to make sirr it worked well I decided to keep it 😬. A must get and the price is definitely not bad.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Excellent purchase.  But it should include a Memory Card, rather than make the purchaser wait and be surprised that they purchased a fabulous camera, easy to use and received Amazon Prime service.....but then have to scrounge up a ten dollar memory card...tsk tsk tsk.... But knowing all the above, I then purchased a second identical camera (and a card at the same time) for gifting to a friend.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This is the 3rd Canon Rebel I have owned.  I had one before the era of digital cameras and then I purchased my first digital version 12 years ago.  My 12 year old very outdated Canon Rebel was still taking good pictures but the lag time and some other issues had me looking to finally upgrade to a newer version.  After reading reviews, I decided to go with the T6 and the package deal offered here on Amazon.,This camera is everything I expected it to be.  An upgraded and better version of my older one.  All of my Canon lens and my Canon Flash attachment can be interchanged.  I still haven't had a chance to figure out how the Wi-Fi features works but will get to that feature shortly.,I am strictly a novice photographer. I really have no idea how to use any of the manual settings.  This camera helps a novice feel more like a, pro.  The quality of the pictures is impressive.  I highly recommend this camera for anyone that enjoys photography but may feel a bit intimidated by some of the more complex and expensive SLR cameras.  This camera is easy enough for anyone to figure out.,I also recommend this package.  Although I won't use everything that was included, the memory cards, the UV filters ,and the two screw on lens attachments make it worth purchasing the bundle.  As for the UV filter it's good to use just to protect your camera. Sometimes I remove it,before taking a picture and then screw it back on when I am finished. It's a great extra layer of protection.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: It is a great gift for kids. I bought for my little cousin to learn how to take photo. It is light weight, and my cousin can carry it for vacation. This camera is very easy and simple to use. And it is modern style. The photos are good considering the low price of this camera. What's more, it was shipped very fast.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Silly me! I though this camera would come with an SD card and a cable to connect it to a computer for picture transfer...but it didn’t.  Now I have to but these in addition to buying the camera.  It’s entirely my fault— I didn’t read the description well enough...how strange on me to assume a camera would come with two necessary components.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Went from knowing absolutely nothing and taking garbage pictures to taking some breathtaking pictures. Once you start to learn all the functions (still learning) you will no doubt be on par with some of the best out there. This camera is beautiful, ergonomic, and fantastically well priced.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I purchased this camera for my 10 year old daughter to take on her first class trip to Washington DC this past weekend. When the camera arrived last week, we charged the batteries, purchased a SanDisk SD card to store images on, and got a padded case to go with it. After batteries were charged we tested the camera and took several pictures to make sure the camera was working, and to make sure our daughter knew how to operate all the functions on it.  Nothing seemed amiss, our daughter was thrilled, and she was all set to go.,Upon her return this evening, we found out that the camera began glitching. The screen would freeze after taking pictures, every few photos. The second day she used the camera it froze and became unresponsive. Her teacher turned the camera off and on to see if it would unfreeze, and my daughter reported that half of her photos on the SD card had disappeared.  When my daughter took more pictures and tried to review them, there was an error message saying "no such file exists".  She then turned the camera off and back on again, and the device erased ALL the pictures on the SD card.,We have tried to connect the camera to our computer, and it will not allow itself to be recognized by our computer.  We hooked the SD card up to a separate card reader with USB port, and the SD card is functioning just fine.  Just empty.,This camera is a worthless piece of junk, and my child is now absolutely HEARTBROKEN because NONE of the pictures she took on trip were recorded, and she has NO pictures from her first trip to our nation's capital.  The reviews all said this camera was great for kids and as a starter camera.  I do agree with it's basic shape - the size of the camera body was just right for her, the functions were simple and easy to figure out, and the extra battery was a nice bonus.  But there must be some major flaw in the internal components for it to completely erase a brand new SD card.,Do not purchase this camera if you are wanting your child or family member to have a reliable device to take pictures of anything memorable. This camera should be taken off Amazon and any other selling marketplaces. It is a waste of money to purchase this, period.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I got this camera for a week long bike trip to keep in my jersey and avoid using my phone all the time to conserve my phone battery life. I had digital cameras in the 1990s that performed better. This product had absolutely terrible image quality and battery life and was completely unreliable and dysfunctional. If you are on a tight budget, take the time and save up for something better or try yard sales for something more proven- you'll be better off.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Was a gift for my mom, shes a fire fighter, She said she loved it! Easy to use, very portable, and withstood the heat of fire while maintaining beautiful picture quality. She however lost it when she took it with her. Her troop is deployed on fires for around 14 days straight. Just as they where coming back from a long fire in California (yes she has been one of the firefighter's fighting the Cali fires of 2018) it dropped from her pack never to be seen again. She was very bummed about it, didnt even get a chance to print any of her fire picture, which we where all bummed about. But she stood by her love of the short lived camera, and its beautiful pictures.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: This camera fits in the palm of my hand & feel that it would be a good basic starter camera.,I got frustrated with my older large camera & thought I'd try a smaller one. After researching on the internet (not Amazon), I found most brands & models of cameras were about 60/40.,The first camera I had, the zoom would get stuck which creates an issue when making a video.,The replacement works well. I do have longer battery life but it's lacking features & settings I would like to have.,However, the main purpose of my purchase was to take pictures of items that I am selling at a popular website. What I discovered was, no matter the zoom level or macro, you can't get too close to the item being photographed which later ends up needing image editing. In addition, I have notice the center of the picture is clear while the outer edges are slightly blurred.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I am SO excited about this purchase! When i saw the price for how much it came with I was sold. I still can't believe it's mine! My boyfriend got the older version of this camera a few years back and he absolutely loved it. I wanted to get this camera to take pictures of our adventures together and everything along the way! also starting a youtube channel here soon! I will update with more awesome pictures later on. If you're thinking about getting this camera and you have the money, do it!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This DSLR is a great entry level camera, me and my wife are using it to learn photography. Works perfectly. I took one star because the external flash of the bundle only works as slave and does not work directly with the camera. (This means that it is still usable, the flash reads the light from the camera flash and works, you just cant use it directly attached to the camera as the main flash) If this is a bundle everything should work properly). Is important to note that not all the things from the bundle are of very good quality but many are really useful. In our case, the most useful items of the bundle are: Tripod, sd cards, bag, cleaning cloth, external shooting cable. I'll upload some photos shoot with the camera with the default kit lens it came with, important to note that I shoot in RAW and use Lightroom, nothing mayor, just a bit of contrast, just a little bit of saturation and sharpness. With good lighting and good composition this camera does the job really well. (We own a Foodtruck business)

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: You need this camera and set, just trust me. Take good photographs with it's HD lens like my friend's $2,000 camera does. He's mad. Lol

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Bought this camera for my 7 and 11 yo. daughters and they love it. We took them on a vacation and they had lots of fun taking photos.,The camera is small (i.e. easy to carry) and in good light takes some pretty nice photos. Not great in low light, but there's a flash. Comes with TWO batteries, which is nice. One battery lasts quite awhile, but it's nice to have the backup.,Zoom is only digital. Does not come with an SD card, so make sure you buy one or two. I bought 16GB cards and they did not get filled on the trip.,Bottom line - you get a lot for $41. There are a fair number of settings and it doesn't break the bank. But be reasonable with your expectations - it's not an expensive camera.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: If you're going on vaycay and don't want to risk dropping your phone in a lake or off a mountain or whatever, this is a good option to drop in a lake instead. It'll still get broken, but at least it's not your phone and you're not out a ton of money. It is in fact the cheapest camera I could find where the image quality didn't make me want to yeet it into the sunset.,Overall, it's equivalent-to-or-better-than most smartphone cameras. It's got a decent optical zoom, so you can zoom in a bit without losing picture quality so it's actually better than a phone-camera in that sense. The zoom lens neatly retracts into the body when the camera is off so you can still stuff it into a convenient pocket (which is good because this listing doesn't come with a case). The sensor isn't anything to write home about, but it's the standard 1/2.3" size for a decent compact camera (and the same or bigger than most smartphones) and gets the job done.,This has all the basic functionality I expect out of a camera - zoom, half-press the shutter button to check focus, a few different shooting modes that I will ignore in favor of "auto" 95% of the time, and a menu to review your taken photos.,Digging through the settings/menus seems a bit un-intuitive to me, but again I'm going to be running on auto 95% of the time so that impacts my experience very little.,It runs off (and came with) two AA batteries. I prefer rechargeable, but this does make it easy to find and carry backup power and for the cost I can't complain.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I use this professionally and take lots of photos including those in macro mode of writing on manufacturer's tags. I have the ISO set to 1600, macro mode on, and try my best at holding the camera stable when taking a photo. I am taking photos of still objects, not moving objects.,Many photos (with and without macro mode on) are blurry. I have always used Fuji Finepix camera and they took much better closeup photos, but none of their current cameras use AA batteries (only proprietary ones) and were the smaller form factor like this camera. I prefer using AA batteries so I can recharge/swab new batteries on the fly when I am in a dark attic or crawl space. Having to buy multiple proprietary batteries and already have an extra charged one is a pain. The manual for this camera is lacking and I think I've followed all recommendations for settings to minimize blur but to great so far..  what am I missing? I don't see a specific shutter speed setting or I'd use that to help minimize blur.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: The added accessories are not from Canon and the quality are so so low. Just buy the camera alone and don't waist your money for low quality accessories.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Like the camera, size and all but the instructions are a nightmare!!!! Would not buy again. My brother is a computer genius and had to set it up  for me and he was complaining about the instructions! Taking it to Germany and hope it will work fine but it's not what I can recommend!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I am amazed at the quality of the picture from this little camera even with the zoom. If you look there are a lot of settings as well as Automatic. It does macro as well as landscape with just the flick of a switch. It also does video, I have only used this by accident so I can not speak to its size or quality. THis beats a lot of name brand point and shoot for a lot more money and it fits easily in my shirt pocket.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I got this to replace another Canon ELPH that I have had for at least 12 years, maybe longer. It still works, but sometimes tells me I have a full battery charge when I don't. This ELPH seems fine and the picture quality is excellent. I need to get used to some of the changes in controls before I can give a complete review. So far, I am pleased with it. I looked at reviews and prices on similar products and decided to stay with Canon, and I have not been disappointed. I will update my review when I have used it more often.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: So far, so good. Bought Nikon CoolPix 10 earlier this year. Familiar with this brand - it works great. Easy, simplified instructions for use(provided). Picture quality is very good. Camera has a flash, which works well at night. Focus can be easily regulated from close to far distance.However, camera has a very inconvenient battery slot, batteries(2 AA) exhausted fast, no visible picture in the bright sun, some minor defects. Memory card has to be bought separately. Bought with a warranty. Recommend despite some obvious fails. Nikon COOLPIX 10 has made top 20 camera list in Consumer Report past year.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Really disappointed in Nikon, I would have liked this little camera to come with a SD card or at the very least the proper cable. Did I not see in the description, SD card and cable sold separately?  So now Im ordering an SD card

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: So far everything in the picture is off.. I hope people read this, the bag and most of the products in here are from an extremely crappy brand called vivitar. I went with cannon because cannon is a high quality product. Vivitar is not. Vivitar produces horrible stuff. It is extremely sad to see that I bought this with my income tax, so I can take better pictures of my one year old, and our new baby on the way, and when I open I see vivitar it makes me feel like a bought a Gucci bag on the streets of new York city. I hope they didn't swap the camera insides and just leave a cannon shell. Ugh, if this was in the pictures I would not have bought this.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I love the camera, but the accessories are junk.  The card reader ruined a couple of cards, so buy a better one.  The 55mm lens is great.  The other ones aren't very exciting.  The camera bag was alright, but don't expect to fit everything in it.  The tripod is a cheap-o, but does the trick for beginners.  The polarized filter is excellent.  I leave it on the camera as a lens protector.  The card case is handy for all the SD cards.,I'd recommend this camera in a heartbeat, but most of the non-canon accessories are garbage. It's a great beginner/intermediate camera.  The auto and pre-set options aren't worth using, and you'll be disappointed with the pictures those take.  I highly recommend taking the time to learn the aperture, shutter, ISO, etc.  It's easy to get off of the auto-mode and use AV, TV, P modes.  Do that, and you'll be taking near-pro pictures in no-time.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Lots of stuff included that I won't use and the one thing I thought I was getting (the higher powered zoom lens) was not included.  Then when I go to see if I can purchase it, I can't find it.  Lots of fluff and not the right stuff!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: WOW so much fun! Got this and a case for my girlfriend for an anniversary and she LOVES it. It is completely plastic so I wouldnt say it feels ";nice"; or anything but it is very well made, everything is snug. It fits very well in the hand. We are still playing with the settings on the thing, there is a lot to learn! I almost wish they would include 5-10 film so you didnt have to spend $5-10 learning how to use all the settiings. Once we figured it out, pictures turn out amazing. SO much fun. A couple of friends have purchased the camera after seeing this one and love it also.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I -like you- did an EXTENSIVE research on which camera to use for my niece's birthday party celebration, and I finally decided to give this camera a try and I have to say that I'm extremely happy so far! the pictures are great and the size is a little bit bigger than other cameras.It is a little bulky but I really don't mind that as long as the pictures come out nice, and they do.I did pay full price for this, and in no way received any discounts or such, so be confident this is a real review.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: So far working great! I have tested it out on just 2 pictures so far, but plan on using it at my wedding reception. If you are looking for perfectly clear resolution with sharp pictures this is NOT the camera for you. We are so used to digitized photos in this day and age, some might be disappointed with the quality. But if you are wanting an old fashion style ";polaroid"; camera, with soft focus, this is great! Make sure you read the instructions, but very easy to use.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Just got it yesterday.  It is easy to use.  So far I am pleased with it.  I took a few photos and transferred them to my computer using the memory card.  The camera is very light weight and user friendly.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I looked at several other cameras for less money but by the time you add the tripod, memory, case, etc. you were at the price point anyhow...I got them all in one package...one day after ordering!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: 3 months so far, great pictures. if you read the manual and practice you can take high-quality pictures no matter what.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Works great.  I bought it for my brother who is mildly handicapped and has gone through several of the cheaper discount store digital cameras.  This one takes the full size SD card and has a lot of easy to use features.  I took a few pictures and the quality was amazing.  I put in a 16GB SD card and had him take several "practice pictures" pictures before he left on a trip to Maine yesterday.  Hopefully he will come home with several high quality pictures.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Very good camera!  Inexpensive for the quality!  I like that it uses regular/rechargeable batteries instead of just a chargeable battery(ies).  I'm a real estate agent and it meets my business needs.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: The camera is small and convenient to carry, but the picture quality is questionable and the zoom decreases the quality even more. Even with the flash, I had difficulty at time capturing pictures in lower light situations. But for the price it was a decent point and shoot.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I purchased this camera for my granddaughter as she was going on a class trip to Washington DC. Unfortunately the battery died on the first day and would not recharge. The camera was useless without a charged battery. I missed out on the return date by three days.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is a good value deal. The camera is good quality and takes nice pictures. It is small and easy to use - ideal for someone who wants to take holiday pictures without too much fuss. The five times optical zoom is reasonable for casual use, and the number of megapixels is plenty unless you wanted to blow pictures up to a really huge size. It is a small light, nice looking camera and the controls are easy to use. It comes with one battery plus a charger, and a cable for connecting it direct to your computer.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: My daughter just started art school and needed a good camera to do her upcoming projects with. I saw this mini camera and ordered it. So glad I did. It is small and light weight and takes high quality images and video. It has built in flash and very easy to use. It comes a pouch and a wrist strap. This camera makes a excellent gift. Kids and adults will love it!!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Wonderful product, easy to use. My sister loved this gift.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I don't like the fact that you have to go online to download the manual. The quality of the pictures is fair. Simple to operate. Not sure of the battery life yet, but it seems to be okay. I would recommend getting another battery and card if you take this on vacation.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Works great. I use for video mostly. My only complaint is the product description is not accurate or helpful enough. I would like a description for how long the battery lasts, some sort of chart for how memory is used: how long can I video, how many pictures can I hold. I would like to know simple thing like the max video you can take is 30 min before the camera shuts off.,All in all, the answers to these questions are better than I expected so I can't really complain.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I absolutely love this camera. Its so light weight and sized perfectly! I put a picture of the camera next to a cotton swab for size reference. The photos cone out super vlear and its awesome that it comes with a rechargeable battery. Such an awesome camera!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: In today’s day and age cameras like this are getting replaced with phones but I got this knowing that and just wanted something my son can carry around to take some nice pictures with his grandparents that was small which wouldn't take up space. This is a great gift for someone younger or their first camera. Some of the pictures he took made this a well worth purchase.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: using it for my field geology project in iceland, perfect for the situation, and really good so far

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This camera came with everything , it's compacted and have everything needed , the case , the card reader, the memory card . It's also small ,neat and easy to use.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: It's been YEARS since I had to buy a camera. I was so delighted that the camera was bundled with a 32 gb SD card AND a carrying bag....along with a TRIPOD. I felt like I won the lottery.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Thrilled with this camera! I know that reviwers here who buy expensive SLRs and (for some unkonwn reason) compare this camera to those and they are less than trilled. This is the camera for the rest of us who just want decent pictures and will probably never make large prints or posters from our pictures. I've used this for outdoor shots and very low light indoor shots of school cermonies. I'm all thumbs and know nothing about photography. My shots and videos at 40 to in the 50s zoom we crisp and sharp. I looked at the images on a 40 inch high def TV and it all looked amazing, like Blu-ray movies. I had no 'soft' images or video. I just held my breath and shot. The custom features take some getting used to and you have to really study the manual. Once you do, you can get some amazing results butin several auto modes, scen modes and semi manual modes. After web research I chose this over the Canon PowerShot SX50. It just seemed like they were abouteven and this is $100 cheaper.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This has been a great little camera.  I bought it to see how much I would actually use a camera and if it would be worthwhile to get a nice DLSR.  I've used this quite a bit and am shocked sometimes just how nice the pictures are.  I love night pictures such as skylines of my hometown (Kansas City), and although this camera has a much smaller sensor than a DLSR, I get pretty good results with a tripod.  I'm sure not as good as a DLSR, but I've been pretty impressed.,I've tried driving out into the country and taking pictures of the Milky Way, but it's just not up to that.  Day photos look amazing.,I've had this for about a year now, and never did upgrade to a DLSR.  If you're just someone who is going to play around with it it's a great camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've owned a lot of cameras over the years, and this is by far my best and most versatile.  The zoom to 60x is amazing!  Does help to have a steady hand, adequate light and preferably a tripod, but you can get some shots that were impossible to get with a $400 cam a few years ago.  In my opinion, it actually beats out DSLRs because you don't have carry extra lenses. The 20x wide angle is useful too.  Have not investigated the other features, but I'm sure they'll come in handy later.  Very happy with this camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: learning how to use this camera at 71 years old has been a boost to my outlook on life!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have more than 30 years as an amateur photographer. From my first days in the 35 mm field I was married with Olympus. I still remember the fantastic OM-1 and my last OM-2. Since the introduction of digital cameras I have had some experiences with the small point and shoot cameras mainly from Panasonic. This were very good cameras but nothing like the professional Olympus system.,Based a lot on the reviews, I bought the DMC-FZ70 with a lot of expectations. Now I have to say that all of them were fulfilled with this amazing camera. With it, I can make anything I made before with my old 35mm Olympus and much more. The most impressive thing is the long focus 60x range . No need of interchangeable zoom lenses. With just one lense you can make all the range from a wide angle to large tele.,In addition it offers adjustments for deep of field, color temperature (with no need of filters), selective focus, image contrast, etc. There is a lot of technology behind this small and light camera that fits anywhere in your baggage.,The Lumix lense at f 2.8 is incredible luminous. With a firm hand (or a tripod) there is no need of flash during normal night conditions.,Other things from the digital era are new to me but I love them as the suggestions from the machine for beautiful sunsets, creative effects and much more.,The only thing I miss is the absence of leather case tailor made for this camera as I had for my old Olympus.,I am not a professional but I will recommend this camera for any amateur who wants a quality systems at much lower prices than most renowned ones.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I will start this by saying that I am a big Panasonic fan and have owned several 12/16 mp P&S high zoom cameras (DMC-ZS20 for example).  I ordered this looking for a good super zoom unit.  I checked other reviews and noted the mixed ratings, but greedy for "zoom" ordered it anyway.,"Bad News" is much like what others have reported in that you are paying for zoom and one of the "give backs" is in the processor.  In order to get really clear pictures I find that I need to use my monopod to steady the camera if using more than a modest amount of zoom.  It is early days and I am still learning to use the unit so I will update this as I go.  I also noted that Panasonic does not use a "named" lense on this unit like on my other cameras, which may also figure into things. I also am aware that talent may be an issue here too so I want to tread lightly here for the moment.,The "Good News" is that it's a Panasonic.  It feels good, albeit a little large and the price via Amazon was very good.  The camera feels solid and the controls are well laid out. The view finders do a good job and Ai mode normally does a very acceptable job.,I want to love this camera, but it is too early to tell if getting the zoom was worth it.,02/23/2014 Update:,I've had more experience with the FZ70 now and it really grows on you.  As recommended in other reviews, I've added a UV filter and a lens hood now that there is one for the camera.  Not being the best at camera manipulation, I found that working through the manual with the camera in hand is a big help.  I also found that using the flash indoors helped with photo sharpness.  I am also in process of working through and testing my camera setups to be sure, now that I am more familar with the beast, that I am achieving what I thought I wanted.  In the end there is just no substitute for using the camera in a range of situations as, while it is no DSLR, it is a whole lot more than a mere point and shoot camera.  I freely admit that most of my "issues" with the camera reside with me, and by working with the camera I am learning to appreciate all it has to offer.  At the price point that I bought the camera for, I am really glad I have it.,06/13/2014 Update:,I wanted to report that I went to Everglades National Park a few days ago and had a perfect opportunity to give the camera a good outdoor test.  While at the main visitor center I was able to get some great shots of gators at a distance.  The zoom was incredible as I was able to get some really close in shots of the gator's eyes and hide.  Really a wonderful experience.  It was a bright day so the UV filter helped especially when taking close in pictures of fish in shallow water.  The camera did very well.  Earlier I tried out my wife's Cannon D40 to get a feel for a big DSLR.  For me I have to say that I prefer the FZ70 as it's a bit smaller and a lot lighter.  On the downside at zoom the picture softens a little (lens quality?) but is still pretty darn good for anything the average picture taker would want to do.  The more I use this camera, the more I like it.  At a $1,000 less that the Cannon/lens, I'm feeling pretty smug.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Bought this camera for a trip to Alaska. The zoom allowed me to get pictures I couldn’t have dreamed of with my other cameras. The attached pictures were hand held from a boat, bus or roadside stop during overcast days shooting hundreds of feet away. Not gallery quality by any means but great remembrances. Given decent lighting, a tripod and someone with more camera savvy there’s no telling how good they could be. Excellent value, couldn’t have asked for more considering the price.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: PROS:,- easy to use, right out the box,- battery life better  than expected,- great value @ $279.00 from Amazon,- lens cover  & neck strap are good  quality,- on-screen details help when using function dial,- transfer  cable & software included,- sharp photos with crisp colors,- the impressive zoom feature works smoothly,CONS:,- Only one.  The software provided  for video replay is on a free-trial basis , and then must  be purchased ($80+).  Perhaps  there is a free shareware  option, but it is unfortunate that free software is not included for video, like it is for photos.,ALSO:,- BE SURE TO PURCHASE A CLASS 10 DATA CARD, OR YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED WITH THE CAMERA's  PERFORMANCE.,- Understand that 60x zoom is significant, and best used with the stability of a bipod/tripod.,* * * I am very satisfied with this camera and would  recommend  the Panasonic LUMIX DMC-FZ70 to friends  and family  without  hesitation.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I bought this camera for it's 4K capabilities, video and for taking still shots. I needed a camera for taking pics when I am in the woods doing things related to Bowhunting. The picture quality and zoom capabilities are Amazing. If you don't know much about cameras and their setting, you can set it in Intelligent Mode and it will set all the settings you need to take excellent photos in most situations. You can play around with various settings to optimize image quality in various situations, but in a pinch  use the Intelligent Mode. It is a great option. There are a lot of videos on Youtube that will help you optimize your use of this camera. Watch as many as you can before and after you buy! This is a great camera and I Highly Recommend it!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: It's going to take me a lifetime to learn all the features of this camera.  Happily, there are some easy point and shoot/ scene options.  I bought the camera for versatility,  to photograph wildlife, festivals, and do some macro photography of insects and flowers.  Every time I use the camera I discover more potential.... and that I'm probably not using the camera to it's fullest potential.  This camera definitely isn't a drop it in your purse and take a few casual photos type camera.  Yet it's also not something you only pull out when your doing serious photography. Instead, it's a great mix.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Great little pocket camera with a decent zoom capability. Still need to figure out how to lock focus when in video mode... it was going in-and-out of focus while I was videoing things on a recent trip we took which was frustrating since we didn’t take the instruction booklet (live and learn)... and the screen wasn’t the 3” screen I had on the Sony this one replaced, but 2.7” is still a decent size. Loved that my batteries and charger from my previous Sony was compatible with this camera... I was going for as close a match to my last Sony and this was almost a bulls eye but with a greater image resolution.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: this camera is horrible. the photos are all blury! I am a professional photographer and I have never had a camera be so horrible !!!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I bought this a year ago to take pictures for my business after dropping my Cool Pix for the last time. I usually get over bright or too dark pictures that I spend forever adjusting so that I can list. Now, after a year, I'm starting to get blurry pictures, and strange brightness and color.  I can take ten pictures of the same item, just in different positions, and my brightness is sometimes glaring. Colors aren't standard in this same group of pictures and I end up taking them same ones over again that same day or the next day. Honestly, I don't have time for this!,I don't need a lot of features, and I don't need zoom. I take my pictures outside on my back deck to get natural lighting and don't use the flash. I don't understand why I can't get consistent lighting and item colors with this camera. So, I guess it will be in the next donation bag. maybe someone can find a use for it, since I'm thinking this is mostly a kids camera or a vacation camera.,I see that the Cool Pix is back for sale and I came here today to get a new one. Glad it's back for sale after being gone a while!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Love this little camera . It replaced my Kodak Camera which I never really like. This one is so easy to use and I think takes great pictures.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I wasn't expecting much from this, I only wanted a camera that was a) cheap and b) would provide a better quality image than the average smart phone camera. But the image quality is truly amazing. I will upload a few customer images of my hiking trip as an example. An SD card is absolutely necessary, the internal storage can only hold 3 maximum quality images.,I did have one problem with the camera, the battery that came with it refused to take a charge. Amazon made up for this by offering me a 40% refund to buy a new battery, and the battery was much cheaper than the $31 refund I got so this issue wasn't even reason enough to take a star off. Overall great camera and great customer service from Amazon.,I've only owned this for a month and only used it for 2 days for a hiking trip so I can't speak on long term survival of this camera. I will update my review if I have any other issues. Be sure to check for my customer images if you want an idea of the maximum image quality.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: My old camera's battery clip broke and was not repairable, so it was time to get a new one. Since I'm a Luddite, still using a flip phone. As I had not bought a camera in about 10 years, my expectation was cheaper, faster, better.,Dunno what the heck happened in the digital camera industry over the last 10 years, but damn, nothing good.,Price - I figured to get something for about $50, since my last camera cost around $70. Nope; this one was close to $100. Some less expensive cameras out there, but the reviews scared me off.,MP - ok, this is a big change. This camera's got 20MP, up from I think 12. However, who needs that? Sucks up memory, and takes forever to load on Shutterfly. In fact, turns out my pictures were too big for Shutterfly and I had to squish them down. Yeah, that's not supposed to be necessary, but it's what worked for me.,Speed - reasonably fast turning on; about the same as my last camera. Not good - time to take a photo.,Two issues here. First, there's about a two-three second process from pressing the button until the picture pops up on the screen. After 3 months I still have not figured out when I can move the camera; not sure what the exposure process is. But I get blurry pictures a lot, so there appears to be some delay between pressing the button and being finished. Second issue - not gonna get many chances at a motion event, so time it well! 3 seconds minimum between pictures. F that noise.,Ease of recharge, battery life, pulling chip to unload pix - no issues. THat's all good.,All in all, this camera will drive me to get a smartphone. Or at least ask my wife to get me one for Christmas next year. She'll be thrilled!,Good job Sony!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: small, very light 4 oz. and very good pics..20 mega pixels and a 5 X zoom..,real easy set up and I got a 32 MG card which holds a ton of shots..haven't used all features yet. bought for my wife's trip to London..in September..,.set up is right on the screen..so you can get it going in no time..EASY mode make flipping it up and shooting with no mistakes, but you can use the setting yourself for exactly what you prefer.. manually if that's your bag....compares very well with Nixon cool pix at 1/3 the price..

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Honestly I have 10 megapixel camera that works better than this does. You have to hold EXTREMELY still in order to get a photo that isn't blurry which is a huge problem. I'm certain that there are better 20 MP cameras that can get that job done but this is definitely not one of them.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I use this camera for work (real estate appraisal). I don't need ultra high resolution shots for the reports, but I do need a cheap camera (they get dropped a lot), that takes quick photos and can be operated with one hand.,I was using a Canon point and shoot before this that was made in 2008, so I expected an upgrade, I was disappointed.,Pros,Cheap price,High resolution,Cons,-Terrible battery life,-Irritating autoflash, when selected it will flash at all times - even in strong lighting and therefore reducing the battery life further,- slow shutter speed, seems to be a disconnect between pressing the button and the device understanding you want a photo to be taken,-long delay between ability to take shots. I don't expect to be able to shoot in a burst mode, but it should allow for maybe two shots every 5 seconds instead of 10 seconds.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This is my first full Digital camera I have ever had. I always loved photography, and I have been using all kinds of different types of smartphone and tablets for taking pictures. While lots of those handheld mobile devices did very good at taking pictures, this SONY DSC-W800 beats all the smartphone and tablet cameras especially with the image processing like (exposure etc.) Also the 5x Optical Zoom is awesome lots of smartphone cameras don't have any Optical Zoom and the ones that do are very limited on the distance because of the focal length. Most new high end smartphone cameras have 1x-2x Optical Zoom which is barely noticeable. And digital zoom just sucks. So coming from tablets and smartphone cameras I have to say this is my best first digital camera I have ever had! The camera has auto focus, 5x Optical Zoom, has a proprietary USB cable for data transfer and changing. The pictures are very good which I will attach in this review.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I'm a Youtuber. I need somethings good and can be underwater. But i dont have a lot money. After searching, i found this camera. Its fit my hand and so easy to use. i had read it can submersible up to 10 Feet in depth waterproof without casing for one hour per time. and i dont believe it. But now i have used and very satisfied.,Good digital camera with best price

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Bought this cam for my holiday in Asia, was going to buy a gopro but its far too expensive, so i bought this with a reasonable price but has similar function. Its waterproof, compact and come with all the bit and pieces, and do what an action cam should do. Don't forget to buy a mini SD tho. It doesn't come with it. Charge with USB cable, can connect to my power bank.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: The quality of the camera was very good. In order to test whether it was really waterproof, it was put in the basin for a period of time.It's a good product. I can use it safely.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I never write reviews but this camera was GREAT! I'm picky about my shots but needed a waterproof camera for vacation so took a risk and bought this Double Screen Waterproof Camera. Great pics underwater and out of water shots! Easy to use & to upload photos once home. No water leaked inside. Battery lasted 5 days and it comes with a spare.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: i had Just received it from the delivery. it's so beautiful. immediately i jumped into my swimming pool to try it. And i felt so good. The camera is so easy to use and you can't know how the quality of picture is. Now i can take a lot underwater picture with this perfect product. So love it.,Try it if you love beautiful picture

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I love this camera. I did not expect a camera like this to be low priced, waterproof, and still be a quality camera. Everything about it is wonderful. I tested it a few times and everything worked perfectly fine. Overall, this is a good low-budget camera and nothing to complain about.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Very good cost-benefit relation. You pay a few dollars for a very good product. It has everything for a perfect picture in the beach. And real beautiful colors , especially teal, under the sun.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: i  am the one love photograph so much. And many times i try to take underwater picture but i didn't try yet. And when i have this product, i can take a lot of beautiful picture. And i love them. SO beautiful.,The camera is so easy to use. And it's cheap more than i thought. Love it.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: The camera looks very cute. Bought this cam for the pool party. It worked great with water proof feature. But you have to be aware it doesn't come with the SD card. Got to pay extra to get it prepared. Picture quality is decent. In summary it's a very nice product with cute appearance.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: The camera is very good quality, waterproof, can be used underwater. The picture quality is very good. The size of the camera is not big, it is very convenient to carry. I usually put it in my bag, it is not very heavy. The operation is very simple. I really like it.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This is a great digital video cameras, I bought this is for my filming class. The quality is outstanding. It’s really light weight camera, my arm don’t get fatigued and also captured all the great moments. It’s easy to use and set it up. It came with two batteries, so it last for a long time. I been use it to video recording birthday, weddings, baby showers etc. it’s a amazing. The picture quality are wonderful, and zoom clearly and the sounds clear. Great digital camera.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: It's a nice small camera! It fits in your hand and is very easy to set up. Very light, and won't add extra weight to your backpack or purse. Comes with a wide angle lens, for group shots. Also was shipped with TWO rechargeable batteries, wrist strap, and soft case. You do need to purchase storage card separately. Would recommend it for the price and quality!

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Just what I needed it, great camera, great resolution, beautiful pictures for a decent price. Very happy with the purchase, I recommend others to buy it.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Camera felt cheap. The plastic case was a very thin plastic. They way it was assembled allowed some of the plastic to shatter at some point in the manufacture to when it arrive. The box was not damaged but there was shattered plastic in the internal packaging that contained the camera in its protective case.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Very poor user manual. No information about lens swapping for Telephoto or wide angle, etc., instructions.,The Camera takes decent pictures overall. I have not yet  experimented with the video. The threads on the camera lenses are a little on the rough side.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: The camera is light and cute, but takes terrible pictures. There is no way to adjust anything to get sharper pictures.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: So I ordered this for a study abroad trip and once I got the camera, I thought okay looks simple, easy to use. It is, it’s also very light and made of plastic on the outside. Comes with a wide lense which is cool. So far everything is decent for the price. However when I started filming and taking pictures I was incredibly disappointed. The quality is worse than my iPhone 6s, which is saying a lot because my phones quality isn’t the greatest. That alone had me send it back for a refund because I’d rather use my cameras phone than a poor quality camera. :/ sorry, if they improved the quality on this thing, it may be worth the price. Otherwise, I’d recommend looking elsewhere. Really disappointed.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: My niece is going to Korea and I elected to get her a camera for the trip. I know most people use their phones to take pictures but I figured a camera would be a nice back up to have. I did some looking and I came across this vlogging camera at a decent price. I had it shipped to myself to make sure everything was good and user friendly and this is what I found. 1) you need a memory card. That’s pretty much given with any camera and luckily I had one laying around. 2) the extra battery is an awesome bonus! 3) the main thing is the user face is easy to use and takes decent pictures. I uploaded some to my computer to see the quality and they look great! Everything thing is super well packaged and the flip out screen is awesome for getting selfies.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I really liked the vintage feel and appearance of this camera. But the technology in it is pretty up to date. The picture quality was great and the build quality of the camera was good too. I wish it had touch screen as well which would make it even better.,It also came with an extra set of wide angle lens which is easy to install onto the camera. You can also send pictures via a wifi hotspot which is useful to quickly post pics to social media via your phone. It takes an sd card which is not included and also has hdmi cable(small port) outlet to connect to your tv.,Overall its a product that is a bang for your buck and you can get it if you are looking for a inexpensive but quality camera.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: It's a good little camera!
