It takes great pictures for its price,and it's lightweight and easy to set up for use.It's useful for life or take to trave, as a thankgive gift,My grandmom likes it so much.  This camera is small and lightweight,easy to put it into the bag. Would recommend it for the price and quality!

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: I bought this camera for my 10yo granddaughter for her birthday.  It is a nice starter camera for a young person.  Easy to understand instructions, lightweight, rechargeable and takes great photos!  She had a great time taking pictures of all her friends and family at her birthday party!  Great value.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: I wanted to get a camera for my nephew since he showed some interest in taking pictures so I got him this camera not expecting much from it but the quality is definitely great! Easy to use, the features are great and the quality of the images is even better! I may be borrowing this from him. Haha.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Bought this as a Christmas present for my best friends child.  We had Christmas last night, and he is thrilled. Spent the night getting candid shots of everyone. Super easy to use and fits in his pocket with ease. Pics look great, well, the quality for sure! Maybe not the people in them! Lol (Got some real funny ones of all of us)

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: I gave this to my youngest daughter. She loves that she can take pictures and then hook it to the computer and edit pictures. She is 9 and this is great!

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: nice little camera. got for a child because pricing was good. would use for myself though also. easy to use.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: You can’t beat this price! It’s easy to use and great pictures. I needed it for work because my phone storage was constantly being used up for work pictures. This camera is great because I can put it in my pocket and go!

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: I got this for my niece to take pictures for a vacation. It's easy to operate. It takes good quality pictures that can easily be transferred to a computer. I like that she will not be able to take pictures for herself.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Awesome camera, I bought this for my daughter as she is starting to get into photography for 4H and it’s the perfect size for her to play around with. It’s lightweight and has a great zoom on it too!

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Great value! Bought this for my daughter for her birthday. I didn’t want to drop a lot of money on a camera in case it got lost or damaged giving her age. This is a great value and she absolutely loves it!

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: This digital camera is awesome! My daughter used it a lot during our vacation. It's easy to use and very lightweight. It also takes really clear picture and videos. I purchased a regular SD card to store pictures.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I realize this is not the most expensive camera, but I expected it to last longer than a year. We cannot get the camera to turn on even though the battery charger registers fully charged with the green light. Called Canon and were basically told too bad. I expected so much more from a Canon camera, but I guess the quality has diminished. Will not buy a Canon camera again. Now that is TOO BAD for consumers.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Right at about 30 days, so I can not return it, it will no longer power up. Battery is fully charged. I had trouble getting it going right out of the box and should have been more concerned. The construction seems cheap. Bought this for my wife. Sorry, honey. I have been using Canon cameras for a long time, but will try a different brand.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This Canon 180 is pretty good but not as good as the ELPH190. The 190 is a little better with more functions. I take alot of picture and am pretty tuff on cameras. I have noticed over time that the newer cameras do not hold up as good as the older ones. I bought the ELPH110 HS and that lasted longer than the 190. We will see what this 180 can do. I am around 10000 pictures and its holding well. The battery will fad over time. Great bang for the buck!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This is an outstanding camera. It is small and lightweight. I have taken it on a few international trips and numerous hikes this winter. I keep it in the thigh pocket of my hiking pants. It works even in 0 degree weather. The photos are fantastic and the movie option also works very well. The price can't be beat.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I like the camera as it is easy to use, compact, and lightweight. Takes nice pictures. It is hard to get it to focus on the correct subject when doing close ups of flowers and such. The major feature I dislike is that there is no way to force a flash to fill in for when the subject is backlit.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: The camera is nice, works well, but I was disappointed that it came with a charger,instead of batteries. With my old Canon camera, I always carried batteries right with it so if they went dead, I could,still use the camera. With the charger, if the camera goes dead you are out of luck unless you are taking pictures,in a home or business and can recharge it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I am very happy with this small camera. I am a plein air artist and was looking for a camera that would fit in my pocket an take very good pictures. I have other Canon camera but this has become my favorite now. Great quality shots

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This camera takes decent quality photos for the price point, but inferior to modern phones. Placement of buttons makes taking photos awkward (your thumb can hit a number of buttons).,3.5-4 stars

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This is my second Canon ELPH. I had my first one for 10 years and have now passed it on to my daughter. This is a basic digital camera with a great view finder and it delivers excellent pictures. I love the small size which can easily fit into a pocket or my purse. It is great to use for every day pictures and for an upcoming vacation. It does not come with a cord to connect the camera up to the computer, but I always take my memory card out and put that in the computer to see my photos.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: A replacement for a very similar earlier monitor that did not survive a pass through a washing machine (although the battery and SD card did!).  Handy, easy to use, reasonably clear photos with OK resolution.  Zoom function is a bit rough (jerky).  Good little camera for the money.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Very disappointed with the result of this camera. I wish I could return it and get another one from canon...,Very mediocre picture it is taking. My very old iphone pics are looking way better than this.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: The focus is not sharp. Probably should give it a one.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Great camera, great price, quick shipping. No complaints here

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: So far we like the camera, but still need to mess with the features to get it where we want it. Small and lightweight, but takes pretty good photos.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: We’ve used on several trips and it has done very well.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I got for my mom as a Christmas present. The screen is almost too small to see. The picture quality on the screen looks very blurry. Buttons are very tiny, difficult for an older person to use. Haven't processed any pics yet. I would have returned it, but the Amazon 30 day return policy does not allow enough time for holiday gifts to be sent, wrapped, opened and returned, within 30 days.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: nice camera for the price

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: this product was returned to Amazon on Tuesday 6/18/2019 by UPS

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Easy to use, light, fits in purse

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: The camera and accessories are excellent! Shipping and packaging are very good.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Bought to use on vacation. Having two batteries which could be recharged in a number of ways was a blessing. Nice photos.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: The pictures are not great quality, it seems to have issues with trying to take vertical photos as well. Also the video is AWFUL. When you try to watch it on your computer later (no matter what format you try) it is choppy, skips, the audio will continue, but the video will lag. It is absolutely impossible to play back a video and see the whole thing. Terrible camera.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I am not a photographer and just wanted a point and shoot.  This camera has every type of setting so I just set it to auto mode and the pictures are beautiful.  The pictures are clear with the appropriate lighting.  Love it and would highly recommend it.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: (See updates below this original review.),This is a great little instamatic type pocket camera as long as you use rechargeable batteries and don't mind charging them frequently. Of course it's nowhere near the quality of a DSL camera, but the price (especially when discounted) is a lot less as well. The camera didn't work in cold weather when all my other electronic devices work just fine. However, that was with the cheap batteries that came with the camera. The camera does go through good renewable batteries quite quickly, however--more quickly than my other cameras do.,Update after I've used the camera a while: I was having to recharge the almost-new, name brand rechargeable AA batteries in a high quality charger (i.e., I knew the batteries and charger were both good) after taking only around a dozen shots. So I called Kodak's support and was told rechargeable need to be at least 2300 mAh (milli-amps). So if you use rechargeables and find they drain too quickly with this camera, check the mAh reading. The support woman suggested trying new Energizer or Duracell non-rechargeable (i.e., throw-away) batteries to confirm the camera is fine and the low-mAh batteries are the issue. I asked why this is not mentioned in the documentation that comes with the camera and she said it's because they don't mention using rechargeable batteries.,Update 5/2019: I've had battery problems with the camera since it was new, buying and trying 2800 mAh batteries along with many others. It became clear the camera had electronic issues. I'd get battery exhausted warnings even with new batteries but by opening and shutting the battery compartment, the camera would work just fine. And occasionally I'd get a message to reformat the memory card though that also was fine and the error disappeared when I opened and shut the compartment. Kodak quickly agreed to replace it under warranty, however, they refuse to pay the return shipping (roughly $8, cheapest rate) which I feel they should pay.,My recommendation is if you buy this camera, test it out thoroughly when new, using either throwaway batteries or 2300 mAh or larger rechargeables to confirm the electronics aren't faulty.,Update 7.15.2019: The camera gets worse and worse. Kodak replaced my original one but I had to pay return shipping. The new camera has the exact same issues as the previous one. Furthermore, its recording of sound is erratic. I recently was at a music event where I recorded a number of short clips with the camera. A few of the clips have sound but the overwhelming majority have none. I just did a short test video and it has no sound. I have listened to the recording file with several different apps and on different devices to confirm the problem is the file itself--i.e., the camera--is at fault, not recording sound. So I am again lowering the number of stars I give this camera, now to the fewest possible.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: camera stopped working after about two days of use. I am very careful with cameras, and it would not shut down, new batteries twice. Same result.,I am on a trip to Alaska, and am tremendously disappointed as I bought Kodak because of the "trusted" name. Wrong...,I cannot return it as am on the road in the wilderness..as it were.,I have to use my phone for photos..and will never buy Kodak again I suppose...

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: This review is mostly about the seller. The camera itself seems to be a good point and shoot especially for a teenage girl... if it would stay on for more than a minute.,The seller... I ordered this at the end of September for a Christmas gift. I was excited because I found this $60 camera for only $20 and thought I was getting a great deal. When I received it I turned it on and tested it out briefly. It seemed to work pretty well, however after my daughter received it for Christmas (three months later) and played with it for a few minutes it shut off randomly. At first it turned right back on then it stopped turning on and responding all together. We put different brand new batteries in it and once again it turned on but this time it shut off right away. We observed that it never showed a full battery icon even with new batteries. So obviously this camera does not work right and I immediately requested a refund. The seller, lotus media, refused because it had been more than 30 days since I purchased it. I wrote another email requesting that they take into consideration that it had been purchased as a Christmas gift and that was the reason for the delay, but they stuck by their “policy” and would not budge. I tried to file an A to Z claim with amazon and was told by them that I was outside my time frame for filing a claim. So basically I’m screwed. I’m glad that I only spent $20. Lesson learned - spend more time testing out electronics, a deal that’s “too good to be true” really is not a deal at all, and though I’ve always had good experiences with amazon I’m disappointed they didn’t back me on this. I can’t believe that this seller didn’t know exactly what they were selling and that’s why the price was so low. I’m sure they thought that was good enough compensation for the fact that the camera doesn’t work right, but this fact should have been made known in the description of the camera.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Works when it wants to , eats batteries. I have had intermittent times when it stops working but, left alone for a few hours and it will work again. I assume it overheats.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: This camera would be great if batteries didn't die within 5 min. If putting in new fresh battery. No matter if it's lithium, alkilin, rechargable, expensive...they all die!,Wish I would if know that sooner.,Got this as a Christmas present for my backpacking trips...just start hiking and found out it's worthless. No to much time has passed to return. Not happy!!

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: This is a great little camera for quick point & shoot situations. One great advantage is that, if dropped, it’s only a few dollars compared to the cost of repairing a smart phone. Rather than fill my phone with lengthy videos, it’s easier to simply use this camera to take them, pop the chip into my laptop, and file or upload the videos.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: So far I love this little camera....when I purchased this I was just looking for an inexpensive little point and shoot camera to make a few family snapshots for our get togethers with all of our family's........ I haven't actually had any of the pics printed yet but plan to within the next week and if I feel any differently after printing some then I will come back with an update!!!!

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: Excellent camera. It's a very compact digital camera but the images and videos (and sound) are very good even in poor light.

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: My daughter wanted a camera, so I bought her this one. It’s small and lightweight. Very easy to use. I took some pictures outside and they look great!

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: Fantastic camera really pleased does everything I want and easy to use, Very happy

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: Small enough to slip in a pocket. Smart enough to capture my holiday. It does the job!

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: I like the size, weight, and ease of use. I am pleased with photo quality, especially for the low price I paid. Good value.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I had been looking at numerous point and shoots for the last few months. The size and price of this item was the positive, but the quality of the photos is terrible. No matter what setting and different amounts of light, the clarity of the photos does not live up to even my smartphone camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I bought this camera to replace my old Sony Cybershot which had lasted 7 years.  I should have waited and saved for a better quality camera.  I use my camera to take product photos of the hand fabricated jewelry I design.  The shutter is a lengthy distance from where I hold the camera thus, I sometimes "miss" pushing it all the way down.  It's an awkward design for my hands.  Also, the camera shell is very plastic.  I know that this is the norm now but, my last 2 Sony Cybershot cameras didn't feel so cheap.,The resolution, on the highest setting available for this model, is sub-par.  Unlike the last two Sony Cybershot cameras I have had, this model doesn't handle low light well at all.,Having written this review, I must say that if one were going to use a camera for something like casual family captures, it's probably acceptable.  I did myself a disservice by not doing more research with this model.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I read the reviews that talked about slow response times and thought I'm not taking pictures of kids, it won't be a problem. I couldn't have been more WRONG.  I can't tell you the number of photos I have missed because I had the camera in my lap, picked it up to point and click, and its little brain was still trying to determine what the lighting was supposed to be.  And don't think, "well the lighting is off on that one, I'll take another right away". Nope, it is really a 5-sec delay between photos  I invested not only in this camera but and extra battery and battery charger.  After missing photo opportunities on two "one-in-a-lifetime" trips, I'm cutting my losses.  Seriously, it's cheap but spend the extra and get a responsive camera.  You'll be happier.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The video and photos are what I would expect for a 720p, maybe less. The photos are average. Spend more and get a 4K compact because this Sony feels more like a toy and I expected more for the money. The strange thing is that the monitor showed a very blurry picture that would not auto focus but the picture file was very clear. The monitor viewing angle is too narrow. No viewfinder.,No problems using the cable to transfer pics and charge the battery.,The camera is slippery and the battery drains unusually fast, even with the 1300 mAh upgrades!,The supplied battery is only 600 mAh. Rubberized coating paint would have been better.,I would not buy this cam again.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This is a good pocket-sized, cheap camera that takes excellent colored pictures even when used by a beginner like me.,However, I've downgraded it because if you want a printed manual you will be tempted to either pay the absurd $55 that Sony charges for a disk that includes the PDF file for the current manual, or to go to a site that claims to have a free copy of the manual available for download if you will install DocToPDF software on your computer.,Fortunately, I did a search for reviews of that software before downloading it, and learned that it is basically spyware that takes over your browser and also installs malicious software on your computer. Do a search on "DocToPDF reviews," and you'll see what I mean. I can't imagine why Sony has not gone after this site to protect its customers and prevent infringement of its copyrights.,There is a workaround: Sony does permit a free download of a 2013 manual for an earlier version of the Cybershot that is close enough to the features of the current version to be usable, but Amazon won't allow me to include the link in my review.  Search on "Sony DSW830 help guide" and then click through the hits until you find a link to the manual with a 2013 copyright date.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Didn't like that I had to find specific instructions online for the memory card (YouTube). However, the pictures are better than my android. I'm very happy with this camera. It's easy to learn, and I'd recommend it to anyone wanting a simple, inexpensive but decent camera. I purchased from amazon warehouse deals. Supposedly it had some "scratches" on the bottom. Didn't notice those. Great deal, though!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Not good quality for point and shoot.  There was also a delay between taking pics and delay focusing.  I think there is something wrong with mine so I sent it back.  Not sure if anyone else had these issues.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: It's possible my expectations are too high for the price, but although I don't usually have a problem with the photos themselves, the build quality on the camera has been disappointing. It's only six months old, and the shutter button and the lens both wobble. (The lens wobble is noticeable when the camera is closed; it doesn't affect the quality of the photos.) It also occasionally struggles to find the right lighting when you're taking a picture soon after turning it on, providing wildly overexposed shots. And be warned that once it's claiming anything but a full battery (four bars out of four), it's going to start dropping fast.,It takes fine pictures and doesn't cost much, making it acceptable for occasional use, especially if you'd expect to need more zoom than you'd get from a cellphone camera. But I'm otherwise not impressed, and it isn't holding up well physically.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Had this camera for 6 months. Many problems. The button to turn it On/Off was not very responsive and had to be pressed several times. The telescoping lens would not open fully at times requiring the camera be turned off then back on. This happened a lot. Once I turned on the flash but decided to not take the photo and I turned the camera off. Next day when I turned the camera on it would freeze and the screen would tell me to turn it off then back on. Did this several times. Tried turning off the flash and it finally worked again. Software issue? If I turned on the flash I used it and could then turn it off and on with no problem. Still under warranty but I'm going to dump it and try another brand. I want small handy pocket camera to keep with me. This Sony Cybershot was good size and took good photos but had too many aggravating mechanical issues with button and lens.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: So far, I am in love with my camera. I do wish it would take night photos. Apart from this, it takes FANTASTIC shots, great, sharp, well defined on all levels. I am impressed w/how easy it is to use. I got this b/c it has a 'steady' feature which is good for me as my hands shake sometimes. This camera keeps your pics from being blurry due to that issue. I DO however, (despite loving the item) wish it were just a TAD larger b/c it's so small (which is a + for some) that my aching hands/fingers sometimes have difficulty holding it or using it as it is so slim. Otherwise, I'd give it 6 stars if I could!

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Really nice case for my new P520. Don't spend or money on the cheap stuff ... this one is the one you want to protect your new camera.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Too small to use in Nikon p610.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Great product for my Coolpix P520 Nikon camera.  Looks good and will protect the camera well, that's why I purchased it.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: I really wanted to like this case, which looks like a classic leather Leica case of the '50s and '60s, but it didn't work well for me, and I'm returning it. It comes in 2 parts: the bottom, which stays attached to the camera via a tripod socket that screws into the camera's tripod socket; and the top, which is a "hoodie" that fits over the camera body and lens and attaches to the bottom part with three snaps. You're supposed to be able to let the top part dangle by one side snap while you take pictures, but mine was so heavy and the snap so loose that it consistently fell off. As another reviewer noted, the bottom part covers up the camera's side ports and door to the battery and memory card, requiring you to remove the whole case in order to access them. The faux leather is also thick and stiff. Although the case fit the camera well, I found it too unwieldy to be practical, despite its good looks.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Bicast leather (also known as bycast leather or PU leather, sometimes described as split leather) is a material made with a split leather backing covered with a layer of polyurethane (hence the term PU leather) that is applied to the surface and then embossed. Because it is only used for the backing, the leather portion of this material is generally not visible in finished goods made from Bicast.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Excellent quality.  Loved the feel of it, but it was too big for the camera (even though it states it is for the Nikon P520).  The reason for the return was that the side part that you have to put the camera into blocks all access to the ports for charging - so I'd have to take it out every time I wanted to do anything (I have a wireless remote adapter that wouldn't work while in the case either).  In addition, the lens covering part was a pain to manage.  It was just going to be more hassle and work than it was worth.  I was looking for ease of use, and this was not it.  Great concept, excellent materials, poor execution and fit.  Returned.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: The quality of this product is fine and it provides good protection. My complaint is that the fit is sloppy for my Nikon P520. There is a large space above the flash. It does not affect the function of the case.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: This case will not fit on either a Nikon Coolpix P520 or Nikon Coolpix P520.There is only one for the camera to fit into case and then the screw on camera case will not align with tripod screw hole on base of camera

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Although I knew this case was more for storage than regular use, as you can't access the battery and SD card slots without removing the camera from the bottom of the case, the leather is much too stiff and heavy.  If you un-snap the top of the case, and expect it to hang to the side during a shot, you'll be disappointed when the weight of the case causes the top to un-snap completely, and fall to the floor.  The case is really for storage and protection when not in use.  It takes you back decades to when cameras were heavy and needed a case like this.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: It looks great, I love the brown leather. It is very sturdy & fits my camera perfectly! Can carry it anywhere.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I got this camcorder for my upcoming trip abroad and I know for a fact that my iPhone will not hold up enough videos due to limited space. I needed a camcorder that will allow me to use SD cards so that, I wont have to keep transferring my videos to my computer. Also, I really don't want to spend so much money on a branded camcorder and just end up not using it as much. This camcorder does the job for me. I can definitely recommend this to everyone, especially those who are tight on budget but needed something that will allow them to capture the moment.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I wanted a simple point-and-shoot to document an outdoor project, and this has been just. It did feel a bit pricy. It comes without an SD card in the box, although the company later emailed me a coupon for a free one.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: For the pros, it's really light-weight and small which creates no hassle when carrying it during hiking. The package also comes with the pouch to protect the camera from scratching and damaging. The camera has enough functions of a regular digital camera: continuous, night time, focus,... The image quality is significantly better that those taken with iPhone 6.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Great little camera. Exactly as described. Small, compact and lightweight which is just what I need for our trip to Europe.  The inclusion of an SD card was a plus, unexpected and very much appreciated.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I am SO excited about this purchase! When i saw the price for how much it came with I was sold. I still can't believe it's mine! My boyfriend got the older version of this camera a few years back and he absolutely loved it. I wanted to get this camera to take pictures of our adventures together and everything along the way! also starting a youtube channel here soon! I will update with more awesome pictures later on. If you're thinking about getting this camera and you have the money, do it!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: great camera when you get it the quality ad the meag pixels are set low go to settings and turn up the quality to super fine ， also can be used as a webcam so pretty awesome comes with detailed instruction booklet charge cable, wall plug, computer disk driver, case, and wrist strap. very good deal for the money ，buy it you wont regret it.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Bought this for a gift to give to my son and he loves it!Very cute and easy to hold and carry it with him.Works great so far! The picture quality is not as good as I thought, but it is enough for him！

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Couldn't get his to work right out of the box.  Wanted something small for an over seas trip.  The battery/st card compartment is so small that it is difficult to get them in and out of.  Went to Wal-Mart and bout a small Kodak. About $30 more, super easy set up and instructions.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Nice little camera. I couldn’t take my phone on a recent trip so I took this camera for pictures. It was easy to use after I learned all the little settings. It definitely took getting used to because I was so used to using my iPhone. Would recommend it!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Battery lasts a long time.  Can take 200 photos or so (depending on settings of course) before battery fades.  Takes excellent photos, very clear.  Easy to move photos to storage.  On complaint (is a small one) is that the controls are not the most intuitive.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Great little camera for a great price. Got it for my niece, who is too young for a phone, but loves this camera!,EDIT: I had originally given this 5 stars, then it broke within a week. Seller was unresponsive and unhelpful. Cannot recommend this anymore or this seller.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: My daughter loves this camera.The price and performance of this camera are very good.It's a great gift to learn and enjoy photography for children.Now my daughter takes pictures everywhere with her camera every day.The memory card has been updated to 32GB and is expected to be even larger...ha

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Bought this for my 6 year old as a fun camera.,It’s junk even for a 6 year old. The picture quality is so awful. Dark, blurry and hard to make images out.,I would not recommend.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: The reason I purchased this camera is that I want to capture moments with a good quality of camera , and this one fits perfectly into my small purse, I do have a good sony DSLR camera but just not worth to spend more money on cameras, but this one works out perfectly!, reasonable price, quality is acceptable! I do recommend for this product if you are looking for a affordable camera!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I had bought this for a Christmas present, but once I received it I loved it..,I recently tied it out. The picture quality is awesome.. it is all digital, very easy to use..,If your a beginner or someone that knows about cameras, this is the one you will want.,The seller was great, the delivery was on time. The packaging was not damaged..,Over all, I am a 110% satisfied..

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I get this camera for my mom, she told me the camera is very easy to use. The camera can be fully charged very quickly which differential from other camera in the market. The picture quality is also good enough for my mother. Overall, it is a good product and I recommend getting one if you are price sensitive.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I got this for Burning Man, because I didn't want my good camera to get ruined by the dust.  This one has no moving parts (no motion around the lens for dust to get stuck in), and it held up well under rough conditions.  The photo quality was fine for a point and shoot during the day, but it was pretty terrible at night.  Way, way worse than my phone's camera, and I have a really old phone.  If you use it for video, the sound is really terrible, too.,But if you just need this to take some abuse and take photos in the daytime, then it's a good camera at a good price.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I really liked that this camera has a sleek design and fits comfortably in your hand, it’s not bulky like a lot of the cameras. It came with easy to follow set up instructions. Taking pictures was easy and anyone can do it. My 4 year old grandson even took pictures with this camera. The pictures were clear and looked to be the same quality of any other digital camera I have purchased in the past. Please note, the pictures I took were not moving or action shots.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This little digital camera I bought it for my son, although his is only 2 years old, but he loved this camera. It is light and safe, easy to upload photos to computer. The battery is good for a long time. Very good design! Love it!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: If this camera weren't so cheap I'd rate it lower buuuuuuuuut for the price I guess it does what it's supposed to. I bought this for work to take pictures of damaged product since we can't be on our cell phones. The product works fine for what it is. My only complaint is that it's built like trash. I accidently half sat on it... Not even my full weight on a padded seat and the view screen is half broken... You'd think the fact that you can sit on the cheapest smart phone available and not destroy the screen they could make this camera do the same. Really hope I never drop it because it'll probably explode. Oh and to get a clear picture you gotta make sure to keep it perfectly still for about 3 seconds after you thought the picture was taken or you'll get a blurry pic.,So long story short:,You get what you pay for and here you get a cheap camera that works but not very well. Fine in an emergency or just need a cheap camera/expensive paperweight then this is exactly what you're looking for.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: So upset camera came with the charging port broken and we bought it just for our Maui trip. Now we have to buy one there.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: it was one of the best purchases I have had from Amazon, worked perfectly under water

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I like it.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Lovely camera at a great price. I'd been looking at proper go pro's but so glad I didn't waste my money. This does everything you want and you get a few different mounts with it as it's waterproof. I'm planning on using it to go skiing. Simple to use but watch the online video on YouTube about it if you need any extra help.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Safety is most important when i bought electical products to my son.I will not worried about the electical safety when this camera need power.And this is really nice so this is definitely something i would buy as a gift. Also the pictures quality is very perfect, worth the money.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I was equally happy with my one attempt at photographing fish whilst snorkelling, even if the fish around Mallorca weren’t as photogenic as those I’d seen on previous holidays in more exotic locations.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Bought this camera for a up coming trip to Florida, so far it has worked really well for doing things around the house.,Well worth the money spent. I feel like I might buy a 2nd one soon. Recommend!

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: The first impression is that it is an excellent and small carry around camera with excellent picture quality, menu structure is much better and easy to use, very happy with this camera

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: The camera fogs up so it's hard to get clear photos. Not worth the money. The buttons jam up and they are hard to press. I took it to Belize and I used my phone in a waterproof case more than this camera

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I bought this for my husband as he did his open water Padi on holiday, which goes to 18 meters and for a first time use this was great. It's perfect for snorkeling too.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am 99% a point-and-shoot guy who doesn't want to remember details but does want a massive zoom. This camera scores on both counts. We left on a trip the day after it arrived and I thoughtfully left my instruction booklet behind. Still figured it out and captured great pictures.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Even I can take decent pictures with this camera! I have a hand tremor so normally have a great deal of difficulty getting decent pictures. Went to Longwood Gardens in Kennett Square PA and followed my normal practice of taking an enormous number of pictures in the hope of getting a few decent shots. Out of 337 332 were good. (I posted some shots I took that day.) Even with the zoom extended completely I am able to get decent pictures. The AI setting does a great job even in low light conditions, it's easy to use, and battery life is excellent. I am beyond pleased and will experiment with settings other than AI. I have not used the video feature so can't comment on that.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have been quite pleased with the results of this camera.,A main use for this cam is for parents and others who find themselves seated in the audience but wanting to photograph friends and family members while they perform on stage or a field (think kids soccer game, or marching band, orchestra, etc...).  The 60x zoom is just incredible.  In both sunny and overcast I get perfect pictures.  I've used it for friend's child who is in a university marching band, we sit about 20 rows up on the side of the end zone and I am able to get super sharp close-ups of anyone on the field.  I'm sure many parents know the feeling of when trying to take these kind of pictures with your phone and your loved one ends up a tiny ant in the picture.,I would not count on this camera as much indoors and definitely not in low light.  But for sunny and overcast outdoor, possibly well lit indoor arenas, it doesn't matter where you are sitting, the reach will give you great pics.,I was concerned initially as some reviewers would say things like "better hope its not cloudy with a camera like that!".  But I have several times gone full zoom in overcast skies and ISO doesn't budge above 80/100.  The stability and being seated or using a string tripod can boost even more.,Another advantage is that some venues, like college football do not allow "professional cameras" or cameras with lens over a certain length.  This cam is a pretty safe to get into a stadium as is clearly for amateurs and retracted, is quite unassuming.,If you accept it for what it is, it is a wonderful camera to make sure you always capture those moments and capture them up close and personal no matter you are seated.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I purchased this camera just for the 60x zoom.  I used it especially to take pictures of the moon.  The camera has good features.,Pro: all the Lumix values, switch betwen LVF & LCD view under bright day light,,take 55mm filter (leverage all my old Minolta 55mm filters).,Wish: The shutter only goes to 1/2000.  I wish it can be one step faster.,Most of the attached photo are taken w yellow filter; one photo is taken w creative art filter.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: First of all I am not a professional photographer graduated from a university, but know a little more than basic concepts. With that said, I believe this camera offers an excellent combination of virtues:,-The optical image stabilizer is incredibly good,-The interface is a traditional camera (I will love to have one interface like in the lumia 1020 camera app),-The battery life is really good,-The zoom of course,-The microphone does reduce noise from wind, and a lot.,But it also has some limitations,-This is not a video camera, yes it records good 1080p but it's not crisp,-The LCD panel is fixed, and the LVF pales compared to an optical one(it's not terrible, but an optical is much better),-You will find some noise due to a tendency to elevate the ISO, but nothing the manual settings can't fix,All and all, this camera packs a hell of a bunch of features that amateurs and semi-professionals will find very useful and fun to use. I truly recommend this camera, but keep in mind you are not buying a $2000 camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I can't say enough good about this camera. It really zooms in and gets great pictures. We used it at my daughter's wedding and got some great shots, including a gorgeous night picture. Very happy and highly recommend.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: The Intelligent Auto with this camera at the high and low end of zoom was far more adaptive than my Fujifilm S4000.  My Fujifilm camera (which is a 30x optical super zoom camera) had trouble focusing at times when taking indoor shots and some outdoor shots.  This camera had no focusing problems in Intelligent auto worthy of reporting.,I also found the white balance on this camera to be a step above my Fujifilm S4000.  It required me to use my flash more indoors so it could focus and that wasn't so much of an issue with the Panasonic LUMIX DMC-FZ70.  It took several indoor shots without the need for a flash and it had real time focus creating images that were sharp and clear.,On the long end of the optical zoom I did notice some noise in the image, but that's to be expected with a lens this powerful.  It performed very well in high range zoom and in both video and picture taking modes.  It's ability to focus in real time during video mode is pretty good and I tested it during a snow storm just to make it a little harder on the camera.,It's been boasted online that you can extend the zoom range on this camera by scaling down megapixel setting.  It does say that in the manual, but I haven't tested that feature.  What I do like about this camera however, is that on the low end of zoom at 20mm, it lets you take a wider shot than other cameras in it's class and some of them even cost more than this camera.,Would it be nice if it had a larger sensor?  Perhaps, but I haven't really seen any super zoom camera's that compete with it that have a larger sensor anyway.  That's probably more for an expensive DSLR anyway.  Besides, this camera takes pretty good pictures without the larger sensor.  Overall, I'm very satisfied with it and it's sure better than my old FUJI in every way.,I don't know if my opinion counts for anything but I can tell you this is a pretty nice camera.  I'm glad I bought it and I'm thoroughly happy with it and I bet there's a good chance you will be to.  For it's ability, features, and performance, I would say this camera is the best overall value of any camera in it's class being sold today, but that's just one mans opinion.,One thing I almost forgot to mention in closing, is that it has a 55mm thread at the end of the lens so you can attach filters for special effects.  That's awesome.  For example, if you wanted to add a Sepia filter you might be able to make your pictures look like they were taken way back in the late 1800's.  It's an awesome special effect.,Take care ... and I hope you buy this camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: If you're looking for a more-than-capable camera, whether it be for ultra-zoom, or even because you aren't quite sure you want to make the investment for a DSLR (with all the lenses and such) I think this camera is hard to beat. I've been using it for months now, and it is, hands down, my go-to for every day shooting. The menus are jam-packed with functionality, and, if you're like me, post-processing is minimal in most situations. I love this camera, and it has truly increased my confidence level in taking stunning pictures...,It's a blast to play with and to find just what 'style' you prefer for images. I can't say enough good things about it!! As a matter of fact, I can't really come up with a negative at this point.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I was able to take amazing photos with it which was kind of a surprise as some reviews were so negative.,I found it to be of high quality according to price, video is pretty amazing and works great while zooming.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Do not buy this camera. After about a month I started getting 2 error messages while trying to zoom. The first one was zoom error and the other error notified me to turn the camera off and on?!  Not only that but after about 1.5 hours the camera will not record because the camera is overheated. Even without being in direct sunlight! Also this doesn’t have a pop out display which is a big deal now that I’ve worked with this camera. So these errors are happening every time I try to zoom in on something which is a huge problem. I would’ve returned it but of course these problems occurred AFTER the deadline to return. I’m writing this to save someone else who’s thinking of purchasing this horrible camera. Maybe I received a dud and no one else has this problem?

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This camera does not take quality pictures at all.  My phone takes better and it shouldn't.  I am tech savvy and read all directions.  I am just not happy with it and will find another.  I am returning this.  For $90 it should do better, this is a $40 camera with a $90 price tag. I will say it was in original packaging and arrived quickly. Thats about all the good.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Had similar SONY in past. Buy this new one. It is made of PLASTIC! Aluminum case is gone! 20mg max. I was on a cruise. New 16gb card. I took 543 pictures! played with pixels, high - low. Tried easy function. The zoom SUCKS! for sunset, horizon. I was not moving. Slow steady hand. 1/3, 33% of the 543 pictures were crap, fuzzy, distorted????,I did buy this cheap cam for taking ebay pics. I can not afford the new?? BIG, OLD style looking 35mm cameras? Really? Thought this new technology was smaller and easy to put in pocket! Yes, I was on a vacation! I have a smart phone that works better. But I hate them! I am 61 and still use  a  desk top PC to store and use paint program.,But cam had a nice long battery life ( of course being new it did ). Did not try video.,But this should have been $49.99. Cost them $3-4 dollars to make in China?? JMO!,I would not buy it again!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I bought this as a gift for my 11 year old daughter for our trip to Europe.  It's a decent little camera.  The pictures turn out nice.  Although it feels a little flimsy (lightweight) she dropped it several times and it didn't break.  My only complaint is it's a little slow between pictures.  You take a picture and wait a couple seconds before it's ready to take another.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I have had a few Nikon Coolpix cameras over the years and loved them, but when my last one finally gave out I decided to try this Sony camera and I wish I hadn't. No matter what the photos are never very clear, are grainy, the colors are always off, the colors with the flash are off and don't look good. It's ok if you take photos in extreme bright sunlight, but anything else and it's not very good.,Worst of all is the horrible video mode which is completely useless. There is no way to stop it from going out of focus constantly. The Nikon Coolpix has two video focus settings, fixed and continuous, and the Nikon's focusing isn't bad at all, it only adjusts it when needed. This Sony on the other hand constantly goes in and out of focus literally every ten seconds making all videos completely unwatchable.,Forget this camera and go buy a Nikon Coolpix. I am.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Pictures were all blurry.  Not sure if we got a dud, or if all these camera's are blurry, but we returned it and bought something different.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: What's cameras in nice small portable easy to work with has a great zoom for how small it is pictures come out very clear and for less than $80 you can't go wrong with this device especially if you get a good size SD card for storage in a good case to put it in

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: So far a cheap and ez camera to use, not many functions, no display button to clear the screen of stuff, cheap and plasticky, light, kind of seems like a real cheap feeling camera, but seems to take descent enough pics and vids is a one button option that as soon as pushed starts filming then when pushed again stops.  Downloads are as ez as drag and drop and quick too.  I'm hoping to get some you tube use of this camera which I got with a tripod.  Not near as nice as my old 600.00 sony camera but twenty megapixels and good for 70.00.  If your expecting aluminum body and a whole list of options this is not the camera for you, mostly an intuitive camera that doe's everything for you and shows you flashes on the screen of what it's doing, such as night time, portrait, facial focus, low light, etc.  Great kids camera but I think some adults might be let down if looking for a fancy sony high end product.  Good enough is what I keep saying, I will update this in time maybe if it works better or worse to let you know.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: After I finally got it (took a week to ship it, 2days to get here), I am real pleased with it. It's easy to use. It stays charged well, though I had read reviews that it didn't. I'm no photographer, I just wanted to take some pictures of sun rises and my family, pets, etc. and it does a good job of that.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I purchased this to replace my old Kodak that is no longer supported online.  I'm liking it, so far.  Just a matter of getting used to something new. Takes very nice pictures (even better than my old Kodak!).  Worth the money, I think.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I used this a few times for biking.  Great for still shots, not so great for moving/action shots.  Even the still shots sometimes look a little crumby.  The only advantage this camera has over an iphone 6s is the zoom quality. I've actually resorted back to using my phone for its ease of use.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I've been waiting for years to start a new hobby and when I saw this affordable digital camera I went ahead and jumped onboard.  The other brand name digital cameras cost so much more, so I was okay making this investment as it is affordable and I'm glad I made that decision.  The camera comes with a two rechargeable batteries, a macro lens attachment, HDMI cable, USB cable and detailed manual.  I need to enroll in a photography course so I can learn about the different settings and how to optimize settings, but as you can see in attached photos, out-of-the-box settings are not bad at all.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I have never been a fan of digital photography, preferring black and white, high speed film for its fine grain detail. I decided to enter the 21st century and see if I could approximate the quality of professional film photography at a reasonable price point. I was surprised. No, digital is not the same as film, but for most of the mundane photography that I do, this dual purpose camera works well. I was impressed by the quality of the images in this relatively inexpensive camera. I have not used it to record video yet and may review that in a future post.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I purchased this camera twice due to a price drop. However, my experience with both cameras was when I put my SD card in, I could not take a picture. The screen read, please insert card. Both SD cards were brand new.  During a google search, I discovered it's the camera not the SD card. If anyone else has experienced this, please advise.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Since my dog knocked the camera out off my wife’s hands and it dropped on the floor and broke the lenses we took all pictures with our cellphones. But the quality is not that good especially at night. I know my wife wanted a new camera and I got her this one. She is very happy with this camera. She likes the wide angle. We took a lot of photos on Easter and we love the quality. My wife likes the flip screen very much. She can take a selfie with our daughter whenever she wants. Anyway we ate really happy with this camera.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I want to buy a camera for travel with a low budget and I choose this one. After using this camera, it surprises me. Since its picture quality is good and the camera weight is not too heavy. It comes with two batteries, so I can use my camera for a whole day and don't need to worry about the battery. It also takes video and has wifi function. When you take a picture you also have a few model function can choose. The best thing is the screen can turn, so you can take a selfie.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Camera was pretty simple to set up. Did have to look at the manual for a few things, such as setting the date and time. Camera reads a micro SD inside of an SD adapter but won't write to it. A regular SD does work just fine though. Was able to record an hour long video and still had some battery left. Nice that it came with a second battery and the wide angle lens was very handy.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This is very nice and stylish camera.  Is easy to use and reliable. In the bundle, it has a simple pouch, but that is fiddly to use . The bundle includes a good size lenses so it's ready to go for any purpose.  The camera slips easy into a pocket, and the supplied wrist strap is handy for carrying it ready for use when sightseeing. The lens is good quality and can make a decent picture where a photo would struggle.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: For the price nice simple basic  camera. The packaging is great. The camera looks nice and comes with 2 batteries.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I'm beyond happy, on how this cheap looking camera works so well! The main use of this camera was to use it to vlog, and i was willing to accept an okay, good quality camera to record videos (one that captures better quality than my phone) as a starting point (to invest on a better one),  but this passed my expectations! The quality is great! It is definitely 1080 definition and the photo aspact captures pictures well!,It's amazing how it came with an extra battery pack, a lens (that pulls out of outlook), and a wire that i guess you can connect to the tv.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I'm a  photographer and I was just looking for a quality camera for my kids.  Overall it does what it says will do.  The menu system is a little clunky, but it seems to be as good as some of the old point and shoots you could buy at the big box stores, but will also shoot video. It has facial recognition which is great, but overall it needs good light to take quality pictures. I'm actually impressed that it has 3 different types of lenses included.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I am very happy with the size of the camera.  It fits perfectly into my handbag.  I am about to embark on a major trip overseas and this camera will back up my I phone camera.,The only thing I am not pleased about is the camera case and I will not be able to use it.  The case has a shocking odor, despite my cleaning it in soap and water.  It smells like everything that comes from China.  Wondering if it is formaldehyde.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This is a nice little camera for the price. The battery charged in about two hours.  I have only taken two pictures just to make sure it worksas it is for a trip, and they look fine on the camera. I have not yet printed or downloaded. It is very lightweight and perfect if you are looking for something that will produce a better than cell phone quality photo without the expense of a professional camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I was happy to receive the camera package. All items were in excellent condition. If anything, I wish the camera case was large enough to house the battery charger. I like to keep all items together.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Bought this for a trip to New Zealand. Great camera and it came with a good package of extra features. The camera is small and can fit in my hiking pants pocket. I made use of the case, the memory case, memory stick, and usb memory socket.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Just purchased this so haven't used it much yet and have not printed in pictures.  Screen is very small and pictures in camera view could have better resolution.  Jury is still out on this one.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Good point and shoot.  The package is a bit overpriced.  Looking at average pricing on line I probably could have got the whole shebang for about $10.00 less.  Was convenient to have all of it in a single package though.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Purchased this item for my sons upcoming photography course (6th grader)  he is in love with it!  I enjoy the smile on his face and the different photos he is taking, this is a great stater kit for anyone just starting out or someone that needs a small but powerful little camera for on the go.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Really like the camera with its compact size but outstanding functions.  The bundle made it nice.  I had a chip without,having to go shopping.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I don't have anything against this camera, except it has no self-timer & that's what I wanted. Other than that one feature, it is a good camera & I would recommend it to any shopper.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Great little camera, and I really mean little! Smaller than I expected, wish it were a tad larger, but it takes nice pics. I haven't had it long, but the photos I've taken with it have been quite lovely. I'm still learning how to use all features, and have yet to use the desk tripod. Nice accessories included.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I read a lot of  negative reviews before making this purchase but decided to try. So thankful that I did! This camera went on a vacation with us and took amazingly clear pictures.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I wish I would've returned this when I had the chance. I suppose I thought maybe I was taking the photos in bad lighting, but I genuinely think the camera just sucks. Don't waste your money. Go to bestbuy or somewhere you can try the cameras out before you buy.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Nice camera for the price point for a nine year old to learn photography and her slime channel.,Build quality is very bad though, not at all what I expect from canon.  I am a professional photographer who shoots mostly canon and fujifilm.  This is far below any cheap pocket canon I have ever purchased before,  the plastic body feels like it will break at any moment.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I charged the battery in the charger (light goes from orange to green) and then could not get the camera to turn on ~ I knew many reviewers with low-star review said they could not get it to turn on, but with free returns I gave it a chance.  I will be returning this item and all accessories that I bought for it for a refund and looking elsewhere for a compact digital camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I had an earlier version and I like the improvements. Only had it for a month so far...  First improvement  is 10x megapixels. (as opposed to 8) Second is that it's even smaller than the earlier version (but still hooks up to a tri-pod) and the 3rd improvement is the battery is removable but is a part of the camera. the previous cameras required 2 AA batteries and what was wrong with it wasn't the batteries but the battery holder lid, it wore out too and would no longer hold the batteries in place. I hope this one doesn't have that problem in the future. Overall I like this camera and it's reasonably priced for it's quality and accuracy. I use it primarily to photograph artwork using a tri-pod and extra lighting.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Don' t forget the card.  This does not come with a card.,My old canon elph 100 stopped working properly, and I wanted something to replace it.  I liked my old elph 100 better because it was easy to switch from close ups to distant shots.  But on the 190 I have to page through the menu to switch from close ups to distance.  Still for about $100 it is easy to use and take along in jacket pocket.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Needed new camera, one I could connect to laptop, and send photos via email/fb messaging to family/friends.  Old camera didn't have that capability!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Functionally, this camera is very similar to my older SD1100IS with a longer zoom range and larger screen. I'm only disappointed that I can't force the flash. The only options are auto flash or no flash.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: The pictures came out terrible and there was insufficient flash for low light. I returned this camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I'm no professional, just needed a camera to take photos of the fishing nets I sell on Etsy. It works for my needs and will serve its purpose.  My old Kodak EasyShare C182 that takes AA batteries eats batteries like crazy. And it started to get a lot of blurred photos. Since I don't have any other device for photos, Smart phone or other,  I bought this Canon. Seems good to me and will serve its purpose.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Super lightweight and easy to use. Gave it to my young son (so he would stop filling my phone with pictures up his nose 😄) and he learned how to use it in seconds. The pictures are surprisingly good from such a young user.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: I got this camera for traveling. I love how compact it is. It’s really easy to use and takes great photos. Much cheaper than a lot of the cameras out there and on par with quality.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
