review: This camera is perfect for using at the ball field. I needed something that could take good pictures in motion and this works great! My 7 year old can even use it easily. Great camera and very affordable

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: This camera is small and very lightweight. The picture quality is great and it’s easy to use. I got this for my daughter and she loves it. I would suggest this to anyone

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: I got this for my kids to use as a starter camera.  It’s a nice size.  Takes good pics.  Easy to use.  The pictures are nice.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Bought this for our daughter to take to Disney. It worked great and was easy for her to use. She loved taking her own pictures!

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Great camera for me to travel with when I don’t want my massive one! Fits nicely in my purse. Takes great photos. Easy to use.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Im very happy with this camera. Very nice picture quality and the smile recognition feature is great.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Super easy to use. Takes good quality photos. Battery had a good charge life.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: The camera has very simple sitting so my daughter used it without any guidance from me.Good for recording her memories done.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Wish it would have came with a port on the camera to connect directly to a computer, other devices to import pictures.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Takes awesome  pictures

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Camera works great and has tons of features. The add on kit has so much! Came right on time. Very happy with this purchase!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Purchased for a trip and am learning it during our VBS program. Taking great photos. Buttons and screen are a little small, but finished product holds up to what I am looking for. Shipped quickly with very nice accessories and well packaged.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: This is just an affordable camera. Takes great photos!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: The camera is a Bat Mitzvah  gift for my granddaughter in Israel. We haven't given it to her yet. We are sure that she'll love it just as much as  her sisters love theirs!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Have not had a chance to use everything yet, buy so far so good!  All the items seem to be of good quality and contraction.  Everything came well packaged and as advertised.  Great package for a traveling set or for someone just starting out!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Value and quality in this one

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Product does not have portal link to USB cable. Too many accessories, would like more put into the camera itself.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I bought it for my 11 years daughter and she like it

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Works good, gets the job done. However, it kills batteries incredibly fast (no matter what kind of batteries I use). If you plan to go on any sort of tour or hike (something where it needs to last a while), this camera will not work for you. However, if you just use it occasionally for a few minutes, it'll be fine. Just make sure you have extra batteries.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I like this little camera - I was looking for something small enough to flip into my bag, quick enough operation for quick pictures, and with enough programing to help me snap quick pictures without getting bogged down with tedious adjustments.  Granted I am not a professional photographer but this little camera allows me the quick snap pictures and fun I was looking for.  The AA batteries are certainly affordable and available anywhere. The pictures are super easy to download to your computer.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Under no circumstances are you to buy this piece of ****!! you take 5 pictures and your batteries are history. its a waste of money and more than that is a plain rip-off I am not satisfied with this product but I doubt I'll get my money back. Hopefully the people  at Kodak can read this!!!!

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: This was a gift for a student of mine’s so I don’t have pics of it to post, but within the first few hours the batteries that came with the camera had already drained out. The focus/ quality of the photos were piss-pour and the flash also wasn’t the best. The audio quality of the video is terrible. Can’t expect too much for a camera at this price point but All in all, if you are planning to gift this to anyone older than 5 years-old then I do not recommend. And if you do happen to gift this to someone, I’d recommend purchasing some rechargeable batteries. They will need them.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: My old Kodak camera died, so I bought this little one.  It has no operational book included, which doesn't seem like a big deal.  However, I'm 78 and not able to use the computer to study & achieve the knowlege to operate this thing.  I found a manual in print on-line which I ordered (all 86 pages of it) and it will take up space and weight in my suitcase on vacation but it's at least something in words that I can use to learn to operate this camera. I would have appreciated a little instruction booklet to help me understand how to operate this item.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: The camera takes great pictures and is easy for a novice to use right out of the box. That said, don't take it camping unless you also bring 10 pounds of batteries. It seems to eat right through the heavy-duty lithium rechargeables I bought to go with it. Maybe it does better with throw-aways, I don't know. But with my batteries it used them up in less than 40 shots with no flash.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I love it now that I have managed how to operate it. Great quality pictures. Great price. Need to learn how to make videos with it but the instructions are so teeny one can't read them and the website it directed me to, isn't live. I shall keep trying. I like this camera. The value is there.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: This is very small, but has very good quality photos and is easy enough to use.  Any child under 9 may have trouble , but we like the small pocket size just fine.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I bought this to use in my classroom as I do  year end slide show for parents.  I have used it 4x in September and taken approximately 20 photos.  The camera will not charge, nor will the lens retract.  So I basically wasted $65.  Apparently the window for returns was Sept 11th for me.  I do not recommend this camera.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I have the same issues as a lot of the other reviewers. The batteries do NOT last in this camera at all. It came with brand new batteries.  I put them in and gave it to my mom as a gift. She tried using the camera a week later and the batteries were completely dead. I put new ones in. She tried using the camera a couple weeks later and again, dead batteries. This happened three times. It takes good pictures when you have fresh batteries, but as soon as you let it sit, it drains and becomes an expensive paperweight. One star because although it can work, it makes it too expensive and inconvenient to do so.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Poor fit and closure snaps did not hold. Case kept popping open, exposing camera.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: WAS VERY DISAPPOINTED. IT LOOKS REAL GOOD AND CAN OPERATE THE CAMERA WITH THE CASE ON - EXCEPT IF YOU ATTACH A TRIPOD OR MONOPOD!  WHEN YOU FLIP DOWN THE FLAP IT HITS THE BASE OF THE ATTACHED TRIPOD MAKING IT IMPOSSIBLE TO GET AT THE CONTROLS OR SEE THE SCREEN PROPERLY. SO WHAT IS THE PURPOSE OF THE TRIPOD ATTACHMENT ON THE BOTTOM OF THE CASE ANYWAYS? DID ANYONE ELSE RUN INTO THIS PROBLEM? ANY SOLUTIONS OUT THERE?

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: The case did not fit my coolpix L810 camera.,I kept it because it seem to fit my camera as pictured in the advertisement.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Would not buy this again. It adds a lot of weight to the camera and actually makes taking pictures more difficult.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: very nice, fits the camera (Nikon p610) like a glove.  Only fault I found is having to remove the camera in order to use the back viewing screen,,other than that it protects the camera as it's supposed to.  nanamarg

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Fit perfect!

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: so far I love my camera case!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Arrived quickly. It's different than the last Sony we had. This one will take a little getting use to. It is very small, and the settings are different. we didn't realize the  memory card didn't come with the camera, so you would be all set to take pictures on Christmas Day. NO we bought the 32 gig memory care along with a bag of goodies, and the case separately

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Sony makes some of the very best digital cameras and this is one of the best.  It is small enough that I can carry it in my pants pocket all the time yet it has a very nice zoom lens and many, many features.  I also have larger digital cameras but this is one of my favorites.  If you want a new digital camera, I say just check out all the Sony models and pick the one which is best for your needs.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The first camera received worked fine outdoors but i noticed it was hunting and having trouble focusing indoors even in a well lit room. If I hadn't had a lot of experience with this level camera from Canon & Lumix, I would have thought it was my fault. I returned it and the second one has no problems focusing indoors quickly. It's just as good as the competition. Things I prefer on this camera to our Canon A3500: 8x vs. 5x optical zoom but with comparable f-stop. Simpler, easier to use menu system and a standard usb cable for charging directly to the camera without removing the battery. The advantage of the Canon over the Sony is the lens retracts completely into the camera body flat whereas the Sony lens protrudes a little bit even when the lens is retracted and closed. Also, the Canon feels a little bit more sold than the Sony. Overall, the Sony is a great camera that takes sharp pictures indoors or out. It has an amazing lens, works great in low light, is tiny, easy to use and takes much better pictures than my iPhone 4.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: My husband and I really love our cameras.  We bought one for each of us to take on vacation.  They are small, lightweight, and take great pictures.  The resolution of the picture is better than what you see on the viewfinder, although the viewfinder is good quality too.  They are also very reasonably priced for the quality of product you get.  When we are out and about, I tend to leave my camera out of the case in my bag so I can pull it out quickly and take pictures.  It has been durable despite the abuse, and we've had no problem whatsoever with them.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Nice little camera -- [UPDATE] it does "burst pictures" but not like an SLR would - meaning there is a slight pause after each picture as it processes the picture.  You have to put it into that mode.  It can do video, but I didn't get it for that.  Good Value.  Worth the money!  I do also wish, as constructive criticism, that there was an intermediate setting between VGA and 5 MP.  The pictures are either too small (150k) or too large (3 GB).  So I take pictures in 5 MP mode and resize them on my desktop computer.  I don't need the detail like some people demand.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Nicely designed camera and good value for the price.  Simple, intuitive controls.  Easy directions. Decent size screen.  Zoom works well.  Auto focus is excellent. Includes the charger.,Drawbacks are NTSC and PAL for video output.  No HDMI option.  No Wi-Fi or Wi-Fi Direct capabilities.  Images take a few seconds to appear after pushing the shutter button. Image quality was decent, but no higher quality than our Samsung Galaxy S6 and S7 phones.  Zoom images were about the same quality as the phone.,So, if you have a nice smart phone, this camera won't offer much additional.  If you wanted a stand alone pocket camera, this is a fine choice.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Took this camera with me to Israel to get shots of the Holy Land that I could blow up if I wanted to. Loved the small size which easily fit in my pockets so it was with me all the time, though it does takes a bit to power up to be ready to take a picture. Battery life was more than adequate and there were more photo options than you might expect on such a compact camera. Very pleased with the quality of the images captured. This Sony delivered high quality shots and others have raved about the optics of the lens. I was quite delighted with this little gem.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I have never purchased an inadequate "Sony" product.  This camera lived up to all of my expectations.  I was able to use it immediately with just a quick review of the camera itself.  The picture quality is amazing.  Looking at some of the other reviews, I might add that I don't like the date and time on the face of my pictures, with this camera you don't get date and time on the picture, thank you Sony.  Also, when I hit the on button it powers on instantly same with power off.  I love that you can get great shots of moving objects!  The size is perfect, not so small you can't find the right button to press but not so large you can't slip it into a pocket.  I also purchased a carrying case for it.  Honestly, I can't find anything bad about this purchase.  I love it!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Really disappointed; the camera is small and decently easy to use for someone like your grandma; but the battery won't last even few hours of usage, without even use the flash.,The image quality is OK; on par with other cameras in the same price range; but the battery life is very short; making this impossible to use for more than 20-30 pictures and few videos.  Beware if you are buying it, that the battery has to be charged constantly.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The slow auto-focus, constant blur, unpredictable light changes, and the display have me really annoyed. I have an older model of this camera which is much better and creates sharper more accurate images, albeit less pixels. The body and size on this overall feels a lot cheaper than the older model. The video isn't all that great either. I feel like some serious corners were cut with this and it was assumed no one would notice. The only difference so far that seems to be a real plus is the battery life. Seriously though, the display is killing me; the colors are nowhere near accurate and it looks no better than a circa 2003 display.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: It’s 2019. I should be able to buy a camera at this price point that actually takes quality pictures. If you have a smart phone from 2008 on, you don’t need this camera. Save some money and get a camera worth your time

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I got this camera as a Vhristmas present for my 9 year old great-grandson. He likes being able to take his own pictures because it's easy for him to use.Nice little camera

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Love the size. Pictures came out good also for a point n shoot.I used it a lot! I hope this will bring out a size like this again, something that can fit in your back jeans pocket.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Digital camera which can be carried in handbags. So handy. Has good picture quality. Easy to capture moments

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I bought this for my son. We were going on a a big trip and he wanted to capture pictures of all the stops we made. The camera stopped focusing within a few days and without any warning, it completely erased everything on the SD card. All of his pictures are gone. The camera will not take another SD card, either. A waste of money and lots of tears from my 8 year old son.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: If you are looking for a Christmas gift or small compact camera for a little beginner photographer, something is not costly, this is the One.It's really small and cute and the quality of the picture are very good. The color is very eye appealing and it is very easy to carry around.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is a great starter camera. It has a ton of features, 8x zoom, 18 mega pixels. It’s lightweight and easy to figure out how to use and edit photos

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I gave it as a gift & it was well liked! I think it was a good deal & price

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is a nifty little camera that is loaded with options and has a great picture. Seller was very accommodating. I will recommend to friends.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: My daguther almost finished kindergarten school. She wants to take some pictures with her friend and partner. So I bought this for her, and he used this camera to took hundreds of pictures, and we printed it for her. She was very satisfied with this camera!!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I was surprised and thrilled when I opened the Amazon box. Although I knew it was a "bundle," I didn't expect the products I discovered. Honestly, I thought most of them would be throw-aways, cheap, and not worth my time. But the bundle was only $4 more than the camera alone, so - what the heck?,First - the camera. It is exactly what I was looking for. Great optical zoom, 20 mp resolution, which allows plenty of image to play around with software-wise. Light, easy to handle, intuitive. I could go on, but suffice it to say that, for a point and shoot camera, this Canon takes awesome pictures. My first outing with it was a trip to Great Smoky Mountains National Park. My pictures could be hung in a gallery, they are SO good.,Second - the bundle. The case alone was impressive. It is one that I would have picked for myself. In addition to being roomy enough for all my stuff - camera, tripod (mini), charger, cleaning cloth, extra battery, it is well-built and looks as if it will stand up to years of use. The tripod is exactly the same one I had on my Amazon wish list - but I got lucky. It was included in the bundle. Cleaning supplies - check; excellent quality charger (with car adapter!), extra battery, extra 64 gb memory card, and some other things I don't recall right off hand.,I'm still astounded that all of these goodies were included in a bundle that cost me less than $5 more than the camera alone. Thanks, The Imaging World. You done good!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I loved how easy it was to figure out how to use, but how high quality the photos are! Im still getting used to it, but the photo quality can only go up from here!, If you want to change the setting to one you can manually change the lighting with, press "function set" when you are in photo taking mode and it'll let you do a bunch different stuff., I couldn't be happier! This is my first good camera (aka not a little pocket digital) but I've been studying about them and wanting one for years! It's perfect.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I bought my first digital camera 16 years ago for a trip we were going to in Europe. 3 megapixel with a 3x optical zoom. Worked fine for me and was satisfied. It finally gave out and I purchased this package deal. Very impressed with the quality of pictures it takes. I'm a graphic artist so I can adjust the image to meet my needs. All the extras in the package where more than I could have hoped for. Two 64GB memory cards, Two batteries with two chargers and a card reader I can plug into my Mac USB port. I don't need extra lenses and having to relearn how to use an SLR Camera again, this camera has all I need and more. Plenty of features to learn if need be, taking great photographs suits me fine now. Totally would would invest in this purchase again.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: So far this camera has exceeded my expectations. I wanted a lightweight, small camera with zoom to photograph wildlife, particularly birds. I also like to go birding at dawn and dusk. This camera captures that light beautifully while retaining sharp detail.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Pros- small, light weight, compact, zoom lens is better than most point and shoot cameras,  takes decent pics for a point and shoot camera, loved that it came in a color other than black.  Good for someone who doesn’t want the hassle of bringing a big camera and all the interchangeable lens when vacationing.,Cons-  The picture quality is not as good as a DSLR camera, it is not suggested for professional use.  You cannot change out the lenses.  If you want a DSLR camera than but it. I would not suggest that you buy this camera expecting it to be equal to a DSLR camera.,Overall-  I purchased this camera for traveling cause I did not want to lug a heavy camera and all its accessories when traveling.  Don’t get me wrong, I love my DSLR camera but sometimes it can be a bit bulky.  I wanted a simple camera that could zoom in and take a decent picture.  I believe this camera is priced right for a point and shoot camera.  It does the job it was intended for.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Absolutely love this camera! It cane with everything pictured and it's a great deal. I've been playing with it and filming with this for my YouTube channel... the quality is fabulous. I just need to get a monitor and a taller tripod. Arrived on time and i chose the red one. I'm still playing with out, but love the autofocus feature, timed photos so I can have my own photo shoot and timed start for filming. This is totally worth the price!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I just wanna start off saying this is a really great beginner camera. This is my first “professional” camera that I have ever owned, but I think it’s safe to say I’m not so much of a “beginner.” I’ve done photography before but I’ve never had my own camera, so I thought this would be a good one to start with. I got it recently and I still have the option to return it and I’ve really been considering it. I personally like having a little more weight in my hands when it comes to my cameras, but that’s just a me thing. I think the camera settings are cool so to speak - they’re more filters to play with than be serious with, but that’s just my own opinion. The continuous shot feature on the camera has to be the one I really hate. It’s basically the same as the normal shot - it takes a really long time to buffer and honestly that takes away the whole point of a continuous shot. I also don’t like how I’ll see the shot I wanna take in the viewfinder, but the moment the picture is actually taken, it looks different. This is especially apparent when taking certain creative liberties with your lighting. Also, the camera does not work well with motion in my experience. Either it’s too late or too early, again this goes back to the continuous shot problem. Also I was told there is a photo editing program that comes with the camera, but I have yet to discover it. I do want to say this, if you have never done photography before then this is a great camera to get you started. I just have a bit more experience so it’s nkt really doing it for me. The zoom, though, is amazing. I was in my backyard and I zoomed into my neighbors tree that was on the other said of the neighborhood, and the camera captured the leaf perfectly. It was amazing. Who knows, I might give the camera another try, but I don’t know. This camera honestly isn’t bad and is worth the investment if you’re starting out or just like to take pictures. It gets the job done.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I just received the camera last week and haven't had time to use it much.  Still learning it.  The camera arrived in two days just as promised.  Impressed with the service.  The bundle package is nice and you get quite a lot accessory items.  The case and extra battery were worth buying the bundle, but the other items are nice, too.,I ordered the wrong camera and was able to cancel it with no problem and get the right camera still on time.,I am well pleased with the company and probably will be with the camera once I figure out how to use it.,It is more for moderate or beginner users, but that's o.k. with me.  This is my second Canon camera and I'm going to love the zoom when we are out nature riding and walking.  If I find I need a more advanced camera later, this will be the company for me.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I decided to get this camera package since I was interested in doing wildlife photography and the idea of having a 40X zoom was very enticing for me.  The package includes an awful lot that I also wanted, most of all, the extra battery and charger, the case, and the 64GB SD card.  I realize all those things can also be purchased separately but it was just so convenient to have it all together in the box.  I haven't had time to take many pictures yet but plan to use this as my go-to camera when I'm out where I might be able to photograph wildlife, especially birds.  I have a smaller camera that fits in my pocket which I use while on kayaking trips.  This camera really doesn't fit in a pocket but it's extremely light and small for all that it does.  I look forward to putting it to the test in the next several months.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Based on the reviews I was so excited to get the camera, I thought I had made the right choice by choosing this one. Man, was I disappointed!!! No matter which setting I chose I could not get a good picture in clear daylight. Instead of our family photos being a success they turned out to be an epic fail. On top of the failed family photoshoot, there is no way to format the pictures so I can view them on my computer. I have no way to edit or print them. This was just a disappointment all around. I will be sending it back.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Bought this for the Sony RX100M3. It's a perfect fit, except the lens makes the camera too thick for comfort. So, XActo knife! I cut out a semi-circle for the lens--now it's ideal! The wrap-around flap still completely protects the camera, and the stick-out lens makes it easy to get the camera out when the flap is lifted.,I've tried a number of other cases, but this is the best. I like a belt case, and this has the loop. I wear it rearward of the right hip, and it sits in a spot where it's hard to see front on, yet easy to access. Sweet spot that does not interfere with sitting in a chair or car seat.,Only improvement, to my mind, would be a real snap instead of a magnetic one. The magnetic one is pretty good, but sometimes comes undone when putting on a seat belt, etc. Still, the flap keeps the camera securely in the case even when un-snapped.,Quality material & workmanship. I preferred a darker color, so wiped it down with black shoe dye, the rubbed with a cloth to get a darker brown antique-y look.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Fits the RX100 version 1 perfectly; can't imagine it wouldn't fit the RX100 II just as well.  Nice tanned leather; the strap matches the case (another reviewer said his didn't, but the set I got match perfectly).  A matching leather wrist strap is also included; it's a bit thicker than the nylon one that comes with the camera, and matches the case.  The case also has a leather-covered belt clip.  All I wanted was something to protect the camera, which I always keep in my briefcase or flight bag, and this is perfect.  The straps and belt clip might be useful to others.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: This is a very nice leather case for my RX100. Love the width-wise case, the combination of soft suede interior and durable leather exterior, the slightly lowered sides that allow the wrist strap to hang out, and especially the magnetic closure. Only reason I didn't give five stars was that the magnet part of the closure pulled out of the bottom of the case. After putting it back in a few times by reinserting the tabs, it broke. A testament to the quality of the leather work is that the metal broke before the leather gave way. I'll be ordering another if I can't successfully epoxy the closure back in.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Others has said they didn't like to color, and the company must have listened because my arrive dark brown.  Don't expect leather for this price it is vinyl. but I don't dare.  I am not buying a fashion accessories I simply want a protective case for camera.  I wanted a belt loop so when hiking, walking or bike riding I would have the camera ready.  I like the magnet closure as it makes it easy to get the camera out with no fumbling.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: I'm actually happy with the color.. I was looking for this case in the lighter, camel brown that some of the other Mega Brands cases are in, but I settled for this darker one.  When the case arrived, I was surprised to see that I had gotten a camel colored one!  A win for me, but this was have been super annoying had I been wanting the dark brown.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Nice quality, but the item was not as good looking as I hoped. It almost looked like one of those little clasp purses that you see women with at parties, so I wasn't interested in it for that reason alone.,Then, my Sony RX-100 m2 didn't fit very well. It fit the original RX-100 (m1) fine. RX-100 m3 also didn't fit.,It didn't seem like a very convenient design.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Under careful inspection, this one isn't genuine leather as described so I'm disappointed but it's very well designed and made. I use this, for sony RX 100v and fits well.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: This is an excellent and well made case that includes a shoulder strap and a belt loop.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: product is very useful, came  in as described ;  delivered in time

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Bought this originally for my Sony RX100m2 which it fit comfortably snug. When i upgraded to the RX100m4, the camera lens was too thick for the case so i cut out the shape of the lens in the case and it fits amazing! Sometimes you just have to innovate to make things work hahah

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Good Camera for beginners. My only problem is that the lowest aperture the camera can shoot is F4.5 and the highest the lens can shoot is F5.6. So if you want your pictures to look fine af there are only 3 aperture stops you can shoot at (F4.5,F5, and F5.6). If you shoot at an aperture to high for the lens, your pic will look like the Palm trees below. A good pic but the lens couldn't handle the aperture. It would have been great if the lens it came with could shoot at a higher aperture.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Great camera for me. I bought to continue a great photographic journey with my son. This year is first year playing tackle football so I got the camera to take football pics..I ended up purchasing the 75-300mm telephoto lense, better for sports, in addition the the wide angle that came w the camera.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Very impressed.  Bought this for my daughter who loves to take pictures on her phone.  This is a major upgrade.  I was concerned when I read some reviews that said the wide angle lens and the filters were not compatible with the camera.  We were able to use every accessory and we found everything in this kit to be high quality and compatible if you know how to hook it up.  One ding...  the auto focus is a little slow,  but she prefers the manual setting.  Very good value.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I'm sure the camera quality was fine but my package came in and there were some sort of rice grain stuck inside of the actual camera lens.The camera was also cover in some sort of white flakey stuff that was hard to get out. And the inside lenses were already dirty and smudgy even though I had just took it out of the box. I will be sending everything back and getting a refund. Some thing like is is not acceptable considering how much money this camera cost.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This was one of those purchases that had me refreshing my Amazon app to check tracking every 10 minutes. Although I chose the free shipment method, it arrived in 2 days. All of correct accessories came in excellent condition with warranty and instructions, except for one item which I'm sure I'll figure out eventually. It's a small piece with a handle and adhesive. I purchased this camera for a trip to Europe that I'll be taking in May, but I'm so inspired by the camera, I'll be doing personal photo shoots. The quality is great. I took a selfie and a photo of my turntable that I didn't realize was as dusty as it is until looking at the photo!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: The camera is of course working and everything was ok, but the bag came broken.. so that was a bit depressing. The part where the strap attaches was torn..,Day 2 and the other side ripped.. and I mean I get the bag isnt the main point of the order but it is really annoying I can't carry my camera out cause I need to get a new bag. If this is a kit, like everything should work pretty fine right?, It was so annoying when it snapped It made me almost drop the camera and the lenses in the bag

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Just get a Canon, and Canon lens. The only thing worth having in this kit is the Canon, and the Canon lens.  Everything else is garbage.,-The Digital Ultraviolet filter could come in handy if you put them to use.,-The memory card holder is cute, but I could have lived without it.,-The flash isn't compatible with Canon T6, therefore it's possible for it not to be compatible with any Canon(I wouldn't take the risk).,-The extra lenses... You guest it, they are not compatible with Canon lenses.,-SD cards work as they should.,-The tripod is cheap and generic.,-The remote shutter works as it should.,-The bag is standard, and if I'm missing something, no worries, it a huge chance you don't need it.,The only reason I gave it a two instead of one has nothing to do with Vivitar.  Save your money, get the basics from authorized dealers, and go from there.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this camera to take photos of jewelry I'm going to be selling and for family events. It's pretty easy to use. It comes with a lot of stuff that I probably won't ever need, but they are nice to have anyway. I think it is a good value. The only thing that bothers me is that it depends so much on the battery being charged. There is no power cord to plug into a wall socket so that you can shoot table-top objects without the battery. You have to rely on the battery all the time. It can get tedious remembering "Oh yeah, I need to charge the battery — AGAIN". Down time. I was able to download photos into my Macintosh (which is 8 years old) without the battery being charged. That being said, you can't charge the battery while it's in the camera from the computer. I do like the quality of the photos and even though it comes with the two extra lenses, the one it comes with is very good. Overall, I am happy with this purchase. Just wish it came with a power cord.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I had been using a 10 year old hand-me-down Canon Rebel until it died. I knew I wanted another Rebel, so I chose this bundle as the best deal acknowledging that some of the accessories are off-brand and possibly useless. I had checked a couple stores, and I would have paid the same amount, if not more, for just the camera and the lens. The one down side is that it doesn't offer an extended warranty, so I'll just have to keep my fingers crossed. The camera is great, the lens is ok. I have a better lens from my old camera, so I didn't use the stock lens much. As for the accessories- the memory card, external flash, usb reader, and remote all function with the camera. Everything fits in the bag that comes with it, except for the tripod. I think this is a good bundle for the money.,I think the Canon Rebels are a great option for people who aren't trying to make money off their photography. I've never used another type of camera, so I can't fully compare but I've been able to take photos I'm really proud of with both of my rebels, and a free online photog course.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I’m an amateur photographer. I do senior pictures for fellow students and family portraits. The quality is amazing it’s easy enough to use point click and the flash works fantastic. The extra light I’ve set up as an exterior light for some photo projects and it’s worked fantastically. The tripod works in any ground pretty much with the help of a small level on the top of it. If I’m on a hill and I wanna know if it’s straight it works perfectly. The lenses are great! Perfect condition when the arrived, they are exactly what I wanted and what a steal! The UV lens is perfect for super gloomy days I think. It makes them look a little brighter in my opinion less bleh. Which is always nice. The bag it comes with is sturdy no tears no holes! The dividers are movable. You can take them out and switch them around! Which is nice since I’m always switching out the stuff I need for work! It has a million pockets to fit everything you need! The lenses have small pouches and covers to put on and in when you’re not using them. Handy indeed! The two SD cards work great! It has a little wallet like case for them that can attach to the cameras strap for easy convenient use! It does not has an extra battery for the camera however! It charges super fast in an hour and a half (1hr 30 mins) usually it’ll be fully charged! It’s also WiFi enabled! Meaning if you ya ether cannon app you can use your camera remotely through the app! You can also download pictures from it and tag locations you’ve shot at! Super handy!!!! The small clicker you can hook up on the side of camera is great! It works great! It’s very short however. Use only when working with nervous kids so they don’t see you take the picture! The pocket tripod isn’t that useful for me personally but maybe a smaller vlogger or general YouTuber could find it useful it’s only about 5 inches high but it’s super sturdy! The camera might look to big but it holds up great! I use the strap it’s semi comfortable it needs broken in but I don’t recommend it. It’s rough around the edges of it but still usable. I’m ordering a better strap because I use it often and my neck will hurt after shooting for 4-5 hours.,Overall great package! Super useful and great for amateurs or people starting out with Cannon!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: I got this to protect the camera when it was not in the bag I got for it, but I don't be using it.  It fits neatly, and it is light weight, but you have to take the case completely off in order to use the camera, and I found that hard to do without turning on the camera prematurely while taking it out, and again while putting it back.  Also, I would have to take off the lens hood in order to fit the camera into the case.  I have a neoprene case for my digital Rebel, and it attaches to the camera using a screw that fits the tripod connector on the bottom.  To use the camera, all I have to do is flip the case open.  I was hoping that was the way this camera case would work, but alas...

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Very nice will protect my camera nicely ,cameras are a huge investment ,so I don't take chances with mine ! These are light weight but will stop sticker bushes and other things from hitting against my camera when I decide to go off the beaten path. All my cameras wear one of these ,just for that purpose . Your strap comes out the side of it . So when walking climbing etc it's always protected .

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Fits my Nikon D5500 perfectly!! I read the measurements for this product and compared it to my camera measurements and it was very close so I took a shot and it's exactly what I've been looking for - fits snug around it to be able to throw it in a bag or purse for the day with some protection without having to lug around my entire camera bag. Most generic cases like this for DSLRs are much bigger than my D5500, I've tried a couple and been very disappointed so I am very happy with this purchase!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Got this for my SL1. It's about 0.5" too wide on the right side of the camera and 1"+ too long in the front with my 24mm pancake lens on, but the camera doesn't move around much inside. Overall a pretty decent fit. I think the looseness would make it easier and quicker for me to grab my camera from the sleeve when in my purse. I bought the pink, and it does not have the black rubber logo. It has the brand printed in white on the front.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: It fits my Canon SX60 HS very well. My only complaint is that its a little awkward to get the camera out. I seem to fumble at the corners. I also wish it had a slim pocket on the back. It would be handy to carry an extra SD card or battery in it.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: worked well for what i got it for, protected camera in a large bag that had other stuff in it.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Worked great for my trip. Closes a little snug but it definitely did the job. Would definitely recommend.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Bought this as an alternative to my backpack, as a quick cover while in the car. It appears that it will work fine. Exactly as described.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: A little hard to put the camera inside, but good product

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Seems like a well made case, but if you also order the Megagear MG499 LH-DC90 Lens Hood for Canon PowerShot SX60, be prepared for the camera not to fit too easily in the case.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This camera takes nice photos for a “point and shoot” easy camera. It’s nice and compact. (See photos holding camera.) You’ll need an SD card to use it. No memory storing device is included.,I do wish the lens were somehow protected when not in use. It does come with a soft case, but if any type of sand or other similar things were to happen to get inside that the lens could get scratched.,Overall the camera is worth the money.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Until the batteries stopped holding a charge

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Bought this for my 9 year old daughter and she absolutely loves it. Great price for a pixel camera and accessories (includes 2 lithium batteries, charger, strap and carrying case). She can’t wait to take pictures on our family trip to Florida.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I bought this for my daughter use in photography class. She was embarrassed and refused to use it because of the poor resolution. The instructions are over complicated and difficult to adjust. I am not joking! the resolution on my old flip phone was better and easier to operate!!! It now sits in the box because I cannot even give it away....Soooo Bad Deal!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: The camera is very pretty and cute, very light and easy to take it with you. It also comes with 2 batteries! It requires you to put in a SD card to store then pictures. It has video mode too but we haven’t tried that yet. Quality of pictures it good.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: As someone who is not a super skilled photographer, I bought this camera for my trip to Tanzania and Kenya, because I wanted something good for catching images of the animals and landscape, but not so overwhelming that the camera was distracting me from the beauty of where I was. This camera was the perfect fit for me. It's light and compact and not overly complicated. I came back with stunning images of leopards in trees, lions on rocks, etc. The zoom was definitely "good enough" to get some quality images that I will never forget. There was also a panoramic feature that came in really handy a few times to get a wider shot of a line of elephants crossing the road.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Although the camera is small, it still works well and is my favorite color. I like this camera as a collectible. I don't know if this camera can take pictures, but I'm still trying to figure out what it can do.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This is an easy camera for beginner. this camera is small and lightweight, I bought it for my kid. Even my 4 years old boy can use it to take nice picture. This camera just has a few bottoms that my kid can learn how to take picture in different mode. And we love it’s aduroble design and colors.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This is on my boy's birthday wishlist this year, I am very happy to have this for him, the package doesn't include the SD card, you have to buy one separate, very easy for kids to learn how to use this. picture quality is just for beginner and kids, but still worth the money.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Great affordable digital camera, decent quality pictures, you need good lighting in the room. This is good when you don't want to waste phone battery on pictures or risk of getting it stolen. This digital camera does the job. I recommend a 32GB SD card and its a good bargain if you don't do much photography or spend $400 on a camera

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I love photography and it has rubbed off on my kiddos. I didn't want them to break my big camera or my phone so this has been a terrific solution to telling them no. Now I offer them this mini camera instead when they want to take a picture. Happy with the quality of the pictures for the size of the camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am headed to Italy so I will do a follow up when I get back in August.,Follow-up review: I am very pleased with this camera. The pictures were sharp and the menu is easy to use. I also like that it has Wi-Fi so I can instantly upload the pictures to my smartphone. I was able to zoom farther and with clarity than others in my group with their cameras. Not sure of the actual model types used but some were Cannon and Nikon. This camera has a 4K feature that enables you to shoot 30 frames per second. You can go back later and use the picture you want from this shoot. Once again this feature was the best of those that had similar in my group.,Hope this updated review helps.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: After comparing the bigger brands, this camera offered more features at a lower cost. The 60x optical zoom is a very nice feature. The camera is very easy to use, make taking quick pictures much simpler and the image quality is far superior to my fruit-branded cell phone's camera. The colors are far more realistic.,I bought this camera for taking pics of products for selling on eBay. The camera works great for this and provides tons of features for using it everywhere else. I bought some extra batteries and an external charger to go along with this. Now I can go on a road trip and never run out of battery juice for my camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This camera's photo quality actually surprised me because the long zoom range.  But the photos are better than expected - not professional, but this isn't a professional camera.  It's pretty easy to understand and work.  I am having some trouble with the image sliding around in my view finder when I zoom in on a subject.  I get it steady, but it seems to bounce up and down on it's own and I can't make it stop.  It's a crazy long zoom too!  But it looses quality like crazy too with the long zoom.  Nice wide angle though.  Overall, I really like this camera and recommend it.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I got this for my Dad who is 84.  He is an excellent photography and has always used Leica cameras.  However he can't use his Leicas anymore because of a hand tremor.  I selected the Panasonic because of its ability to control stability.  My Dad is now into photography again and taking amazing shots with this camera.  He is also getting into computers and digital photography at 84 because of this great camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This was my fourth Panasonic Lumix camera - I have stepped up from one of the first Bridge cameras that they offered, and I loved them. That is until, I got this one. My last camera is the DMC-FZ100. I wanted the upgraded zoom and megapixels. Let me say that the camera does have good points. The weight of the camera is a nice beefy feeling, and makes you aware that you have a camera in your hands. The zoom is INCREDIBLE! Wow,,,it almost breaks my heart to return it because the zoom is so amazing.,There is a hot shoe for an external flash. That is about where my "WOW factor".,Panasonic made a decision to leave items off of this camera items that had a GREAT purpose and now they are gone. Things like the tilt screen,,,the external MIC plug, the macro setting on the setting wheel is gone, and now must be found in the setting menu (it's easy to find, but it used to be easier to just turn the setting wheel). But the tilt screen gone? Why? Having a bridge camera is the reason why folks like me LOVE having a tilt screen. Most of us are amateur photographers, we LIKE the tilt screen! We don't want to manipulate the different lenses,,,many don't like having to mess with manual focus or settings to control many things. I for one like the ability to change my settings manually,,,but,,,I'm also only 5ft tall, I can't get many shots that taller folks can get. But, give me a tilt screen and I can hold the camera up in the air, tilt the screen down, and see what I want for a decent picture,,,that has been taken away.,That being said,,,I could live with it when I saw the zoom ability! I loved it!!! I could see birds hiding in trees from quite a distance! WOW - I was a happy shutter bug! Then I started to use the camera. The zoom focus was sluggish and super slow (it was not supposed to be this way). I played around with the settings, and was hoping that this would change, it didn't. But, I dealt with it, and started taking pictures,,,the back screen was almost invisible in bright sunlight, so I switched to the view finder. Getting my full view was a bit difficult for me, but I got the shots that I wanted. It was a clear, bright sunny day, not a cloud in the sky and spring cherry tree blooms were screaming for their picture to be taken. Out of 128 pictures taken from my walk, over half had to be deleted. This was an anomaly that had never taken place in my photoshop menu before. The ones that I did keep, all had to be manually adjusted for clarity. I was upset. I had such high expectations for this model camera. I was willing to give up certain items, in a swap for that awesome zoom capability, but the quality that was lacking in the photos themselves, was just not worth it. Many people have raved at this model, and the pictures that it takes. Perhaps I just got a bad camera? I don't know. I cannot be sure. And, I'm not willing to take that chance. I will be waiting for a different brand camera, to arrive on the market place in March. It will cost much more, but, at this point, I'd rather spend more money, and get everything that I want in a camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I'm not a pro or anything but I was tired of taking pictures on my phone.... Just going to say this is absolutely amazing. Very easy to use and the features are easy to control... If you are taking Instagram pictures I'm sure any other camera would do as Point and Shoot are all the rage these days...however if you are serious about quality pictures that don't require a year of schooling to become a photographer than this is for you.,The nice thing is you can do a quick filter edit of colors directly from the camera.,Also the video quality blew my mind...,If you are hesitant don't be and get this one vs the other one you've been thinking about. I did and I'm very happy.,I took photos around my yard yesterday....and of the moon!,I feel like a pro!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am definitely an instamatic user, so when this came, I have been having a blast with all the choices I have.  I would highly recommend watching the dvd that comes with the camera.  The booklet is good, but very basic and this camera can do so MUCH.  I love the telephoto lens, this camera pulls the birds right up to me.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This would be my second panasonic camera. Don't get me wrong, I desperately wanted the fancy Rebel T6 camera but wasn't quite ready to spend that much money, plus money for lenses.  This one comes with a fixie lens (meaning you can't change it out) but the zoom is pretty dope. It also has a macro setting, for those of you that like up-close shots.  It has lots of features I still haven't figured out, but my friend who owns a Canon thinks it's pretty cool since it has a few settings that his $800 camera doesn't have.,So if you're looking for something to begin with for photography, or getting REALLY good quality images, check this camera out.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I'm new to taking any semi professional photos. The extent of my camera knowledge extends to cell phone and go pro, which I've managed pretty well on. One thing I've missed using both of them is any kind of decent zoom.  The FZ80 on the other hand will zoom for days. It's actually pretty incredible. This allows for all kinds of creative space to take photos of nature and wildlife. For the price I think it takes very detailed, clear pictures. The fast delivery was a bonus as well.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Does well.  Pictures fine. Takes several seconds to save pictures, so no possibility whatever for rapid picture captures.  On/Off switch tends to trip on when in holster from mild friction.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I suppose if you were looking for an inexpensive camera to give to a child this would be "ok", everyone else "Caveat Emptor" and remember that you get what you pay for! Painfully slow....Horrible, blurry pictures...Granted I haven't tried using with a tripod, but this is a point and shoot after all so I shouldn't have to rely on using one for a half way decent picture... Completely regret the purchase

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: The images produced by this camera are truly on par with early 2000's flip phones (albeit high resolution) They are blurry and washed out in everything from early morning outdoor shots to evening interior shots I'm no professional photographer but have plenty of experience with other point-and shoots as well as a few SLR's. I didn't expect much from a point and shoot at this price point. However this camera performed below even my low expectations. My $200 2014 Moto G blew the doors off this camera in image output. Will be returning ASAP.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: A small but powerful camera!  Purchased this for a trip.  Didn't want to have the heavy lenses and other equipment to carry.  Figured for the price, I wouldn't be upset if it broke or was lost while traveling.  It takes wonderful pictures!  lightweight and easily fits in a pocket or small purse.  Highly recommend!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I like the size.,Love the lightweight yet durability of this camera. I’m not completely satisfied with the playback volume (extremely low & cannot be adjusted). I can’t seem to get the focus to stay focused during videos though. Maybe it’s the operator though.,Overall I’m pretty happy with the still picture quality and the battery life.,Great budget camera!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Our original camera had been dropped many times resulting in a cracked view screen but was still usable. It was left out in the rain several times and the lens sometimes needed a little manual assist to fully retract but we still took great pics with it. Hopefully we will take a little better care of this second one. It is a great camera and I was very glad to find this model in such good condition.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I own an older model of this camera and used it constantly for 6 years with no problems, but it is starting to have a few issues, so I bought a new, updated one. BIG mistake. The battery has NEVER fully charged after the first time I charged it. The settings are so confusing I can't figure out how to get it to do what I want. The software that came with it has not worked correctly. With the old camera, I plugged it in, it asked what I wanted to do with the pictures, and it worked. After putting my old card into this camera and then putting it back in the old camera, the old camera software no longer worked right (and all of the instructions, for some reason, turned to German.) I kept trying to figure out the new camera and kept waiting for a techier person to help me out with it, but nobody seems to be able to figure it out. It takes great photos sometimes and horrible, blurry ones more often. The battery is dead more often than not and I have to use the old camera anyway. It is way too easy to turn on or off by mistake--although the button is in about the same place, it is easier to push it and I turn the camera off by mistake in the middle of taking a picture. I LOVED my old camera (and still use it even with the small problems.) This one was a waste of money. I wish I'd sent it back when I ordered it six or eight months ago instead of trying to figure it out. I wanted it to be as great as my older Sony, and I'm really disappointed.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: So far so good.  Similar to my last digital camera, a different brand, easy to start using.  One reviewer mentioned the buttons were a bit difficult....that is correct.  They are small and recessed.  I was glad I was aware before purchasing.  Unless you buy an additional charger, you charge the battery in the camera.  Handy at times but I prefer to remove the battery for charging.  Again, I was aware prior to purchasing.  Very happy with the camera. Takes great pictures, price was good. It is in my bag at all times. Takes great videos and they seem less shaky than my previous camera, another brand.  Be aware though, this must be shipped to a physical address rather than a post office box because of the battery.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I have an iPHONE, but hate dealing with apple as getting the photos off of it can be a challenge at times.  They snag them to the cloud.  This camera takes  great photos easy to use and easy to take photos off it

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Best camera for the money. I bought this to take hiking because it weighed almost nothing and it took 20mp photos. It did the job and took some very nice photos, the battery lasted through the entire hike and it even takes some half decent video.,Be warned the autofocus of the video is not very fast or great but the camera is sub 100$ so what do you expect?,As some of the reviews stated if you plan on taking any photos in darkness this thing really exacerbates darkness, but for outdoor sunshiney photos its perfect.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Camera felt like it was made cheap plastic. The picture quality was bad.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: The reviews on here have to be a scam. If I could this product less than a star I would.,Considering all the reviews on here I bought this camera .... it is nothing as described. Did not work. Hassle now to return. Quality is not good for this price- it’s like a camera for a young kid if it worked or play toy. Def not a $129 camera ...  totally disappointed as I’m going on a trip and needed it! Amazon needs to take this product / seller off its site.  Something isn’t right....

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I am so glad I bought this for my husband he really likes taking pictures to use for his website.  The quality of this camera is good but the only thing the battery runs out quick, good thing it comes with two batteries so make sure the other battery is fully charged.  Otherwise this is a good camera.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I can not ask more, this cam has wide angel lens and wifi function, means you can download photo to your phone or PC without hard wire it. The package include a small bag for the cam. it has digital zoom in and out also has flash light when it is not enough light. only thing is, if they can provide a sd card in the package that wound be awesome.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This camera is a great value. Comes with an extra battery for those long shooting or site seeing days. I like that you can flip the screen and it take good pictures and video. Also comes with a carrying pouch, is lightweight,  and shoots in 1080p. I've been happy so far with camera.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Oh this camera is awesome, I have been testing it through with pics of my monsters, its nice to have a camera that isnt attached to my phone for storage purposes, picture quality is amazing, and I love that you can set it up as a webcam, we have been exploring the possibilities ^.^

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I bought this camera for my mom. The camera is very simple to use and takes high quality photos. She wanted to record herself playing video, the flip screen helps a lot. This camera is super easy to use for both videos and taking pictures. Fits nicely in her purse or pocket. 16x digital zoom, for casual snapshot it’s a great choice. This was a great purchase as my Mom loves it.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This is my first real camera bought and I'm not an expert at all. This is a lightweight camera that is easy to use as a point and shoot but the picture quality of a DSLR.,It is also very user friendly and simple to use for people just getting started in photography!

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: The price was wonderful, the camera....not so much. Constantly turned off when in use. Picture quality was hella blurry and it would never connect to wifi or the app. This camera would be great for your 4 year old niece if you don't care about the pictures coming out nicely.,Pro: Does make a cute shutter sound but that's about it

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: As soon as I open the box, I was worried - there were plastic broken pieces from an unidentified source. I dont see anything that looks broken in the camera, but something happened during boxing or shipping.,Camera is lightweight (not in a good way) and there aren't really any settings to use.
