When they say amateur, they seem to mean like for a small child.,Picture quality was not great and the SD card didn't seem to read consistently.,The WA lenses may make it feel like a fancy camera to those used to a phone or a simple digital camera, but I'm returning and looking elsewhere.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I used to have one like this in college and never loved another camera like it. So I bought it again for a recent trip to Disneyland. It took amazing photos and videos. I plan to use this as my youtube camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Took this on a trip and shot about 400 pictures.  Pictures came out pretty good. I use a DSLR but wanted the convenience of a pocket camera. It fit the bill. This camera is very small. It can be hard to see if you are level.  I couldn't find any feature for panarama. You get what you pay for.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I really love these ELPH cameras. This is my 2nd one and it works like a charm. Clear and crisp pictures in the size of your palm. Although Sony has elected to make these in plastic instead of metal like the first iterations, its still a good functioning camera for those who remember when you took pictures with a camera instead of a phone. LOL!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: The concept is fine, but if you read other reviews, you will find that the camera doesn'twork all the time. I had to send mine back because it died.,I went with another brand and another model type.  This camera would rock if it was reliable

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This camera was a great buy !! It is compact and the images are sharp and clear. I can download them to my computer,,and the quality remains unchanged. The battery life is also a plus and when it does need charged you can remove it and plug it into the charger. Priced right and received in 2 days with Prime.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Good camera. I took this on vacation to Europe because I wanted a small camera that took good pictures. The pictures turned out great! The battery lasted the entire vacation. Recommend for anyone who needs a small, good camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: does not take very good pictures and it does not focus very well, not worth the high price.no I would not buy again!!! very disappointing!!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Very complicated WiFi setup....most difficult.  Also the battery life is limited so it is best to have a backup battery if you are in travel when you do not want to miss out on capturing images.  Otherwise, it is definitely better than a Polaroid.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Received this in the mail yesterday. I purchased it based on the high reviews. Came with everything you see in the picture. The battery took about an hour to charge and it’s been very user friendly so far. I’ll take pictures this weekend and provide an update.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: We have just received this camera Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 and to our big surprise it turns out that there is NO USB CABLE included. It's an essential part of any camera. We've had 5 cameras, 3 out of which are Canon brand and all 3 came with the USB cable, non of which fits this current. Please, advise ASAP.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: I bought this camcorder as I was fed up with the quality of videos on my phone. I am looking forward to taking this camera around on my holiday. I did test it several times and it seemed really good with everything, the price is cheap. It's got a great quality video capability and I'm looking forward to taking it away with me!

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: My family and I plan to go skiing during the Christmas vacation. I got this camera for keeping the nice memory for my family since it will be the first skiing trip for us，hope it will works well.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: This camcorder I bought for my nephew. He really liked it. It’s long battery life , easy to use and good quality pictures and videos. It has wireless remote control also have nice case.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: I love this little camera. I take pictures of property daily for work. Had it for a few months and charged it once. Holds charge, works fine. Great price.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: I been wanting just to get a Video camcorder, just to plug around the house, parks, blogging, some easy to use but have some good quality, Im very pleased with this purchase, luckly i got this camcorder,i like it.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: It's an excellent budget-friendly starter camera, it has infrared night vision and supports remote control. The only thing else you need to buy is an SD card, but those are relatively inexpensive.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: I needed a small compact camera for a vacation that I was going on. I did not want to spend a lot of money on one as I was going to be back packing out in the elements for over a week.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: I bought it for a child's birthday, so I was looking for something cheap but with a certain quality. The design is beautiful and the decent materials for what it's worth, it's small and it weighs little, which is also appreciated. The screen can be rotated to record or take selfie photos.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: The first look of this camera is over my expectations.This camera is in very good quality for a nice price.You can also control the camera by using the remote, which is convenient for me. I recommend people to buy this camera when you looking for a nice quality and lower price camera.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: After using the camera for a couple of days, I am really happy with my purchase. I went back through all of my pictures and videos that I took with this camera and they all turned out good! This camera not only met but exceeded my expectations. If you are looking for an affordable digital camera that takes really nice pictures and videos, this is one for you!

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Small and lightweight which is perfect for my 4th grader. Very user friendly.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Great camera.  Great display and holds strdy

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: This  camera  works  really good.  I bought it for my 11 year old to take with her to dance competitions.  Its small enough to fit perfect in her bag.  It takes good quality pictures.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Very easy to use, beautiful photos!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Love my cannon takes great pictures!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I will be using the camera for a European vacation. I have been playing around with it so I know what I’m doing.i like all of the extras you included in the package. Thank you.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Perfect for my teenager.  Arrived quickly, charged, and ready to use!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: The camera works well ... however the USB card reader did not work... I am waiting for a replacement.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Haven’t used the camera yet but it seems great and comes with so many goodies

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Lots of "stuff", at a good price, and amazingly packaged.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I went on vacation to California and i took a lot of pics.  The battery  last longer i like that.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I took it on vacation to Disney World and the first time I use it I found it would fog up and the pictures were unrecognizable. I am returning it ASAP.  I won't buy it again.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I appreciate the good service.  It is the second Canon PowerShot camera I have owned and loved them both.  The case was a little bulky for me so picked up a nice one locally in town.  Thank you.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: I recently purchased a new Canon PowerShot G7 X to replace an older Canon for use when traveling. On a trip, I take a lot of pictures – both of scenery and of food – and I want a camera (and camera case) to be to small enough to wear comfortably (and unobtrusively) around my neck all the time. I was pleased with the size of the G7 X, but found it somewhat difficult to choose a case that I liked for the camera. After spending many hours reading reviews, I decided to order 6 different camera cases to see which suited me best. Note that ALL the cases I ordered claimed to be compatible with the G7 X. Surprisingly, the MegaGear “Ultra Lite” Neoprene camera case was the only one of the six cases to suit my needs – all the other ones were either way too large/bulky OR too small for the camera (I felt like the lens was in danger of being crushed when these cases were closed).,PROS for the MegaGear “Ultra Lite” Neoprene case: 1. the G7 X fit perfectly – secure, but not constrictively snug; 2. the case itself was actually smaller than any of the other cases that I ordered – all the other cases were larger (L x W), but some had a shallower or less forgiving depth; 3. the case was easy to open quickly to allow for fast shots of unexpected photo opportunities; 4. the supplied carabiner secured the case easily to my own neck lanyard (I like a longer lanyard length; 5. the case is lightweight and is a stylish and unobtrusive basic black (but, for those more daring than I, it also comes in hot pink, blue, gray and red).,CONS for the MegaGear “Ultra Lite” Neoprene camera case: none really, once you get used to the Velcro closure. I had originally looked for a case with a top zipper opening, but found the MegaGear’s top flap Vecro closure worked well and was really no more “noisy” than a zipper.,* I am pleased with my purchase and would recommend this case to other Canon PowerShot G7 X owners.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: I got this for my Canon G7x Mk2.  When it first arrived I was convinced that the camera would never fit inside it!  But its really stretchy and the camera along with a lens cap fits in perfectly, but tightly.  The belt loop and very secure and properly stitched and that combined with the tight fit means that you will not be able to get to the camera fast if its on your belt, so plan ahead.  Nonetheless, its a great sleek case, albeit with less protection.  And it squeezes down into a tiny size for storage.  The only thing I dont really like is the plastic clip, may have to break it off.,I also got the large amazon basics case for more protection, ie when tossing the camera into a backpack etc.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: I really like this case. I agree with other reviewers who express concern about its ability to protect camera from a 3 foot drop. But if you want a case that will allow you to shove the G7x inside a bag or pock worry-free, it is perfect. All other cases were too bulky. It's also very compressible and so it's easy to quickly stow, leaving your hands free to shoot. I also like that I can keep the camera strap around my wrist while still having the case on the camera. That way you have the camera at the ready rather than trying to fish it out of a bag or disentangle it from a pocket. Can't comment on strength of belt loop as I don't carry it that way. My only real complaint is that it is VERY easy to deploy the lens accidentally while trying to squeeze the camera in. Unintentionally pushing  the side-mounted wifi button powers the camera "on" with the lens closed.  But once powered-up any shutter pressure (inevitable with this snug fitting case) will cause the lens to deploy.  Careful attention to where you press the camera will help, but I still have this problem. I'm thinking of trying the horizontal orientation instead.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Ordered this case my Canon G7XMKII. Arrived quickly and fit the camera great! It was slightly snug but once I get used to using it, it was a snap to pull my camera out of it with ease. I loved having the ability to attach it to my belt. It’s more or less why I ordered it. I carry my camera on me a lot...like a lot a lot.,I used it for approximately one week which included some light hiking and a flight across the United States. Still completely pleased with it. However, once I arrived in one of my destinations I took the camera and case off my belt one evening and found that the stitching that held the belt loop nylon on was beginning to tear. :( I didn’t feel confident in it after (didn’t want my camera to come flying off my belt once the stitching completely failed) seeing that and was forced to spend more money on a generic commercial case somewhere which was big, bulky and in my opinion not as cool as this one.,Summary:,It was relatively cheap and a good deal at first. Being small, compact and flexible it was the perfect case for what I needed it for. I REALLY REALLY wanted to like this case and use it A LOT but unfortunately the stitching just kind of looked like a weak point in the product. Not really an issue of quality but more of design. If they somehow remedied this issue I would most definetly get another one which I would attach to my belt indefinetly.,4 out of 5 stars because I just liked it so much. FIX IT PLEASEEEE :)

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: I purchased this case for a new Canon G7X MkII...  You can wrestle the G7X into the case, but it's tight, especially in the area of the lens/housing.  The Neoprene material and its stitching look fine, but I'm not sure it's worthy of protecting $700 camera from a drop onto a hard surface.  The limited stitching that secures the upper part of the belt loop may also be a weak point, unless your camera is very light in weight.  Removing and inserting a G7X isn't going to be a simple 'quick-draw' either, as the lens housing restricts the camera from being easily removed), so you're likely to miss a few photos.  All-in-all, the case is probably fine for protecting a lighter point-and-shoot from nicks and bruises while traveling around, but if you've got a better or more substantial camera you want to protect, I'd look for something else.  Not a big deal to me, but I did not get any lens cloth, as shown in the photo...

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Compact case for the new Canon G7X camera - and the Velcro on the flap holds down well.  Recommended for G7X owners (a great little camera BTW).  Nice padding and good workmanship.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: I bought this for my Olympus Tough TG-4. This camera only has one connection area for a strap on one side of the camera. I attached both sides of my camera strap to that one connection.  With the strap around my neck, the camera hangs vertically. This case fits the camera perfectly with my camera strap. When the camera is in use, I like the extra strap with a clip to attach to my camera strap so I won't lose the case while taking photos.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: The actual dimensions are one 1.5 x 4 x 2.5. Not  even close to wat the description says and not nearly big enough to fit the G7X Mark 2. Clearly they never tried to put the camera in the case before they listed it in the title. Very irritating.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Bought this for my new Canon Powershot G7X Mark II camera. It's a very tight fit, and quite cumbersome to get the camera in and out of the case.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Bought this for my new Canon G7x MkII.  Fits perfect and because of the small size I can carry it with me all the time in my rolling briefcase or backpack.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: This is a great camera and I think it takes very good pictures. My battery lasts a while. I think it depends if the person doesn't turn the camera off, the batteries drain faster. I'm very please with it and thought the price was great.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Uses two AA batteries and works well, except it always has the flash on when started.  Eats batteries.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: For the price, this is a GREAT camera. The pictures are clear enough. And the video quality is certainly acceptable. The only real negative I can give it is battery life. It really LOVES to eat up batteries. I would recommend investing in rechargeable batteries for this. In the long run, it will prove cheaper.,The camera is very easy to set up and use. It comes with instructions, but I found I didn't need them. Everything is really easy to figure out.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: nice and clear pics.  Easy to upload.  However, it uses battery power quickly.  And the need for separate purchase of a Memory Card was not clear.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I purchased this new. It came with a defective SD card slot, it would not hold the SD card at all - making the product worthless. However Amazon replaced it free of charge . I ordered it Thursday night, it came by friday evening. It was defective, and so I contacted Amazon. they sent a replacement unit by Saturday.,Now this has everything I desired. true, it does sap the AA batteries pretty quick, however for my purposes this is not so much an issue. A pair of rechargeable AA batteries or a pack of batteries should suffice - as opposed to lithium ion batteries that degrade over time and become difficult to replace.,I am happy with this, it is light weight and it has a sleek design. You can trust Kodak to produce quality products.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: This camera has been an amazing surprise . Pictures are clear and sharp , hard to believe that a camera that will easily fit into a mans shirt pocket will take photos of this quality . Compares favorably with cameras that sell for twice the price.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Bought this for my 8 year old granddaughter for Christmas.  It is small enough to fit into her hands comfortably, the buttons are easy for her to reach and use and the overall use of the camera was was easy for her to learn.  She loves it.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: This camera is easy to use, but I go through double AA batteries by the dozen.  You never know when the camera will just shut down because of low power.  Logistically it is a nightmare to carry all the batteries you need away from your base of operation.  I am very careful about turning my camera on and off, but still the battery life is exhausted very quickly.  Looking for another more efficient camera battery wise.  When I find one, this one is going in the trash.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: At base, this camera is very accessible.,But, you should look up the manual for the more complicated functions.,Get some rechargeable batteries too. Average lifetime for a set of AAs is about two days at most.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Yes, it is battery hungry. You'll get a few hours use from fresh AA batteries. However, it takes good pictures. Wish it had more zoom, but the pictures are clear. Just check the batteries and replace as needed, carrying a spare pair on a trip would be a good idea. At least they are standard so easy to buy anywhere.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This camcorder has a remote control, you don’t need ask people to take pictures for you, so convenient. It is perfect for travelling. The size is very compact and lightweight. It also has a touch screen. I tried to take some pictures, the pictures look great. It has a ​night version, still not try it.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I read the reviews and I was excited to receive this camera for my child.  It’s terrible.  And very cheap. It will not stay charged for longer than an hour and it keeps resetting the settings. Bummed

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: it delivery soon ， last sunday we used it ，it is easy to carry and operate. we wanna record the the my daughters childhood and keep it forever. when I contact to the seller for some questions ，the seller is very nice and help me . recommend it to my friends and families .

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: It takes quality pictures and works great, even better is the size and weight, it is really easy to carry on with me at all times.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: The Video camera has very good quality.The anti shake is very useful for good videos.The graphics of the camera is very exclusive and rare but cheap.At night when I use it to video it's still has very good video graphics in the dark

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Works ok but small and will slip out of your hands. But it's still good price for what it is. Kinda like a disposable camera

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: It is small but clicks really quality pictures. Easy to handle, and click pictures, After zooming the pixels are good.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I purchased this for an upcoming trip, thinking I did not want to rely on my iPhone for all of my pictures.  I am returning it!  The picture quality is very poor and I am not happy with this purchase.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I was lost until a young neighbor showed me how to do it. Photos can be accessed either by using the memory card or connecting the camera to the PC via a USB port.,If an old guy like me can operate this camera, so can you.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I brought a black color, It is small handy camera, fit anywhere in bag, it has very good picture quality and it can click picture in night mode too.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: We bought this for my daughter for her birthday. She loves it, plus because its rugged it means she can be a bit rough with it without me having to worry.,The picture quality seems great and even our 8 year old has taken some cracking pictures with this camera.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Okay, so I wouldn’t normally write a review, however this product is actually worth it.,So, I’m a week in and have tested the product and am so far very impressed.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: the product for the price is absolutely fantastic! My 7 year old loves his new camera.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Read a lot of reviews, and I am not disappointed in this choice. It feels as sturdy as suggested and won’t hesitate to use it for what it’s designed. Photos great for camera in its class.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: So far I really like this camera. I just wish the zoom was a little more zoomier. Haven't tried it in the water yet. My last camera was ruined at the beach, so that's why I went with a waterproof camera this time.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Absolutely love this camera. The kids love playing in the pool with it! I don’t have to worry about it getting wet and ruined and they love that they can take photos underwater with it. Great clear photos and cord included to charge it and download the photos to your computer. Oh and it floats!!! Can’t wait to take it to the lake.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: This is a good camera when taking a picture if looks a lil off but once you put it on the computer it looks great.  I was hoping it didnt come out the way you see it on the camera and it doesnt.  So you going to take pictures and wonder hmmmm doesnt look great but then i tested on computer and the screen fools you.  So is the camera worth it yes for the price.  It is light and it is waterproof and the battery is easy to come off with a push of a button and that's where you will charge it as well

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Bought this camera for my son to use in swimming pool very weekend. He rreceived t today, open up the box and say to me the color was so nice and the weight was so light and this camera had front LCD so he can selfie in the water. HE very loved it

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: This camera fulfilled its purpose during our beach day! It’s very lightweight, compact, and user-friendly. I had an underwater camera before, and this one is much better  The dual screen was very useful for underwater selfies and videos. The photo quality could be better, but for the price and function, this camera is the right one for us. I will definitely bring this to my next island getaway!

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: This is a really nice camera with waterproof.I had pay tiktok and i want to take the video in the water.So a high quality camera is my first problem and it will be my first choce.I had received the camera in the morning and i had try to take the video.Full 1080P underwater .Nice seller!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Because I've not really had a chance to use this camera I can only comment on how easy it was to set up and get ready to use.  The camera is also a nice compact size and can fit in a pocket which I like.  It was very easy to upload the one test picture I took.  Overall seems like a very nice camera especially the price.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Bought for my mom. Feels cheaply made but is a good camera. The case it comes with in this package is very low quality. Everything else is great.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Cheap plastic casing and picture quality is worse than the 12 mp camera on my cell phone. I do not recommend this camera to anyone

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: package came with everything I needed for my trip, bought an extra sd card just in case but so far no need. lightweight, compact and small, so far very happy with this purchase

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I purchased this camera for a trip to Europe.  I was extremely disappointed in the quality of the photos.  Luckily I had my iPhone with me and took much better quality pictures with the iPhone.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I was impressed when, right after my order, Joel from The Image World contacted me to make sure my order was received and that I would be happy with the product.  The camera is great, compact and simple to use.  We wanted something like this instead of using our phones to take pictures.  It is simple to download and seems to have a good battery life.  I would recommend this camera and The Image World.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Worked perfectly for our trip to Italy. I have it to my husband to snap photos while I used my iPhone. We got some great shots!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Great Camera!! Nice and small. Charged fast and took great pictures. The tripod, I'm pleasantly  surprised that I like it so much 😀👍

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: The camera is fine and delivery was prompt. The only faults I can point out are that the wrist strap is difficult to thread into the camera and it seemed like there was a lot of packaging material for a small package. Also the packaging included Styrofoam peanuts which are not recyclable. I have not yet loaded pictures onto my laptop but I don't anticipate a problem. The camera is easy to use and takes nice pictures.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Compact and light weight!  Came with all kinds of extras.  The perfect little point and shoot that also allows for certain control of the subject matter.  I'm glad I made this purchase.  Arrived on time and in good shape.  Just as I expected!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I love this camera! Photography is a hobby for me, but something I really enjoy and an area in which I want to continue growing. The zoom and clarity is incredible. I really enjoy having the extra battery and the charger that works in the car as well as the home. The disk reader is easy to use and caps so you don't accidentally lose your chip. The case is really nice with extra padding, space for the additional battery and cards, and a zip/velcro combo that makes me confident that the camera won't tumble out. I have not used the tripod yet, but it fits well. I had been researching cameras for months and this met and exceeded my expectations. I don't recommend for someone who wants the option of a flash since it only has auto or off. I don't use it for action shots, but it doesn't have additional modes like sport or portrait. I use the live option whenever I am focused on nature and it works beautifully. It's a great product and easy to use!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this as a father's day gift- shipping was quick and arrived earlier than expected. The camera is great, perfect for the amateur photographer. Takes great pictures and connects to my phone and WiFi so I can upload pictures to social media or share with friends and family, so easy and convenient! The bundle came with a bunch of useful things.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: So far I am very pleased with this camera. It takes great photos, and I really like the zoom on it. It is sharp, and fast and you can get good close ups. I sell on  the internet, and it is perfect for my uses. It seems to be a very well made camera. I have not checked out all of the features yet, so I may still be in for some pleasant surprises. The package has everything you need in it, extra battery, card reader, etc. A great value for the money.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I'm a journalist who specializes in radio/audio reporting. Most of my work is concerned with that, however this is the digital revolution and you need good equipment. iPhone's don't cut it. After going to several events where I needed good zoom and was getting pixelated garbage as results. This looked like a nice happy medium for me. Zoom is incredible, the WiFi option is awesome. I have to admit, I wish it would remember your phone with an automatic connection. You have to go into your wifi settings and connect it to the app to transfer photos, however after that initial connection, it works flawlessly to send photos/video from the Canon to your phone. Just wish it was a little quicker, absolutely not a hindrance to the operation  of this camera. It's also very easy to use, I'm sure some photogs out there would have their critiques, but I think is an absolutely great camera. Good for beginners and good for journalists as well. The bundle package here on Amazon is awesome too. Great travel bag, only thing I had to buy extra was a neck strap. A+ and highly recommend.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Easy to use (except that I've yet to succeed being able to transfer images via wifi to my MacBook Pro, will continue to work on that as I suspect it's something I'm doing wrong and not the fault of the camera), light weight, excellent image quality. The learning curve was short as I already own a Canon Elph and most of the commands and layout are the same. Curious however that a cable to transfer images from the camera to a computer is not included. I had to order one of those. But overall this is a fine little camera. The many additions included by this seller (spare battery, 32gig memory card, case, tripods, cleaning cloth, device to transfer memory card to computer and more) make this an exceptional value if you need those things. The follow-up from the seller was excellent also. Highly recommended!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Just got this a couple of days ago.  There's one piece that I can't find in the manual and have no idea what it's for.  BUT, better to have more than less . . . right?  So far it's pretty easy to work with and I like it a lot.  Thank Goodness I downloaded the PDF file of the owners manual so I could read it.  The print in the manual that came with the camera is way too small for my 75 year old eyes.  LOL. My challenge with a previous camera was transferring the images from the memory card to my computer.  Once I get to that point I will post my experiences.  But for now I very happy with the camera and its accesories.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Best purchase ever! I spent about 4-5 days searching online and at B&M stores for a new, high-powered digital camera. I landed back on Amazon for this sweet bundle. I had about 48 hours to learn the camera before going to South Africa for a 10-day holiday. I'm so glad I had this for the safari, wine country tour and exploring the sites of Cape Town. It has captured my most treasured memories without any fails. The bundle had nearly everything I needed - I did add the Canon neck strap (priceless). Lightweight. Easy to point and shoot. Stabilization is great. Audio is clear. Playback simple. I didn't use the WiFi features but will on my next photo adventure locally!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I'll start by saying that I've had this camera for eight months now, I always like to wait a while before writing reviews. I made a good choice when I bout this.,I know nothing about cameras, as much of a beginner as you can be. There were only a few features I wanted. I wanted something easy to use, I wanted one with an easy self timer and an easy to use quality zoom.  This camera had them all for me.. I've also been very impressed by how long the battery lasts without needing recharged. Like I said, it's easy and takes good pictures. The picture of the eagles is from my backyard at a distance of about 300 yards, with the camera on a cheap tripod, using the self timer. I really need to get a better tripod..

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: The camera is great quality, I purchased it to take HD proofs of my artwork and it is doing the job wonderfully. All items provided in bundle were great quality as well, I have tested them all and they work perfectly. I am actually extremely impressed with the quality of the bundled items. They clearly have a higher dollar value than the bundle all together. The seller was incredible though, we received the item a day before it was expected, it was packaged with care. He sent two e-mails expressing his concern with us being satisfied with a promise to ensure we were if anything was amiss. It wasn't! Highly recommend the camera CANON SX420IS, and The Imaging World for your future camera  purchases!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: If you want a great point and shoot camera then this is it. I've had some training in photography but I wanted a camera that my wife could use also. You still have the option to "tweak" your photos but if you do not know anything about cameras this is one to consider. I heard about the Canon PowerShot cameras from others so I decided to try it and I am pleased with the results. I would recommend this camera package to anyone looking for a good quality camera.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: I've been looking for a belt loop case for my RX100 II for a long time with no luck. It fits perfectly in this really high quality case and at a bargain price. Soft rich looking leather.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
