product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: I have a Sony RX 100 and RX 100 ll and this or the black is a good case for both.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: It has met all my expectations of a camera carrying case.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: It is a super practical camera! the photos have excellent definision and real carl zeiss color. I recommend this product, I have compared its definition and color with my lumix zs10 (16x hd) and it has the same resolution. Very happy with the purchase!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I bought this camera for when I am out on my bike and taking in the sites. It is very compact and light. Like other reviewers said, the pause between taking pictures is a second or two, too long, but other than that it takes nice photos will above average to excellent quality. The zoom feature is decent -- My overall impression of this camera is that it is better or as good as many higher priced ones for a lot less money. Delivery was fast. The charger is easy with the USB as is uploading pictures to your computer. I definitely recommend this camera especially for sporting events and traveling. The photos are of excellent quality and the camera is not very expensive in the event you lose it or etc.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Great quality pix.  Buy about 5 extra 'N' type I think batteries along with an extra charger or two and you will be able to take pix all day with power on all the time (have a 64 gig card in it never vaguely near filling it up, have taken 2200 pix in one day at various places / shows.  you can mix/match pictures with high quality video. power it on connected to your PC and you can copy pix from the camera's disk drive letter that appears.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This was a gift for a friend. It did not come with an AC adapter - we got a European adapter which doesn't do any good in the U.S.  I bought the accessory kit (that is another story - groan) which did have an AC charger. The price dropped right after I purchased it and then another friend stopped at Walmart and it was on sale for $60 (I paid $118) and they said only the display camera was left so he got it for $29. My friend likes the camera - especially the small size. I'm sure it deserves more stars but the adapter and price were why I gave only 3.  Be aware that there is no SD card included (surprised about that) but, fortunately I did purchase one as an extra.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I bought this camera to replace a DSC-W690.  The menu format is the same as the DSC-W690, however, the camera is significantly smaller, and the zoom clarity proved inferior to the DSC-W690 in a side by side comparison.  The zoom discolored low light pretty dramatically. I returned this camera & opted for the DSC-W690 instead.  But this camera does function smoothly.  It is really designed for a small hand.  Bottom line is I missed the W690 so much I decided to return this more recent version of it.  Better zoom, better clarity and color rendering in the W690.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Excellent value. I bought the first one for myself a week before an Alaska excursion and cruise. Photos and videos were excellent. It is small and was easy to carry and easy to use. The second was for my husband per his request. The next two were Christmas gifts for our grandchildren ages 5 and 8. They both take good pictures consistently of their achievements and fun activities.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: ***UPDATE AFTER MANY MONTHS OF USE***- For my videos, this is an OK camera, but it dies SUPER fast. You need like 3 extra batteries on hand if say going out for a day trip No other camera I have had (about 20 of them in my life) has died this fast. The pictures are rough. I would say 3 out of 5 are blurry. I have to take numerous photos to get any that aren't the least bit fuzzy. It might be closer to 4 out of 5. Sometimes it's minor and you don't notice w/o zooming in. I didn't realize that problem very fast because I use it more for YT videos than anything else. Also, the shutter speed for photos is rather slow, but it's a cheap camera, so that isn't too abnormal there.,The pros to this camera are that it is small, light-weight and films video in the 16:9 widescreen I need for my online videos. IF I could turn back time, I would have returned this camera and bought something a little bit pricier and better all around. Oh well. Hopefully, I get a better one from Santa Claus :)!!,I love this camera so far, as far as what I bought it for, my You Tube videos and other stuff. I only used it one full day, but the battery STINKS!! My other cameras last 5x's or more longer. Did I get a bum battery???? I charge it fully and take video and it starts going down to one bar and done FAR too fast to be normal. I read reviews that said it lasted people through many flash photos and videos during the day. I'm wondering if this is a camera I can take out for a day trip or not. My husband thinks maybe I got a bad battery. Anybody have any issues??? I love that it doesn't change the lighting to an orangey color, which is what the problem was with my more expensive, larger cameras. It's all over the place with those, which makes editing sooo difficult. This seems to stay true, and the video quality is very good. I wanted a 1080, but I cannot tell the difference to be honest. This is worth the $$ in the quality dept. & it is a Sony. I haven't taken photos yet. I'm just concerned about the battery. If the battery gets replaced and lasts a lot longer, than I will give this a better review. PS- The size is great, but very tiny compared to my old point and shoot. In a crazy house like mine it may not last the year lol. All is good but the battery. I'm thinking that may be a defect.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Arrived quickly.  Easy assembly.,Could not tell if photo subjects were in focus window is so tiny.,I don't use glasses but would need readers to take any photo and to see the photo on recall.  Sent it back.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The camera seemed fine, although I never got to use it. If you are purchasing this camera from Phototech, please be aware that the camera is packaged for European sale (that is, the battery charger comes with a European AC plug rather than a US AC plug). Nothing in the product description notes this fact. US customers must either return the camera or purchase an after-market European to US AC adapter.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: i am absolutely in love with this camera, i contemplated for many days between Sony Cyber Shot and Cannon something. I am very happy with my purchase and shipping was fast.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I love my new camera, but wish I bought one that zooms in further.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: This little camera takes amazing pictures. I was so surprised how well it took. It also does not eat batteries. We went on a 5 day cruise and I didn't have to change the batteries once.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: After looking at a few pictures the screen would go lime green.  I would have to shut the camera off and try again.  Did this over and over - same problem.  Returned to Amazon

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Can’t downloads pictures—correct usb cable not provided.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I may be a slight bit slanted towards Nikon, but this is a product that replaced my other camera which broke.  It has held up on various things I have done and the picture quality is quite good.  The  overall quality of this camera is quite good and it will not break your pocket.  It is a perfect camera for a youth or just someone that wants to take pictures randomly.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Always a Nikon COOLPIX. This is satisfactory. When I walk with new batteries I do not have to remember if I charged my camera. Wi-Fi is better but using a card reader is ok with me.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Clear and quality photos. Like carrying in around in my car and have it handy for that random snapshot. Minus 1 star coz it doesn't come with USB,

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Great little camera. It's super compact so I can carry it in my pocket when I need to. The quality of photos are better than expected for the price and size combined. It doesn't come with a USB cable which was fine with me because I just use micro sd cards.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: This is my second Nikon COOLPIX. I drowned my last one. What I really like about this camera is that it uses two AA batteries instead of a rechargeable.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Works  well, easy to use, takes great pictures and video. The AA battery's give a long use time. I like this camera a lot.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I've wanted a Canon EOS Rebel for years so finally splurged to buy one and glad I did. I took the attached pic of the full moon the other night with the optional 300mm lens I purchased and it works great!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: The purchase was extremely poorly packaged with little cushion and protection.  No surprise that there were broken parts.  Also the boxes and items seemed to have been opened and even previously used.  When trying to return it, post office refused to ship because of inclusion of lithium battery.  DHL can ship it but at a cost of more than USD250!  Now I am at a loss on what to do with the broken item I cannot use but already paid for.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: The original estimate for me receiving my camera was September 13th however I received the camera 2 days after I ordered it. The camera itself is great! I love all the accessories and I think it actually comes with a few more things than pictured. I'm an amateur when it comes to photography so I didn't really know what I was doing when I first opened the camera set up but it's pretty self explanatory once you read the manual to find out what everything does. The lenses are great! I haven't messed around with the filters yet but they're looking clean and clear. I'm super glad I bought this camera with all the accessories. I've priced cameras for over a year and I'm glad I finally got one. Great price for everything you get!!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I think the camera and the primary lens is what was described.  HOWEVER, the others items listed as "lens" ARE NOT LENSES - they are adaptors.  What is described as lenses screw to the front of the lenses attached to the camera. They do not attach directly to the camera.  This is a complete MISREPRESENTATION of what is being sold as lenses.  BUYER BEWARE!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Hate the stock lens. Look around and hunt down a better telephoto or a wide angle lens. It does come with stock versions however they just suck... They suck better than my vacuum... It's almost impossible to get a great shot of the moon even under the best lighting conditions. Other than that the other gimmes were okay, but really aren't necessary. You'll find out once you start to actually use the kit. IMO look into getting a colored lens kit for around 10-20 bucks. This will help with some of your nature shots and cut down on using Photoshop or other like programs for editing. Also, make sure to register this. I found out that the software for your model will be sent via a link that way you know what you need.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Seems like a pretty good kit for a beginner so far, I'm just starting out, so I'll find out. Most of the kit items are of low quality, but the it's a great setup for a beginner on a budget. The wide angle lens I received however does not fit the anything that came with the kit (including it's own cap). I'm pretty sure some of this was used, but I mostly got it for the camera and lens. I'm frustrated the lens isn't usable right now, but all in all, if you have no supplies, I guess it's a start. I may have gone with another kit though if I knew the lens wasn't going to work. To clarify, the telephoto lens works fine, the macro wide angle lens does not. (And if there's a piece I need to make it fit, it doesn't come with the kit, so still useless right now.)

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I've been watching this camera and package for years now and I finally bought it. I love it! It was everything I wanted and more. This is my first DSLR so I figured from other reviews, I would get familiar with the camera and technic and slowly upgrade lens, etc... the price is the same for the camera alone so why not add all the extra for free pretty much. The bag is perfect size to carry everything. The camera is VERY user friendly. I went on Pinterest to find tips and tricks for this camera and became overwhelmed with all the options. But just playing with it for a few hours, I feel like a pro already :) no Pinterest involved lol. I use the telephoto lens the most!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I was excited to order this because I read so many great reviews about the video quality from this camera.  But it really was not worth the money I spent on it.  The camera on my smartphone is far superior to this.  Maybe I'll just use it for photographs.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: LOVE my camera! It was a dream come true to buy it. It's the best camera I've ever gotten. However not sure how the warranty works, so I feel I wasted money on that part. However the camera itself is amazing! Plus all the accessories that comes with it is awesome and very helpful!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: The camera is wonderful. Appropriate for a beginner and takes great pictures.  A lot of the equipment included in this kit is quite useful, and some I haven't touched yet. I did try out the telephoto lens extender and found it difficult to thread properly.  It pulled apart when I removed it from the kit lens and I wasn't quite sure what lens parts belonged with the kit lens and which ones belonged with the extender.  But I eventually figured it out.  So, I'd just say be careful with the extenders. Thread them slowly and delicately or they come apart.  The tripod has a removable clip that you can leave on your camera to easily clip back onto the tripod.  Very convenient.  Overall, I'm pleased with this purchase.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've owned this for about a month and a half now and have for the most part enjoyed it.  I had a Panasonic Lumix previously, so this was supposed to be a slight upgrade over it (especially the zoom).  I would describe my photography style as "lazy".  It isn't that I couldn't fiddle with the settings, or that I don't at times, but I enjoy just setting it to Intelligent Auto and letting the camera do all the work.  The problem I've found is that at times this camera just takes blurry pictures due to it not switching to a good setting.  It also tends to take a lot of dark images.  At times you think you've taken a good shot and get it back on the computer and realize that it is in fact blurry.  Our previous camera's didn't have that problem except in some very particular situations.  Then again it can take some really nice shots too and the zoom is really incredible.  Overall it is a really good camera for the price and I am glad I purchased it.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've been a fan of the super zoom category since 2001, back when Olympus arguably created the category with the introduction of the C700 with a 10x zoom.  It was ground breaking at the time to have a camera of that size, that much zoom, and at that price point.  I feel the same way about this Lumix.  The 60x lens is an incredible amount of magnification that is usable, hand held, in good light, the image stabilization is that good.  It may be the largest super zoom camera I've owned, but I don't mind carrying it, given it's ability to take long distance shots of small objects, with nothing more than a steady hand (in good light).,2018 Update- continues to amaze.  Great camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: LOVE this camera and I use it for my real estate photos.....wide enough angle lens and very clear photos! Great camera!! Much easier to use than my DSL.....I don't even use the DSL anymore.  You won't regret buying this camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am not very happy with the technology in this camera. There is no blue tooth, the connection to WiFi is indirect and the instructions are difficult to translate.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This camera is amazing! its super versatile and with a little knowledge about photography you can take amazing pictures. I also like that it shoots 4k. For the price point I dont think you can do better. While you could get the body of an entry level DSLR for the same price you would end up spending much more in lenses to get the same capability. The zoom on this camera is awesome as well. I would say if you are looking for a high quality low cost camera and dont want to deal with lugging around multiple lenses, this camera is for you!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Whoa, Fred, did you not just purchase a Canon SX 530 with a 50x zoom a few months ago? Why would you trade it in and order this instead? Well, a minor detail is that this is 60x zoom so I gain a bit on the wide angle end but, again that is minor. I had a Lumix travel camera before (for serious stuff my "big boy" cameras are Olympus and Lumix mirrorless interchangeable lens models) and I used that camera until I wore the paint off the controls. When it came time to replace it, the Canon was being closed out and was a super deal. Now this one is at a great price and the major thing that drove the purchase is realizing how much I missed the viewfinder which this has and the Canon does not. Only a biggie when taking pix outside in the bright sun and this being Florida...

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I was impressed when the camera arrived.  I am usually a point and shoot type person so it is all a little overwhelming to me right now.  There are so many features and choices.  Once I finally figure everything out I think it will be a great camera.  I have used a simpler version of the Panasonic Lumix for years and have always received compliments on the great pictures it took.  Hope this one will provide the same quality photos.  I was impressed with the reviews of others..

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I purchased this F70 for myself for Christmas after exhaustively researching all the "super zoom" cameras I could find, including all of the reviews on this site. If you're considering this camera, know that you probably won't find it in any but the largest camera stores and the online price varies widely. Last week on Amazon it varied from $249.00-349.00, and that's on the one site! Needless to say, I waited until it was $249. I’m not a professional photographer so this isn’t a technical review, but I’ve been taking pictures for about 50 years, first with Kodak roll film box cameras, then a twin lens reflex, then a series of manual 35mm cameras (no light meter), and culminating in my ultimate 35mm, a Nikon FM. I’ve used various digital cameras that my wife owned, including a Minolta and a Canon ELPH. Until I bought my wife a Canon SX50 last xmas, I was not ready to give up my Nikon but the Canon astounded me with its picture quality, small size, light weight, and of course that 50X optical zoom (effectively 24-1200mm). After selling my Nikon, I was about set to buy another SX50 for myself when I saw the Panasonic FZ70. What attracted me was the 20mm wide angle and 60X optical zoom as well as the manual control options. I was turned off by some of the reviews regarding picture quality especially compared to the SX50 but after re-reading the reviews, I decided to take a chance and ordered it and I’m glad I did. I set it on a tripod and photographed a tree about a half mile away, first at wide angle then at 60X zoom and another at 50X zoom. And I did the same thing with her Canon. Despite tripod shake and a strong wind blowing the tree, the FZ70 took a remarkably clear shot at 60X. At 50X it actually appeared to have more detail than the Canon when viewed on my computer. I liked the colors with the Canon better but the colors are adjustable on the Panasonic so I could probably duplicate the results. I wish there was a way to upload the photos so I could show you.  Also, the 20mm on the Panasonic is a real advantage for me because I shoot mostly landscapes and the panoramic feature works as advertised, enabling you to take up to a 360 degree shot in one pass! Close-ups are also astounding, without even enabling a macro feature. As mentioned by another reviewer, the on/off switch does seem flimsy but at least you won’t turn it on or off accidentally. It’s also bigger and bulkier and hard to find a case for – I ended up ordering a Tamrac 5210 from Cameta Camera on Ebay which should fit. If you buy this camera and use a UV filter at all times as I do to protect the lens, follow one reviewer’s recommendation and get a quality multi-coated glass filter like the Sigma, because cheap filters can affect the clarity. I bought a set of Vivitar filters for my wife’s Canon from Digital Goya through Amazon and they seem fine but I opted for the more expensive Sigma for my Panasonic. To summarize, don’t believe everything you read. Different cameras perform differently under different conditions with different settings. Decide what’s important  to you and try several if you can. I’d be perfectly happy with another Canon SX50; it’s a great camera, but I’m glad I took a leap of faith and bought the Panasonic. No more film, no more lens changing, and I sold my Nikon and a Samsung camcorder which more than paid for the Panasonic – I’m a happy camper. If you’re a professional, neither will probably replace your SLR or DSLR or camcorder, but for the rest of us, these open a whole new world of photography.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: What a fun camera with loads of settings.  And if you like shooting birds and other outdoor distance things, you will love this camera.  Should be illegal with the zoom on this camera.  Stabilizer works great for optical distance, but IQ suffers when you extend the zoom.  And it really extends.  Try changing the size of the mps and it will go to super extreme tele distanc es.  Do not count on dslr IQ, but sure is fun to check out the distance things because it is not a dslr.  Have fun with this camera.  I am.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is my first real camera. I wanted something with a decent macro mode to take pictures of the tiny clay sculptures I make.,I knew I wanted a point and shoot so I wouldn't be too overwhelmed.,It took a couple days to become familiar with the settings but I'm happy!,The manual focus is great for tiny things (that don't move) and the fact it can be within 1cm away for the macro mode is helpful.,I use auto focus macro for some spider photography I've been doing for fun and it works pretty well.,My main problem with this camera is how grainy the photos are even in natural lighting coming through the window.,It seems to really need that direct sunlight.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: you want to be able to connect the camera to the computer and transfer data directly to computer or charge the camera via hard cable but you are not able to.,you have to keep opening the latch and remove your memory card or the battery for computer connection or charging which will eventually damage the battery door and you have to buy a new camera again.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I purchased this item for my mother as a Christmas gift.  I love it overall, however I am giving it four stars because of the following:,-Slow response time in taking pictures,-Does not have a very good anti-blur feature, you must hold it VERY still to get the best pictures.,With the negatives being said, the positives of this item are:,-Great size,-Rechargeable battery,-Easy usage (interface),-Feels durable,Overall, I would recommend this product.  I would just warn that it does have a little lag in taking photos, however, if you can live with that minor inconvenience then you should love this!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Not a pro camera, but for the price, didn't expect it to be. Does a nice job with point and shoot photos, and has nice set of basic features. My 8yr old son loves it, because he can "just use it" without having to do a lot of setup. Battery life seems to be pretty good after a couple days' use. He's taken close ups, portrait and landscape in bright and low light and it seems to auto adjust pretty well.  With 32gb card added, he'll be taking shots for a long time without worry.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Camera was everything I expected. Online manual very easy to follow and understand. Camera has taken great pictures indoors and outdoors. Easy to set up pictures and even has internal memory if you have no stick.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Good quality point and shoot camera for the price. I bought this for work and the quality of pictures is still worse than my cell phone but overall it they are good. It has basic functions like zoom and video. It is small and lightweight. I would recommend this product to others.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Bought this camera for my 10 year old daughter for Christmas. It’s been 6 months and she barely uses it. She wanted to record basic videos but the playback is horrible. You can barely hear anything even though the volume is all the way up. Even putting the camera up to your ear is still hard to hear. It’s okay with taking photos if you just want a basic camera and do not mind if the photo is not crystal clear.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: It's okay.  Takes great pictures if the object being photographed is close.  Lots of ways to adjust the camera's settings including the ISO speed.  However, in spite of this camera's exceptionally high megapixel, pictures captured from a distance, whether using the zoom or not, come out very poor quality.,The camera is extremely convenient to carry it in a pocket or a purse, but the quality of the photos don't seem to be as good as those taken by many smart phones now.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I bought this camera to use while vacationing in Disney World. I needed something small and compact that would be easy to handle. While it did take nice photos here and there, it was extremely slow even with the 10 class  32g memory card. The zoom was okay, but I took better pictures with zoom with my phone. The recording feature left A LOT to be desired. Even though I got a lot of good shoots, I would NOT recommend this camera to anyone.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This camera works reasonably well. And does video also. Lots of long awkward pauses when taking several pictures in succession. After pressing the button to snap a picture. Not exactly a rapid fire type of camera, but it gets the job done, slowly. The images are very nice. I had that problem with another digital camera brand. I like the rechargeable lithium battery. Buying batteries all the time is no fun.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Good utility camera for the price. You won't cry when you lose it, it gets stolen, or it gets dropped off of a building. I use it almost daily in my work. Easy learning curve. One major pro is that you can charge it off of any USB port, and you don't need a separate clunky charging unit. The one major con (for me) is that the flash is not all that powerful for large interior shots under low light. Still, it has been a very convenient and trouble free unit so far.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I was disappointed in this camera. It had good reviews and that’s why I bought it. The zoom is not great, the clarity of photos is not great. There’s no focus on it. I returned it and used the money towards a slightly more expensive canon and it was money well spent.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I purchased this as a gift for my son’s birthday and he loves it. It is easy to use yet has professional quality. The picture quality is great. It comes with a wide-angle lens that is detachable and rechargeable batteries. Its s a great camera for someone interested in vlogging.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: My iphone camera had conveniently broken right before my 10 day trip across country so I purchased this digital camera.,I received the box within 2 days of ordering and it was nicely compartmentalized (camera, accessories, wide angle lens, chargers, instructions),The camera is easy to use and takes great quality (wide angles if you want nice skyline photos while traveling) -,It's light and rather compact so it's super portable and easy to carry in your bag/hand.,Would highly recommend if you want a nice travel camera that's easy to use.,5/5

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: It's a great camera. Comes with an extra lens. It connects to screens and TV's with HDMI cable. Also it has an application where it enables you to see the screen from distance via Bluetooth. You can also use it like webcam. The only problem is the app is working on Apple but it's not working yet on Android but I informed the seller about it already. So I'm sure they'll fix it soon.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This is my forth Canon point and shoot camera. I wore the others out. This one uses Lithium ion batteries where the previous models used AA batteries. I have only  taken about 50 images so far with this camera and it seems to work just fine.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This camera does have a retro look, but feels really cheap. I know it’s priced well, but not sure that I cannot take better pics on my iPhone.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I bought this camera to learn how to do YouTube videos.  I would have given it a 5-star rating but I could not get it to connect to the Internet for use of Ap.  The App always failed.  Instead, I remove the Sandisk from the camera, put it my computer and upload my videos for editing to it.  It works for the purpose that I need it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: The pictures were not very good quality and rather grainy. But if you want a point and soot camera with 4x6 prints it might be okay.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I purchased the Camera in October and worked ok initially. However, the battery now does not hold a charge and now will not work.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Great small compact camera to take photo of your every memories. Awesome quality pictures for,non professional photographers. Several functions for photography. Includes camera, battery,battery charger and wrist handle, instructions.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Camera is perfect for the price point it's trying to hit with the quality it takes. Always better than you would be able to with your own mobile phone and the ui is simple to maneuver through.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I am afraid that when it arrived, the lens would not extend, and if it did, it would not retract. Shame, because the camera was exactly what I was looking for. I am now in the about to return the camera.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Pictures are decent and batteries last about a day as expected.  However when I power it on the flash is always in the "ON" mode and I keep forgetting to turn it off so I when I need to take a quick picture the flash goes off when I don't want it to.  It doesn't remember I had switched off the flash the previous time I used the camera.,Plus none of the video modes play on my Samsung TV.  All of my other cameras have a mode or two that play on my TV.  Two of the modes on this camera display a still picture and play the audio.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Daughter got this as gift Xmas 2017. Died Jan 2019, tries to draw over 1.2 amps from batteries while starting, which drops the battery voltage and forces the microcontroller to reset, then repeats the cycle.  Killed several new sets before I measured it on current-controlled B&K power supply. Ordered replacement, and new unit did much the  same, right out of the box. Sent it back.  This design has issues, would not recommend. Dan, a ham radio guy

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I wanted a camera that didn't need a rocket scientist or computer programmer to use. This camera suits all my needs. It was easy to initialize, takes nice pictures, and easy to handle. The recommended carrying case is perfect too. Although not a professional photographer - I'm getting there with the help of the Pix Pro FZ43. Try it, you'll like it !

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: This camera feels very cheap. I liked that it used AA batteries until you realize a set of batteries only lasts about 300 pictures. I do home inspections so I regularly take 3-500 pictures a day. Also to get this camera to focus on details like a data tag on an A/C unit or a water heater is nearly impossible. I kept this camera as a backup camera and now have realized for my business I can’t even use it for that. Also with as fast as this thing goes throug batteries I’ll go broke keeping batteries in it.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Startup time is horrendous.  Add in the time to pick your scene mode or turn off flash (you have to wait a few seconds after it's turned on, then click a button /seven times/, but not too quick), and you're not going to be getting any pictures of something that doesn't stand still for at least ten seconds.  Wanted to take a picture of a train the other day but by the time the camera was ready it was long gone.,Use for low-light situations is just okay.  There's an option to change the ISO from 80 to 1600 and 'EV' (whatever that is) from -2 to +2, but no way as far as I can tell to explicitly set exposure time.,I haven't had the battery drain problem that some other people mentioned.  It has lasted for a few weeks (of me getting the camera out maybe 60 times and taking several pictures over that period and taking several pictures each time) at a time on a single pair of NiMH AAs.,Biggest pro: cheap.  Definitely good enough to be my primary carry-around-everywhere-and-get-better-pictures-than-a-cell-phone-would camera.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I never do reviews but here I go...their is no battery life with this camera! I have owned "Kodak" before and were great but this one is terrible. I even bought rechargeable batts cause recommended before purchase....forget it..."Duracell "Max batts..forget it..this camera completely took away the joy of photography. Just my opinion...stick'n to it...

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I purchased this camera in March, 2017, it's been a problem from the beginning.  I just figured I had to get use to using it, so I kept it.  I don't take photos often but this never is ready when you want to use it.  Eats thru batteries like crazy.  Now it doesn't work at all!  I used it a total of 2 hours since I purchased it. No more Kodak for me. Costly lesson learned.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I got just what I thought I would get.  I use this camera daily and it takes a beating.  The only issue is that it sometimes takes awhile to shoot the picture and if I am not watching I will lose the shot.

review: These cameras are terrible. The picture quality is poor and the gobble up batteries. I teach at a high school. I put fresh batteries into the camera at the beginning of a 50 minute period. product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: The case's belt loop stitching unraveled on the first day of a 5 day backpacking trip. I had it looped through the sternum strap of my back pack making it convenient to take pictures as we hiked the High Sierras. I had to make longitudinal cuts through the case as a makeshift belt loop. Otherwise it is a reasonable light weight case for the Canon G7x Mark II. Just do not attach it to a belt and expect it to stay put. A solution would be if the manufacture attached a wider nylon strap and use the same stitching pattern they used on the bottom of the belt loop strap.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: I love this case. I have a new point and shoot camera. I got this case so I can carry the camera in my purse or in my camera bag with other things. Helps to keep it from getting scratched. Worth the money. Only paid 11.00 for it.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Does the job nicely enough for a soft case. The biggest drawback is that even with mostly-careful handling, the stitched holes in the neoprene already seem to be getting slightly bigger from the inevitable pulling motion. I don't think it'll actually rip, but that'll be something to watch out for.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: It keeps my camera safe(powershot g7 mark ii) but it doesn’t hold my camera as expected. I was looking for a quick draw case, so I could grab my camera fast. The way it holds the camera I kind of have to peel it off my camera and put more effort than I wanted to taking it out. But it keeps it safe and that’s all that matters.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Our Canon SX610HS fits well in the case.. It gives good protection for the camera from bumps and jolts. It has a snaphook at the back to attach it to a belt loop or something else rather than a loop that you would put a belt through. We felt this gave more carrying options especially since my wife is the main user of the camera and doesn't wear belts that often.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Nice case, but it fits the Canon Powershot G7X Mark II like a TIGHT glove. I don't want to struggle with the case when I use my camera, so I'm returning it.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Would be 5 stars if it had a pocket to keep extra batteries and memory cards, but this is a fantastic case and I'm 4 stars worth of happy with it!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Lovely camera and kit for me to learn to use over the next month or so. This will become part of my research tool set. I am very pleased with this vendor and the speed the camera rrived and how it was packaged. WAY TO GO, 5 thumbs up!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: A great little case; fabric and  stitching looks good, a test of time will tell more! A bit tight, older  fat Fiji A700 camera was tight and a little tender forcing worked! I'll leave the camera in the case, maybe it will stretch a little???!  Color is very vibrant and stands out!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: While it could be said to fit the Canon G7X MkII  - it is such a tight fit I think it will damage the camera taking it out or forcing it in.,Would fit a smaller camera without the protruding lens better - disappointing...

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: While the accessories are nice to have, the majority of the extra stuff are things you probably wouldnt purchase individually due to low quality. The screen covers were of such awful quality that after barely putting one edge on my camera, I had a doubt, tried to take it off, and spent the next hour carefully scraping away the adhesive that cemented itself to the camera.,I dont feel comfortable even thinking about putting the extra battery that came with it in the charger, much less the camera considering how generic it looks. The same can be said of the little "tripod" stand with legs so short it can barely stand on its own as well as the "stabilization brace" which appears to be more awkward than useful.,In any case, the camera itself is an authentic Canon and of great quality, but the extras are things you're probably better off buying from other places to get real quality versus a low budget "bundle" where you end up paying for things you cant even really use.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Great point & shoot camera for the price.  The clarity when zoomed is very good and the HD video is sharp and clear.  Comes with so made extras that you will need.  Would definitely recommend this camera package!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Bought this as a gift for my wife’s birthday. First thing I noticed is the camera is double boxed with a bubble mailer in between the two boxes to keep it from moving. Inside the box with the camera and accessories were plenty of packaging peanuts to protect the inner contents. The price point alone is worth the camera so the fact that they include all the accessories is enough to recommend this to anyone looking for a starter camera. I turned it on to make sure it was functioning fine and it was perfect and seemed easy to use. Accessories that are included are a travel charger, screen protector, travel case, extra battery, an SD card, wiping cloth, a care kit, a small tripod stand, and a usb SD card reader for easy access to plug into any computer/device that supports USB input. Honestly not only did they ensure that the product arrived as safe as possible but they ensured everything included was for every possible convenience. Hope my wife loves it! Thank you guys.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I'm absolutely in love with this camera! It's super easy to use (especially for a beginner like me) and the company is super helpful and friendly! When I bought the bundle I wasn't sure what all I was expecting to receive and it felt just like the holidays. For example, I would've never thought about getting a car charger for my camera before. Now I don't have to worry, because the bundle came with one! I'm super excited to go on family road trips with it, especially knowing I have a way to charge it. Here are some pictures I've taken with it, granted I'm very new at photography.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Camera is what I expected. It took great shots in the daytime and the zoom helped to get a more precise shot. I would not classify this camera as a professional grade to where you could head out and do wedding shots or photo shoots. In fact purchasing the $1000+ Iphone would probably give you just as clear and precise images for those of us who haven't upgraded yet as (July 8 2019). Camera came with a few accessories which was an added bonus including an extra battery & charger unit. Did not perform well under low light despite the onboard flash. The camera does not have a ton of options to change the lighting settings so I assume that taking shots in a dimmer area will result in dimmer photos of low quality.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Pictures are fairly poor quality on a par with an old 256KP I bought many years ago and inferior to any phone camera that I have seen. Some features are non-functional to useless. Difficult and time consuming to download pictures as it requires removing the chip and putting it directly into a computer. Then all pictures require manual sorting one at a time. None of the advertised ways of doing this function in the camera. Camera has lots of buttons and settings most that do nothing at all or have very marginal effects. It is what I would expect from a cheap camera priced under $50.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Great package that included absolutely everything anyone could want in a camera package.  Easy to follow instructions.  Item had great reviews and turned out to be just what I wanted/needed to replace my aging  Samsung digital camera.  That camera had been great with every possible feature so it was a hard item to replace, but this one does the trick plus the added value of such a large zoom lens. It will get a work out as I am preparing for a week long Harley ride/camping trip with some brothers from church then a two week cross country AMTRAK vacation.  I will update my review after returning, but I fully expect the update to  be a glowing addition.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: This package kit was great, we used it to take pictures at our wedding.  For non-professionals, we had many nice shots due to the high degree of zooming, the good resolution of the digital images, and the many beginner friendly features.  The kit made it a breeze to know we had all our bases covered (no worrying about finding the right kind of backup battery, compatible SD card, or spare charger types.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: OMG! You have found a lifelong customer! Where do I start? First the camera is AMAZING! Hands down best camera I've ever owned! Then the accessories it comes with are not only GREAT quality but accent the camera so nicely (stand, cleaning kit, 2 batteries and 2 chargers, screen protectors, a carrying case with shoulder strap, etc) ! Everything works perfectly! I am 100% satisfied with this purchase! There is always uncertainty when buying electronics offline, well you don't have to worry here! 10 out of 10! 5 stars! 100% you are the best! Thank you!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Thank you

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Love it!  Everything needed all in one place.  Thanks so much!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I purchased this product for my 11 year old granddaughter for Christmas.  She loves it and loves taking pictures with it.  And she really loved all of the extras we got with the camera!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I finally had a chance to use my Canon Power Shot ELPH 180.  I love it.  So easy to use and takes great photos.  This package includes everything for your camera.  A real good deal.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: It was a gift for my mom and she really loved it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: This is similar to the camera that I had..  I liked that camera very well..  This,one being similar should pose no problems for me to use in the classroom..  Thank you..

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
