product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: excellent carrying case for small digital camera!

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: It is not leather. The catch comes open very easily which would allow the camera to fall. I will not use this case for anything but storage...

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: works well for my sony rx-100

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: First, it is not leather.  Second, it is much lighter in color and the metal parts are very bright chrome finish.  The coloration makes it look like a modern woman's handbag, not a vintage leather camera case.,If it was leather, I could just make it darker to resemble the pic, but it's not.,I gave it 3 stars because it does seem to be well built, good quality, and fits the camera well.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Ordered this for the RX100 M3 but returned it as it is not deep enough. It looks like the same case that is advertised for the RX100 M1 but the camera has got progressively thicker with each generation and it no longer fits the newer models -  the seller does not seem to realize this.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Very well made!

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Really nice quality case. Seemed a bit expensive when I was buying it, but after receiving it I'm pleased with the fit and finish.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: This soft carrying case fits my SONY RX-100 II perfectly without any bulk. It is the perfect size and offers good protection.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: I bought this case for my new Sony camera. I really like it and it fits my camera perfectly. Easy to find in my purse.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Simple straight forward camera and gear. I'm using this as a shop camera for QC purposes and it's not as fast as an iPhone but it's nice to have something separate and not filling up your personal phone with work photos.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Camera is nice... good value/quality.  The case is decent, and the SD Card and small tri-pod are nice additions - however, the rest of the add-ons are nothing worthy of recognition. Instead, a USB cord could have been nice.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: For a small "pocket size" camera, this camera has wonderful features and a decent zoom. I plan to use it in conjunction with my bigger Canon 50x zoom while in Alaska.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Great Camera, good price, quick shipping. Cannon does not include the 32G Card and USB reader when you buy this model, but this vendor includes them both as part of the package

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Great product great value....if I should loose this camera on my trip to Hawaii..... I will not hesitate to buy another....

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This camera was too small for us.  We couldn't get a quality, clear picture. We needed a tripod

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Great present for my husband erwfor Fathers day he takes lots of pictures and he really likes the Power Shot ELPH 180,Your product was just as advertised and service was the best.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: i have used camera several times ,works good with good,clear pictures, happy so far.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: My wife used this on our motorcycle rides. I can honestly say i was surprised by the photos she took from the back of the bike. Very steady, smooth and detailed.,Probably the best compact cam we own.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: The camera is great. I like everything about it.  However the case for the camera that you sent is poor!  The belt strap broke the first day that I used it and I almost lost the camera.  It uses cheap plastic for the strap.  It should be the material that was used for the rest of the case and double stiched.  Do not send out anymore out like that one, it is junk.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: This is a neat little camera that will be great to have when we don't want to carry the larger, bulkier Nikon!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I had a Canon that only had 6 megapixels and I thought buying a new one that had more would mean I would get better pictures.....NOT!  The picture quality of this camera is terrible.  I would not recommend this one to a friend.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: This is the worst camera I’ve ever owned. It won’t take 2 pictures in a row. You have to turn it off and turn it back on each time to take s picture. Also the batteries last 3 weeks and need to be replaced constantly.  Just purchase a camera that you can charge and go.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I used a similar model of this Nikon camera for troubleshooting and repairs of industrial welding equipment, and even related circuit boards.  Results were mixed, but one in a hundred photos were pretty good. In spite of Nikon's great reputation for SLR cameras, their compact digital units just don't seem to measure up.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: We like the ease of use and that is why we purchase this camera plus the fact of using regular batteries not some special battery.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I needed a camera and had very little to spend. This is perfect for my needs. Taking photos of gravestones and scenery of Cape Cod. It appears to not be great in poor outdoor lighting. So I just wait until the sun is out or it is bright.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: No download cable  or software , so far I can't  view pictures .  Size is nice price  is good,Selector to use rechargeable  batteries  is good .  I've bought  a case a cable an a memory  card,I think  it would  have been better  to pay a little more and have these  items included

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Save your money and buy a Canon with image stabilization.  This thing cannot shoot a properly focused snapshot if your life depended on it.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I hadn't owned a camera in years, and this one is very small, easy to use and I like the fact that it uses regular batteries.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I love everything about this camera BUT, The picture quality is not very good for my use. This has 16 pixels. The camera I replace this one for was Identical except 20 pixels

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Wanted better pictures than a cell phone allows. Wanted enough zoom to take pics of kids in football games, or wildlife along the road. We use it in "auto" and the pics are awesome, and with the features this camera has (that we haven't used yet) I can only imagine what it's capable of!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Great features of this camera: 1) the 60X zoom, of course; 2)  one can quickly switch between taking pictures and recording videos by pushing a button; 3) there is very little time between pushing the button and the picture being taken; 4) lots of fun picture effects and pre-set scenes - in fact, probably more than I will ever need; 5) the automated i-mode can produce good pictures in a wide range of settings, and allows for some customization of the shot if desired; 6) the macro feature can get you very close to the subject; 7) the camera can take pictures in RAW mode; 8) it can take panoramic pictures.,Not-so-great features: 1)The display is fixed instead of being able to swivel to different angles, which may make it hard to take pictures holding the camera above the head or of objects on the ground. 2) It takes a while to save the pictures, so if you are taking (with the zoom, of course) a series of pictures of your graduating kid you better stop before the kid gets too close to whomever is handing out the diplomas (thank goodness for school photographers). 3) Sometimes when there are strong variations in illumination in a picture the results can be quite bizarre, such as completely white faces on some people while others close to them look normal. I suspect that using the RAW format would prevent this, but I usually stay in the auto modes.,I am also wondering why all cameras I have used, this one included, seem to have the battery compartment next to the tripod attachment, so that if the battery runs out while the camera is mounted on a tripod one must remove the camera from the tripod to swap batteries.,My previous camera was a Sony Cybershot, which seemed to produce clearer, more detailed pictures. I don't know if this is due to the fact that the Cybershot had great quality optics or to the fact that I am still learning how to best use the LUMIX. I suspect that the LUMIX optics may not be the best, but they are certainly functional. So far, after a couple of months of ownership, I am quite excited about this camera - it is very versatile with a great selection of fun possibilities, such as the "miniature" mode. I have been able to take decent pictures of anything from the moon to bugs to family members. The zoom performs best with a tripod, like all zooms, especially when fully deployed, but the software does a good job compensating for instability when the camera is hand-held. There are better cameras on the market, but this one is a good value for the price, at least in my opinion.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I'll be honest; I don't know anything about cameras and I'm too lazy to take a two year class on taking pictures of my kids...or a flower.  I just wanted something that would take nice photographs from far away, action shots, and general photo taking.  This camera does all of that very easily.,I got tired of going to my kids' school functions with just a 4x zoom camera (or my cell phone) only to get THE WORST PICTURES POSSIBLE!  My oldest son had this graduation ceremony from fifth grade.  I was 200ft away.  They were too far away and the picutres I took closer were so blurry they were unusable.,With this camera, those days are over!  You can zoom in from so far away it's ridiculous!  The nice thing is that they don't seem to lose too much picture quality, either.  The picture quality is fantastic!  I will say this; if you zoom all the way out (or close to it) it gets a little shaky.  You can still take the shot but you might want to use a tripod or brace it on something.,Other than that, pictures come out vibrant and crystal clear, even with kids running at full steam.,I am very happy with this product.  I attached two photos.  The first one is pointed at the moon with no zoom.  The second one was at full zoom.  I had to use a tripod for the second one.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Pros:  Great zoom power. Large aperture which allows allows hand held shots at full zoom and use of filters that reduce one stop or more. Multipoint focus tech' which means shots where there is a lot of sky in the center, the focus defaults to infinity, which is preferred. Cons: Bright red objects (flowers, etc.) in the frame tend to saturate -- I'm working on that.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: After several months of shooting daytime and other full light shots with this super zoom camera I decided to take it on a two week tour in Europe- primarily because it weighs about a pound less than my Nikon.  The days there were mostly cloudy and overcast.  While the full sun shots were still good, I think overall the quality of the shots were below average and somewere downright awful.  The camera disappointed me with anything less than full sun.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I just take pictures for my own use.  This camera gives me great pictures.  The image stability for video and high magnification (zoom) is very good.  I took still and video at a robotics world competition at Cobo Hall in Detroit.  This was an indoor arena with good lighting.  I took many pictures and video of fast moving robots.  The images were sharp with great color.  That was done with auto plus and 3 exposures per shot (-2/3, 0, 2/3).  Usually the zero was the best, but a few times one of the other was slightly better (nice).  Very happy with this camera and it cost half of what my previous SLR cost.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am not a professional photographer so my knowledge of the function specifics of different camera models is limited, but as a photo hobbyist, here is my opinion on the Lumix FZ70...  Love this camera!  My old Lumix bit the dust after a LOT of use and so I upgraded to this newer model.  It's fabulous.  Has the point and shoot (intelligent auto) feature along with some manual capabilities...great for the hobbyist that isn't a professional photographer that knows all the technical aspects of shooting photos.  I like the creative options on this one as well.  I took a handheld close up of the moon (slight shake so it wasn't a clear as if I'd used a tripod) with the super zoom on this camera and was able to see craters in pretty good detail...kids thought that was pretty cool!  My photos have been consistently bright, clear and focused and the video is great too.  I would highly recommend this camera to someone who needs a reliable, quality camera to take photos of their kids, vacation, everyday things...can't speak to the professional capabilities.  :)

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This seems like an extremely well made and well thought out camera. I expect to almost always use it on the Intelligent Automatic setting and am mostly impressed with the way that the camera deals with difficult areas of contrast in the picture. I am also impressed with the ability to zoom all the way in on something in good light and still be able to get an acceptable photo without bracing myself or using a tripod. Obviously, bracing or use of a tripod would be better. But this is the test that all my friends wanted to try on the camera and everybody was impressed.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: REALLY GOOD!!!  After reading reviews I purchased this camera just to go to Yellowstone. I knew that we wouldn't be able to get real close to the animals & some of the scenery. I had my professional photographer, (daughter), look at the reviews & specs. She said that it would be a good entry level camera. All I'm going to say is that she had my new camera in her hands 80% of the time. The words I heard the most was "I hate this cheap, lite weight camera!!" I think it had something to do with the cost of her cameras & lenses that was in her expensive case for most of the trip.,The biggest down fall that I read about this was the fuzzy pictures. I'm not sure why that happened because there was some amazing photos taken out the side widow at 80 MPH, even zoomed all the way out. Just remember to roll down the window, you get less reflections.,So my unprofessional oppion is buy this lite weight, cheap, entry level, camera if you need to get great long range & close pictures.,  Over 2,000 pictures, 1 drop of 4ft. on cement, battery held up great, just charge every night. Get a large memory card it helps.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Just took some pictures on the new camera.  This camera does so much.  I normally shoot a Nikon D810 but needed a camera that was smaller and lighter and could do many of the things my pro camera does.  Sure, it doesn't have a full sensor, but the pictures seem to be pretty good.  I will be traveling to South America with this camera.  The camera is not very expensive and I am looking forward to seeing what it can do.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I love this camera so much!!! I'm still learning how to use it but i'm mostly glad that this deal is 100% real and not a scam! I read everything this camera came with and still couldn't believe how much stuff it came with until it arrived!! Highly suggest this package if this is the camera you're looking for!!!!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I got this wonderful amazing camera for my birthday and absolutely love it! This is my first time getting a dslr or a canon and I love it! I think it’s and amazing beginner camera there’s not much to say but this camera is amazing! Also all the item you get I haven’t played with all of them but you get a lot and they all seem really helpful.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is fabulous. I bought this for my husband who had never used a camera other than on his smartphone. The camera is very easy to use and he quickly learned how to shoot pictures and take video. The photos come out incredibly clear and very professional looking. The accessories that come with the package are somewhat cheap, the tripod broke after a few uses. But for the memory cards and Canon brand items inside the price is totally worth it!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I usually use my cell phone to take pictures of my family, not always the best quality of pics are produced with cell phones. This is my first real professional style camera. My Forever purchased this for me and I am IN LOVE with this camera(Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera). I am truly happy with the package set (multiple lenses, 2 tripods, multiple memory cards,  and more.) This is a great camera at a reasonable price.,Candy

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Overall the camer is awesome! I've gotten excellent photos and have found the camera easy to navigate. The accessories are okay, but they are all third party. My wide angle lens came broken upon receiving the package. The other lenses easily come apart, which makes me hesitant to use them. Everything else came in tact. I've found it difficult to contact the original seller about the issue. I certainly will not buy any third party accessories ever again for such an expensive purchase.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: The camera itself is amazing. We loved it as soon as we unpackaged it. It's easy to use and there are so many various YouTube videos on the manual guide, tips and tricks, etc. The additional flash that comes in this package is not compatible with the camera, unfortunately. The additional lenses seemed to work well, but we could tell only a slight difference with the filtered lenses on a bright but cloudy day (diffused light). I would recommend this camera package to anyone who is starting out in photography, or anyone who wants a nice camera for family photos at events, soccer games, etc. A great find!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This is the first DSLR I’ve used, so I only have past point and shoots and my phone to compare it to- I’m very impressed! My TA helped me pick out this model/set to start with as I needed a DSLR for my photo class and I was lost as to what to get. I’ve been using this camera and the various inclusions for the past couple of weeks, and it has really aided in improving my photos. There are quite a few things I haven’t used yet (like the filters) but the SD cards, reader, tripods, and bag have all been helpful. In fact, I found the included “Photo4Less” bag to be a little too big for my daily use. It will definitely hold a lot of extra accessories inside of it alongside the camera and kit lens. However, for my purposes, I went ahead and purchased another smaller bag for walking around town/campus with. The included bag would probably be good for traveling though.,I found the seller of this bundle, Photo4Less, to be good. I received all my items on my estimated arrival date (fast shipping with prime) and nothing was damaged or not working properly. Overall, if you’re a beginner like me, I think this is a good camera bundle to start with.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: GREAT camera!  I'm a beginner....I've only used point and clicks before....I was taking pics inside of five mins.  The full auto setting is my friend!  I couldn't figure out the macro/wide angle lens, though....until I noticed that that was TWO lenses screwed together.  lol  Works perfectly now!  Only detraction;  the little screen/lens cleaner, Vivitar product, the bottle cap was cracked and the liquid contents leaked out inside its little box.  It's like a tablespoon of liquid inside its own little box so it's not like it's a biggy.  GREAT camera kit!!!  Highly recommend this one, guys!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Even though I absolutely love my camera, I haven't needed to use the portable flash component until now. I inserted new AA batteries and the flash does not work which is upsetting. During the summer I didn't need the extra flash as majority of my photos are outside during daylight but as we're going into fall and winter I decided to test it...and doesn't work. Which is quite upsetting as I will now need to purchase an extra component. :(. I bought this set off the recommendation of a friend who bought it and loves it and all his accessories work.,Other than this I definitely recommend this camera as it's extremely user friendly!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Okay, for the cost this is probably a 4 star item.,However, I give this a 3 stars because it fell below my expectations.,My expectations were a little high, as the image quality is not what I would have imagined. I feel like my samsung s9 gets nearly the same camera quality.,However, I've been told if I upgrade the lenses, the quality would be much better.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Handy little camera that's easy to use. I was surprised at the fine quality of the video. Makes posting videos on YouTube a snap. Now with the price drop it's a good deal. Only problem is with the charging cable, it's only 2 feet long with a dedicated plug. Amazon sells a 6 foot cable listed as "ABC Products Replacement Sony Alpha / Cybershot USB Cable Cord Lead (For Image Transfer / Battery Charger" that is a perfect replacement.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The Sony DCS-W830 Is much smaller than I expected but I'm happy with its size. It's smaller than an Apple 8 iphone and fits nicely in my shirt pocket/pants pocket. Lightweight... Sturdy Body... Well made. Takes pictures comparable to any cell phone and the zoom is about the same. Battery life can be better, but since it's a small phone, it's a small battery. I would suggest purchasing a couple more batteries as backup. Overall, I give it a solid 4 out of 5 stars.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I purchased this as something small to supplement pictures that I was taking with my Samsung Note 4 phone (16mp w/ no optical zoom).  I used both cameras indoors and out with different lighting situations, and when I reviewed them, almost all duplicate pictures were either better or the same ON MY CELL PHONE.  Even though there are supposed to be autofocusing features, the pictures had a soft focus appearance, foggy and washed out.,The power button is small and flush with the top of the camera, so sometimes it was difficult to press.  The small screen is low quality making it difficult to determine how good the pictures are, and if held at different angles, it is difficult to see all together.,On the plus size, it is small.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Camera seems to take good pictures (at least the best I can tell by looking at the screen on the camera). But I have the hardest time to download the pictures to my computer using the cord that was provided. Tried on both my desktop and the laptop. Have been working on it for the last couple of days but no luck. I have owned several digital cameras in the past and never had this problem.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Still getting used to no eye hole viewer and all the automatic stuff.  Wish it came with instruction book rather than on line.  Internet not always available.  Great little point & shoot camera.  One word of caution, don't drop it!  I had one in my shirt pocket, bent over and it fell out and quit working - lc screen was shot.  I ordered another one, that tells you something!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This is my second Sony DSCW830, I abused the first  one carrying it around in my pocket unprotected. The first one developed a shadow across the print face but I liked the camera enough to  buy again. This camera is easy on batteries, I've never run the battery down to empty. It is a point and shoot, it takes a few seconds to auto adjust the focus  but it is a 120 USD camera so it is to be expected.  Picture quality is about what you get for a hundred and twenty dollars, good enough.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Very simple camera. No flair really. The chaager that came in the package did not work. When plugged in with the battery to recharge, the orange light comes on then goes off almost instantly and would not charge the battery. Because we are in the Caribbean, returning is not really an option so we simply purchased another generic charger that looked very similar and that works well.,We use it to take photos on site visits during construction so we do not require anything fancy.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I have owned two Cybershot cameras before which is why I bought this one.  Clarity matters to me; I want to be able to see the pores on a cat's nose, I could do this with my two previous Cybershots, this camera doesn't focus on anything.  The flash is delayed so it goes off a full second after the camera has taken the photo.  I have tried all the settings and this DELAY does not seem to change.  Literally the flash can and will go off and yet the photo will look like it was taken in the dark.,Lastly, the color is not natural.  I have tried several settings and everything always has a pink hue.  This was not the case with my previous Cybershot cameras, they had natural color.,Sony might think that the kind of people that buy this camera do not care about quality, only simplicity, but they're dead-wrong.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: At this price point, we can't expect miracles.  My other camera is a Sony a-6000, but the DSC-W830 was purchased as a simple-to-use camera for my wife--to replace her 2006 model Canon Elph SD600 (6 megapixels, 3x optical zoom, no image stabilization).  The image quality and noise levels are definitely much better than the old Elph with this Sony point-and-shoot.  But the remaining question is whether my wife should use this camera or her iPhone 6 while on vacation.,On paper, the DSC-W830 should be better: its sensor is 50% larger than the iPhone sensor, and it boasts 20 megapixels compared to the iPhone 6's 8 megapixels.  And the DSCW830 sports a Zeiss lens.  Using the intelligent auto setting, I shot several scenes using the DSC-W830 (lens at widest setting--25 mm focal length equivalent) and the iPhone 6 (29 mm focal length equivalent) and the standard photo app.  In the centers of the photos, the DSC-W830 images were clearly sharper reflecting the improved resolution of the sensor.  But at the edges of the photos, the iPhone 6 images were much sharper because of the large chromatic aberration for the Sony product.,I haven't tried out the P mode on the DSC-W830 in with various settings (exposure compensation, ISO, HDR changes, etc.), and I suspect that by fussing with the Sony camera I could make it perform close to the iPhone 6--in the center of the image with wide angle.  The chromatic aberration appears to be a lens issue, and I haven't tested different focal lengths (levels of zoom) to see whether it gets worse or better when focal length is increased.  The iPhone 6 probably has less of a problem with this because it uses a prime lens (no zoom).  Of course the DSC-W830 has the zoom capability (an advantage), which the iPhone lacks.,I tried out the panorama feature on the DSC-W830, and found the resolution of images to be so bad that the panoramas were useless.  The iPhone 6 panoramas are excellent--way, way better.  The SCN setting on the Sony camera may be useful, but the 4 picture effects are gimmicky in my opinion.  The screen menus are simple and easy to navigate.,Based on sensor size and number of pixels, I would have thought that the Sony camera might have been better than the iPhone 6, but overall it is equivalent in some circumstances and worse in others.  Did Sony use a cheap sensor and other inexpensive electronics? Is their firmware less sophisticated? I was disappointed in the lens performance (chromatic aberration, softness at the edges of the images).,I think that the Sony DSC-W830 is suitable for snapshots made by people who may be technically challenged--Aunt Ida or your 12 year-old pre-teen.  It is convenient if you are going to an amusement park with the family and just want some fun shots.  But if you don't need the zoom, you can probably get comparable to better results with your iPhone 6, particularly if you install the ProCamera 8 app, which makes the iPhone work more like a digital camera.,UPDATE,Previous shots were done in the evening, when conditions might have been less than optimal.  I tested the DSC-W830 in bright sunlight and with different zoom settings.  Results were disappointing.  The right edge of the image was blurred at 1X, 2X (equiv. to 50 mm), and 4X zoom.  I had thought that perhaps a smaller aperture (resulting from the bright sunlight) might help, or that the lens would have a "sweet-spot" at mid-zoom.  The blurring would be just detectable with a 4x6 print, but I wouldn't use images from this camera for any greater enlargement of the whole image.  You can have an acceptable enlargement if you crop off the edges leaving the center 50% of the image. One of the photos below (about 1/3 of the whole frame) shows the blurring on the right edge. I'm disappointed.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I bought this to use to take pictures for ebay. I finally got around to starting, but the quality of the pictures is not even good enough for ebay. I waited so long, I can't even return it. I expected better of a Canon.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I have been unable to get a clear picture with this camera. Unfortunately, I tried too long and now cannot return it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Worst camera I've ever owned. It doesn't focus well, and the lighting/color is always off.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Went on vacation less than one year after initial purchase and the camera would not work. Could view photos from memory card, but would not take new photos or movies. Of course it's just out of warranty so no help for me.  We have always had Sony cameras but I figured I'd buy a nice little Cannon for my husband to use. Not impressed with clarity of photos taken prior to it demise. Very disappointed with performance and quality of this camera. Save your money. I'm going back to Sony.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I bought the camera for my time abroad and it was an okay camera - like it took decent photos - but there were a good amount of times when my old  iphone took better pictures (of the same scene...). If I could go back, I would definitely have passed on this camera and saved up more money to buy a better camera instead.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This little camera is okay.  I had 2 major complaints.,1.  It came to me with NO way to charge it - no cable, no charger unit, nothing.  This was frustrating over the holidays, I finally used a cable my mother-in-law had to wrap up Christmas, but once I got home I was needy again.,2.  The on/off switch is SUPER FRUSTRATING!  It will not come on unless you press down hard on the ON/OFF button for a little while.  That makes  quickie photos IMPOSSIBLE.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: purchased for grand daughter trip to Europe she she is easy to use

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: It's so tiny! Takes great photos but I have to learn more than the autofocus mode. Have had several Canons so it fits right into the cord I have in place that connects the camera to my computer.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This camera replaced an older Vivitar  camera and is a real improvement.  Easy to use, takes really great photos, and is overall a great camera for its size.  A good camera for the average person.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I like the fact that this camera is lightweight as I put it in my back jeans pocket.  I hike every day and bring it with me.  You never know what you'll see.  Takes good pictures, have no complaints.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I like that it's small to carry around. They have moments where they are some blurriness in some pictures but I will keep it because of the size.,The video is pretty good I like that.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: The camera was shipped and packaged very nicely packaged. The camera looks nice, and works well. It syncs to your phone so you can see on your phone what the camera sees. Nice product, would buy it again.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Hard to use and terrible pictures

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: its a great camera, easy to operate. I use it for work and pleasure.  My job as a Insurance inspector creates a demand for a all around easy and fast tool. I need a camera that takes very good pictures for the companies i work for.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I love this camera! I ordered it for a Caribbean vacation and I’m excited to use it! It’s lightweight and user friendly and I love the look of it! Ideal for beginner photographers

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Very few people still like to use a real camera for photography rather than using a mobile phone. I am one of them. This camera is very easy to use and the picture is very good in quality.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Made a little video review of the camera. Video and image quality looks pretty amazing. No lag. The zoom works pretty good. And cant wait to start using it :)

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Good product, long battery life.acceptable  video  quality for the price with addiyional accessories,  a really great camera for traveling and at home.this is not a professional  camer but it does do the job!

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Initially seemed pretty nice, but the image quality started going blurry and deteriorated very fast. poor to no support from the seller. If you buy it return it while you can, I did in the nick of time.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: The picture quality is very clear. I used it to take pictures when I went hiking without my phone and the picture quality is awesome. Also used the webcam feature with my old computer. 10/10 will buy again.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: It is good camera for  taking pictures and makes videos.It is small and light weight.The picture quality is far better than mobile photo and Easy function , battery life is good  and comes with extra battery  I love this camera , nice product .

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Still a few things I have trouble with which I'm sure I'll figure out.  The previous Sony which is same basic model works better for downloading photos which this newer one does not.  My only complaint.  I'd sure buy it again if something happened to the new one!,David

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I'm not impressed. The camera takes a long time to focus and is only decent in optimal lighting situations. Save your money up and buy something better.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I initially gave this camera a 2-star rating but I have decided to come on here today to change that to a 4. I really like it, I never realized how much fun and convenient it could be to have a tiny camera to just carry along in my bag to snap a picture where ever I am. My little nephew loves it too. it is so easy for him to use at only 4 years old but still inspires me to take as many photos as I can anywhere I am.,it doesn't have audio but it has a movie making function.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Feels so bad to write a negative review but got to give a fair review. #1 Best Seller was the reason that prompted me buy this camera. But alas! After using sparsely for just a year or so, something went wrong with the lens and the camera no longer works properly! The pictures clicked are completely blur and hazy. Totally useless!! Probably the camera is good. Hence, the best seller. But it's just me who has received a defective piece unfortunately!! And,it is going to be just 2 stars from my end.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Good camera. Good pictures.  Not so easy to use and operate. Manual lacks in clarity and instructions. Had to figure it out for myself.,I recommend this camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Pretty disappointing, I got this camera thinking  it would be better than taking photos with my iPhone 6. It takes blurry photos in lower light situations and nothing  to write home about in normal lighting.  The video is horrible, the iPhone is much better and the stabilization is awful.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This is a very good camera for everyday use. I keep it with me at all times at work and its' 'predecessor' cybershot was extremely reliable and although it still works well, developed an issue after 6 years and I figured it was time to replace it, so I purchased the next closest clone in the Sony line which I expect will serve as well. Purchase was fine and delivery fast.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Second bad camera I've ordered here although everything else I get is great.  I can't return it because I waited too long.  A costly mistake because this is going into the garbage.  The memory card slot was defective, bent, I don't know what, but a memory card could not be inserted.  I bought the recommended memory card from Amazon plus purchased two others close to home because I thought I was making a mistake.  I finally used force to push one in and it wouldn't  come out.  Had to use pliers. Sigh.  Makes me think you should check this as soon as you get the camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I bought this for a very technologically challenged friend and he was able to use it pretty easily.  I showed him how to do the basics and he got it right away.  It takes great pics and the zoom is a good distance.  Also, there is an easy mode that you can put it on that makes the wording larger and makes the camera even more simple.  I highly recommend this camera for new users and those that might have a difficult time with the technology.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I bought this little to replace my [ pricier ] Cannon that My lady friend dropped. I was skeptical with Not having experience with Sony Cameras. Even though I know Sony produces quality products. But this camera was about one third the cost of My previous camera.. Well with their reputation and the [Positive] experiences I have with Amazon. What did I have to loose... Well I had nothing to lose. In fact I had a Big Gain. The camera is More then I expected. I got a great camera, at a price.So I can afford to buy one for My Son !

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Awesome camera case , slim design makes it easy to carry your camera inside your purse and still have it well protected!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Great quality and lite weight.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Nice and light.  Protects camera without bulk.

review: My biggest issue is the false advertising. There is absolutely no way this is a 21 megapixel digital camera. It is hardly better than early 2000’s camera phones. The flash washes everything in sight out and there is zero image stabilization. Immediately returned.

review: This camera is very nice. I like the color of the camera and I like the size of it. I really that it is easy to use and I like the quality of the pictures that the camera takes.

review: I bought this for my son as a Christmas present. However I tested it out myself first because I wanted to have it all set up for when he opens it. The quality is really great and easy to uSe. I am going to buy a few more to give out to my niece and nephews for Christmas.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: very good quality. As good as it was described. Safe shipping fast

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I bought this for my kids so they don't always use my cell phone to take pictures, and so they can have their own little camera. For starters, the SD card will not stay where it is supposed to so none of their pictures ever save. You can sometimes make it if you open it up, jiggle it, hope for the best, open it, jiggle it again and then it stays, but the second you move, it comes undone again. It is very disappointing for your little budding photographer. The picture quality isnt great, nor is it awful, you definitely get what you pay for with this inexpensive first camera. Except it won't save any pictures.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my mother in law (given early bc of a vacation.) She does not have a smart phone and wanted to take pictures. The camera takes great quality photos for 4x6 prints and for her digital picture frame. It is easy for a not tech savvy senior to use.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I have only had this camera for 1 day. I got this camera as a replacement for a much more expensive one, I wasn't expecting much, however, I am very pleasantly surprised. This camera takes very nice, clear pictures. I haven't gotten to try out many of the features yet but the features that I have tried have produced very nice photos. It is very easy to use on auto mode, just point and shoot and you get a great picture. The accessory kit that came with the camera is really nice, there are a lot of nice, helpful products in it, including a small tripod. Overall I would give this camera 5 stars, It's great for beginners also!!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: This camera was a gift, so I have not had a chance to use the camera or any of the bells and whistles that came with it. I did notice that it is smaller and lighter than I thought it would be, and this is good because I want my husband to feel comfortable holding it while filming video for several minutes at a time. I like the wifi feature because he likes to put his photos on the desktop PC, and this makes it easy. The camera came with a really nice bag to store it in, and we are happy so far!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: It is an amazing camera! The additional assessories that came in the package are high quality. I could not pass up this good buy!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this camera about 3 months ago, so wanted to give it time to really test it out. I took it on a trip to London and Doha and the picture quality is horrible. I would have returned, but I figured I'm over the refund policy. I started to use it during my travels and the pictures were blurry and not sharp at all. Dark too.  Horrible. I finally gave up and just started using my Galaxy 9 and what a difference.  What a waste of money.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Nice camera and fairly easy to use. Have had it for only one day, so it's hard to tell about anything that I haven't dealt with yet, but so far I am very happy with it. It was delivered within the time frame specified, actually on the first day of the time frame. It was packaged well and all was good inside the box. I have no complaints so far about this camera or the transaction.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: There is nothing I don't  like about this surprisingly small and light camera.  There are ample functions for those of us who do somewhat serious photography but don't want or can't afford to pay the price of the professional grade cameras.  It would be nice to  have changeable lenses and be able to incorporate an external mic although the internal mic is quite good.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: The Canon SX420 IS camera is remarkably easy to use. I was surprised at its light weight and comfortable grip. Its advanced features are quickly accessible through the menus. Even the WI-FI setup is good, although I had some problems due to my network system, not the camera. Picture quality is excellent, due in part to its image stabilization. The accessories included as packaged by the Imaging World are very useful and are "the cherry on top of the icing".

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: The camera is easy to use, light weight, and the picture quality is really nice! I got this right before the weekend, so took some pictures on Sunday of some family, and tested out the features. I was very happy with everything. The package deal from TheImagingWorld is perfect for starter or pro photographers. I was really surprised at quality of everything for the price. I would definitely buy from TheImagingWorld again!

review: This camera takes great pictures but the batteries die fast.  The batteries that come with it are junk and didn’t work when I got the camera. review: I received the camera, set it up and I took 2 practice photos to make sure I knew what I was doing and now after only 2 pictures, the camera keeps telling me the "memory is full". review: I purchased this as a gift for my mom. She wanted to take pics of our vacation. It will not turn on. I tried using only name brand batteries. I used brand new from the store. review: I was looking for an inexpensive point and shoot for my 14 y.o. son's 21 day backpacking trip out west. While the price was great and delivery was fast, the quality of the images was really disappointing. We ended up using a camera we had from 10 years before and it worked well.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Bought it for my vacation and was not able to use . Even with fresh batteries it wouldn't turn on completely. product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Well, purchased and used for about a month and a half. Since that time the camera has just stopped working. It will turn on for a few seconds then cut back off. I dabble in electronics, so generally I can mend any problems that arise. But this product did not last any time at all. I wish it was a better product. *I will update of seller reaches out and offers a replacement*,Just a note to other fellow reviewers, If a company offers a replacement please update your star rating and comments. Any company willing to take that time is a company that wants to try their best.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: First, let me state that this will NOT fit you RX100II, RX100IV or RX100V.  At least, not without a lot of pushing and undue stress on your lens.,HOWEVER, if you do as others have suggested, and cut out a semicircle for the inner front of the case to fit the lens.  Then it fits PERFECTLY.,I added some pics here to show a) the (poor) fit as it comes from the factory; and b) to show my steps to cut out the face and the results of the mod.,I found a pill container cap that just matched the diameter of the lens and used that - aligned with the lens & camera pushed down into the case - to mark the cutting line on masking tape.  Then I used a VERY sharp knife to cut through.  There are two layers of very dense cardboard in the walls that are very difficult to cut, so take it carefully (you DON'T want to slip!).  After cutting I wiped glue around the cut between the pleather and the cardboard to keep the cut edges together.  Then I used a brown sharpie to color the cut edges.  Voila!,You can see in the final pics, how far the lens protrudes from the case front with the mod.  Makes it obvious how tight it was before.
