product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: We will be using this small, compact camera on an upcoming trip.  It is easy to use and takes great pictures.  The zoom feature is going to greatly enhance our shots.  It will be a great way to document our trip.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Still trying it out

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Great camera, very easy to use!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Love that this was the complete package for most of your picture needs! Pictures come out beautiful!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: This is our third camera that we have bought for our classroom to use, They hold up well and take a great picture.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Small but not too good of pics taken. Easy to use. Just not it

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Son’s first camera. Purchased for 5th grade camping field trip. Easy for him to use and he enjoyed taking many photos.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Great package, cameras is compact which is what I was looking for. All the accessories came in handy.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: It’s small but it’s portable so I love it

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I ordered this as a gift for my daughter, it is the perfect beginner camera for a tween and the bundle made it even a better deal.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I received everything with no damage. Like everything I received, somethings appear smaller in the pic. The products work well

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I previously owned a Canon Rebel film 35mm camera bought it back in 2000...loved it!! Had wanted a new digital camera for a long time, found this kit deal and couldn't pass it up for the price!!! You get so many accessories and items to assist you in great photography. I would highly recommend this to anyone thinking of purchasing a digital 35mm.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I have never had experience with cameras past my smart phones. I have been wanting a "real legit" camera for a while now. I finally decided to purchase it. So far, it's amazing. It came with so much more than I originally thought. There was debate on what actually came with it so I was not expecting much. The amount I paid was definitely worth it. Everything came in great condition. It took me a second to sit down and put everything together but it wasn't too hard to figure out. I recommend this to others who are in a similar situation. The quality of the pictures are great too as you can see from other people's reviews. And yes, half the stuff I took pictures of are on my leg.. fight me.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Everything is lovely! (Haven't taken more than a few test pics so, know that when reading),Firstly, shipping time was IMMACULATE. nuff said.,Second, SO MANY ACCESSORIES! If you're trying to get into photography or do it as a hobby n need a quick upgrade, THIS IS IT. It is the camera set itself (camera base, battery charger, is chord, and lens) and an additional 14 (I think I counted right?) Accessories: 4 filters (2 uv's, cpl, fld), 2 lenses (wide angle w macro, & telephoto), flash attatchment, mini tripod, 60" tripod, 16 & 32 gb sd cards, lens cleaner, a remote shutter trigger, and a gadget bag. W H E W a lot. Do know that the only thing that's Canon brand is the camera set; the accessories I received are vivtar (and transcend sd cards).,I think the only BIG con is that IT DOES NOT COME W BATTERIES. you have to buy em separate. But man if they add that in later, y'all I'm saying there's no real reason not to get this.,Can't wait to take photos n better my hobby!!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Excellent addition to anyone's photographic arsenal.  Images are rich, sharp and colors are vivid.  Manual mode is simple and bracketing feature available for those wanting to get into HDR.  I'd recommend this camera to anyone looking for a great SLR, can never go wrong with a Canon.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: $300 for the camera & a whole bunch of inclusions - everyone I know has been asking me where I got such a great deal! Will be posting some photos taken using this camera & doing an update on durability in the future. For now, I absolutely love it!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Just returned from a 17-day vacation in Scandinavia, for which I purchased this new camera.  It takes excellent photographs, and the 60x optical zoom is amazing.  What is particularly surprising, and useful, is its ability to take great photos in dim light, without using the built-in flash; this was especially helpful in certain museum locations where flash was forbidden. It autofocuses very quickly as well. Sighting of the subject can be done by using the LCD screen (which is quite bright, even in bright sunlight) or, with the push of a button, through the small sighting slot just below the flash.  The flash, incidentally, must be manually raised and lowered for use, but this is quite easy and quickly done.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I took my first photos this evening with the Rebel camera using the automatic features, and took pics with my Samsung Galaxy S7, too, of the same subject. I think my phone took better pictures--clearer and better color. Perhaps as I become more proficient with the camera the photos will improve, but so far I'm not impressed. Also, the front zipper on the Vivitar camera bag was defective, however Amazon customer service was very helpful and is sending a replacement bag free.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is great for beginner to intermediate DSLR photographers and is very user friendly. Arrived on time and came with everything description listed. All accessories work with the camera and are easily attached. Definitely worth the money.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: My daughter bought it with her birthday money. Everything came new and in good condition! She loves it! It is an awesome buy!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: The camera and lens it comes with is amazing. All the other gear with it is crap. What I don't like about legitimate DSLRs is their lack of flexibility. I've been able to take a bigger verity of shots with a point and shoot than with this. The lens here is made for close range and indoor shooting only and it does it VERY well, but that is it. Guess I have to start a collection of Canon lenses now after I sell a bunch of the add-on junk that came with the kit.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I bought this camera for a recent trip across the southwest US. My first impression was that this camera is a bit bulkier than I expected. It is basically the same size as a DSLR, while many bridge cameras are smaller. The handgrip is good and it feels good and balanced when held.,The photo quality is just awesome. I am no professional by any means, but I do appreciate the quality of this camera and the photos it produces.,The things that I used quite a bit on the trip were the dedicated video button (you can start video recording at any time), photos during video (while recording, just snap pictures like normal) and the incredible zoom. While at the Grand Canyon especially, we used the zoom like a digital telescope to investigate things. I was sort of concerned that I wouldn't really use this camera's zooming capabilities, but I quickly found that I was capturing things and getting great crisp close ups of things that I would have passed on with my old digital camera; especially wildlife that we couldn't physically get close to. By the quality and clarity of the photos, you'd never know I was at least 50 to 100 yards away for many shots. The stabilization is outstanding, so at extreme zooms, you can count on crispness.,Another great thing that I noticed is how quickly the camera could get from a standing start - meaning turned off to on, then booted up, then zoomed, then focused, then capturing the photo. On our trip, many things would just happen quickly and getting the picture required a quick camera. My wife gave up trying to use her Samsung S3 to get any quick photos because I could grab the camera and complete a picture with the FZ70 in about 3 seconds, no kidding. It's like boom, it's on and ready.,I'm having some trouble forcing the flash on like the manual states. I have created my own program setting to accomplish this. I played with manual exposure settings to get some interesting effects. I tried to set it for extra long exposure times for star photos, but so far I can only get it to 60 seconds. There is a ton of options and settings, so I need to dig more.,Battery life is good and the camera feels rugged, yet not too heavy. I'm very pleased with this camera and it is a good buy for the money.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've been using this camera for about 3-weeks and think it great! Oh, I could have spent twice the money on a "better" camera, but for my needs and the way I use a camera this one is just perfect. And, it seems - so far - the camera very well made. Note: I've owned Lumix cameras before so the learning curve (how to use the camera) is shorter. I'm very happy with my purchase...,A note on Amazons' packing... I was not at all happy with the packing. Amazon packed the FX70 in a box 3-times larger that the camera box and the amount of packaging material was next to nothing. So, the camera and the factory box rattled around inside the 'too large' Amazon box during,shipping. Luckily the factory box 'absorbed' any problems so the camera undamaged.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Great camera, but the wifi feature is really misleading. It only allows you to view on your smartphone. If you want to upload to your computer or a web service, you have to connect it to a computer via USB. In other words Wifi is worthless.  Pictures seem pretty nice, but my first DSLR, easy to use, good UI and menus explain what you are doing.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Great camera, absolutely amazing zoom.  We have had previous Lumix cameras, this one is the best one yet. And the zoom.. well, let's just say you can overdo that easily, it zooms so far.  Some great photos of very distant objects that look like we have an external telephoto lens on.  Just a great camera so far.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is the second Panasonic DMC camera I purchased. I bought the DMC-FZ18 (8mp, 18X optical zoom) in 2007 and took some wonderful pictures with it. I love the EVF on both cameras., I made the mistake of putting a different brand on my wish list. Hubby surprised me on Christmas day with the other brand. I played with it but  realized it was so so good as the Panasonic brand. The other brand was returned and I ordered the FZ70 for next day delivery.,The other brand used 4 AA batteries that just didn't last.  Yes, there are rechargeable AA batteries I could purchase, but it's awkward carrying around multiple batteries like that. Two batteries had to be placed positive side up and two negative side up, but the diagram wasn't clearly marked under the battery door. The battery door felt flimsy and it was awkward to open. Lastly, I had trouble with the lens cap staying on the lens.,I like how Panasonic compartments have a way to keep the lithium ion rechargeable battery pack locked into position when the door opens. The charger and the battery pack are compact and not cumbersome to use.  There is only one way the battery can be inserted because of its shape., There are a lot more bells and whistles with the FZ70 but I don't plan to learn it all over night. I hope this digital camera lasts at least as long as the FZ18.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: If you do not need a DSLR camera and want a very good general all round camera for nature or sport photography, the Lumix FZ80 is one of the best. The price for what you get is also very attractive. Use of the program is also easy to follow and understand. Image stabilization for a 60X zoom is amazing, shake free pictures can be taken at maximum zoom if one has a reasonably steady hand.,The only improvement I would have liked is to have the camera splash resistant, but that would of course add to the price.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Just received the new Fz80 yesterday and took it out today for a trail run. Did very well it takes excellent pictures has good focus speed especially for the price has a very nice zoom range is comfortable to hold, body seems solid zoom is quick it will be a good addition to my other cameras. Took it out to a couple of ponds today for bird and duck photos and got some nice shots It is easy to use has a host of great features which include the ability to take 4K videos and photos excellent entry level bridge camera :)

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: After having a small Sony Cybershot with only a 3X zoom (which actually took great pics), I decided to upgrade to another point and shoot with more zoom.  Looked around and researched similar cameras from Canon, Fuji, Sony, and Nikon, but decided on the Panasonic due to the wide angle feature.  I'm not a pro and probably will never use half of the features of this camera or even understand what they all mean.  I just want to put it in auto and go take pics.  Have already taken several hundred pics and I am very, very satisfied with this camera.  It takes awesome landscapes in low power/wide angle (my favorite pics to take) with awesome colors, crisp and sharp.  The zoom is phenominal and even with a tripod or monopod, you do lose some quality when zoomed all the way out, but still are good pics.  Although slightly larger than the other cameras, I like the size and ease of handling.  Really, the only negative I can think of is finding your way through the different menus and what all of the buttons and dials do... a little confusing, but I'm sure reading the electronic manual and using the camera over time will make it easier.  For the price, this camera is excellent and I recommend it, just don't expect it to be perfect in all areas and take pics like a high end camera. It's a point and shoot super-zoom that costs a couple hundred, to that end, it does an outstanding job IMO.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Excellent Camera. Very much impressed with battery life. I have many cameras whose battery life lasts maximum 2 hours. But this camera's battery did not completely drain even after continuously recording video for 4 hours. Video is excellent. I love this camera. Highly recommend to others who are undecided about which camera they should buy. Price is also within $300 which is very impressive.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I had earlier purchased a Panasonic 18X zoom and was favorably impressed with its optics and functionality.  I waited for the next Panasonic, even while other powerful zooms made their appearance, because I had a hunch it would be worthwhile to do so.  Indeed it was, I brought FZ70 with expedited shipping, as I was heading out to SF to see my son, daughter-in-law, and grandchildren and I wanted to be able to test it out during the trip.,My son, as a surprise gift, bought my wife and myself tickets aboard a tour ship that went out into the SF harbor to watch the America's Cup.  Our distance ranged from 1/3 to 3/4 miles from the racing craft and the zoom gave me exceptional photos.  Not only did the image stabilization take care of my tremors, it also took care of the rolling of the tour ship!  I have a collection of truly impressive clear pictures that I only wish I could share with you.  This camera is truly an exceptional value.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Overall, it's a great little camera, compact and totable. I have trouble focusing on zoomed-in images, however, something I've not had with other Canon cameras. This could be the camera, could be something I've yet to learn. However, I did get awesome pictures on a recent trip.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I bought this for my 11 year old daughter for xmas, she wanted a Polaroid but I couldnt see continually spending $$$ on the film, so I opted for this. She loves it and can take videos as well.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: The camera was bought for my son. He loved it as it was very simple to use. However, the lens cover stopped working and the lens has been left partly exposed after every camera session. This was disappointing. But the camera has seemed to perform well otherwise.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Well. It's palstic. So of course I was disappointed about that fact. None of the canon cameras I've owner have been like this. But...it is a canon. So there is that.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Most of the time use phone but were going for a hiking to Glacier and to Nepal so ordered it.  It worked for a week during Glacier trip but when tried to turn on during Nepal trip camera will not turn on. Cheaply made.  Should have ordered from Costco so I could return it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This camera is good for zooming in on close-up shots, or general picture taking.  For a take-along on vacation, it worked well for me.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: This camera is exactly what I wanted. Inexpensive, uses AA batteries vs one that has to be charged (I had problems charging my previous one), and it takes great pictures.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: not as good as the Nikon it replaced

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Bought this camera to replace the one that was dropped and badly damaged .,  wife uses it ,despite her poor grip , she can hold it and has taken a few photos , all came out well !

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This camera surprised me. It takes better quality photos than I expected, is easy to operate, and battery life is very impressive. Excellent value.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: So disappointed!  Bought this camera for vacation and it stopped dead shortly after the vacation began.  Bought it in May and cannot find the option to return it!  It should not die this soon after purchase.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Considering the low price, this camera takes very good pictures. It is easy to navigate and the instructions are pretty clear.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I love this camera, for it's size and easiness to use.,the only thing I was upset about was the batteries,AA batteries are not convenient,  much prefer the rechargeable,flat ones

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Love my new camera.  I like the fact that I don't need to charge the camera.  I use AA lithium batteries and my camera is ready when I am.  I prefer this to the newer rechargeable camera batteries.  I have not been lucky with them,  When taking lots of pictures in one day, my rechargeable cameras always went dead before the day was done.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Camera is not bad, but the major issue is the flash. The options are "Auto Flash" or "No Flash" there IS NOT a "Always Flash" or "Flash On" option. When I need the flash to take a picture of a dark area, i need to use my phone light to trick the camera into using its flash function. The Auto Flash choice is horrible and hardly works.,Other than that its a great cheap option.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Nothing special, it was too small for my taste and the construction was somewhat cheap (made in China).  Decided to send it back and look for a better product.  Would make a good gift for a starter camera.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Does not seem to work as well as my older model even though is has a lot more pixels and it does use up batteries twice as fast as my older model

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Gift for our granddaughter. Her first real camera and she was have a great time on Christmas taking pictures of everyone. Still learning but that’s why I bought that camera so she could.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Cheap and disappointing. Didn’t even come with cord to connect to computer. Wish I hadn’t spent the money.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Yes, I bought this camera so I can use it when my baby is born and I don’t want to use the camera on my phone. I like how it uses batteries. Eventually I’ll buy a carrier for the camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I had a camera from Sony that looked identical (W650), which worked very well, but broke by accident. So, I needed portable Sony with Zeiss lens.,This camera meets most of the expectations, except one- the speed. I've got many not focused pictures and some, which are just late. There is no manual included (I found it at manualslib.com) and there is many adjustments, which is time consuming to try. So, the camera is just little slow for now, but works right otherwise.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: ok, first, the picture with this review is from my iPhone because it takes better pictures than this hunk of junk. I'm tired of having to make changes in the menu EVERY SINGLE TIME I TURN IT ON!! For all that is holy can you just save the dang settings???,Pictures are fuzzy, it says it's focused but no....,It won't turn on when you push the button (sometimes),It will randomly turn off,I threw it in a river.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This camera was purchased as an inexpensive alternative to a DSLR (ok - not alternative, but when traveling abroad, the teacher wouldn't allow my daughter to bring her DSLR so we got this instead).,This camera caused major distortion on the corners of images - so if any person happened to be in the corner - they looked pretty funny. This camera also had internal dust on the lens. I cleaned the lens several times - with the same stuff I clean my professional lenses with - and nothing got the dust out - so I have to assume it was on the inside of the lens. ALL images had this dust on them - and they are NOT easy to remove in post processing. I had high hopes for this camera being a nice alternative when my daughter can't take her bulky DSLR - but this is not the case. Not many of her photos turned out. Quite disappointing for a once in a lifetime trip.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I bought this camera to take on a trip to China. It was great most of the time. And the 20MP pictures are so much better than my phone. The slow reset to taking the next picture is a little annoying, and I killed the battery every day. I really wish I had gotten a spare battery. So if you will be out for more than 5 hours and you use the zoom a lot and take a lot of pictures, 400 was the most I was able to take in a day, you will really want a spare battery. The auto focus and image stabilization work great, so does the panorama feature. I dropped it a few times and it was still just fine, but maybe I was just lucky. Overall, I am glad I chose this camera, even with the short battery life.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: If your are looking for a small Camera ,with a German Zeiss Lens, that takes really good pictures ,for under $150,this is the only one. I spent 16 days in The Galapagos Islands ,and the  "Nasty" (So hot ,humid, rains all the time). The Amazon Jungle Rainforest. It was so bad ,I thought my Camera would stop working. But it survived just fine.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: l bough this camera new it would not work so i sent it to sony repair it could not be fixed so they sent me another one that one was broke also i am out 118.00 i can not get sony on the phone. so far no camera no money.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The camera seems fine, but the item description should clearly state "WARNING, THIS CAMERA WILL NOT DOWNLOAD PICTURES TO A MAC". I couldn't even assess the camera because of this limitation. Sony dropped the ball because this looked like it would be a great camera (I'm returning it tho, so I'll never know)

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I love this little camera!  It's just what I was looking for.  It takes great photos and is easy to operate....so far.  It's small and fits anywhere.  I'm not a photographer so I was just looking for a little point and shoot I could use.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: My long loved digital camera and its case were failing. This replacement is great! (I always buy last year's models to save money). Got for a good price. Had to study the manual for a bit to understand and set options. Paired it with HDE Neoprene Case for Sony Cyber-Shot Digital Cameras. https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001U8V87U/ref=oh_aui_search_detailpage?ie=UTF8&psc=1

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Almost a "Kiddie" Camera.  Slow save rate (even though I have one of the fastest memory cards available).  Takes some Great pictures, takes some 'ok' pictures, takes some bad ones.  All in the same light conditions.  Strange.  BUT, I bought it as a backup camera and to have a zoom better than my phone.  My samsung takes consistently better pictures.  The 8x optical zoom works well.  So i am underwhelmed, but given the price, i'm giving it 3 stars.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Water seal is great and the pic is perfect. The battery also last long. Recommend.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Great value for the price, we went to Pocono mountain water park resort and stays there for 2 nights. My kid has the camera on him at all time while he was in the water. He captured so many valuable memories and they are surprisingly good.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I'm going travelling to Madagascar soon and I really wanted a hardy little camera to take with me when I'm diving or crossing that insane bridge that I've been told about. However, I really didn't want to spend a hilarious amount for it, I won't really use it that much to justify the amount GoPros cost.,The camera arrived very quickly, I really liked everything about it. It's super simple to use (if you use it enough to remember what each of the button does)!,I tried to take pictures and I took an underwater video, everything worked very well. Good quality of picture!

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I've taken photos indoors and outdoors, using different levels of zoom, with flash, without flash and the results have been fantastic every-time; the colours have all been true to life - direct sunlight nor strong lighting have bleached the resulting photos in any way. I'm not sure would someone more experienced would think of the image quality, but I honestly can't fault it.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: First impressions are very good, have not gone into all the functions yet but am impressed with the performance so far. had no worries when out with walking club in arctic conditions.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: This was a present for my husband, and he absolutely loves it. Pictures come out crisp and clear, and teh controls are straight forward enough for quick snaps as well as more complex compositions.,Ideal when you don't want to haul a big camera around. Due to the rugged design (water and dust proof) it's a camera that can be taken out regardless of the weather. Recommend.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: We bought this to encourage our daughter to enjoy more outdoor activities. This camera is perfect for this little photographer, she absolutely love it, take it everywhere, she even took it to her swimming classes last weekend, now she love the underwater activities. With this price, there is nothing I can complaint really, highly recommend this.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Bought the camera for my sons birthday and really impressed with it. Feels high quality and it is very easy to use. The front facing screen is a nice addition.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: What a fantastic little camera. Packaged very nicely,with easy to understand instructions for all the different clips / connectors. The camera itself is lovely and small great for catching those special action moments. This will be a wonderful asset for my walks on Dartmoor with the dogs and then my trip to Peru.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Bought for my little boy's 7th birthday. He can use it fine and is just the right size to fit his hands. Gives good results in regards to picture quality and takes quite good video at too. Love it so much.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This camera provides amazing clarity in both video and image quality, especially for the price. It is very easy to use and handle. Tested in both inside and outside environments. Plugging the camera into the pc to view images/videos or to use the camera for the pc is very straight forward.  I am very satisfied with my purchase.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Not user-friendly, poor battery life, wish I could send it back...very disappointing! They reached out and said they would give me half of my money back if I took my review down. TOTALLY UNETHICAL. They were trying to conceal this products failures from the potential Amazon consumers.  STAY FAR AWAY FROM THIS HORRIFIC COMPANY! I have warned many future consumers on many platforms.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Really nice picture quality. Easy to use. I like this digital camera so much. Very professional.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Nice camera , good picture quality .,Little bit heavy cause was made with good  material.,Love lenses ,

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I can take this go out. Then I don't need to take out my phone, this will save the power of my phone

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I got this for my daughter who is producing her own videos on YouTube and she just loves it! It is the perfect gift for a reasonable price.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Dont buy... there were better and cheaper cameras made in the early 2000s.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This camera was exactly what I was hoping it would be. Takes great pictures and the video is clear with great sound. I love all the extra stuff that came with it and that it is all packaged separately to ensure that it arrives intact. I would absolutely recommend this camera, it’s well worth the price!

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Very efficient camera. Got it as a gift and it’s amazing

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Gave this to my niece as a birthday gift. She loved it a lot, especially the 180 display, very good function for a selfie camera.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Nice protective case, but I found some flaws.  First, it's easy to think that the camera is attached to the case when it's not.  I found out the hard way and the camera fell to the ground.  Fortunately, it works fine though it did get scratched.  Second. the strap attachments become loose over time, creating another opportunity for the camera to fall.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Great case. Only issue is the part covering the lens comes off completely when you want to take pictures. The bottom part unsnaps. You have to snap the separate piece back at each end  when protecting the camera.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Sturdy, yet lightweight. Neck strap perfect length to carry camera which allows instant access to camera.,Everyone is asking me where I got my new camera case!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Fit my Cannon G7 perfect. Color is as pictured. Soft case that comes with cleaning cloth for camera lense.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: very nice, quality leather, feels and fits good on the camera

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Changing from 4 to 5.  Really worked out well not having to take Canon out of a case-just open up.  Able to carry camera for longer periods as compared with my big Nikon.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Nice case for the money.  Well padded.  Very satisfied with purchase.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Item was delivered as expected and the product fits it's purpose to protect the camera while I have it in my purse. Thanks!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: This case is beautiful. A few of my colleagues have commented that they're more impressed with my case than the camera itself. I usually leave the detachable top flap off, but I snap it on to protect my camera if it's bumping around in a crowded purse. The bottom piece screws on securely and offers a better grip than I get from holding the camera alone.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: It is perfect!!,Great Item, Great Sale!!!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This is my second one after 5 years of pretty good use. An excellent little digital camera. The flash stopped working on my old one but not worth repairing at this price. It takes wonderful photos and I was glad I could still get the same one.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Incredible little camera.  Many, many features with excellent pictures.  I mentioned this camera to my brother, a camera buff, and he was so impressed, he bought one.  He's a CAO of a defense contractor and showed the camera to many engineers and factory workers who also ordered the camera.  It's hard to believe, but the count at the plant is now up to 142 cameras ordered.  One engineer ordered 12 to send overseas to his sons and friends stationed in Iraq.,For the price, it can't be beat.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I didn't want a rechargeable battery pack...I wanted operation by batteries.  Guess I missed this in the product description.  When traveling overseas (Europe, Asia), there is no ac current plugs, batteries are better.  When your camera needs more power...right in the middle of a "shoot" ...batteries are replaced quicker and more easily.  Oh well....

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Have had fun with this camera.  Some people use their phone for good pictures.  This affordable, high pixel / quality camera gives me many useful options  and I can get by with a relatively cheap phone.  A very essential tool for what I do.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Quality of the pics - pretty good for point and shoot camera.,Quality of the craftsmanship - poor.  Part that zooms in and out, one of the metal part is falling off after 2 use.  It's not critical to taking picture itself, so the camera still works fine, but I didn't expect this camera to start falling apart this quickly.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Bought it for my kid to play around with, the quality of the lcd is really poor, the autofocus is slow, and the low light capabilities are bad...if you plan on shooting in beautiful light all the time you’ll prolly be fine with this

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: wow its a great little camera ..takes great pictures is inexpensive ..and i use it to document rentals condition.wish it had wi fi .but i love it anyway .

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: It takes a lot of play with the settings to consistently get good clear pictures.  If you know your way around a camera you can do well for cheap with this.  If your an amateur hoping to be carried by Easy Mode I would look elsewhere.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: OK camera for the price. Picture quality varies, and the delay between pictures is LONG, causing you to miss some great shots. Good camera to toss in the glovebox just in case!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This is my favorite digital camera.  I had one that I dropped and broke it.  This is a replacement.  I couldn't live without a Sony digi-cam.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This camera lasted about 45 days before it quit working completely. The battery, despite being plugged in for 24 hours, works for approximately 1 minute. Three screen quality is incredibly poor. Red looks like orange, orange looks like tan, and basically none of the colors look correct. I bought this for my son to use at school but I am definitely not going to buy it again.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: My husband is a bigfan of professional mirror less camera. Therefore, I bought this one for myself to use it. It is lightweight and very good for girl to carry and I usually take it to hiking. The quality of the picture is good enough for a very beginner. The battery can last long as well.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I like everything about this camera, especially the close up factor that I need to sell items on-line.  Oh....  I am 72, and the Booklet that came with it, the printing was smaller than a Bible.  Needed  a Magnifing Glass to read!!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: The product itself has the feel of a piece of junk. It was difficult to insert the battery, and 24 hours of charging and it still had the charging in progress indicator on. I could not turn on the camera, or do ANYTHING with it. Like many others, I would have given this a zero rating, but I had to give it a 1. DON'T BUY IT.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: The description says 21 mega pixels, but its more like just 21 pixels. The only "mega" about this camera is the disappointment you'll get.  Don't get me wrong I know its  a cheap camera, but I was expecting what it promised. (good quality pictures at a cheap price) silly me.,Look, Im not saying it isn't worth the $40 but I've seen better quality pictures from a Pez dispenser. Because of this MEGA SCAM I trust more in the reliability of a torn condom over the "aberg best" product line.  Not sure sure how it got 3.5 stars, I am thinking Russian hackers...and even they couldn't bring themselves to give it 4 stars.,I'am probably going to keep it in a vehicle, for one of those "just in case" moments when a camera may be used as an object to be thrown as a distraction, or be used as door stopper.,Seriously dont spend your money on this camera... It was probably manufactured in the back of a van in the ghetto of china, Its probably flammable AF too.  If after reading my review you MUST buy it, as much as it'll weigh on my conscious, i'll sell you mine.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: It is a very good product. I bought it for my kid. It is better than what I thought. Very cheap and nice product.  I will recommend it for everyone.  Love it

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I m an beginner of photography .This product is perfect for me . I use this camera to record my daily life. The picture quality comes out better than I was expected. Also it’s light weight ,and easy to carry around . Very happy with this camera .

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: A decent camera to play with,  specially if you want to feel how your parents Camara felt like.  The quality is not great as you can expect but you know,  how much you paying for. Cool to have for your filming project. Vintage look

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: It’s great camera! Sooooo cute! The most important thing is low price and good quality!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Really regret buying this, first of all cheap material, I’ve seen toy cameras better than this camera. Also the poor quality of the pictures is by far the worst I’ve seen. I’m not even going to mention the zoom quality cause you can already imagine. Waist of money and waist of time setting it up. I had good expectations that were not met.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Even though this product is not easy on the pocket, it was worth every penny. I am not a professional photographer but I feel like one. If you were to buy this Camara you will enjoy it. I dont even need to do much to transfer files to my phone. The NFC feature will take care of you. Best advice, take time to read the manual as many times as you need. This product was intended to make my presentation great on my website and so far on my social media it's gotten me good compliments.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: We have only had this for almost a week now. We used it this past weekend on a trip to Ohlahoma and it takes great pictures. So far this is an awesome camera. Very satisfied and especially with the extras that came with it. I really don't think you can go wrong with this product.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I am very happy with the camera and package deal that came with it. The camera exceeded me expectation. Very simple to use, with very good pictures and movies. I wish all my purchases were this good. Fast shipping from a very good seller. Great value., Thank you.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: In addition to the camera, you will received an awesome assortment of additional items like a second battery and charger, sim card, multiple lens cleaners, etc.  I purchased this for a June trip to Costa Rica and am looking forward to a great photo memento.  May update review after trip...  practice pics are great!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Amazed at all accessaries included,for instance it came with 2 little tripods. So compact and amazed at the power of this camera. The zoom was more than I anticipated. I took a pic of a mountain range across Lake Granby, in Colorado, and then zoomed in and took a pic and was pleasantly surprised that I could she each tree in the forest. Wow, for such a nice compact camera I couldn’t be happier.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I wanted an inexpensive digital camera for my daughter because she's interested in taking photography in school next year, but wanted to give her an opportunity to use it prior.  Reading many reviews about this particular camera I decided to purchase this model and brand.  I like the fact that, for basically $5+ change you get all the accessories listed.  The camera and accessories came very well packaged and everything seems to be working fine.  My daughter loves the camera and is getting used to all the different features.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Very difficult to use anything but autofocus and that will not take pics through a porch screen.  If I could set the aperture it would be no problem but absolutely unable to do so, even using the manual.  Wish I could return for a different camera but 30 days has passed.  Won't make this mistake with a camera again.  I guess the return window is very short for this dealer.  How can you know whether it works for your purposes within 30 days?  :(

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Takes beautiful pictures and easy to use. Came with tons of fantastic products.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I love this little camera! It's rather spectacular for a point and shoot - I can get clear macro in low light, which is great for museums. I can capture things crystal clear with the telephoto, and then crop to appear MUCH closer. I haven't done much with the video, but it's adequate for my needs.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: The camera looks great but the screen is very blurry and makes you feel your taking bad photos however. When u send them to your phone via the Bluetooth option it’s great. Also many of the products they give you are cheap looking. Still a good camera.

review: It's a little tight around my Canon but works to protect it.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: its a bit snug for the camera

review: Fits my Canon G7X with a spare battery perfectly. If you want small, cushioned and well fitting this is the one.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Stay away from Metgear products at all costs.  These cases make it sound like they will work on so many cameras but the trust is that it hasn’t been tested and probably won’t work on your camera.  Much better products out there in the market.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Really tight fit. Probably won't use it.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Bought this for a Canon G7X as that camera was listed in the description. If you think you're going to wear this thing on your belt and pull your camera out for a quick pic when needed, then you  have another thing coming. It fits very tight on this camera and is difficult to insert and remove it from this case. Bu!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: FITS MY NEED FOR A COMPACT STORAGE KIT

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: This case does NOT fit the Sony RX100 III.  It's too thin.  The case split apart at a corner seam when I tried to put the camera in it.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: It was not dark brown as shown but a much lighter tan shade I have seen referred to as camel which was a major disappointment.  I cut out a section for the lens of my Sony RX100 M3 as described in another review.  I wish someone would offer a version for the Sony RX100 M3.  If so, this would be a great case.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Good quality, good appearance, just a little tight. Definitely no room for anything else in case.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)

I like how it takes regular old batteries,though, any nearby minimart and your powered up again. If your expectations aren't too high, for the price, good basic digicam. 16 mp is bonus.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)

Be sure to buy the package deal that includes the SD card, case, and other items for the best price ( I didn't and had to buy the SD card & case locally).  I particularly like the small size as it fits into my pocket or purse easily.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Pictures come out nice but the battery life is pretty low. I don't think they fit snugly in their places - which would account for the problems there. Some times I just take the batteries out and re-insert them - and they work again.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: What a deal! I've had my camera for a couple months now and I love it. The package comes with so many accessories, this is great for amateur photographers or families wanting something to capture moments beyond a smartphone. The only issue I had was with delivery, it was left in the middle of my porch in the rain. Thankfully I got home before it got too wet and nothing was damaged.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Detachable flash is not compatible, the camera does ok pictures, none of the features like portrait or landscape make any difference in the picture, all are not very sharp, and the flash comes up for every picture unless in the no-flash mode, even in bright light outside. Not happy with it at all but by the time we started using it more it could not be returned.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I'm still a beginner and this camera is amazing, I have a photo of my mom at the beach that I took and edited and a picture of my Starbucks drink when we were leaving the beach,this camera is already amazing, the auto setting is great considering im a beginner and don't know how to do ISO and all of that confusing stuff

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I am new to photography, so I had been doing a decent amount of research, reading reviews, comparing prices...the whole nine yards, before I landed on this Canon Rebel T6 DSLR camera bundle.I feel like I should start first with saying I absolutely love this camera. While I've only had a couple of cheaper cameras that I could call my own, I have used a variety of cameras, but this is my first DSLR....and I LOVE IT! The Canon lens that comes with it is a handy for multiple situations and shooting conditions, as well as the ability to zoom a bit. However, my praises on this bundle, for the most part, start and end with the camera and the Canon lens. Most of the bundle is kind of a joke except for a few choice items, that I should say does still make it worth the additional $20 or so more it is than getting just the camera and lens without the accessories. The bag, SD cards, and SD card reader are all helpful, and are by themselves worth the extra $20 for the included accessory bundle. However, the stand alone flash is not compatible with this camera. The two "lenses" that are included are not really lenses at all, but actually screw on the end of your nice Canon lenses, making your pictures worse. The cheap filters are exactly that, a handful of cheap filters, that I suppose could come in handy, maybe, one day...possibly. I have not tried out the remote switch yet or the lens cleaning kit. And lastly, the tripod is a cheap plastic one that will likely get broken in a matter of a few shows during transport, and will likely need to be replaced. Attached some photos from the camera.,Tl;dr - This bundle is great, and this camera is amazing for someone who wants solid quality for a good price. The accessories that come with it are worth the extra $20.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I really wanted the T6i but this was such an amazing deal and it surpassed my expectations with all that came with the camera for the price. My photos are amazing with this camera. It is perfect for my needs right now.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I ordered this camera kit and was more than happy with the package when it arrived. It is an excellent value and I'm planning on getting a lot of use from it. The box arrived when it was supposed to and was in great condition. Very pleased with this order.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: if you're looking for a step up beginner SLR camera, this is it. And it comes with everything pictured. Tripod, different size lenses, memory cards, filters, such a great deal for this price point. I wanted a beginner camera to use to work on my photography skills and this camera is lightweight, easy to use and takes really good quality photos. highly recommend for beginners and non beginners alike!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I love that the camera came with a lot of beginner essentials - but a lot of the equipment seems very cheap.  I took the camera on vacation with me about a month ago and did not use it as much as I thought I would because of the many different lens.  Overall you probably get what you pay for cheap=cheap camera.  My iphone sadly takes better pictures.  The auto focus is terrible.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Has all items except battery. Seller has taken care of all small small details like cleaning aolution, bag ,etc but intentionally missed battery. Looking at picture , no one can figure out.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This was a Christmas gift for my wife and she loves it. All of the advertised add-ons were in the box. Everything was in it's own package inside the main shipping box. Everything in the box was new, as advertised, and works great. All of the accessories that came in the kit, the Canon EOS T6 camera. The only items my wife has not used is the mini stand and the slave light. She has attached the items to ensure they fit the camera, they do, but has not had to use them as of yet. Overall a great starter DSLR camera.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I take this on vacation and give photos as presents instead of souvenirs. They break easily though, this is the third one I've had. The film quality also seems to have gone down over the past 2 years. Unsure if it's just old film, or they changed their chemicals.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is a cute little camera. It's good for my grandkids to use when they are on a field trip. It's easy to use and the pictures are very clear. They can record their trip memory. The price is good for a kid.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Instructions were very hard to read and you have to be exrra careful to hold camera steady or pictures are blurry

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I brought this as a gift for my mom who will be traveling soon. She doesn’t use a smartphone and this was easy for her to learn how to use. The picture quality was also good. It has nice design and is light weighted.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Bought this for a gift to give to my son and he loves it!Very cute and easy to hold and carry it with him.Works great so far! The picture quality is not as good as I thought, but it is enough for him！

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Great camera, it takes great photos. I have been completely satisfied with my purchase, had not even one issue come up with it.I would purchase it again as its an amazing camera for beginners.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography

The unit appears to be a poor design.  I have never been able to use it as I could not even get it to operate due to the breakdown of the cover door.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G3 X G3X Digital Camera (HotPink)

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G3 X G3X Digital Camera (HotPink)
