review: It fits my Cannon G7X camera however a bit snug putting it in and taking it out.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Perfect for the Nikon 9900.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Fits my Canon G7X mkII like a glove !,Probably wouldn't provide adequate protection for a 3 ft. fall on concrete, but if it was any thicker, the camera, case package would be to large to be considered "pocketable".,I have used similar neoprene cases for my last two pocket cameras, and they survived for many years and many 1000's of images.,(FYI, the Canon G7X mkII is pocketable in this case in a cargo pocket. It's a little chunkier than pocket cameras with less glass. it weighs more too.)

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Nice small size. Camera arrived sooner than expected. Seems to do the job I want it to do.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This camera is very cheaply made.  I had hoped for better from Canon.  Once I charged the battery, I installed it into the camera.  Once the battery door is closed, it gaps open slightly.  A more sturdy design would be better.  And then, the camera wouldn't even power on.  I'm returning it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Pictures not vibrant enough.  My phone takes better pictures. With less megapixels.,It is also slow to take pictures.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I just took this on a trip to Hawaii, and I actually like it better than a larger camera as it is so portable and takes very good photos

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Great camera.  It's a basic unit.  You do need to buy your own computer cable. It's a little tricky transferring photos to a Macintosh.  I like the intuitive camera menu.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: It's a handy little camera. Picture is clear. Don't know all the bells and whistles yet. Had to purchase a memory card separately.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: junk... waiting for refund... scam product!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Great little camera with all the features I need.  Takes great high quality pictures.  Easy to operate.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: So easy to use. Very small slips in a  pocket easy No more digging my phone out. Long lasting battery and very clear pic.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: UPDATE OCT 2016,Canon replaced the camera with a "new or refurbished unit" and this one has been working fine. I am grateful for Canon's warranty work but my sense is not to increase the review rating given that the issue seems quite widespread with this model. Those who are unlucky enough to have it strike after the warranty period are out of luck.,UPDATE SEP 2016,I'm sorry to say this camera has now started experiencing the dreaded focus problems that other reviewers have complained about. It still turns on and lets me select different modes, but will not take a focused picture. I got less than 6 months of use out of it - no drops, spills, or weather exposure. I'll try to get a warranty repair or exchange but I'm not optimistic.,As an aside, I have to say as a long-time Canon photography devotee that this is yet another Canon product that has not lived up to expectations. Other failures have included a Canon mid-level DSLR, 50 mm prime lens, and even a (very expensive) L lens which did give me years of service, but for that price should have given me years more.,***** ORIGINAL REVIEW *****,Long ago when I lived in Japan, I owned an earlier version of this camera when it was called IXY and it only had 4.0 megapixels. I loved it then and I love it now!,Full disclosure: I'm a photography nut and I usually take pictures with a full frame DSLR. In my experience there's simply no substitute for a quality full sized sensor and the lens to go with it.,But the philosophical side of photography tells us that the best picture is the one you get, not the one you missed because your equipment was too heavy or bulky to take with you. This little camera is a point-and-shoot dream. Out of the box, the thing just works. If you stand in the right place, point the camera in the right drection, and push the button at the right moment, you get a well exposed, color balanced, perfectly focused photography. From a camera that will fit in your front jeans pocket.,The battery lasts for a subjective forever - I've taken it on photo-heavy vacation and a single charge lasted most of the week. There are ample customizable modes if you want to tinker - from macro to exposure modes to filters and effects. To be honest, I never use them. The camera is good enough to get me what I need in its default mode. It has saved my bacon more than once when my primary DSLR was unavailable or impractical for the task at hand, and I needed something small and light that could still take a quality picture.,It's not the fanciest or most feature heavy camera you can find, but it's a great little workhorse that I wouldn't hesitate to recommend to anyone.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Kinda tricky to learn how to use the settings on this even with the instruction book, but otherwise it's a really good and affordable camera. I haven't had any issues with it at all.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Good size and takes great pictures as long as you don;t get bumped or move the hand holding the camera.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I saw this $40.99 camera on Amazon, this is cheap and if my son drops it or damages it, I won't have any hard feeling. I don't expect much from it. But it turns out to be better than I expected.,It comes with 2 batteries, carrying pouch and strap.,It is very light and small.,This camera has proper flash and not the LED flash like those on the phone. This is powerful, sometimes I feel it is a bit too powerful and make the image a bit washout when it is too close to the object.,Usually with my other cameras, you can touch the lens easily and get the fingerprint mark on the lens. But the lens on this camera is very far back in the small hole, which you won't be able to get the finger to touch the camera lens. The LCD screen on the camera is not good, if you view the photo on the computer, the photo will be better than on the camera screen.,Photo quality is very reasonable for this cheap camera.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: It takes great pictures for an inexpensive camera. My 7 year old can use it quite easily. The only complaint is that it absolutely DEVOURS standard alkaline batteries.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Small, easy to use.  Will be a good camera to pack in my purse.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Great little camera - great for the price.  I bought as a gift but tested it first.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Impressive little camera.  Great first camera for young child.  Easy for child to learn to operate.  Easily recharges.  Like that they added an extra battery.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: The whole camera is just meh. There is nothing great about the camera it's small its light. The end picture quality is like an store security camera, any print you order all come out grainy no matter where we ordered from. Even on the computer the pic was odd quality. The battery life was good it was longer then expected. You still have to have a cd driver disk to transfer files to your computer so if like most  modern computers you dont have a cd reader you may have some issues. Without a sd card you can only take one pic. The navigation is not intuitive and the camera even lost 10 pictures for half a day before bring them back. If you are getting IT to travel light or for a child's camera it's fine but it would not work as your main camera

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: For a $40 camera this is of a decent quality. This is perfect as a gift for a child as their first camera. Most kids now uses their phones so this is a great way for them to learn how a camera works without burning a hole in your wallet!

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: We received this today, and unfortunately the lens wouldn't open when turned on. It would click repeatedly like it was trying to open, but couldn't. Yes, it's a cheaper end camera. We were buying it for our kids to use at camp this summer. Still, even with the cost, disappointed it wouldn't work straight out of the box. We'll be returning it and buying a different brand.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: The 2 AA battery drain pretty quickly and if you didn't bring back up batteries your out of luck. Otherwise it's not a bad camera. That is the only down fall I have noticed with the camera so far.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: picture not as good of quality as my Easy Share, but is a good starter camera for my daughters 4-H projects.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Very poor picture quality. Tried all settings and still very blurry. So disappointing as a gift for my daughter.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I'm not impressed with this camera. I purchased this camera for concerts, as they are becoming so stingy with what devices you bring into the place. I figured if it didnt have a lenses that zoomed then you wouldn't have an issue getting into the venue. While that aspect the item did work, I had ZERO issues getting into venue. THE CAMERA IS TERRIBLE. Terrible quality. Terrible audio, Terrible graphics, Terrible EVERYTHING. The buttons stick, and the camera is HARD TO OPERATE. And IM A NETWORK AND COMPUTER TECH! I've been RAISED AROUND TECHNOLOGY, and usually NEVER need instruction manuals. The manual is like a deciphering code book full of equations that you dont have or know the answers too, it doesnt explain ANYTHING! Just please do yourself a favor! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!! It was a waste of my money and not worth my time.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: A digital camera at a reasonable price, I can take it on vacation. When I saw this camera, I really liked its smooth appearance. It was very light and had a belt around its wrist, which helped keep it stable when taking pictures. I like this camera with rechargeable batteries! The battery will last a long time before I recharge it again. I don't have to worry about buying batteries. That's good. You just charge it with the power cord attached to it and it's ready to use. The 3-inch LCD screen is so big that you can see the image clearly before taking a picture, which I like very much. It also makes it very easy to shoot videos. After a few days, I was very satisfied with my purchase. I watched all the pictures and videos I took with this camera, and the results were great! This camera not only meets my requirements, but also exceeds my expectations. If you are looking for a reasonable price digital camera, it can take very clear photos and high quality video, this is a camera for you!

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Very disappointed that a Kodak brand was so cheaply made and the company has this one on the market.  The lens won't even open.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Broke on the first use and never worked again!  Terrible product!  Don't buy it....waste of money!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This camera is very lightweight and easy to use. However, the main issues I've had had to do with the CD (I don't know if my CD-ROM drive is going bad or what...), but in installing the drivers so I can upload photos from the camera to my computer, the CD never started or the screen for installation didn't come up. I had to go looking for the installation folder to get it to run. Once I got installed, I opened it so that I could download the few photos I took. Unfortunately, it showed a camera that I no longer have, and even clicking refresh in Photags didn't bring up the ABcam/Aberg Best. I was not able to locate the SD card on my computer to manually upload the photos. When I clicked on the link to go to the manufacturer's website, I got a warning from Microsoft Edge saying that my IP/server had notified someone that I was trying to do something regarding pornography! In order for me to continue using the computer, I had to call the Windows Online Help in order to resolve the issues. There is no way of contacting the manufacturer to obtain help immediately. I need to purchase an SD card reader in order to upload the photos.,If you're wanting a camera that you'll have to take to Walmart or one of the many pharmacies with a photo area in order to get hard copies, this camera is ok. The other thing I'd noted is that when I took pictures using the 21MP setting, they appear blurry and out of focus when viewing them on the LCD screen. At the lower MP settings, they appear to be perfect! I've used the 14, 16 and 18MP settings. As soon as I am able to upload the photos to show the difference, I will do so.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This camera is easy to use But not good quality. Gunna return

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This is garbage.  Flash too slow, takes blurry pictures, and the buttons and on-screen icons are difficult to manipulate.  cheap plastic, not a good camera at all.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Our 14 year old granddaughter loves the whole package of camera equipment and it will come in handy for the photography classes she’s taking in high school. She has been taking photos and loves how easy it is to upload into her iPad and computer.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Great price for the amount of stuff you get. The camera is fantastic. I am not a professional by any means and this camera makes it easy to take pictures that look pretty darn close to being professional.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I am a beginner and use this for personal purposes and this set was perfect. It had everything I needed to get started. The picture quality is amazing and the pre set functions help a ton. Uploading pictures has always been quick and easy. Battery life is way beyond what I ever expected. Great purchase!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I have had this camera for about a year and after 3 months of using it, the camera/lens started making my photos bend. I know longer have straight lines when taking photos. No one seems to be able to solve the problem. Don't bother getting it in a kit, there is no use for all the extra crap they throw in there. Go for a Nikon!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Alot of the products that were included were pointless.  I also had a error message on the screen continuously that wouldn't come off and STILL wont... The 8 pictures that I was able to take are nice though!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Can we rate this a 10 star instead of 5?  I surprised our middle daughter for her birthday and she went crazy.  Will need a lot of time to review all the information and gadgets in the box but the quality is unbelievable.  Such a great product with a bundled kit that we might even buy one for us since we'll probably never see hers!  She's always out shooting more photos with it!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I have been a Canon camera person for over 30 years and I will remain one for many years to come, This Canon Rebel takes amazing pictures and if you know how to use the features as I do it is also great for videos and sporting events. I am brand loyal because I have never been let down using my Canon products, I have only always just upgraded.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: It was a gift item for a serious-want-to-be student photographer.  The only questions I have is that since you have provided just about everything that are needed for a SLR camera user, why don't you throw in a lens shade as well?

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This is perfect for a first camera, trust me when I say this, it works so easily, battery lasts long, great pictures, like amazing professional quality, I've been hired for many photography jobs because of the camera's quality and ability. I've owned it for a year so far, never broken, very sturdy, love everything about it!!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is great! It takes super high quality photos, is easy to use (you can make it as easy or as hard as you want based on which mode you're in). Plus all of the stuff it came with was awesome! This was my first camera so having a nice starter pack was super helpful! Highly recommend this camera!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I love this camera.  I wanted a beginner camera that take pro pics and I got it!  I have just begun to play around with it but I love it already.  It takes great pics and the price was great.  The bundle came with a lot more than I thought it would.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: So I got this camera because I’m really into photography and wanted a more professional look to my photos. It sounded like the perfect camera for beginners. I was really excited for it to arrive but once it did and I opened it I was quite disappointed. My iPhone takes better pictures than that!I kept trying the camera out to try and convince myself that it was worth the money but it just wasn’t. Everything else that came with it was great though but I just wouldn’t recommend getting this.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this camera because I thought I lost my other camera. While I had just got this camera I found my other one. Although this one is amazing for beginners I love my other camera more!! Definitely would recommend though!!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this for my 12 year old grandsons Christmas present. He hasn’t seen it yet but I am thrilled with the size. It will be a great starter camera for a budding photographer. We have had several Cannon cameras so I’m sure it will be fine. I love the accessories. It was even delivered early. Would recommend this seller and camera package.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: this camera is amazing! the second picture has a filter on it but i love this camera and all of its accessories!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: The clarity of the image is great. The zoom works well and with practice becomes easier.  The image stabilization while shooting on zoom is difficult but again with practice and patience you become proficient.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I immediately had to return this product. Although all the goodies that came with the camera were wonderful, the camera itself left much to be desired. The price was so nice that I jumped at the opportunity but the truth is: if you want a good camera, wait until you have the money to buy a great one. If you want a whatever-I-just-want-pictures camera, go for this one. It's cheap (comparatively) and it works just fine.,But if you're looking for a steady picture with vivid colors and good focus, do not consider this camera!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Fast service, great product.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this gift as a birthday present after a couple of months of searching for the perfect camera. The pictures come out amazing and the zoom is outstanding. We even took a picture of a fly on a ceiling just to see how good the quality would be! We got the camera came with everything included and it got here in less than a week. Also, the camera has wifi which i didnt realize could be connected to a phone so i was able to send pictures to the phone from the camera and take pictures using the phone app!! This was an awesome bonus!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is unbelievable!  It’s easy to use, takes awesome telephoto and macro shots.  Love the Wi-fi.  So much easier to move photos.  Couldn’t be happier.  Exceeded my expectations.  All of the extras in the bundle were great too.  Everything you need in one box.  Would make a terrific gift!  A great buy.  Arrived right on time.  Highly recommend.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This is a sweet little camera.  It is easy to use and so small.  Everything arrived on time and in good condition.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: The camera was delivered quickly and it is easy to set up and use. The only thing people need to be aware of is to make sure you get all the add ons like the usb cable and the flash drive if you are planning to transfer pictures and do not already have the necessary add ons.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Lightweight and easy to use

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Bought for vacation, very easy setup, takes good pictures, a little small for my hands, love the accessories that came with the camera especially rechargeable battery and cases.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: It was the perfect starter set for our daughter who is just getting into photography. It has everything she needs

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I needed a camera that would take excellent pictures of our Koi Pond and the Koi.  This camera is all that and more.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Works well. Guidebook is somewhat limited

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I was surprisingly pleased with the package that I received.  The accessories are great.  I am especially amazed at the multi-slot USB card reader because I have a lot of different memory cards from various devices and I was able to load them and transfer files to an SD card.  The mini tripod is easily collapsible.  I liked the SD card storage pouch although one of the pockets was not attached (the thread came loose).  I tried to use the screen protector, but I couldn't get it smoothed out, and I didn't like the bubbles  due to lack of clarity on the screen.  The camera case is just right for the camera and SC card storage, but nothing else.  The BEST part of the package is the Canon camera.  I was replacing a Polaroid digital camera that had a larger screen; but I couldn't be more pleased with the photos from this camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Great gift to an aspiring photographer. Or someone needing a great little camera.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: The item is exactly as how it is described. My job requires lots of picture taking and this little camera is perfect for that. Quality is definately there and it is very light weight so I like that I can carry it everywhere in my purse. Recommended for those who need better-than-phone quality pictures!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I wasn't expecting much from this, I only wanted a camera that was a) cheap and b) would provide a better quality image than the average smart phone camera. But the image quality is truly amazing.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I am a heavy duty mechanic and my job requires me to take photos of my work for backup and I saw how inexpensive this camera was and said why not. But this camera does not meet to any of the standards that it says it does and now I have to buy another camera to have a better quality picture

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Bought this for my wife to replace a camera with a broken battery door. She loves it. Easy to use, very light and small for the amount of features it has.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Great pictures and small

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: My 11 year old granddaughter got this for her birthday.  She loves it and her pictures are fabulous, she is in training for the photographer position in the family one day..  Easy to use, easy to carry, small, perfect all around camera

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Poor camera.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Buttons and functions are pretty basic and easy to use.Picture quality is good and capture speed is decent as well.Good little camera simple to use and takes good pictures

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: LOVE this camera.. it's so fun and takes super cute pics. The only issue is the power button is easy to turn on, so if you put it in a bag, it might turn on or off by accident.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Perfect for going out of town and wanted something to capture quick photos without having to worry about bringing your expensive one and risk losing it

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is a great product for the price​ you can't go wrong,The video​ quality stunning,Great camera for the price. Needs an sd card.buy separately.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: great camera for sporting events and outdoor photography in the light, Hauling around a big lensed DLSR id just not practical most of the time so this gets good shots quickly with ease of carry. The battery lasts surprisingly a long time although I don't use the rear display that often which usually uses a lot of battery. All in all it takes pretty good long shots and is good for sporting shots when I select the sport scene mode the scene modes work well.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I recently purchased this camera after my previous Lumix fell off the table. I went to my local camera shop to see the different brands out there and liked this one. I went home to research it and was happy with the reviews. I found this cheaper at Amazon and purchased it. When I went on vacation recently, I enjoyed having this camera with me. The zoom is amazing and the picture quality was beautiful, I am no pro at taking pictures and I will probably never use all the functions but, this camera is incredible! I have tried uploading a picture 3 times to this review but it isn't working. This camera is definitely worth the purchase!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am truly surprised with what this camera can do. 4K video at 30 FPS is a great feature to have that no other price points have even dared to include. Beautiful photos and the zoom is unbelievable.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Awesome camera. It does everything well! This is a hybrid camera. It has the full functionality of an SLR, but the ease of use of a point and shoot. The ability to control the depth of field is taken to a level of simplicity that is genious (there is a wheel that is also a depressable button that changes control mode... aperture, shutter speed, etc.), allowing for "on the fly" control of the lens.  Sometimes it seems a bit slow to focus on distant objects, but when it does, the optics prove they are excellent and the pictures of objects taken at high distance (even in low light) are amazing. Highly recommend!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I bought this camera for a "Bucket List" trip to Yellowstone and the surrounding areas. I took over 1500 pix of landscapes and animals. This camera always came on and focused very quick. I took photos of 4 wolves close to 3/4 mile away. You can tell they're wolves. I have a slight shaking in my hands and the fz 70 even took Most of that out. INCREDIBLE SHOTS. Moving at 70mph. Low light. Long shots. Battery lasted over 500 shots. Close ups on flowers. The only glitch is when you're wanting to take a longer shot and the camera focuses on something closer, electric lines, leaves, etc. I usually could step one way or the other and problem solved.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I used this on a media trip and was completely impressed with the quality and the ease of use. The touch screen was a breath of fresh air from my other cameras and the preinstalled setting modes were amazing. Check out the quality of the pics I posted - all settings in the camera. I didn't have to touch anything manually.,My only issue was figuring out the WiFi. I haven't had the patience to go through the manual, but it was easy enough to pull from the SD card.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love this camera.  Since it's no longer made and you`re able to find one at this price, buy it!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Yes, 60X zoom. Really! And if you lower your picture quality, meaning you do not take a 16M picture but set it to 5M or 3M, you get 135X zoom.,I took pictures of faces 300 feet away, clear and smooth.,It has a great anti-shake as well.,This camera can be used completely auto (for beginners) and completely Manual, completely! Shutter speed, ISO, F stop, everything manual.,Only a few days old, mine is. I took about 100 pictures so far. IMPRESSIVE!,The manual is simply worded, easy to understand. Nothing special explained but the on-board programming makes it idiot simple.,And the camera is completely fool-proof.,So If I were you, get one. It is not even expensive. How to check it? Browse Amazon.com for 60X cameras and see.,Anyway, I am completely pumped with this toy.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is the best camera have ever had. it uses a MOS sensor which is much more accurate and clear than CMOS that is used everywhere. (GOOGLE MOS VS CMOS). the 60x lens with image stabilization is amazing. you will hear the little stabilization motors running when it is zoomed out. it has great wide angle at the other end. the battery lasts way longer than any point and shoot. it has dozens of modes to shoot under. I bought a 64gig chip for it.,Don't hesitate to get this camera. I did lots of research and comparisons and this one wins hands down. I am an electrical engineer ... total geek and nurd.,larry ponziani

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This has been my main youtube camera for pretty much a year now and the only reason I'm upgrading is because in the tech community its all about the video quality and I just needed to upgrade to a DSLR camera. But other than that I'd say that this is a really killer camera for the price. You can get some great photo and video out of this thing and it has killer zoom. 60X!!! So if you wanna see some photo and videos that this camera can produce go check out my youtube channel AppsOnFire for my camera test of this camera!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Can’t believe that canon made this camera, seemed very generic and cheap

review: This camera was perfect and with the accessories it work out perfect for us.

review: Excellent fast service! My daughter really loves the camera!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I got this as a starter camera for my son who is taking 6th grade photography.  It was very easy to navigate and he's well on his way.  Pictures look good and he's having loads of fun!  Good package deal.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I like the camera just fine. It's very similar to Olympus Stylus. What I don't like is the recommended Sandisk card that came with it. After looking at very reviews it appears this card is not reliable. Although I program my camera to sequence the pictures to "auto reset", it still records the pictures with random/out of sequence numbers. Since I use the camera for business, it's important to me to store picture file sequentially from project to project. If I shoot multiple projects in one day, I need to manually sort through pictures.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Cant say much since it was a Christmas gift for a 10 year old girl.  When I hear more, I will let you know.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Bought for a gift.The bundle has everything you need.Easy to setup.Seller communication excellent,Highly recommend!!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Just as described. Nice little point and shoot camera with the resolution to give my pics on Ebay a nice crisp look.,Camera phones only go so far this is so much better quality.Shipping was extremely quick and packing was fine. I downloaded the guide from Sony online and am good to go.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: 3 Stars,Has a non universal USB port.  Great little camera, but I don't like the fact that it dosen't use a standard Mini or micro USB port.  At 20MP 5152 x 3864 resolutions the camera does a great job indoors with the flash and assuming the object is close to the camera as well as outdoor lighting.  Image quality is great for the price.  The picture size is average around 8MB compared to an I-Phone 6 at 2MB.,Pros.,Image Quality is better than expected for this price.,Does have 8x opical zoom,Cons.,Does not use a standard micro or even a mini USB like everything else I have.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I was needing a small camera for product photography. I have a dslr, but wanted something smaller and comparable to a smart phone when it comes to quality and portability. After much research, I settled on the Sony DSCW830. Partially because of the reviews & price, and partially because my current dslr is a older Sony model which has a similar menu. I've already taken a bunch of test shots with it, and so far I'm really digging it. Now, don't get me wrong, this wont replace your dslr camera. I wouldn't use this to take action shots. This would not be my "go to" camera on Christmas morning, as it takes entirely too long for it to snap the picture ... However, for my needs it's perfect. The macro setting is where this camera really shines, as it takes very crisp photos of small subjects. It also seems to perform well for taking shots where the subject can sit still and pose for you. The video quality is more than sufficient and seems just as good, if not better than most smart phones. The battery life is good for this size of camera, and it charges up pretty quickly. All in all, it's a good little budget friendly camera if you use it for the right things.,Pros-,Size,Value,Quality,Easy menu system,Good for shooting 'still' subjects,Cons-,Doesn't come with a case,Not good for taking action shots

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I had an older Sony digital camera (14 MP) which was significantly superior to this version.,Unfortunately, I dropped it on a rock and it stopped working, that was the reason for buying this camera. I am not very happy with this newer version.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Excellent camera. I bought it for my wife for Christmas and she almost seems like it grew from her hand. She loves it.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The camera seems OK, but the light that is supposed to indicate it is charging does not come on.  The seller claims they do not do "trouble shooting", as if somehow the light can be made to come on, so they said I should contact Sony.  I don't see the point in exchanging the camera, since another one might have worse problems.  Perhaps there is a quality control issue here.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: ordered the camera last month and discovered after downloading photos that there appeared to be a "black smudge" in the upper left corner of each picture.  I returned the camera this week and have already received a replacement, but noticed that there is a shadow (pink-colored) in the view finder when taking pictures.  As yet, I have not confirmed that this shows up in the final pictures, but am disappointed that I'm still having some issues with this camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This replaced a Nikon I had. I had lots of issues with the Nikon cool shots. I decided to go to a sony. Seems like a good camera. Had if for a while now and its good easy to use. Much like the cool shots.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: A truly awesome camera. I have a medical condition that makes my hands shaky. I am trying to take pictures of items I am selling, but the pictures came out so blurry, they were unusable. I was very frustrated. Whit this Sony camera with "Optical Steady Shot image Stabilization" I can take good picture again. Most of my pictures are not only clearer, but many of my pictures bring out amazing details. I could not begin to talk about the many other features, a truly great camera at a very good price.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it. She thinks it's really kewl that when she pointed it at her baby sister it said "hey that's a baby!" and it switched to baby mode. Not kidding. It does take beautiful pictures!

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I bought this camera, and admittedly I was a little skeptical because of the reviews I have seen that have been posted. However, after purchasing the camera and using it myself I can honestly say that I don’t know how half of these reviews came to be. One review demo’d the video quality and when I watched the video the video quality didn’t look that great. Now that I have the camera and can view things personally, I can say that the camera actually has pretty good image quality. I would say it might even come close to IPhone picture quality and that’s saying something. The additional lens is pretty nice. There’s just certain shots you want to be super close up on.,Thank you for reading my review, If you found it helpful I would really appreciate the helpful vote.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This digital camera is amazing I bought this camera because I have four kids and I’m one of those moms who takes tons of pictures of everything my kids do lol I’ve owned several different digital cameras and honestly this camera is one of my favs by far it really does take wonderful pictures the pictures don’t come out kinda blurry like some other camera the pictures are surprisingly clear very impressed this camera is super easy to use and change the lens truthfully the camera is very lightweight I can just stick it in my purse with no problems which is always a plus for me ❤️

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Bought this to replace my branded mirrorless camera as i have dropped it and it broke into several pieces. the price for this is competitive. i am just an amateur user for camera so having read the instructions more or less it is easy to operate and use it. Pictures are clear and crisp as it can be. the design can be comparable when the point and shoot digital camera first appear on the market. Design is a classic one so i really liked it. Wifi connection is superb and it removes the inconvenience when copying photos over to a device.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I needed a camera for my Vlogging, and picture taking. I wanted something that is good quality and not so expensive. When I purchased this, I was not too sure about the quality, but after I tried it, I was amazed. The lens changing is a big plus, and the weight is just right. I found that setting up the recording or taking picture is very easy, and the quality and price are just right. I’m happy with this purchase and the way the camera looks. Recommended

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This camera is light and easy to use. The style is very noglastic for me. The camera comes not 1 but 2 rechargeable batteries which is a plus. You do have to plug the charger into the camera to charge it up. There’s no separate battery charger. I also wished the flip out screen could rotate but at this price point, it’s pretty good. The photo and audio quality is decent but can get a little blurrier when zoomed at its maximum. It’s a great compact camera.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: it really has a very good image quality the photos come out very clear and take very long distance photos very clear the battery is very durable when it has a bag where you keep the camera very nice so that the camera does not scratch or anything I loved

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Good quality and affordable. I like the classic look. The style reminds me of the early days when I had a film roll camera.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This camera is very easy to set up and use. It comes with an ultra-wide lens which is able to capture images vividly I love the fact that it has wifi function. so I can view and edit on the go. The battery last pretty long and sufficient. More importantly, it can be used as a webcam if you just happen to Skype somebody. The image quality is pretty good as well.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I like this camera because it's small and not too heavy like my older camera. I brought this on our beach trip last week. So far it's all good. The quality of pictures and videos were fine. It's not that bad! Battery were great too, it lasted for a day. It might not be one of those high tech camera. But this one is very cute and fancy. I like it.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This camera is small and cute. It is very easy to set up and use. The picture quality is really good.  I am surprised by how well it works for how little it costs. I can definitely recommend this to everyone, especially those who are tight on budget but needed something that will allow them to capture the moment.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Lost my camera case on a recent trip. This case fit nicely and will protect my camera, which is what I wanted. Nice case for the price.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: This is truly an "ultra light" case that keeps a "pocket size" camera pocket sized. It snugly fits my enormous Canon G7X Mark II to the point that I didn't think it would when I first opened it.  I like that the underside flap partially covers the side of the camera so the camera won't just slip out if the top flap is opened.  Velcro attachment is solid, and it has a belt loop and a hook for attaching to different things.  It doesn't enclose the camera on all sides as there are small openings on either side of the top flap when it's closed, but it will absolutely protect the camera from scratches, dirt and an occasional splash of water.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Good snug fit, but neoprene is a little too soft a material for securing a camera to your belt-- at least the way they've sewn it together.  The belt piece ripped out sending my camera to the floor (and I was on a boat-- could have gone into the water).  I've sewn it back together and expect it to last, which is why it got two stars.  Good fit, and decent soft protection if you want to throw your camera in your backpack instead.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Though a bit snug, this case offers very good protection.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Excellent cushion and not bulky. Camera feels safe, which was my #1 goal. Fits my camera perfectly as advertised. There's a little lip to help secure the camera so it doesn't easily fall out, but personally I dislike this feature.  I want to be able to quickly pull out the camera to take a quick photo rather than have to fight with it to get the camera out of the case (which happened to me many many times during a recent vacation).  Also, I didn't feel comfortable using the included plastic clip to secure my expensive camera. I broke it off and replaced it with a carabiner.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Really liked this small bag. fits well. protects my camera very well too. Thank you

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Nice case for my canon G7X (Good fit)

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Good tight fit.  In fact it's TOO good.  If it's on your belt, it takes two hands, torquing your body awkwardly, to cram it in the case.  Once in, it's like it's been swallowed up.  When you see that must have shot and you need to get the camera quickly, good luck.  It takes another two hands to get it out.  I'm sending it back and I never send stuff back, but this is horrible.  Avoid.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: It fits the Canon G7X but too snugly for me.  Hard to remove the body.  Just too form fitting. Padding is good but I prefer a harder, more roomy case. I wrote MegaGear and they refunded my purchase.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: The case fit well and seemed good... I would have given it 4 stars. BUT... After only using it a small number of times on my belt (I would guess 5-6) I heard a clunk and was surprised to find my camera on the ground. My canon g7x sustained a small scratch as the case didn't protect it. The case's belt loop had torn free of the case, rendering it useless.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Perfect for my 9 year old!! He loves taking pics and this is a great camera for him to start with!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I had to return my first order because it wouldn’t turn on. That process was easy. I re-ordered the second one and it came quickly. Look at the price...for the money, you get a lot of bells and whistles that you would pay a lot more for. But you do get what you pay for - I’m using this camera rather than my phone in Europe...the battery should last most if not all day and the pics will uploaded to my computer afterwards for cropping, fixing etc. For the price - don’t expect a state of the art Nikon...but my camera dealer was amazed with all the features, pixels and price. Although - he NEVER HEARD OF the camera!!!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Do not buy fourty dollar cameras off Amazon. UNLESS! You like to take photos from a foot away and you are four years old.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I wanted a small camera that I could carry at all times, with a descent optical zoom and not pay to much for. Picture quality is great for this size of camera and it is very easy to use.Has some great settings on it to get some cool effects and the video quality is brilliant.  like , white balance, image resolution, zoom I have not had a chance to test all of the camera functions, but the ones I had needed have worked well

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Perfect camera for little ones and for basic photos. Small screen. Hard to get sd card out. You can't playback sound on videos (it records though so you can listen to the sd card on another device) with all these cons I'd still recommend this as a gift for a child 8-12 years old as their first little camera,Update July, 2019,It's 7 months and camera not working. I emailed the company - Albergs, and within minutes after I explained my issue they gave me a refund. I strongly recommend them. A company that backs their products!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This is a nice little camera. It's best used outside. It has a small mirror on the front so you can set up a selfie. It has a full frame and a portrait mode. The portrait mode is kind of a zoom feature. The best thing is it came with two batteries. I took this to the to the amusement park near us and took lots of pictures and never had to use the second battery. I managed to forget to take pictures that did not include my family members. The camera is an auto focus. The flash works well but if taking indoor pictures I would use a tripod.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I bought this low cost camera for my tween daughter to try her hand at digital photography.,I don't want her to have phone but she wants to take photos.  This was a great fit and the price was right.,We're not talking about the height of professional photography here so this is a great fit.  Small and portable.  easy and simple to use.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: A company shouldn't be allowed to sell on amazon without instructions in English.  My opinion.  Tried to print out the pdg file but 34 pages was too much for my old printer.  Out of paper, out of ink, and too small.  It should be mentioned in their ad that the instructions are not in English. Will probably return.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: * There's a little slider on the side of the camera which changes the focal point from near to far. There doesn't appear to be any automatic focus between these two points, which can result in some blurry pictures.,* Charging port uses a USB Mini B jack, which is pretty unconventional compared to the standard Micro USB jack, making it sort of a pain to need to use an alternate charger + wire for this device.,* Has decent battery life,* No issues with reading/writing to an SD card. It doesn't come with one, but that's fine.,* Camera's functionality and UI feels like it was designed somewhere in the early 2000s.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I saw same bad reviews about this camera. Frankly speaking, you should not compare this one with an expensive digital camera. Its not an expensive camera. You get what you pay for. It is fancy and light for the kid. My kid enjoys the new toy. Two batteries give him extra fun time. I won't give him a chance to touch / damage my Nikon.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I like taking photographs. I've never taken a how to but with this camera and some help from youtube I think I'm taking some cool pictures. Maybe not :) It seems to be easy to work with and the settings are opk for me. Now time to gain a collection of lenses for different ratios etc....

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I have really enjoyed my new camera and the nice kit that came along with it. I was like a kid in the candy store opening my new present to myself. This camera is great for someone just starting into the real photography world. It is really easy to handle and to is a good solid product.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Got this for my son, he needed a camera for a college class. The picture quality is amazing! The zoomed in pictures come out really nice and clear! My son took a picture of the moon on a clear night and you can see the detail very well on the moon, it's a really nice camera. He loves it!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I actually purchased this because I needed a DSLR camera for a digital photography course that is required for my design major. I had little knowledge of photography or digital cameras before buying. This is definitely a great camera for beginners cause it comes with literally everything you might need to start out right. I probably read the directions for a good five minutes and found out it was better to play around with some of the semi-auto settings on my own and even went full on into manual mode to snap some shots. I'd say with all the stuff you get in this package it's a great value for the amount you spend.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: It is a great Camera, Takes amazing photos but it freezes and then struggles to capture a picture if you use it to often. I am a growing photographer and it seems endless with this problem. I have had the camera since march. And it conitnue to become sluggish and freezes more frequently. I take amazing care of the Camera.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I’m NEW to cameras..so I took a good friend with me to Best Buy to look for a camera I could get great pictures with and start off with something nice! She does this for a living so her Advice was super important! Anyways Best Buy has this same camera (just the camera) for a hundred dollars more with nothing else with it! So this bundle deal is the BEST! For right now all I can say is I’m having fun with this camera and so happy I finally purchased this! Couldn’t be happier with it!!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: So far camera is excellent value. The add-on lens turned out to be not much benefit.  Only thng missing was camera is not good at fireworks type picture taking.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is more than I could have thought to ask for! Its my first camera that isn't a simple pocket sized camera. I was nervous about using it, but it has been a breeze to learn. All the accessories make it a perfect option for starting out. Bonus, my kids are learning with me!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Such a good package deal.  You aren't getting a professional photographer's lens but this lens is SO GOOD! I've used it for food photos, my kids baseball/soccer games and the action shots are clear and excellent.  I already had two shots enlarged and the pixels are beautiful.  I'm so happy with this purchase.  Highly,  highly recommend buying this camera.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This has been the best purchase I've ever made on Amazon. The price point for everything you receive is the best deal around. Everything arrived timely, together and nothing was missing or dented/damaged. The camera is fantastic. It's very user friendly and the extra features are great. If you're interested in photography but don't know where to start, start with this camera!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This is a bad choice so move on to another.,Picture quality is terrible and color very washed out.,Time to process is very slow so no rapid fire shots.,I usually use my phone and did this last trip (to colorful Ireland).,Comparing the same scene shots and the (low end) phone comes up the winner by far.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I bought this camera mainly for work purposes. I have a Cannon Rebel XS DSLR, and this camera in no way compares to the quality of it. Of course I wasn't expecting it to. For this review I will focus on indoor shots of about 25 feet or under. I will start by saying low light, and even no light, performance is excellent. I tested it in my completely dark bedroom and the picture turned out as if it were brightly lit. I will say now that the colors do trend on the warm side. Subject tracking is a nice feature, great for moving objects, such as pets, and for people who have had to much coffee. It has an "Easy Mode" which is great for good casual shots, but I think that it's a little TO simple. It simplifies the menu choices to one: large images or small images. I personally think they should had left all of the sizes selectable in this mode. Video is limited to 1280x720, but this is more than enough for close up movies. The rated battery life is fairly short at 100 minutes, but this is most likely due to the viewscreen. Additional batteries are, as of this review, under $13 for the Sony battery NP-BN1, and half that for generics, which is very inexpensive for a camera battery. It charges via a special USB cable, which I hate, instead of a standard USB Type B which all small electrical devices seem to charge from, so be careful that you don't damage it. The included AC Adapter connects through the USB cable as well, and outputs 0.5A, so it is no faster than charging it from any other USB source.,All in all I would say this is a great camera for taking pictures up close, under 20 feet ideally. It's compact size, portability, features, and low cost make it a great camera for close up shots. It's not close to a DSLR quality, and I wouldn't think about using it to record once in a lifetime memories, but it's also less than 10% of the cost of a DSLR, and a great item to have around.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Sham on soney, check on line, too many common problem, mine too so I returned it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: It came with everything noted, but also with the shoulder strap for the camera case, which one reviewer mentioned they didn't get. Most of this stuff I don't know what to do with, so will leave in their boxes until I figure them out ("USB multicard reader/writer", tripod (extends to 8 "), LCD/lens cleaner, memory card wallet, SanDisk Ultra 32GB SD Card (it says 16 mp photo/7 mb file size = 2000 and video (mpeg-4/H.264, 1920x1080 @30fps) in minutes = 40), and some odd Focus Squeegee card w fluid and Qtips and a floppy card w a grid and ruler printed on it (does anyone know what this stuff is for?), 1 battery, the charger (also a charger for the car and a converter for European plugs!).,Even though I don't know what everything is, it is still a good deal for a small point and shoot camera. And it is definitely a very small camera, but that's how they come, these days.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: I am a senior...travel a lot...am NOT smart phone fan....I needed a simple , high quality camera to keep in my pocket while traveling. This one suits my needs perfectly....compact...has all the needed features. I had a Nikon ...time to replace....it actually had too many features.,Buying this as a package with what you need....is simple and easy....and you are ready to go!  All in all...great value...delivered two days with Prime! Life is good even when you get old....keep it simple!!!  My career marketing...learned that too many features...more things to fail...best to buy one step above the basic....last longer!!

After hours of research, I was still hesitant to shell out big money due to budgetary constraints. Then, I came across the Canon PowerShot 180 bundle. All I can say is, I'm completely satisfied with this camera, It's a great value, takes wonderful pictures, and has a bundle of accessories included. Run to your computer (or walk) and check out what's being offered! Few purchases please me as much, and I make dozens annually, mostly through Amazon.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm is II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Flex Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: For the price, I felt this was one of the best deals out there. For a beginner like me, the Canon Rebel T7 is a perfect starter camera as it gives the ability to use manual mode where you can control things like the ISO, Aperature, and shutter speed, but also several auto modes for those who just don't want handle those options. The lenses were all great; however, the 500mm felt like overkill unless you're into certain types of photography. I've been able to get some great shots with all lense. The carrying bag is also a great starter for lens storage. Really happy and excited to venture deeper into photography with this bundle.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm is II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Flex Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: As most people I'm not a professional. I've been looking to purchase a camera for months now.  I've read many reviews and it seems like Canon is a good brand for beginners.  So far I'm in love. Between Canon and YouTube videos I've gotten a better understanding on how to use it.  I plan to use it during vacations and hiking.  My camera bundle came in a large box but within that a medium sized one.  I'm glad nothing was punctured,  ripped or torn. Everything came perfectly packaged.  I've tested every item and haven't had any issues. This is my new obsession.

Overall seems like a nice camera with no regrets purchasing it.,Has been using a lot more. It has quit a few features and still figuring out some of them. Takes really nice photo's.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Focusing issues are too numerous and too often for my being able to find it acceptable. I am returning the camera. But for the sake of others here is what I have found,The LCD is inadequate and difficult to see when you need it most in direct sunlight as it does not pop out to swivel but for a guy who does most of his photography in bright sunny Florida the viewfinder is my preferred method for completing images.  The viewfinder is bright enough but is of poor quality and considering this has such as large zoom range, having a good EVF is very important. There is the ability to change the brightness of the LCD screen and many users are not aware there is a framing grid overlay grid you can find in the settings so you have a visual horizontal and vertical grid to assist in composition of your shots. ..useful for keeping sunset horizons straight for example.,The camera is speedy in it's startup and focusing time.  The zoom is smooth and increases in just the right increments.  There is no focus assist magnification,  a feature that magnifies a small portion of the focus point to help you visualize detail of that area which is useful when using a long zoom and would've been a very useful tool for a zoom of this magnitude.,Shame I have to return this camera, it felt good in my hands as far as the body grip and I wanted to make it work.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This product didn’t last a year! It no longer holds a charge. Way too expensive for very little quality.
