review: I have been looking for a good mid-range priced camera to photograph flies I tied for fly fishing. This camera takes fantastic standard and macro photos! Read the operations manual folks! This is a fantastic point and shoot camera 📷! Can't wait to do a 4k video!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Everything I wanted and more! I bought this camera specifically for bird watching. It's really hard to juggle binoculars, bird books, and a journal and trying to identify before they fly away. I wanted a quick point and shoot that had the ability to zoom in so I can see the bird's features. So far I'm blown away. I know nothing about cameras and I've gotten some really good shots on the first try. Can't wait to see what it can do once I figure out all the features! Happy, happy.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Fantastic Camera. This is my third Panasonic Camera, each one better than the last.  I carry a Panasonic DMC ZS20 camera in my purse that I use all the time but I also wanted one that had more zoom for when I travel or have my family here or for a hundred and one reasons.  I wanted a camera that would fulfill my desire for great pictures, up close and in the distance, at a reasonable price.  My ZS20 fills my everyday need but this FZ70 does so much more but is too big to carry in my purse.  Of course, there is a lot more to learn about this camera but then it does a lot more than my other cameras.  It is light weight enough to handle with ease and I like the feel of it in my hands.  I do not need a professional camera, just a good camera for my picture taking pleasure.  As far as the bells and whistles, I have not had the chance to go through everything this camera can do as yet but look forward to experimenting in the future.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am really enjoying using this camera with the 60x zoom.  Some photos, when zoomed to the max, are not crisp when handheld but most are pretty good.  When at a "reasonable" zoom they are good.  The only thing I don't like is the online manual.  I'm not printing out 200+ pages and I like to read and experiment which I find hard to do online.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is an amazing camera.....I've had it for about a month, and have spent a lot of that time learning some of the features and capabilities. The FZ70 is an upgrade for me, having had an FZ40 previously.  Because I never spent much time trying to learn all the features of the FZ40, this camera is almost a whole new experience. Be aware that the manual is not very clear on a lot of the functions of this camera, but there are other sources online for help.,The images (those taken correctly) are clear, and the 60X zoom is fantastic. Some reviewers have stated that image quality is not very good when utilizing the ultra zoom, but I think you will find that with any large zoom if you don't use a tripod.,All in all, I think I will enjoy this camera - even more so after I master all of its functions.  My one disappointment is that the price has dropped considerably since I purchased it last month.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This camera is  great for blogging on you tube  or where ever you want to put a video online . It is easy to use and comes with two batteries and it also comes with another lens and a few more things that come in handy . Over all not to bad of a camera for the class it is in .

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: It’s easy to use and set it up. It came with two batteries, so it last for a long time. The picture quality are wonderful.Play back mode for video has great picture quality and color is very vibrant.and zoom clearly and the sounds clear.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I had a great moment with this camera in coney island beach in New York last weekend with my girl friend, it could do zoom in and out to get closer or far as much as you want, clear lense and give high quality picture , it really worth the money i spent

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This camera is perfect for vlogging! The picture quality is really good and It comes with a wide angle lense or macro lens and 2 batterys. The screen reverses so you can see yourself and it's easy to attach to a tripod.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I grew up in the 90s. My family had something similar to this. Smart phones were not available back then. For something only 1/5 the price of an average smartphone today. This camera brings quality and fun time as well as great memories.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: The camera comes with everything that you need, except you will need to supply your own memory card like most cameras. It is very easy to use, simple easy menu navigation. The picture quality is worthy of its price.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: My dad loves it. It has a classic look with modern digital functionality. Pictures come out with good color, and it is also simple to use. A bit pricey but very unique design!

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: It’s got a lot of accessories. Two batteries is very useful. Three different lenses. I wish it can have focus adjusting. But compare to the price, it’s good.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Bought that camera just to get good pictures of my car to sell. Wide angle works, customers were wondering is it a real car ?

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Great Camera. It takes great pictures and is lightweight for on the go. Recommend buying!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: i like sony cameras , like that it is small , offers panoramic, movie 720p and USB for charging. There is a few second delay every time i click which is somewhat annoying but most times the shot is OK.  Haven't worked out the 'continuous' yet?,I think this will work for me for my needs.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Bought this for my father because it was small & easy to use. Takes great photos. He loves it, so I'm happy. Only complaint is that it's NOT a touch screen.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This little camera packs a big punch.  I'm a Realtor and I wanted something small and I don't count on my phone for photos.  I have used this several times and have yet to have 1 bad picture.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Great camera...it arrived on time and well packaged. Supplier did a good job on everything including the price. Been using it to get photos of the gators behind my house. The female has a new litter of 6. Great camera and good speeds. I replaced my 10 mp camera with this one.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Almost broke it from the get go, because the "switch" to open and close the battery cover is so minute and not very obvious.  The manual is on-line and too cumbersome to try to print out.  So far appears to operate satisfactorily, but a chore trying to learn all of the features using the manual.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: For me, this is the perfect camera: a grab-point-shoot, with great resolution for any use, including the option to better crop hasty shots and still have plenty of pixel resolution for posting or printing. I like that I carry it in my pocket and even forget it is there. Camera phones then to be too jittery and although lighter, cameras are more difficult to hold steady than this Sony. A final feather in this bonnet is the name: Sony has meant qualty for a billion years, give or take a week or two.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Just love it, it is the same as I have that I actually broke and I couldn't have it fixed , I didn't know what I would do with out it, and I never thought I would ever find exactly what I had. What can I say, It just saved me,

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The best camera for the cheapest price you can find!  Have two!  Zeiss lense's will get good pictures from the bottom of a bottle of beer!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Haven't put it to use much yet, other than just messing around with some of the features while taking silly photos...but I love it already! It's small and discrete...I like that it's black so I'm not pulling out some outrageous pink camera anywhere... I can't wait to take it with me on my "no phones allowed" camping trip! I'm sure it'll take great pictures.,--- I will add that it doesn't come with a case or a memory card, but it wasn't too much extra to add those to the shopping cart.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Got as a Christmas present for my mom. This is a BEAUTIFUL small camera. If you are looking for a good quality point and shoot camera for a lowish price and a small body, this will be perfect for you.

review: I'm a lover of Cannon products and have been for probably 20 years and this camera for its size the features are just absolutely fantastic I love shooting with it I love the fact that it has the video future it has great resolution so I'm very very happy with my purchase outstanding product thank you for great service and for offering these super high quality cameras

review: This Canon camera is highly rated and the combination package makes it a great deal.  You will have to add on a USB cable for about $6 to complete the assemblage.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This camera is very high quality and I use it for work to take pictures and it works great. Good price as well as quality I enjoy this purchase very much . Happy with the quality of the pictures for the size of the camera

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Directions for use appear to be written by someone who doesn't own a camera and doesn't understand why numerous items need no explanation.  If you follow directions on more than one item, you must understand that it's not you and that you weren't meant to understand the unexplained.  I ran the fully charged battery down just trying to make the correct choices on unreachable menu items.  It's listed as a camera for children and elderly people, this is harassment.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: You can not focus or review the photos on screen.  Pics are grainy, very poor quality.  Definitely not 21 MP as described.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I was hesitant to purchase this one due to low price, but bought this based on other reviews and was honestly expecting a little more. The picture quality is poor and I've made every adjustment possible. Seems to take a littpe better photos outdoors, but even my phone has much better quality than this thing. I passed it into our kids, for them to play around with and as a starter camera. I am currently looking for a much better quality one. Really wished I hadn't have purchased it.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: We bought this for my seven-year-old daughter and while the camera is pretty straightforward to use, the photo quality is not great. I know I can’t compare it to photos from a “real” camera, but especially outdoor the photos are very grainy, washed-out, and out of focus. It’s a little disappointing. We’ve messed with the settings quite a bit, but that doesn’t seem to help.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Don't waste your money on this camers. This camers does not work.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: When trying to load the disc that came with the camera the error message said it was incompatible with iMac/Apple. Also the description said  you could use a SanDisk Memory card up to 64 GB (which I bought) but the camera was unable to format it. Amazon's description and stats said nothing about the incompatiblity and once I was able to read the manual it stated that it recommended only going up to a 32GB Memory card.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Terrible camera. Terrible customer service. This camera was literally used on two separate occasions. The third time I took it out to use it was broken -- it wouldn't stop zooming in and wouldn't turn off. I contacted customer service to return it and they said it was past the return period. I wrote again saying this camera was LESS THAN A YEAR OLD and only used TWICE and please refund me and let me send it back. They NEVER responded. Cheap camera. Awful customer service. DO NOT BUY!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Have to say the pros are the camera is really lightweight and the function is enough for the beginner like kids. However the picture quality is exactly an issue. But thinking in other way, if I really need a High performance quality, I prefer to buy professional one to instead of it. For now, this one is enough for kids at my home.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Price is very good anf it got good rating by other people. However, when I received it I was surprised, it looks like a toy. The 2 things I like about it is that it's compact and can take up to 21mega pixel pictures. What I DON'T LIKE is that the camera looks cheap in quality (although advertisement pictures looks great). What I didn't like and why I don't recommend this camera to anyone I know is that the DISPLAY is of the lowest quality possible, VERY DARK and almost monocrome. I CANNOT tell the quality or color of the pictures because every picture is dark and blueish. Even when I uploaded it to my computer, it looks terrible unless I use photoshop to fix it up.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: My daughter got it for her birthday and absolutely loves it... To the detriment of the family. We can't sneeze without a pic now, lol. We just got back from the Grand Canyon... She did so awesome with the camera right out of the box. It's like it came with an "artistic eye" included! Lol!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Got it for christmas so far its amazing! And it comes with a ton of stuff more than I know what to do with it also has a 32GB SD card not pictured. And a charger not pictured. Great start very happy with my purchase.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Just now learning how to use this neat camera, the flash, and other functions. I've captured a few great up-close photos of birds in the backyard, also some indoor people photos. It's simple to learn the basic functions and easy to operate.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Daughter is tickled pink with her camera.  Tripod was broken(won't lock in place) but all other items in kit were good.  Due to low cost of kit I did not complain, will just buy one by itself.  Overall pleased though with purchase, no problem with camera itself

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I’ve had this camera for about a week now. I bought this camera so I would have a good camera instead of always using my iPhone to take pics. This camera takes excellent pictures. This is a good camera for beginners because it’s not complicated. This is also a good deal for the price.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This set is amazing and the price is hard to beat. It has been great to use as a first time user of such a utility. I am still learning how to use it for my blogging, but I think it will be great.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: My mom bought me this bundle for as a birthday gift. Unexpected. I was so surprised and happy! It came with so many accessories. The camera is beautiful and takes amazing pictures. The camera bag is really spacious as all of the accessories fit in the bag. The 5ft tripod is sturdy and very portable as it is adjustable. It is the perfect starter kit for anyone.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I gave this to my daughter for a gift and she loves it. It was everything she was looking for in a camera to make YouTube videos and great photos.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: The perfect camera for beginners. The camera priced alone is about $400, so, the extra $40 for lenses, filters and tripods is well worth the cost. I can upgrade as i go. As the reviews state, the lenses are Canon compatible, but work well. Perfect for learning and growing as a photographer.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Needed a camera for my photography class. This was a great deal. Now I have a camera to use for class and outside of class. Stand it comes with is very cheap. I recommend, if you are a serious photographer, to get another one. The cheap plastic broke pretty fast.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this as an early father's day present for my husband since we were going on vacation. He has used it non stop and was able to capture some fantastic photos of our children on the beach. The zoom is incredible, the quality of the pictures is amazing & it's a nice sized camera. I would say perfect for a family camera or even for a photographer just starting out!! 5 STARS!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle

review: Great little camera, beautiful pix. from Sony no bologna..

review: I bought this camera for my daughter as a gift.  It takes nice pictures, but it doesn't come with the memory card, and it also doesn't list it clearly which one to get.  If you look on the paper that comes with it, it's there in very small print.  The card costs another $10-$25. I got mine locally, but they also sell them on Amazon.  I think it would be better for the listing to mention that it is sold separately.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: My husband loves his camera. I bought it for him for his birthday. He loves how you can charge it in the car if you forget to charge it at home. Takes pretty good pics and easy to transfer to your pc...

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

The only negative I found was with image stability.  If I used any zoom at all, pictures tended to come out blurry.  Once I figured that out, I was able to compensate.,I used the panorama mode a lot to capture the skyline...in my opinion, this one feature makes the camera worth purchasing.  Easiest panorama shooting ever.

The pictures came out very clear and very real The battery capacity is about 3 hours. I will recommend it to my friend.

review: I'm not sure if it was just the camera that I got, but no matter how much I change any of the settings for a better picture/video quality it would not focus as well as in any environment with different lighting I was in. When I transferred the pictures and videos to my computer to see the quality of it, it's still very pixelated even as I compare all the different quality settings. The camera is exactly like the picture and the screen flips perfectly fine. But not the quality that was being described in the description. Also, when taking videos the sound is very sensitive to the camera being touched or moved around where you can't really hear any other noise in the room even as I steadily and silently move the camera in one direction.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: I love this camera. I've been a longtime fan of canon rebel SLR. I was worried the digital model wouldn't live up to its predecessor. My worries were unfounded. Everything about this camera is wonderful. Easy to figure out (even for an old lady like me). I recommend spending several days with the camera just trying out all the features and functions before using it for an important event, because there are so many enhancements and possibilities. You COULD just put it on auto and get fantastic pictures, but then what would be the point of buying a camera with so many great features? The lenses included in this bundle are all great. The 500mm, I didn't think I'd use, but it's been so fun taking pics of the moon. It takes time to get used to the light balance if you are used to film cameras, so practice with it if that's how you started. If you started on digital cameras, you won't have any problems. The camera bag is too small to hold everything that comes with it, so if you want to take everything with you, get a bigger bag. The bag isn't waterproof, either. Just water resistant. So a good, large, waterproof camera bag is a good additional purchase. You can't go wrong with this bundle. I was so nervous buying something this expensive online, but I'm so happy I bought it.Included a few photos I've taken with it since buying it in June. The moon is with 500mm lens, manual setting w/250 shutter speed (on tripod using the included shutter cord/button). The other pics are in Colorado.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: I absolutely love this camera! I was extremely nervous to order something so expensive when it had only a few reviews. It comes with 3 lenses two of which are canon brand lenses and one that isn't but still is very nice. Plus it came with all kinds of fun other things like a mini tripod and an different filter lenses. Great purchase glad I took a chance on this product!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: This is an amazing deal. I've been shopping around for this type of camera and lenses for quite some time so I knew what I wanted and the average price. Let me say, it was way more than this. AND here I got lots of accessories that I wouldn't have gotten at a store. I am not a professional photographer, just an amateur that wants to mess with it and learn. I've used a camera like this with my work so I am familiar with it and this one met all my expectations. I have not tried the very large lens yet but the two Cannon lenses work great. I also have not tried the flash that came with it yet. I'm delighted to have a mono-pole but will use a regular tripod, which I already have, when using the longest lens. I do have to say the bag that came with this stuff is a bit cheap feeling. I quickly ditched that and got a backpack to transport everything.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: I recently wrote a review and gave this item 4 stars. My sincere apologies for I thought I was missing 3 of the included filters. As I looked further in to the case it comes in, I found the 3 missing filters. Aside from that, this camera deal is a total package!! I'm most impressed with the quality of images and every time I use it, I get better as I become more familiar with the manipulation of its settings. I HIGHLY recommend this package!! THANK YOU!!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: This is my first DSLR camera.  I bought this to complement my DJI drone photography and im not disappointed. It's fun learning new stuff and this package comes with a ton of accessories to work with on my journey to evolve my skills.  I've included a few photos. I know i can do better once I've learned to master this tool.  Have fun!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: Great camera. Two short lenses and great, the long one is a bit of a gimmick. This is. Super entry pack. And you can add better lenses, I have a EF 100-400mm f/4.5-5.6 IS II USM lens and the photos with it and this camera are mind blowing!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: I received when expected and it was all in great condition. The T6 works great and I was very happy with all the extra lenses and filters etc that came with it. Haven't had time to try out everything yet. I have a T3 and T5 so I am very happy with this camera.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: Great Camera only thing I wish is that you could video record remotely using the app.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: Years ago I owned a Canon XTi Rebel 35mm film camera. Loved that camera!!! Then I bought an SX40 and loved that camera and last year decided on something stronger - the SX60. For some reason I couldn't get a feeling for that one. Then I saw the T6 w/the 500mm lens.  Almost identical to the XTi - only digital. Bought it on Black Friday, had it Saturday. I couldn't have asked for better packaging with the camera and one lens wrapped with bubble wrap. The 75-300 was in a box of it own and packed so it wouldn't bounce around. The whole bundle was packed very securely. Tried the camera and lenses and all worked as it should. I can see an affair coming already with this camera. If you've ever had one of the 35mm film Rebels, you'll adore this one.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: This is a great starter kit and a very good value for someone who wants a nice camera set up. Although I purchased some extra lenses and accessories to go with this set, I am very pleased with this set as a starter set. Takes great pictures, and is very versatile for someone who wants to take a lot of different types of photos. The lenses are not the best quality, but they are pretty well made and should last for a very long time if not abused.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I purchased this for my 11 year old daughter who wanted a real "grown up" camera. She has been very happy with the easy of use and the quality of the photos.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I purchased this camera back at Christmas time and have used it numerous times. I chose it mainly for its zooming features and am most pleased with how things have worked out and pleasantly surprised by the additional features I am still learning about.,Photography is my hobby so this review is coming from that angle. The pictures are crisp and clear. I only have enlarged one (8x10) that I did use the zoom feature on and it came out lovely.,I guess it is a personal preference but I love the feel of the camera in my hands and the quality of the photos. Again I am an amateur and just like to walk about and take some photos and print some of them up or post them on tumblr. I receive good feedback on my posts on tumblr so I am going to say others find the color and quality of the photos to fine as well.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: My daughter loves it

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is a very light weight camera with a great zoom. However, you can spend hours trying to solve problems to set functions to what you want. The menu in the camera is not all there is. Downloading the full manual would have helped if I could find the menu item in the camera to begin with! The menu is not at all intuitive and the places where settings are buried is very confusing.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is a great camera.  I have to admit this is the first really nice camera that I have purchased in several years but it has exceeded my expectations.  The zoom on this camera is impressive.  I was looking for a camera that would take great photos and video, it has exceeded my expectations for both of these requirements.  I was really suprised by the clarity even when using the extended digital zoom.  In the past when I have used the digital zoom on other cameras the picture quality was horrible.  The digital zoom on this camera produces pretty good photos.  I have been playing around with several of the features on this camera but still have a lot to learn.  I think this camera's options will satisfy most users.  If you just want to point and shoot you can always use the automatic settings which produce fantastic pictures.  For the price and quality, this camera is hard to beat.  So far the battery life is great, I have taken several hundred photos (mostly w/o flash) and taken probably an hours worth of video, the battery is still about 1/4-1/2 full.  I would highly recommend this purchase.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: A quick, short review is all that is needed.  This is a bridge camera and not a dslr so with that in mind, this camera for the money is the best you can do.  I have had lots of bridge cameras from all makes (even the Canon SX50 which is a very good camera, but with crazy set up controls and too small), but this one beats them all taking the cost into account.  The zoom is phenomenal especially if you set the camera to 7MP and put it on a tripod.  This zoom should be illegal!!  Or you can shoot at the 16MP and go to 60x and get a great shot.  Sure it has some weak points like no tilting LCD, but every camera has its weak points. IQ clarity is a strength for this camera.  With the price it is selling for on Amazon, I should buy another one.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I am very happy with this purchase. It was for a gift and so I do not know much about its functioning yet. But it was delivered on time in great condition and I am quite pleased.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this camera before taking my trip and it was all that I hoped it would be. I was worried I might not receive it timely but I actually got it before the delivery date I was promised.It was nice and compact and easy to use. I would definitely recommend.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: bought this for our upcoming trip so we would not fill up our phones with trip pictures.  Very pleases with size and operation and quality

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This camera works very well on closeups and standard distance. Have taken alot of pictures so far and very pleased

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Bought this for my daughter in law & she loves it!!  It makes great pictures!!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have used this camera for almost two years (about 6,000 pictures so far), and I love the camera - especially the 60x optical zoom.  It takes remarkably good pictures in very low light situations, too.,For the last several months though, I have been struggling with a rear dial which has stretches where it ignores rotation (or worse, responds as if I were rotating it in the opposite direction).  As the camera is virtually useless without a functioning rear dial, I was rather disturbed.,Then I remembered I had recently had problems with my computer's mouse. After an internet search, I found that breathing on the mouse button area - getting some humid air inside the mouse - fixed the problem for me.,Having nothing to lose, I tried the same thing this morning with my camera, putting my mouth over the rear dial and exhaling several times to force humid air inside the camera.  Much to my surprise - and relief - it worked.  This sure saved me from having to buy a new camera - at least for now!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Ordered when my 2nd FZ200 finally bit the dust...I thought I would try a different model.  Some things are slightly different but overall, the same quality I have come to love from Panasonic.  I do think there is a bit of a difference in the lens (Lumix vs Leica) but not enough to matter to most folks.  Love the extra zoom...just use a tripod or be very steady.  I am still learning how this particular camera works but in no time it will be an extension of my arm just as the previous ones were.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Very powerful camera with great resolution, albeit, the processor is quite slow.  I used it to photograph my Nephew playing high school football.  I could zoom in and get great shots of him from almost anywhere on the field.  The resolution is wonderful, even when zoomed all the way.  Note that, in low light, high zoom photos, the camera will take 2-3 seconds between photos so if you're looking for rapid-fire action shots, get a different camera.  For the price & features and what I needed for occasional shots, it's perfect.  The optical zoom is fantastic.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have used this camera for a year now. Excellent pictures. Many different controls on the dial, but I tend to use the 'automatic' artificial intelligence mode most. Scenic modes give good results though on the sunset mode the reds seemed more enhanced. Good sharp pictures. Zoom is amazing.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am an experienced photographer and looked for a camera with long zoom.  Main reason to not to lug around different lenses. Product has manual features to adjust the Exposure and ISO however the result from the camera is very poor in lesser than normal light.  quite disappointed I spend 300 dollars on a product that did not meet my needs.  It is definitely not a supplement to anyone looking to have an alternate to a DSLR.  it is just a point and shoot travel product like any other point and shoot.  attached couple of pictures straight out from camera.  one of them is at high zoom (1200) on an evening light and i am not happy with the result.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This review isn't for the camera, but for the SD card that is being erroneously recommended by Amazon to be purchased with the camera. The Panasonic Lumix DC-FZ80 needs either a SDHC or SDXC card; and the specifications for that card should be (or be better than) UHS-I Speed Class 3 (the symbol is a large letter U, with a 3 inside of the U), and C10 (a large letter C, with a 10 inside the C). This is the minimum needed to shoot 4K Video.,The recommended SD card is UHS-I Speed Class 1, & C10; which is insufficent.

Auto stability is a wonderful feature, especially for photoing kids!

The only problem I had is that the display screen died in the middle of my vacation.  Since it has passed the 30 day window for a return, I'm stuck with dealing with Sony to get the screen repaired.  I have to say they need to have a better setup for warranty repairs.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: HELP!  HELP! HELP!  MFG. DEFECT, BAD PLASTIC HOUSING, cannot keep battery door latched, thus camera doesn't work!!!!!  Taping door closed doesn't work either!,Sony customer service has given me an electronic loop frustration when trying to get a product defect solved.  The battery well cover latch will not retain the cover in a closed condition.  This disrupts the camera's function to keep the memory card circuit working.  I also wrote this input on my product review direct to Sony with NO response!!!  Their customer service operator gave me a telephone number that was a recorded message (not the camera service people) directing me to the same phone number I had just called getting the person that lead me to this message!!!!  HOW stupid can a business system BE???  This result is changing my faithful customer viewpoint of Sony and their products, this is after numerous good  TV's , DVD and tape machines and other cameras.  I'm a retired Prof. Eng'r and Air Forced trained as a camera repairman.  THEIR CAMERA problem is a small hinged piece that mates with the slide latch in the cover and DOESN'T keep the cover closed due to hinge moving.... R. Givens

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This camera came with all the accessories to get started taking really beautiful pictures. I had everything I needed to begin with except for a zoom lens which I quickly added. I've had so much fun with this!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Have used this a couple times since buying it.  Really only used the 18-55 lens.  Have not used all the other items that came with the bundle yet.  Overall I would say this is a great first time camera for someone getting into photography.  I bought a 18-135 lens on as a separate and used that on July 4.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I LOVE this camera! I bought it to take family photos. These were the first few pictures taken while I was tinkering around with it. I have 0 experience with photography but this is so easy to use, a child could take stunning photos. In fact, the pictures of the little blonde kitty were taken by my boyfriend's daughter's (ages 10 and 8). I love this camera!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Just got this on Friday...... 3 days ago now.,1st thing I noticed is the impossible to use viewfinder. Why they even bother putting it on there is beyond me.,Other than that, this thing takes really good photos and really good video.,The on screen controls are really easy and intuitive to use unless you're an idiot.,The lens filters and image effects are completely unnecessary in today's world with Photoshop and After Effects.,So again, why bother including it?

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Good price.  Camera takes great pictures, but the screen quit working on our first trip.  We were still able to take pics.,Canon's warranty registration is much more complicated than it needs to be, but they repaired and returned the camera quickly.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is amazing! The kit is great if you’re new to photography and want some ideas of stuff to try out. The pictures come out beautifully, even if you’re novice. Probably not going to use everything it comes with but it’s cool to try it all out for a reasonable price.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: I needed a digital video camera to help me transfer old cine reels to the computer. This was perfect for the job - simple to use, high enoug image quality, and cheap. I wasn't expecting much for the money, and was very happy to have my expectations massively exceeded by this camera. I struggle to understand how it's possible to make something this good for the amount I paid for it.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)

I can safely say this has it!. From color, exposure and output quality these need to be looked tat before operating this camera as you environment depends on the settings to be adjusted to get the best outcome. something i didn't master in my clips in the video.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: I purchased this camera set for a trip to Alaska.  I was very pleased with how easy it was to use this camera and loved the pictures it took.  I do have some trouble using the telescope lens, and they do offer other packages so if that's something you don't need, you may want to chose a package with a different lens.  I use this camera all the time living in the woods for wildlife pictures and they are professional quality.  It did come with a lot of extras and I haven't used some of them.  However, I shopped around for this specific camera and this price couldn't be beat.  I even went to a store to look at this exact camera before purchasing and the store's price just for the camera and a small lens was more than this whole package.  Definitely very pleased with this purchase.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: This camera is basically idiot proof. It has settings for different types of picture types. My camera is generally set on sports mode, but I have taken portrait photos and landscape photos. The bundle comes with light filters and screens, which allow you to control the amount of light coming into the lens. This is awesome for Friday Night Lights photos. I also love the two different lenses that come in the bundle. They make taking photos super easy based on your distance from the subject and how up close and personal you want to be. If you are a manual reader as I am, you can make your photos even crisper by adjusting the shutter speed. This is accomplished by knowing which small dial to turn. The autofocus feature is also nice. I love this camera!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: This is by far the nicest camera I have ever owned especially for the price. I loved having the option to buy a beginners set including everything one might need. My only complaint is that the spider tripod is cheaply made and it broke very easily even after MINIMAL use and only using it in the very basic tripod fashion without bending the legs into any sort of shape. A minor inconvenience for sure but I can't really complain given the price.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: very good camera

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: This is a great, I am so happy with this purchase..

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: I love the camera Canon T6, I think it’s very good beginner camera. I honestly only use Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II and,Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens. I feel like you don’t need the huge telescope lens unless you are going to take picture of the moon or lions from far. The bag it comes with are okay and so are the filter. The reason I’m giving 3 star review is because the little tripod broke on me and I email them just to get a reply a week later. The monopod is pretty bad. But overall look for the kit that has the Canon with two lens and you should be ready for your photography journey.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle

review: Camera is great but didn’t need most of the accessories in the bundle. Camera bag is cheaply made, shredded and ripped in a few places after the first outing with the camera

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: I would be giving it more than 10 stars.  I’ve been eyeing this camera for the past 3 months and finally after all the wait I finally got it today. But shipment was great and the customers that answered questions were great. I’m still learning photography and hope one day my dream comes true of owning my own studio.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: This package has all sorts of extras, including some things I’ll probably never use.  The only thing notably missing is a 2nd rear lens cap.  I’ll have to order another one separately.,I wouldn’t recommend this camera for casual users.  The “automatic” mode has been more than a little frustrating.  It takes forever to auto-focus even after changing some settings.  Sometimes it makes all the sounds of snapping a photo but then you go to look at how it turned out and there is no photo.,I have a lot of experience with 35mm film SLR cameras and so it didn’t take long to learn to use the manual options.  I really like Shutter Priority mode (TV) for moving objects and Aperture Priority mode (AV) for still shots.  I keep this camera set to manual focus at all times.,Take some practice shots to get the correct ISO and this camera can get really great photos!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: This was an amazing deal from Beach Camera!  Love the features of this Nikon Coolpix B500.  I'm not a camera person but I love to take pix, and this works very well.  It's like a step above a point-and-click, but with a wonderful lens that can zoom in tight.  I bought this for my husband's birthday because he liked my other one so much that I figured he should have his own.  (not that I don't mind sharing, but when we're together and trying to take pix, seems to me that we should not have to wait our turn to use this great camera),I was particularly impressed with the whole bundle from this seller.  There are so many great accessories included that aren't normally with a camera purchase.  The bag is a really good camera bag that adjusts to hold virtually anything you'd need.  Love that they included both a large spider tripod and a short tripod.  Plus, they sent a 64gb memory card which was a very nice touch.  The cleaning kit was included as was a USB reader for the memory card.  Also, despite the fact that this base camera comes with four batteries, they also included four rechargeable batteries together with a charger.  I think we got a great deal on this camera, and my husband is loving his new toy!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I am a semi pro nature photographer and I found this camera a sore disappointment as it pertains to image quality. I have been using Fuji for about 15 years and I switched to Nikon for a change. It contained most of the basic features as my Fuji except the eye lens. Please note: You are only able to take a picture using the display. If you need to see extreme detail, this may frustrate you. With a 40x zoom, you need an eye lens. I used the camera for about a week and a half. The image quality  is terrible and every image on a regular/auto setting is thoroughly washed out. If you utilize the dawn/dusk or sunset setting it drops a blue cast over the image which in some cases looks ridiculous, but without it, it would be too bright. There is no definition or depth to the images. It seem to me I get either washed out/unremarkable images or blue images. Glare is hard to avoid as well even with a darker setting. You don't see this glare until you download the larger image. I have provided images side by side. From L to R is a cell phone image, one on Auto and one on Dawn/Dusk. At least the cell image has no glare. An everyday user for everyday life, this is fine. Other than that, it has no use. It is my opinion that the reviews posted are fictitious. There is simply no way I could be getting these pictures based on REAL reviews. It doesn't make sense.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is great.,1. Take a picture, it goes right to your phone BAM! Upload it, send it, easy to share.,2. Batteries, some may not like the AA type but for traveling it's Paramount.,Having a Keen eye makes for great picture taking and I've been away from it for a while now. My old Nikon N64 35MM film camera is still a champion.,But this camera is fun and easy to use.,Versatile in almost anyway.,And it takes outstanding photos.,So if you are new to the hobby or just want something that is ready to go and pull in from a good distance.,This camera will not upset you.,So easy to use.,Have fun!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: This is an update to my last review.  This is a great camera for amateur photographers.  It is true to the advertisement.  It is a lot smaller than I expected, but I appreciate that it will be easier to slip into a purse when I travel.  Very comfortable to hold and use.  Straightforward features.  I would say the shutter (if that is the right word) is very slow.  So if you are setting up for a sudden photo op, you might miss it.  That is the reason I cannot give it five stars.  Also, I had a great customer service experience with Beach Camera.  Initially, when I got the camera, there was a defective European battery charger in the box, and for many reasons, it would be no good for a U.S. based customer.  Also, the batteries had already corroded.  It could be argued that someone should have caught it, but I understand mistakes happen.  I appreciate just how quickly they resolved the problem.  Thanks, Beach Camera!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I love this camera. This thing is so much better than I expected. I originally bought it for filming my you tube channel but found that this camera takes great photos. The video is second to none and compairs to cameras costing much much more. The video sound quality is surprisingly good. This is the best camera purchase I have made in the last five years. I love I.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: high quality camera that takes great pictures. It has great zoom ability 40x's. I have used on a recent trip to Europe and it performed excellent. I believe there is a factory warranty. It would be awesome if we had the ability to buy a 2 or 3 year protection plan for this camera. BTW the red color stands out as everyone's camera is usually a dull black color!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: This Nikon COOLPIX B500 Camera kit was an excellent purchase. First of all I love Nikon cameras, second of all this kit if perfect for a beginner level, or youth level of experience in photography, and overall it is just a really nice camera to use for everyday enjoyment in taking pictures. Set up is super easy and the accessories are a wonderful perk. Enjoy!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is a lot of fun. Just started clicking away right out of the box. Played with some of the different features, and became even more comfortable with the camera. Practice practice practice. The manual is an easy start, but could be a little more detailed. The downloaded one is comprehensive.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Love this easy to use camera. Have bought 3 of them as gifts. Great zoom capability and the images are crisp and clear. The photo shop software in this package was very nice and a true $50 value.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: 01-15-19  Editing my review. Wish I had not bought this. Very disappointed in this Nikon. Enough so that my next purchase will be another brand altogether. *********This purchase was to replace my NikonCoolpix P510. Had that one for several years and finally the abuse caught up with it. I actually feel like I took a step down with this new camera. But, I have not used it a great deal yet so perhaps my opinion will change. I shot some video at a dog agility trial, even in good sun there was a bit of blur when I zoomed. One negative of note, the usb cable to allow me to upload directly to my pc is RIDICULOUSLY short. Too damn bad the usb cable from my old Nikon won't work with the new one. This camera is OK. Just not super.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I'll probably only be able to update with more experience with it within a couple of months (1Q'14, when I'll be able to take a lot of real world situation photos, but here is what I tough so far from some tests.,I'm currently upgrading from a Canon SX20 IS and was considering Canon SX50 and Fujifilm X-S1 (both around $30-40 more expensive by the time of purchase). Since I tend to take a lot of photos indoor with poor illumination, some reviews I've read set my mind towards FZ70 and its 20mm wide.,What I like:,- 20mm wide: it allows me to cover a lot of width without having to step back much. My previous camera has 28mm and other cameras in this range has 24 or 25mm, tipically.,- 1200mm tele: SX50 has the same ammount of tele, but my SX20 maxes at 560mm.,- internal memory: not that I intend to run around without a SD card, but internal memory can be a life saver and it allowed for immediate photos after unpacking, since I didn't bought a new SD card (and my current one was very far).,- easy to open battery compartment: my SX20 has a battery compartment that is a bit tricky to open. On FZ70, you just slide a switch and it opens. Closing is just as easy.,- image quality: my main reason to upgrade. Of course, I fully expected a decent improvement since SX20 is a 2009 camera while FZ70 is 4 years newer. Still, it's quite noticeable when I looked at details while at 100% image size under low light.,What I disliked:,- Fixed lcd: SX20 has a variable angle lcd viewer (so does SX50), while FZ70 has a fixed one. I almost gave up on buying when I saw it didn't have a variable one, since it's so useful for selfies, seeing what is on it when the camera is too high or to low while mount on tripods and such.,- Proprietary USB connector: while most cameras allow USB connection by providing a mini-usb port, Panasonic decided to go with something else and so you're stuck with their cables.,- Battery: it was another factor that almost interfered with this choice. It's mostly personal preference, but I'd prefer if it used 4 AA batteries instead of a proprietary li-ion one. I use Sanyo Eneloops in my SX20 and have been happy with their duration (I can shoot 12h of video without needing to replace them). Also, I could buy some alcalines should necessity arises.,- No lens hood: it's a pity there are no lens hood in the box. My SX20 came with one. It's a cheap piece of plastic that'd be easy and inexpensive for Panasonic to add in the bundle.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've had this camera for a while now and the thing has been my baby. I love using it, but I have noticed a few flaws as well. It's a cheaper option for superzoom bridge cameras, so keep that in mind while you read about these pros and cons.,Pros:,- cheap for the technology, especially with the high zoom,- excellent 60X zoom,- clear, crisp pictures in good lighting,- fairly durable (mine has taken some hits),- small enough to fit in a backpack without too much worry,- wide angle lens and very good image stabilization,- has a decent viewfinder,- long battery life,- sensitive microphone for picking up audio,- able to have zoom even further increased with a telephoto adapter,Cons:,- the manual focus feature is a joke, it's practically unusable,- forget about manual settings too since it takes too much time to set,- it loves to autofocus on whatever is behind the subject,- the shutter speed is horribly slow (I've missed a ton of birds because of this),- mediocre in color and contrast,- practically useless in low light conditions (especially since you can't connect a remote shutter),- moisture has gotten in and appeared behind the lens on humid days,I still love this camera, but if I could go back in time I'd buy a Sony instead.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: After 1 year I still have not used all the features. Still my go-to camera!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: The price to performance is unbeatable here this camera my not do well in low light, doesn't have the best menu system, or even let you change lenses BUT comparing a 1080p video from this camera next to my Lumix G7 both shot in AVCHD in good lighting conditions the only way I could tell the difference is looking at meta data and knowing the sensors give a different crop affect. To be completely honest this camera is a steal for $250 get one while they still have them!!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is a great bridge camera. Excellent images that are very sharp but with perhaps somewhat overly aggressive in camera sharpening. Very nice wide angle shots and relatively fast at 2.8. Overall extremely pleased to date and would recommend. I'm a novice but seasoned photographer and have had several film and digital cameras. I primarily use an Olympus micro four thirds system and would say this cameral could become my camera of choice for its versatility.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: well i tried it today for the first time. it is a little complicated... but i put it in smart mode, and could not believe the pictures that came out of this camera.. i cannot wait until the eagles come back to florida.. it will be awesome. one of the best purchases i have ever made... thanks panasonic. taking bird photos has just become an amazing hobby with this camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Did alot of research on what to buy. Figured out I wanted the ability to adjust settings but didnt want to have to read a book to use EVERY time. Its a great combo and takes fantastic photos.  For the price..you cannot go wrong. The zoom....is amazing.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Absolutely incredible camera.  I have gotten close ups of birds that normally would take a 400 to 500mm lens.  It works wonderfully in good light.  However in low light or if there is a lot of movement, the camera has trouble focusing but in good light and without fast movement, the camera is miraculous.  I love it and bought one for my son, who was also astonished by its lens power. I highly recommend it even though it has the flaws I mentioned. The animal pictures it has taken are of National Geographic picture quality.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Amazing camera. Takes high end photos and great micro. You can't go wrong with this camera. It's great for beginners or experienced. I enjoy the automatic settings over my big daddy cannon for infant and children photography it keeps up better with the content movement which helps capture pictures without messing with constant changing of specs.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I like this camera. I am able to look through an eyepiece to focus. The only drawback to me is that the zoom is so powerful it takes a steady hand and a bit of patience to set the distance that is best for the shot.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: A camera like this in the 80's would've easily run at around 800.00 minimum. With just the default settings, I took pictures in the semi-dark and it produced clear images. But the best is in regards to close snapshots. I can use it to take pictures of documents at very close range and the letters comes out sharp clear.,So happy I made this purchase. You will not be disappointed.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Good little camera, great pictures. Still trying to learn all to the features, but do far it's easy to use and takes great pictures.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I love my little camera. I keep it in my purse for those moments when you wish you had a camera. It takes good, detailed pictures. The one drawback for me is that it will not take the kind of close up pictures I occasionally need. If I stand back and use the zoom, it struggles sometimes to find the focus. It occasionally takes accidental pictures of the inside of my pocket, the ceiling, or the floor, but I chalk that up to my own random pressing of the button.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I use the camera for both business and personal. In my career as a real estate appraiser, I must have gone through dozens of cameras. I can tell you that most of time, the "achilles heel" of cameras that I have owned is the battery door. This part cannot take the wear and tear of opening and closing so the latch fails; then resorting to scotch taping it closed until I get a new camera. On this model of Sony cameras, they have taken great care to make the battery door spring loaded so that there is absolutely no stress or wear on the latch; It will not fail. Therefore this model camera has lasted far longer than any other camera that I have ever used. The ease of use and lens quality is first rate. I can easily fit everything in frame without stepping back too far.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Does everything it's supposed to do.  It has more capacity then our Samsung S6 phones and can do more.  Plus, it's truly small and easily carried in your pocket.  Smaller than a pack of cigarettes.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Bought for my granddaughters 12th birthday.  Chose sony due to the reliability history I have had with their products.,My granddaughter quickly learned how to operate and rechargeable battery lasted for numerous pictures.,The 20.1 mp rating is a plus. Another plus is the ability to recharge the battery without removing it from the camera.  The 8 times zoom is nice, but not very practical over about 6 times.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Really tiny ... Works well took a few pictures of some birds with the zoom.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Slow, slow, s l o w! Very disappointed in this camera's speed. I took it to my daughter's graduation and it was so slow in taking the pictures that they are all blurry--people started moving before the shot was taken. I chose Sony because I have an old 3 MP Sony camera that takes great pictures. My Samsung phone takes better pictures. Might work ok on stationary objects, but forget people or animals.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Still new, but takes a good picture for the price, image stabilization is good for the price. I'm satisfied with it, considering the price is so competitive.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I had an older version of this camera which I got 9 years ago, and it ended up breaking. This camera is mostly an upgrade. The one thing that I don't like is that you can't choose to put it in macro; the camera tries to decide where it needs to focus and if it needs to be in macro, but sometimes I will be trying to take a picture up close but the camera will want to focus on something farther away.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: It's a fine camera but we returned it because it doesn't have a rechargeable battery. It uses regular batteries.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I bought this camera for a gift, I think it will be a perfect fit for her, very easy to operate,The price was affordable and did not require a lot of computer skills.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: The cameras compact size and low price make it ideal for the type of on the spot photography that I do.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Looks fine, I only  tested it to see if works.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Takes really nice pictures. Had to order the whole package since everything is separate. I don't like the fact that the batteries are not rechargeable. The case that come with the package is nice. It has room for the card and extra batteries and the cable.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: It's a nice camera to snap a few quick pictures but if you want to go into detail or take pictures without adequate lighting I would recommend something more advanced. Definitely a good starter camera.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Great

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Product is an updated version of the previous one I purchased.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: great little camera

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Geat

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This product is very good.i give 5 stars

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Everything I received was exactly as described online. The camera is super easy to setup and to use. So far, I love it.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Bought this for a trip next week since my kids want to take pictures and they do not have phones. Right off the bat, I took a pic of my son and it alerted me that it needs an SD card to save pictures. There's no SD card included, of course. Then I tried to put the strap on, and the receiver is too small to thread the strap through. So far very disappointed.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I received my camera when it was expected to come. I have taken a few pictures so far with it and have no complaints with this product. It measures up to what the product description said. I am looking forward to using it more.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
