product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This little camera is so easy to use. Pictures and videos are clear.download is easy. Only wish is USB cord would have been included for download to my computer instead of taking card out of camera each time.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Bought this for my 14 yr old daughter. We've shopped at Costco and Walmart first and decided that this was the best deal. She loves the camera. Her only complaint is that she wishes it came with the feature to crop pictures.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This is exactly what I was looking for. Im so tierd of my phone camera running out of space and I have to keep removing pics and apps. Camera was very easy to set up and use.  Nice large display screen and takes pretty good pics!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: We bought this for my ten year old daughter for Christmas and she loves it!  Perfect camera for a beginner.  The picture quality could be better, but you’d have to pay extra for that so we’ll make due 😉

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I bought this as a gift for my mother-in-law and all of the photos are dark and blurry. I know my way around a camera, and no setting I tried would give even close to decent pictures. She did not use the camera until after the product return window or support window, so there is nothing we can do about it other than warn others not to waste their money purchasing this product. I was not expecting spectacular pictures with a camera of this price, but I at least expected legible pictures. Very disappointed.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I bought this for my 8 year old son who loves taking pictures and videos. He loves it, and it's perfect for him! It's small and comact which is nice, and I'm able to carry it in my purse when he's not using it. It really is a great little camera, especially for the price!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: It downloads to windows vista fine.  To insert the battery, you need to rotate a little tab first.  They don't make this clear.,It will work download to windows 10 if you select the F drive or whatever drive your computer USB connects it to.,Just select the pictures, copy, then paste to a directory on you computer.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Camera bought as an upgrade for the old one my son had (he’s 11). Didn't even had to teach him how to use the basics, but he did need some help with some of the setup menus for then different spotting modes.,Good quality of the images and the battery seems to last long as he’s been using it non stop since i gave it to him and he’s not had to recharge it yet (or use the extra battery included in pack).

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: When you have a cellphone you forget the difference using a camera. You can choose between easy mode or take a little time learning how to use the manual mode and get the best pictures you can imagine. Be patient and you will get the best results.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is strong, made well,  The camera bag is made well, several pockets with zippers.,The bundle is so worth the price. It operates with ease and and with clarity. My only issue is the battery compartment is a bit tough to open.  I don't have finger nails so maybe that's why.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: my husband loved the camera and equipment but, when he started to use it, he found that the aux. flash didn't work with the camera and some of the filters didn't fit either.  He was disappointed to find that it appeared that whoever packed the box didn't verify that all of the items work with the T6 Eos camera.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: A great camera, learning all what it does is a little tedious, but the pictures are worth it

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: This unit has the size and all the bells and whistles that I want in a small pocket sized camera. However this particular unit has a problem with the auto focus. I will have to send it back to have it fixed.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this to replace a Nikon Coolpix that i dropped and damaged. The camera has far less features than the old Nikon did but was described as having multiple shooting modes. The only ones that are easy to use are auto and portrait. When holding the camera up to take pictures it is very easy to accidentally press a button that you don't want. I would like to return it, but I was on vacation when the 30 days came up.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: This camera still holds up. Great pictures, ease of use and reliability. Lots of extras come in the bundle. Does anyone know what the plastic graph/grid sheets are for? Nice to have an extra battery (haven't had to use it yet, so I'm not sure of it's endurance). Recommend getting a backup SD card if you don't already have one.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: I received it and it was exactly as stated in the Amazon description. I like the size of the camera. It takes great pictures, is easy to use, and all the accessories are good quality. It is a great value for the money.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: I've only taken three pictures so far, They were good quality. The camera was a little confusing Getting to know, but now I love it, I just put it on automatic and away we go.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Have used the product in the past so knew i would have a great purchase.  It came with more than I thought I would get too!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle

review: I recently bought this camera. Took hundreds of photos and now learn that there is no driver to download so that I can upload the images. I guess I will order a card reader and see if that works. CANON SHOULD OFFER A DRIVER FOR NEW MACS.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: Nice small size and does all that I required. Will come into its own on holidays.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: poor quality on any setting. controls very small and confusing!

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: I was so surprised when I finally got this camera how disappointed I was given the fantastic reviews! We have a GoPro but the fish eye angle drives me crazy sometimes. This is a camera I would give my kids to play around with. But when it comes to me recording stuff in our lives, I’ll spend a few more hundred to get better quality.,First, the internal mic is AWFUL. It picks up every little shift in the camera itself. It ends up sounding like creaking and crackling noises. And then even at arm’s length I could barely hear what I was saying.,Second, it wasn’t as intuitive to use. I consider myself decently tech-savvy, but I had to use the user guide multiple times.,Third, I was not impressed with the photo quality. Super grainy no matter how I messed with the settings.,I’m not sure if I just got a dud, but I’ve noticed the same photo being used for other listings on here. The other listings don’t have perfect reviews. Maybe that should have tipped me off that something fishy is going on. Unfortunately I’m going to return this camera.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: I bought this camera as a gift for my mom.She wanted to record herself playing video, the flip screen helps a lot. This camera is super easy to use for both videos and taking pictures. Fits nicely in her purse or pocket, for casual snapshot it’s a great choice. The photo is very clear and beautiful.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: If it lasts a year or two it will be worth the money. Our 3-year-old is always wanting to play around with our smartphone and take photos (and use up our memory). This little camera gives her the freedom to take her own pictures. Most importantly, I personally have a Sony A6400 and this camera looks like a professional DSLR camera just like Sony. That made me buy it for my kid.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: This camera seems to be more professional than any other I've ever owned. I was wondering why I would need this camera since I already have a Samsung S9+ phone that takes excellent pictures. I was urged to buy this camera and I am glad I did. This camera has a very fancy lense that gives you excellent zoom。Came quickly and was packaged well. I bought this for my daughter who will be traveling soon with her Grandmother. The reason I chose this one is because it was small and the features seemed quite simple to use.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: Amazing camera! I love this camera it takes great pictures and is very easy to use. Love that you can take pictures and record. The face front screen makes it so easy. Really great buy!

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: Camera is very easy to use. It has great resolution and takes very spectacular photos. I highly recommend it. It is light weight and easy to carry around.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: The camera looks good. I'm ready to enjoy holiday snapshots and a clearer and better picture than our mobile camera. It's small enough to fit into a small handbag and looks very good. So far it has worked well, but it has been used only a few times. I know it should be more suitable for personal tourist attractions to take photos!

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: This is a very good camera with beautiful appearance. Good quality and low price are very convenient for me to use. I like it very much. I hope I can make a satisfactory picture.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Bought this as a gift, point and shoot. it is slow to focus and produced poor quality pictures

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Small, compartment and takes decent pictures. The battery does not last very long though.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: great for the price! I highly recommend if you are going on vacation and don't want to risk losing a high end camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Still getting used to this camera, lots of blurry pictures. Very lightweight, surprised for a Sony camera kind of cheaply made but for the price, guess you get what you pay for.  Its a good camera, not great.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I really love this camera.  It's SO easy to use.. and the pictures are SUPER high res and clear.  As an artist... details are everything.  This camera is the best I've used!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: It's compact. It takes OK photos. But it takes a long time between photos, and the photo quality is not noticeably better than our phones.,It is user friendly though, not too complex.,If you want something for just taking high quality photos, you need to spend more.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Never worked  inky worked if plugged into charger. This was after battery had been charging for 12 hours. Sent back

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Most people use their phones to take pictures, however, I needed a simple camera to take pictures of property.  This Sony camera does the job, takes beautiful pictures and will also use for vacations.  Seller delivered the product as promised and would purchase from them in the future.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Good value, good product

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Sony Cyber shot is a high quality camera that is very easy to use. People have asked me if some of the pictures I've taken with this are professional, and they are surprised when I tell them I took them with this camera.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: My Pentax DSL camera wouldn't autofocus any more so it was time for a new camera. I have been a Pentax owner for 30 years but couldn't believe the price of this bundled set which I got for slightly more than the price of a new lens for my Pentax. I will say the housing is not a robust as the Pentax so it remains to be seen how it works in the field. However, for a beginner or someone who just doesn't want to spend thousands on their digital photography this is absolutely great.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: Heavy for an older person

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: This is my third Canon camera. I had an older film SLR and then a Rebel XT. Unfortunately an accident rendered that one inoperable. So I looked at this T6.  Overall I like it but I am very familiar with Canon.  The body is much lighter than the older XT which is a plus. I have played around a bit with the WiFi and it seems straight forward.,The only complaint I have is that the lens shades when attached to the lens (both Canon lenses) is that the lens cap doesn't fit.  They screw on to the fittings like a filter will.  The tolerance is just a bit off.,More reviews as I put the camera through its paces.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: Every thing works perfectky! Worth every penny. So I went to YouTube twice, because I was too lastly to read the users manual and lack patience. I watched a video on getting started, that showed all the buttons on the camera and the second video was how to set both the zoom lens to 32 to get me started. All I had to do with the zoom then was focus the end of it. Well treacherous crystal clear shots, zoom gets me closer to the critters, and the negation gets me crater shots of the moon. This camera is also lighter then the cannon Seri had in the 90's and I also YouTube's how to use the Bluetooth Wi-Fi with my phone to remotely take photos and receive them for Facebook. Anywho, I'm more patient these days and technology is easier, so I'm a happy camper. Thank you for your service.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: The camera is really good! The quality is awesome and the all the stuff it comes with is so cool. It came with everything listed and it was all very good quality. Honestly I would've given it 5 stars but the SD card that came with it was broken and doesn't work. That was the only problem though! The bag is really cool and has these velcro section dividers so you can divide up the bag anyway you want! I'm so excited to have this camera! I'm going on a trip next month and this the perfect thing.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: didnt come with battery charger

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: I am amazed at everything included in this package for the price. I've been using phone cameras for the past few years but wanted to get some decent zoom capability for nature photography.  It took a few hours of playing with it and a couple youtube videos and now I am beginning to get comfortable with it. I was skeptical about the 500mm zoom at first because it was relatively cheap, but the few test shots I took came out great. My last SLR was a Pentex K1000 from the 70's.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: This camera offers so many features that my learning curve is steep, but the quality is what I need. This kit has many things I wouldn't have thought of buying however the remote is perfect for taking photos of the Northern Lights. I love the whole package

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: Loved that the bundle has so much to offer that you don't have to go add additional items to your cart to get what you need.  The only thing I would have offered with the bundle was a larger bag as you cannot get everything into the bag it comes with so you do have to purchase a larger bag.  Would give it 5 stars if it wasn't for that detail.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: I was a professional photographer 10+ years ago and always wanted a Canon EOS, but could not afford one.  This package costs way less than an original EOS and you get a ton of extras.  Went to Orlando and took pictures with my Samsung Galaxy phone and this camera at the amusement parks.  Although the phone was way more convenient, the pictures from this camera were much better, especially the action shots.

review: Love this little camera . It replaced my Kodak Camera which I never really like. This one is so easy to use and I think takes great pictures.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: small, very light 4 oz. and very good pics..20 mega pixels and a 5 X zoom..real easy set up and I got a 32 MG card which holds a ton of shots..haven't used all features yet. bought for my wife's trip to London..in September...set up is right on the screen..so you can get it going in no time..EASY mode make flipping it up and shooting with no mistakes, but you can use the setting yourself for exactly what you prefer.. manually if that's your bag....compares very well with Nixon cool pix at 1/3 the price..

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is my second it ELPH. I had my first one for 10 years and have now passed it on to my daughter. This is a basic digital camera with a great view finder and it delivers excellent pictures. I love the small size which can easily fit into a pocket or my purse. It is great to use for every day pictures and for an upcoming vacation. It does not come with a cord to connect the camera up to the computer, but I always take my memory card out and put that in the computer to see my photos.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I really like this camera.  Very easy to use.  Photo are  crisp and sharp.  Took photo of the moon and with the zoom lens it’s like you had a  telescope added to the camera.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I just received this camera. It came a few days faster than expected. Well-packaged and everything in great condition.  I purchased the red-colored one and it's a gorgeous little piece of machine. It is small but doesn't feel cheap. Feels good in the hands and not too heavy. I briefly read the manual and was able to start taking photos and videos right away. The buttons feel very intuitive so far. Very pleased with the quality of the photos, especially close-up shots which I love to take. I took some test videos and for such a small camera, the quality of the audio and video seems really good. I love that the display screen can be adjusted. Makes it easy to experiment with some cool and unusual shots.,I haven't tried out the WiFi feature, but was able to connect to my computer really easily with the USB cable and download the photos with no problem. I'm really excited to use this camera. I bought a couple of other cameras I had to return, so I feel really good about keeping this one.,So far, from my first impression I would highly recommend this camera if you are looking for something not quite as expensive as a true professional camera, but still want something that takes great photos. I also love that it came with batteries you could use right away as well as a battery charger and rechargeable batteries.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I have had this for 1 week. Used it a lot already. Very easy to use but it has frozen like 3 times. I had to remove batteries in order for it to work again all 3 times. Then it frozen while watching a video and made a very loud noise.  Also not great for fast pictures so if you have a toddler and want to capture that great moment quick forget it.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I am thoroughly enjoying using this camera!  I haven't had it long enough to learn all of the ins and outs of it yet, so I don't know everything it will do.  I am excited about learning how to take better pictures and being able to edit on the fly.  I highly recommend this camera, especially to a novice like myself.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Camera is great, the bag is different than pictured but not bad. Accessories aren't the same brands as pictured and some of them are of lesser quality.. Still waiting on the Corel Paintshop Pro so I can't comment on that..,So a little update it's been 7 months and it still works good. Some pictures on the auto setting don't come out as clear or blur.. So outside it works awesome I have great pics of the moon and some clear shots from a great distance away frpm the subjust og the oic, but once I go inside it makes it so i2have to use flash to gwt a clear pic which I dont always like beciase it changes the coloring. So if i want a pic in soft light where it has a yellowish tone because of the amount of light I can't get it because the camera will say raise flash and not take the pic unless you do or change the setting..

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: This was an excellent bundle! It came with 9 accessories along with the camera. It’s a Christmas gift for my sister, who has just started photography as a hobby. I will update this review after she opens it and begins taking photos.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Bought this camera for our Universal and Disney Vacation. We took close to 500 pictures. The picture quality was spot on. Love this take it on vacations and family outings

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Great pictures and vibrant colors. Simple to use. Great starter kit, comes with everything you need. Price is great for everything you get.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Perfect camera!! So happy with this purchase!!!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Amazing camera easy to use great quality

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: We bought this camera for my wife's recent trip to France, She took over 1,600 pictures in three weeks. She loves this camera. We highly recommend it.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have had this camera for quite a while now, it has worked flawlessly. This camera has met and surpassed my expectations, it was left outside in the rain and after putting it in rice it works fine. The zoom is amazing and the close up shots are even better, the battery last all day and then some and the wifi capabilities are a life saver. The only thing I wish was different would be the sensor size, its a little too small, when zoomed in you will lose some clarity and definition, over all its an incredible camera for the price.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have had this camera for about 6 months now and I couldn't of asked for a better camera. It is great for starting out as a beginner photographer. Easy to set up and travel with. I take it everywhere I go around the country. A great buy. Thank you!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I replaced my FZ70 with this one and what an improvement!  4k video, raw, multiple special effects and it uses the same battery so I never run out of juice.  I have shared my advanced compact journey with lumix starting with 12x to 24x to 48x and now 60x zoom and 6mp up to the current 18. Just took 64GB of photos and videos in New Zealand without any glitches.  I also have a DSLR which was largely ignored because of the ease and range of the Lumix.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Great macro shots, even better getting close up of distant items. I was able to take a picture of a rock in a waterfall that was several hundred feet away and it came out clear as a bell.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love the FZ70, at least what I've figured out how to use. It's quite a complex camera(at least for a digitally confused man), the instructions are relatively adequate, but going on to U-tube I was able to see some of the workings in action. Probably just how I learn better, see one do one kinda thing. But the photos are beautiful and when using a tripod I got some terrific shots of the moon that showed more than I'd been able to get with previous cameras. It has a multitude of scene variations as well as numerous programs that do most anything you would want a camera to do, from total automatic to total manual operation and anything in between.,I was able to purchase a factory refurb unit for a great savings, and I believe from the reviews and what I've experienced from the limited use so far I believe I found a real diamond in the rough !

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is the only camera on our 2 weeks cruise trip.  Good to shot whole day with one charge at night.  Good for all scenes.  Excellent for low light and very fast with moving subjects without flashlight.  Little bit heavy than regular snapshot cameras but with much dSLR quality and no need to carry set of lens.  When shot pictures, I hold it with one hand without problem so it's fine with me.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This camera is amazing! Haven't tried ALL the functions, yet; but what I have tried so far is truly breathtaking. The one photo that I took of the Moon really took me by surprise; the clarity! WOW! Shipping came on time. Very satisfied.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: My wife and I had been in the market for some time for a high-quality, relatively easy-to-use camera that would be especially great for non-professionals like us who like taking quality travel/nature photos and has good zoom.  We did not want to jump into the DSLR arena, but wanted to get shots as-close-as-possible.  After painstakingly researching media and reviews for all of the latest models in this category, I couldn't pass up the deal on this Lumix FZ70.,I have to say, I feel this camera is one of the best value purchases I've ever made.  First of all, the exterior fit, finish, and feel inspire immediate confidence, as the materials used and weightiness of the device exude quality.  Not chintzy at all.  I tested and compared the Canon SX50 in-store, and while that is also a very capable camera, the Lumix just feels and looks so much more high-quality in person.  Secondly, the ease of use and capability of taking great photos right out of the box, especially in iAuto mode was astonishing.  We were immediately taking awesome photos of our pets up close, and distant birds and squirrels out in the yard on full 60X zoom, with nice bokeh effect and great color and quality.  If the lighting outdoors leaves something to be desired, some of the quick post-processing effects can be implemented to immediately color-up, sharpen, brighten, etc to produce beautiful images with little effort.  Image stabilization is top-notch, as I have been able to take several long-zoom outdoor shots without a tripod with ease, just using simple technique tricks like using the viewfinder while bracing elbows against the body, etc.  Auto-focus is fast and accurate, burst shooting mode is also wonderful, as it greatly increases your odds of getting that perfect shot without any noticeable extra effort on your part.,Although I know there are many reviews that nit-pick on various things such as indoor photo quality, my use of the camera indoors has produced very good results, with a nice flash that doesn't wash out pictures at all.  I feel that for the average user who wants to shoot photos above the capabilities of the average point-and-shoot that appear 'professional' to 95% of viewers, you can't go wrong with this camera.  I have an aging Canon PowerShot SD1100IS small handheld that has taken some amazing photos for me through the last several years, and this Lumix FZ70 with its amazing zoom capabilities is the perfect natural progression to the next level.  At this price point, you can't go wrong.  Highly recommended!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Had this less than a month. Had a dmc-fz10 before.  Very nice update.  Clear pictures, easy to use. Did take me some time to work out how to adjust manual exposure and such. The printed manual is very basic but finding some of the settings on the camera is not.  Amazing lens stabilization. I have a hand tremor and can still shoot at full zoom.  From macro to full tele, range is great and picture quality only limited by my talent, or lack thereof, as a photographer.  I don't want to have to haul around multiple lenses, but want to do most of what a full DSLR can do so this is an ideal camera. I'm not sure what the advantage would be of a DSLR.  I got a refurbished one for just over $200, and at that price it was well worth it. Not sure if would have paid full new retail price but even that is cheaper than decent DSLR.  Time will tell as to how it holds up. My old fz10 is still taking great pictures, 10 years on and I expect the same from this one.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Love my new camera

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Great camera. took it on trip to Alaska and worked great.  If you want a back lite need to adjust the exposure compensation. This may take a little time. Wish it was a matter of just pushing 1 bottom like on my other cameras. Also takes great video. Fits nice in my pocket,And yes i would buy it again.,I also purchased the hard case,  I don't like the case, hard to keep spare batteries, I like the fact i can use AA batteries instead of rechargeable.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Camera seems ok.  Haven't had a chance to really use.  I'm just upset that the supposed new batteries were completely dead.  This may sound picky but if I'm purchasing a $90 camera with batteries included I guess I just expected new batteries.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Poor quality photos.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I discovered that in order to get a picture into my computer I need a custom USB adapter cord. Another 12 bucks....  I don't like getting nicked 12 bucks for for a piece of wire worth, I would say, about 29 cents that should have come with the thing. Any decent company includes the adapter cord, plus, generally, a few other cords you might need. Not this outfit.,Camera isn't bad. Simple and fits anywhere.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Upon receiving the camera, I could tell I wouldn't like it. It's very small. I put it away with the intent to use it right away, but kept leaving it at home. When I did get around to using it, I was not impressed with the quality of photos and just the overall functionality of it. I really wanted to like it, so I held on to it and told myself I just had to get used to it. I kept it in a camera bag with my other Kodak instant camera and when I took it out again to use it, the camera wouldn't work. The lens wouldn't open, somehow it got jammed. Not sure how because I took very good care of it and I kept it in the same bag with my Kodak and the Kodak works perfectly fine. Heck, I've even dropped my Kodak instant camera and it STILL works two years later. Luckily, I was still within my warranty window so I set up a repair. I returned the camera on May 21st and we are now in July and I have yet to get my camera back. I keep checking for repair updates and it's been in "repair on hold" status for weeks. Unfortunately, it's too late for me to return it and get my money back but I would if I could in a heartbeat. I purchased this camera with the intent on having a camera I could travel around with and take pictures instead of always using my phone since the phone battery dies out fast. I'm not a pro with camera's so I wanted something of good quality but affordable and easy to use. Spend the extra money and get something worth it - this one isn't.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Perfect pocket camera.  Much better than smart phones.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I should have read the description better. It takes 2 AA batteries!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: You get what you pay for please note takes 2 AA batteries

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Just not happy with this camera.  Bought it to replace my Canon Power Shot A1100IS for a higher pixel count.  Unfortunately, the Nikon Cool Pix falls short in it's performance.  Sorry I bought it.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: its an ok its not a bad camera ether its a point and shoot camera. I will say this though the zoom is not great it has a hard time focusing no matter what settings you are in I've tried everything but no luck. I did upload some pictures I took with the camera in the photo section of a Bee and clouds. but over all its an ok camera it will be great for kids to have to. but one thing to add is the price is a little to pricey just for this small type of point and shoot camera it should be way lower the price tag.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: works OK but the zoom is VERY weak. delays with continuous shooting is always a negative for this type of camera even though this camera offered a continuous shooting option in the menu. perhaps i didn't figure out how to use this camera. i liked the idea of charging the battery while in the camera. camera is small and light weight , just what you want for a digital point and shoot.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This is an excellent point and shoot camera with high (20 MP) resolution and a very respectable 8x optical zoom.  I've used this for about a year now and have had no issues with it.  I owned a similar camera made by epson excilim and had issues with the lense retract after about a year.  So far, so good with this Sony.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: My husband loves this camera which replaced an old heavy Sony Mavica.  Tiny and lightweight, it take amazing photos.  He still hasn't learned all the functions and probably never will since the auto function works so well.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I bought this to replace an old camera that was taking fuzzy indoor pictures.  This camera is beautiful (and, so are the pictures).  I can't believe how perfect the pictures are and I'm very, very pleased that I choose this camera out of all the choices.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This is the definition of an inexpensive pocket camera. Yes I know the notion is less popular these days with cell phones having cameras in them, but the addition of a big zoom range, wider angle at the short range, low price, and small size makes this an attractive option. Not a professional camera by any means, but quite serviceable. Bring reasonable expectations, and this item will suit your needs.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: We bought this to replace a 10 year old Sony camera which would no longer accept the memory stick.  This camera is too small.  When you hit one control you get two by accident and can do nothing.

I like that it is rechargeable so that I am not constantly having to have batteries. I do wish it would have a video option.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: At first I thought this camera is garbage I charged it for a long time because I thought that was  the problem so the next day I was playing with it and it still wouldn't come on so I looked at reviews and /i looked at videos to see if I had put everything in right and I found why it didn't come on . Th battery wasn't pushed far enough for the black latch inside to catch so after doing that, it came on and works like a charm. Nice thin design that will help me with all my photography needs. If you don't want to spend thousand and thousands on a camera right now this is your best bet. I  need a wonderful digital camera that has wonderful quality when I'm taking shots of my products and this a wonderful camera!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I bought this camera for my kid to practice photography. She loves it, it’s a great size and so far everything works as advertised. I’m pretty happy to have found this many features (zoom, pixels, overall quality) for such a cheap price.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I think the great reviews must be fake. This camera is so junky 8 can only recommend it for a 5 year old. We bought it for my 10 year old and I’m trying to decide if it should be returned immediately or try to make it work. The overall feel is junky, camera is hard to navigate and video seems to have no sound. My daughter actually likes it and is willing to try and learn the features, so we will keep it for a week and reevaluate before the return window.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)

The camera is small and light, like a toy. But some basic features are still available. Such as picture format, size adjustment. White balance setting, etc.,In short, this price is worthwhile to start this camera. But if you have a request on the road to photography, then buy a professional camera.

Please let me know your policy.  Everything in the package is in great order. The card is used, but I can replace it.  Nothing important on it...

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Great size camera, came with a ton of extra accessories. My mother loved it as a Christmas present.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle

review: I just received the camera a week ago. It seems to take good pictures and everything seems to be in the box. The only problem is the tripod. I am unable to mount my camera because the screw is smooth. There are no ridges on the screw so I can even screw it in. The piece around it is extremely weak too. I've been trying to contact customer support but its not allowing me to submit my phone number. I don't know how to even report this issue. Very frustrating.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Good camera but idk why but after putting the extra lens on and take it off its out of focus and with the lens on you can see the lens on the pic

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Takes amazing pictures, the tripod is easy and quick to use, and all of the other accessories are wonderful as well. Amazing bundle for the price. I would definitely recommend this to anyone starting out. Also, the transfer to other devices is very simple and fast!,I love this camera!,(The photo of two people was taken on the tripod by connecting my phone to the camera via Canon app.)

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Not even Costco could beat this bundle, the price is fantastic for what you're getting, the camera is not the latest and greatest of course, but great for entry level photography or for setting up a photo booth. I paired the flash with a radio trigger to backfill light, flash worked well! And while taking pictures outside it even had the uv filter to ensure the colors weren't messed up

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I love it! Its my first dslr camera and came in great shape. Still learning to use it but already it takes great pictures, and the filters and accessories it came with are in great condition and work perfectly

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I love this camera. I use it for my business to take photos of our products. Great camera and the company sent decent extras with it.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Amazing. Great price. The camera was perfect. The Tripp’s fell apart after a few months. It wasn’t really a long last one. But I still find uses for it. There’s just a lose screw somewhere. Memory card works. Flash works. Really this is a good deal. I’m glad I bought it.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Sooo impressed with this camera! I bought it because I’ve always had an interest in photography and I wanted a good starter camera!! I love everything about this camera. So easy to use. Love the built in WiFi. Came with everything and more to get started!! will continue to recommend this camera!

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: i've taken some amazing pics with this. people are shocked it was with a point and shoot.,I put a couple up for example.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: The battery life for this camera was less than 2 hours.  I charged it overnight to be ready for my tours the next day.  After about 20 pictures the battery was at half strength and lasted for maybe another 20 pictures.  The older Sony camera batteries had at least 6-8 hours of constant picture taking.  I even bought extra batteries but they weren't any better.  It was terrible for my trip to Scandinavia.  Good thing I had my Ipad otherwise I wouldn't have had any pictures to share with my friends.  You would think that newer cameras would work better but this camera is proof that statement is incorrect. My big Nikon Camera had batteries that last 6-8 hours without recharging..

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Totally pleased with purchase!! Comes with three chords that when all put together Can be used to charge in the wall outlet. Then one chord can be used to charge in the computer. And one cord for the car.Super easy to use. To set up the camera is very simple and easy to figure out which button is which.It comes with a battery but no memory card the memory card I had to buy separately but it was not expensive and for the price of the camera I was not expecting it.It takes just your regular general memory card nothing fancy.The only issue I had with it was the arm strap. Even in the instructions it did not say how to attach it and we have yet to figure that out. So if someone could help us that would be great.The feature that helps you to get a focused picture even when you’re shaking a little bit works great.The instructions are pretty much basic and simple and so you may need to find out more information about it online.It works best for outdoor pictures I think. And the zoom is A very nice feature.They have continued to improve it in the past few years.It is lightweight but it has enough body to it to hold it easily when taking a picture.If there is no charge to the battery it takes approximately an hour to an hour and a half to charge.I purchased this camera for the purpose of taking outdoor nature pictures for the cards that I sell. And I am very pleased with the camera and so far think it is going to work great for that purpose. I would recommend this camera to anyone who just want something simple but well worth it with great quality.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Great little camera, perfect for my older mom who is technologically challenged ;-)

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I needed this camera for my business & the picture quality is horrible. The pictures of my products continually came out blurry & grainy. I had better quality pictures with my camera phone

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I have used Sony over the years because of their outstanding quality.  I read reviews before purchasing this one.  I take many, many pictures of mostly small Jewelry items.  I need a CRISP picture w/o graininess and good rich color.  I got neither.  I wish I had ordered my replacement sooner as this has been a big disappointment and I felt as if I maybe got a refurbished camera instead of a brand new one?  For the sake of two days, I am unable to return it.  Please do not buy if you need a camera for fine detailed pictures.  It will not do that for you.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: This is probably a good general camera but wasn’t what I looking for. I tried this out at a zoo but since most animals were moving the pictures came out blurry and I couldn’t find a setting to fix this. There is a delay from when you push the button to the picture being taken to the picture showing on the display. The display is pretty low resolution and made me wonder what the quality of the pictures truly were.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I previously had a Canon S100, which was a good camera for me, but I damaged the racked out lens when it got bumped.  The S100 had worked well for me, but now is not available as new. I read the reviews of other cameras, and thought this Sony camera might be a good camera to use for shooting stills and video at concerts where the venue does not allow larger "professional" cameras.  I was very disappointed  in the auto focus function of this camera. It even has an auto-tracking selection where you are supposed to be able to pick a point in the frame to follow focus, but this was still not helpful in stills shooting, and did not seem to be an option for tracking focus in video shooting. I think my cell phone was a better choice for this purpose, but I had wanted a better optical zoom. This camera, despite the 5X zoom, still was not powerful enough to really get me the close ups I was looking for. I also has trouble with slow shutter speeds in a concert I took pix of, making horribly unusable photos. The menu also was not very intuitive.  Because of the focusing and slow shutter speed and menu issues, I promptly returned this for a refund, and received the refund quickly from Amazon.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Camera is a great point and shoot with zoom if you depress the shoot button half. Then take your pictrue. You have to wait. If you want a movement shot. It takes great shots if you time the shot .

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Very sharp images even with fully extended lens. Faithfully captures colors. Fast shutter enables great pics of moving animals, i;e; iguanas. Complete accessory package but phone no. for spare battery provider “out of service.”

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I was very happy to get this camera along with everything I would need to get started! So far I am very pleased with the quality of all pieces. Thank you! :)

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I have had this camera for a week and love it.  Easy to use and the zoom function is fabulous.  Small in size, accessories that came with package truly make this camera and deal worth every penny.  I look forward to many years of enjoyment with this camera.  Great camera for a beginning camera user.  Purchase this camera and package!

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Gave this to my granddaughter for her 9th birthday.  It is nice because she can hook to their computer and don't have to worry about wasting film for bad pictures.  Taking good pictures has to be learned through  practice.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Hey the camera does have a slow exposure because of the small sensor. That did not bother me since it takes great photos. I know some people complain of the slow shutter. This is not a camera I would be taking to a sporting event or concert or birthday party. This camera is perfect for sightseeing and landscapes.,As I have other more expensive cameras for that type of photography.  I just wanted something compact to take on airplane when traveling and when I was traveling light. To take nice pictures. You know sometimes you are traveling and do not have time to carry around a dedicated camcorder and a hybrid point and shoot and a dslr. Sometimes you just want to enjoy the vacation and leave your fancy camera at home. That's where the dsc800 comes in handy. I will be updating this review with pictures. In the coming days.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: The first thing I notice is how light the camera is; it seems to be made out of 80%+ plastic. Easy to use. Small and will fit in a pants pocket. I had it on Easy mode and the pictures I took were not in focus so I am returning it. Considering upgrading.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I am enjoying my new camera and it is definitely an improvement from may last compact Canon but it didn't come with an adapter cord to upload pictures from the camera to my computer.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: This is a Christmas gift, so I really cant leave a review till she opens it and we try it out. We bought it due to the good reviews so will keep our fingers crossed it works great for my daughter..

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Love this camera. Got it for my daughter. She loves it. I love how she can send the pics from her camera to my phone in a text. The picture quality is great.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle

review: Picture quality is grainy. Reminds me of my first point and shoot camera from 20 years ago. I feel it should be better quality.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This camera is easy to use.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Would never purchase again.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Easy to use, lightweight, image stabilization, what's not to love!

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: I’m impressed with this camcorder, its very handy, easy to operate and the most important is that it has night vision！

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: i had received the camera in the morning and i take the picture at nighe.my son really like the photograph at school. and i want to gave him a nice gift for this camera!

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: I bought this camera for my kids and for myself too. I constantly run out of phone storage and sometimes miss great shots and so I decided I need a separate small camera to take pictures. I have chosen this because of its price，the quality of the pictures is really amazing. I'm so impressed with it and so therefore wanted to recommend it to others by giving it 5 stars.My kids learned very quickly how to use it and already take pictures with it. I hope it inspires them to take great pictures.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: I got this camera for my daughter.  She was so happy and satisfied for this.She needed one to make videos on her youtube channel. She is not  professional and so didn't feel she needed a professional camera. This camera is not a professional camera, but has some nice features for an amateur. It's definitely not bad for the price and gets the job done. If you are looking for a professional camcorder however, this is not the one to get. But, if your're looking for something for personal use and to post videos to social media or youtube, this is a great camera for that,

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: Began very worried, camera operation is not very complicated. Get the goods own use for a while and found that the operation is very simple, do not need the manual. This makes me very reassuring to my mother, a small and lightweight camera, suitable for the elderly (they like to go out).

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: This is a gift for my daughter. She likes it very much. The LCD screen is very clear and the design is streamlined and performs very well. The mini size and weight are suitable for children. The package contains basic accessories, so it is enough for everyday use.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: My very first camcorder and I am enjoying it! I love it.cables required to hook up to my television or laptop,battery charger.I charged it for the recommended 8 hours, it kept the charge, but I have not yet tested it on longer hours of recording. The longest I have gone is an hour and ten minutes. I am able to take videos and still pics. It's Amazing I don't have to travel with my regular camera.I love capturing life's little moments and this is perfect.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: this is one of the best camcorders I have ever owned. It has so many options that you wouldn't even need a separate camera to go along with it. It has a rechargeable battery so there is no more buying batteries. You can record and take pictures to a sd card which is not included. This camera gives you a great zooming feature so you can zoom in on something farther away and still see it.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: The color of the camera is what I like. Its small size and lightness are very popular with me and my family. Especially my little son, the camera can be put into his pocket. Obviously the camera is not a professional camera, but its price is worthy of its quality. Like it, it’s worthy of praise.

product_name: Digital Camera with WiFi 24.0 MP Vlogging Camera 2.7K Ultra HD 3.0 Inch Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flashlight (RG)
review: Slimmer than the cameras of 3 or 4 years ago, and very good all round for us who need a point and click easy camera.Great little camera. Taking it on holiday to record lots of memories，and the camera is beautifully designed and light in weight, so it is suitable for carrying around.

The quality is amazing but you can not hook up an external mic.,So don’t be like me.,The canon rebel t6i camera have a mic input. So if you need an external mic this camera is not for you,This is a fantastic bundle. The camera itself it more expensive than the bundle cost.,I would have kept it if I didn’t need to return this camera to get the other camera

review: I loved everything about this camera. Easy to use. The lenses interchange quickly. I am an amateur photographer so I am just getting used to all the extras. A fantastic product.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle

review: Havin a blast learning how to use this camera. It’s taking great photos and all the additional lenses and products are easy to use. Any new users, just play with camera. Go through all the settings. See what works for you.
