review: I outgrew my other camera and wanted something a little more up to my speed. This is perfect for the stage I'm in. I'm enjoying playing with all the features and learning manual focus. The telescope lens is awesome. Can't wait to use it. Excellent price for everything in the bundle.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: This is an absolutely great deal for all of the things you get in the bundle. I have a friend that's a photographer and she said it was a great value, and encouraged my purchase. I love it and have been using it since I got it. Also learning alot about photography.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: The connection piece to put the Telescopic lens on did not work, it was the wrong part but I did call the number and they sent me a new piece within two days and were very nice called to check up make sure it was working correctly  and everything was good with the camera so I will say the customer service is excellent. The camera works just how you want your cannon to work. It’s a camera you aren’t gonna get free WiFi or anything from it but if your eye is good enough you’ll get the most beautiful pictures!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This camera battery only charges for two hours at a time. This makes it almost unusable to use to video workshops or anything longer than two hours. It is an inexpensive camera. It is impossible to video while it is plugged in. Does anyone know if there is a stronger battery? I usually really like Sony products, but this was a disappointment.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: It would be nice if it came with book manual for those who are not computer available. Small but nice

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: It is compact and takes great pictures . With the zoom , it brings up shots that you would miss with other cameras . I am well pleased.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Poor build quality. Bought as a gift and I was embarrassed when it arrived. It includes a 220 volt charger (not 120 volt for Americans). Picture quality was worse than my phone.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: A good, inexpensive, "throw down" camera that I can leave in my truck, just in case I don't have my SLR.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Love this camera! It's thin, takes great pictures, you can always adjust brightness, flash etc. The flash takes a while though. It's really bright, but I like that for my pictures. When taking a picture it takes a couple of seconds but I don't mind. It also takes a while to record.  Compared other cameras in this price range and went with this one. Glad I did.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Seems to be working great. got it to replace an older camera that wore out. very happy so far

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Bought this to have a camera on a trip and not just depend on my iPhone. At the end, comparing pix, my iPhone 6+ took better photos than this camera, so we returned it. My husband was the primary photo-taker with the camera, so there's a chance it was "user error" but who's to say?

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Fantastic camera for the value.  I have bought several of this model.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Very handy; fits in a shirt pocket. Not as sharp as some. Biggest problem is obscure method of accessing features. Even showing pics is hard to do because can't find the commands. Poor instructions and poor procedures. That said, it is convenient to carry and snap pics.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Buying this camera was the best decision I made! I have been looking for a good deal on a nice camera for a while and happened upon this gem.The camera not only is amazing in quality, it also came along with a lot of extras that I didn't even know I would need. This is an amazing deal. To anyone just starting out in photography or doing this for fun, don't pass up on this offer. Everything that it came with works, the shipping was fast and nothing was damaged when it arrived. Hope this review helps as I am also one to religiously look through every comment on a product before purchasing.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Unfortunately I did not realize there is a 30 day return policy and I purchased this early as a birthday gift.  I just set it up and tested it (so it would be ready as soon as the gift was open) and quickly realized I cannot give this as a gift.  The picture quality is terrible.  Even with making constant adjustments to exposure, etc., it is difficult to get a decent picture.  I was not expecting a miracle camera at this price, but I did expect decent pictures.  There were so many good reviews!  I don't get it.  Anyway, I am purchasing a different camera.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I purchased the it PowerShot ELPH 180 for my youtube channel as a side camera. It works great. It can take some amazing footage and pictures. It doesn't do too well in low light, but if you have a lot of external lighting, that shouldn't be a problem. I'll probably review this camera on my youtube channel pretty soon. I'll put a link to the video once it's uploaded!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: My old digital compact camera didn't have a USB charging cord and we were on our way to a once-in-a-lifetime tour of Scotland, so I ordered this at the last minute. Great little camera takes wonderful snaps. Rode in top pocket of my pack through trains, planes, busses, taxis, etc. and never a hiccup. Really simple to operate. Just what I needed!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: After I finally got it (took a week to ship it, 2days to get here), I am real pleased with it. It's easy to use. It stays charged well, though I had read reviews that it didn't. I'm no photographer, I just wanted to take some pictures of sun rises and my family, pets, etc. and it does a good job of that.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: What a deal! I've had my camera for a couple months now and I love it. The package comes with so many accessories, this is great for amateur photographers or families wanting something to capture moments beyond a smartphone. The only issue I had was with delivery, it was left in the middle of my porch in the rain. Thankfully I got home before it got too wet and nothing was damaged.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: was looking for a camera that takes better pics then my phone but nothing bulky because I hike alot so dont need extra weight or another thing to worry about not breaking and bam found it with this camera. images are legit super user friendly because I am not tech savy.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: The best camera ive ever had in my life. The experience and the pictures you get are way beyond this universe. Yes, a bit heavy and bulky but that aint matter after you take your pictures and enjoy yourself with this precious treasure. Everyone should buy one of these.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This little camera seems to do very well.  Have used it quite a bit and am very happy with the quality of the pics.  Would recommend this to others for the price.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Obviously will once more, definietly will recommend to others Love it

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: So, am still learning. Will update review later.  For now, it's one of the most beautiful, intriguing cameras.  Everything was shipped with care.  The name, as well is well chosen. Lumix.  I can't wait to learn everything about it.  I am in awe.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: One word to describe this camera: WOW~! I am amazed with its zoom capability. I appreciate it even more after I download the photos to my computer and as I review them, I notice more details that the human naked eyes couldn't even see when taking the photos. It is obviously not a compact camera to accommodate the powerful zoom lens. It is solidly built. I especially love the super wide 20mm lens. Great for party shots when you need to squeeze in a group of people in the frame. Buy it! You will have so much fun using this camera! You might consider becoming a Paparazzi, too. :)

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: It has a fantastic lens: I was at a high school graduation, about 200 feet away from the band, but was able to get a clear close-up of the drummer (my grand nephew). It IS very complicated, meaning it has many, many options -- but I have to confess that I leave it in intelligent auto mode and use it as a point and shoot. It has most of the capability of an actual SLR at a fraction of the cost. The down side is its bulk, it will not fit into most pockets.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Purchased to take on vacation to the Dominican Republic.  Amazed at the clarity and the the zoom feature.  This 60x zoom really brings far off things very close and even holding it without a tripod I had no problem taking clear photos with the anti-shake feature.  Love that the lens is threaded to accept filters and additional lenses.  Also I love that it it has a viewfinder and hot shoe.  At this price point you don't get all that from other makes.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Great zoom.  Lots of features.  Takes some time to learn all features.  Can be more complex than a simple point and shoot.  That is good if you want more features.  WiFi is tricky.  Good camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Love this camera.,I am a proud mom with little ones that are into different outdoor activities.,This is a easy to use camera.,I love taking video with this camera.,The best part is the zoom!!!!!!!,All of my other cameras do not come close to this camera!,I am not Professional or a amateur photographer like my husband, this is the reason why I am not so picky when it comes to megapixels.,If you are using the Nikon D810A or anything of this caliber it does not come close, but for moms like me it is great!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love this camera. Most user friendly camera I have ever used, considering its' capabilities. I feel that a person should print the user manual (all 300 pages of it) to be able to use all of the amazing things this camera can do. Still looking in the manual frequently to make use of the wi-fi options. Explanations are excellent. Panasonic has a winner! One small qwuible. The viewfinder diopter adjustment doesn't stay where I set it. Have to reset it frequently.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: To fully enjoy the use of this camera,  YOU NEED TO READ THE MANUALS, BOTH OF THEM.  YOU NEED TO DOWNLOAD THE ADVANCED MANUAL AND READ IT.  This camera has amazing capabilities.  The zoom capabilities without reverting to the use of the digital zoom are awe-inspiring.  The Intelligent Zoom is better than a digital zoom, and it extends the zoom capabilities to more than the 60x figure.  I have used both.  The intelligent zoom will give you a photo with fewer megapixels, but the distortion common to digital zooming is missing.  Since you're starting with 16.1 mp, you can well afford to reduce the mp for the purpose of getting a long shot, but you don't even have to do that if you use the zoom attachment you can purchase with the adapter.,I also have the adapter for the zoom attachment and the close-up attachment.  I was using a FZ100, and the same accessories work.  For the record,  you can use the regular zoom AND the intelligent zoom with the telephoto attachment which allows you to get magnificent zoom capabilities without using a digital zoom.,This camera also has good wide angle capabilities as well - at least as wide as I ever want.  It doesn't do fisheye.,It has macrofocusing down to 1 mm AND macro zoom focusing, which is delightful and will enlarge the subject.  And I have the close-up attachment as well, although so far the macro zoom has produced pictures I'm happy with, so I haven't used it.  .,It has many different focusing choices.  You need to see what they are and see which one works for you.  The flexible focus is my favorite.  Uses a bit more battery, but it is faster continuous focus than the one labeled continuous focus.  This is why you have to read the directions.  There is also manual focus.  And standard focus.,They have skimped on not making the vewing screen moveable to different angles.  If you want to take a time exposure, you mght want to use the timed shutter release to avoid camera movement, since there is no input for an external shutter button.  And yes, those things would have been nice, BUT I couldn't afford the camera if they hadn't kept the price down.  This is a hobby of mine, not a profession.,This is one whopper of a camera for the price.  I think they economized in the right places and spent the money on the best kind of image stabilization that you can get - a necessity if you are going to use such a zoom.,I have set my camera to limit the shutter speeds (found in the camera menu settings) so that it can't automatically go to too slow a speed.  Panasonic recommends a tripod -- and it's very true that a good tripod helps - but ninety nine percent of the time, when I want a photo, I either don't have my tripod with me, or it's not set up -- so I am handholding shots that should be on a tripod -- because the deer will leave -- or the birds or small animals are active -- I'm often taking a walk, and I use the zoom to photograph wild flowers I can't get close to without getting into poison ivy or some such thing.,My advice for handheld shots is to use the shutter speed limit, so the shutter speed can't go too slow on you.  I often use shutter priority, risking the shot being too dark, but there is also an option in the setup stuff. Often, even if a picture is too dark, you can improve it with software.,The camera also had editing capabilities, but I use Corel's software on my PC.,I take LOTS OF PHOTOS.  If you think you can't hand hold the camera, snap as many photos as you can, and try.  Hold your breath and get your elbows close to your sides -- really - it steadies you -- or find something to lean on, if possible, and do your best.  Sometimes it doesn't work, but often if I take a lot of photos, at least a couple of them will be sharp, because I snapped the picture at just the right moment.,The beauty of digital photography is that you don't have to pay for your flops.  You can just delete them, and keep the good ones.,This is not a professional photographer's camera, although I would bet that pros would have one whopper of a good time with it.  But I don't have the money to buy a pro's camera, nor do I have the ability to carry the camera equipment I used to -- nor do I have the money to spare for excessive film and processing.,SO I am as happy as a hog in a mud waller with this camera.  It take good pictures.  As with any camera, you need to get used to this particular one.  I have a particular combination of metering and exposure that I usually use -- you could vary your choices to suit yourself, BUT YOU WON'T DO THAT IF YOU DON'T DOWNLOAD THE ADVANCED MANUAL AND READ IT.,I went to the trouble to print out the manual, because I studied it in odd places in order to cover the information.  It is convenient to have it on your computer, too, but I wanted a print out.  I printed it one section at a time.,This is a wonderful camera for the money.  If I could afford the setup the National Geographic photographers use, I wouldn't be able to carry it anyway.  This camera is a great deal of fun, and if you will take the time to master the vast number of choices you have available, you will surely enjoy it.,I highly recommend it.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've had the Lumix FZ70 camera for all of two days, and so far I am thrilled with the experience of owning it. The default iA setting produces sharp photos and videos, far superior to my Samsung Galaxy 2 (phone), iPhone 4, and assorted cheap 16MP Canon and Nikon cameras. The picture quality is comparable to and possibly even better than from the Canon 16MP D5100 that costs more than twice as much. Some people may be put off by its light weight and plastic body; it feels solid enough for my needs.  The camera works well in low light, occasionally I got a warning to pop open the flash. I simply pressed a button to do that, and viola the flash fired without requiring any setting changes. Because it is light, compact, yields quality results and is not expensive I am likely to pack it on every trip.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This camera is amazing. I took the first photo attached during the summer wildfire season here in Western Washington. I took it from my balcony with the auto mode and zoomed in. I am not a photographer at all-point and shoot. The second was from the grocery store parking lot of venus same thing, auto-point-zoom-click.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Aweful, I  brought 3 , pictures  are  not clear ,  battery dies  in a week. Won't buy again.  Purchasing a  better camera .

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: It just ok good for a back up spare. Quality not the best.... but I got what I paid for .

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Seems to take decent pictures. No usb cable included in the box. For $85, a $2 USB cable should come standard. Not happy.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Did not take good pictures.  The  pictures were blurry.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Much smaller than I pictured it.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: It broke inside a month.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: If this is the best camera you can buy, get a decent smart phone instead.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Very difficult for a 5 year old to use. Have to hold the button down for a few seconds for the picture to take. Quality of picture not wonderful.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: We found that our cell phones and iPad cameras took better pictures.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I am a professional photographer and came to Tulsa to photograph the NCAA Tournament at the Bok Center.  I did not have a media pass so I could not get in with my Nikon D7100.  I take wide angle photos for  a company that sells tickets.  I have a Nikon point and shoot in the car for these times but it went down on me.  I drove to the closest box store and they had this Nikon Coolpix A10.  I like that it takes AA batteries, a dead battery is what caused this problem in the first place, and that it takes SD memory cards.  The color was great and the photos where very sharp.  The VR worked like a charm in the low lighting of the arena.  I would have much prefered to use my D7100 with the 10-20mm lens but this little pocket camera is perfect in a pinch!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: 4 stars for the camera, and 3 for the accessories.  The one thing this camera lacks is a threaded mount for filters.  Even if you are using the filters to protect the lens, it's important to have the security of a threaded mount, not some force-fit add-on.,Otherwise, my only complaint is the same one I have for any camera that lacks a real viewfinder.  On a bright, sunny day, with the sun overhead, or behind you, no matter how much you turn up the view screen, you'll have trouble seeing much.  Everything else works just fine.,As for the accessories, the tabletop tripod is fine, the rest of the stuff is nothing to write home about, and the rechargable batteries wouldn't hold a charge for 2 weeks,(unused).

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: It’s only the first day of opening up the mystery box and finding all the goodies inside. I bought it for my girlfriend’s birthday and so far she seems reluctant to have it. She hardly read through the manual and is figuring everything out; mind you she is a beginner in photography. So that’s an important note that it is not super complex. With that being said, it is more than a simple camera. With photos, videos, and blue tooth options I say this camera takes beginner to a different level. Not only did we receive the camera, but a bag for it, memory cards, rechargeable batters with the charging port, cleaning kit, a stand and other stuff we are still figuring out. Needless to say this was a great bundle. Will have more to say when more use has been put into it but so far so good.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: The camera is noice, I’ve taken some pictures of my son and puppy and they have come out clear and beautiful pictures especially with the flash. I am taking it to Vegas with me next week so I’ll update on how it goes a week over there. The tripod was a little dented on the leg and stuck. It took awhile but I was finally able to unstick it so hopefully it still works right. The screen protector that came with it didn’t stick at all to the screen I ended up just throwing it away. The bag had all the camera cleaning stuff and I was surprised by how much was in there. The strap seems like it’ll hold tight, but I’ll let y’all know about that on my update of the review. So far I like it and I’m excited to use it at the wedding.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: My wife loves to take pictures, and has used a Nikon DSLR for years. But this camera is so powerful and useful to her that it will be her "go-to" for all quick snaps. She has tried it out in almost all scene modes and is very well satisfied with the results. And having the pics appear instantly on her iPhone is a great plus.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: So far, I'm frustrated. SD card that came in bundle is not compatible with camera, had to order another SD card because camera will only take 4 pictures then reads Memory Full. According to customer service that's how the camera is. That should be included in initial information and why send an SD card in bundle that doesn't work with camera? I'm also disappointed the only way to look at manual is to download it, no paper copies. Much more time consuming scrolling through pages than being able to flip through paper pages. I hope to heck once I get the hang of the camera I'll like it.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: This was a gift and it was the best gift to buy, fast shipping, packaged beautifully. This camera is amazing, the quality and ease is amazing. You can transfer photos from it via Bluetooth to your phone. It’s incredible. The red color is very sharp, the tripod is such a neat idea and perfect addition. Honestly I am just very pleased and my wife is extremely pleased with this gift.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: The camera was nice but I was really disappointed with how I recieved it. Many items were missing and other items were not as depicted in sales pictures. I ordered red Camera but recieved the black one.. (not a huge deal but kind of disappointing) I ended up retuning the package due to missing items.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this camera to replace my older one, similar model but this one is newer.  I love it!  Still learning how to use it but so far I am well pleased and all the extras are amazing. It's a battery operated camera and I like that as you can bring extra batteries, having to charge between uses was a pain.  This one came with 8 batteries, 4 are rechargeable in a charging box!  Wow!!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: The camera itself and what we got have been great thus far seeing as how the wife just got it 48 hours ago. We did not get the mini tripod listed on the inventory sheet. My wife would have preferred to have the software in physical media form and not download codes. The box had a few indentions on it but the camera itself was not damaged, however the bottle containing the cleaning solution had leaked out somewhat and a few items were wet luckily nothing of real value was ruined. Overall I feel it was a good purchase for the money.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I was already familiar with the coolpix line from Nikon so it was super easy to use, excellent picture quality. This upgrade for me was great with the 16 mp and enhanced memory, the camera is also lighter. The only thing I do miss is this camera does not have an eye piece.  The only time that matters is when the sunlight is so bright you can't really see what you are shooting on the viewer screen due to glare.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This is a great camera, especially for the price. I got it because my 6  year old daughter likes taking pictures, and I was worried to get her something expensive. So far it's worked out very nicely

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: When I got home, I couldn't wait to open the package. What I saw was a very beautiful box, which I liked very much.I opened it and found that there was no damage to the product, the logistics was fast, and the picture of the camera was very clear. I was very satisfied, and I will come again if there is any need

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Not 21 megapixels

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Purchased camera for my nieces birthday. She was SO excited to finally get her own camera for taking pictures of her friends. She is beyond excited so win for this Aunt!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Decent camera for kids. It seems to work well. My only concern is that the latch that opens for the SD card and battery seems a bit flimsy and may break eventually. Good news is that you don’t need to open it often since you can charge and read the SD card without opening.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I love this little beginner camera! My 7 year old granddaughter is interested in video and photography. This is perfect for her to take on trips and learn how to take photos. Highly recommend!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I really can't tell you to much, because the first one I got didn't work. And the second one I got wouldn't turn on the second time I charged it. There seems to be a problem with the batteries. It was fully charged and I took a couple pictures. But when I went back the battery was dead. I plugged it into a USB using the cord it came with, but it would turn on again. So I didn't get to take it on vacation with me. But when I got back home my puppy had chewed on the cord. Which really didn't matter, because I was going to return it anyway.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This camera is perfect for trips, parties, and really any thing that you would love to have a portable memory of. The pictures are credit card sized and are actually pretty cool because you can fit them into your wallet, but just as easily combine them for a collage or scrapbook or something. Every single place I've brought this thing, it's been a hit, and people love taking instant pictures that they can carry around with them everywhere. Almost like a portable photo booth.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: When I first got this I almost returned it because it appeared to have a white screen only. It looked as if the contrast was up way too high because I could see and scroll through menus but only if I was looking at the screen from an upward angle. The problem oddly fixed itself after a couple nights in my cold car as I had it prepared for return.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This camera was impossible to program so was never able to use it.  If you got part of it done, you couldn't toggle to the next part as it would take you right back to the beginning.  I gave up out of frustration and returned it.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: So far this is a great point and shoot camera. I would say that I wish it was a bit quicker taking the photo, but it works well for what I wanted it for.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I have bought a Sony cyber shot 2.0 DSC P31,  a Sony 7.2  3X1000,  A SONY 12.1 steady shot,this Sony DSC W830 is a nightmare to try to get it to down load to my computer. I gave up and took,it to a professional  for help which took him almost two hours to get it to down load to my old Sony 7.2 PMB,files , then I have to do back to my 2.0 and 12.1 files to send e-mail out. So now I have two files the DCS W830,and the Sony 7.2 and the photos I can send out in my 2.0 and 12.1 ??? I suggest  if you buy a Sony,get it from a land based store so they can show you how to down load it to your computer before you pay for it.,Like a Best Buy or something. I am going to try a new brand next time four is enough for me. The delivery time was great,Packaging was great, price was great directions sucked.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The camera has some good features, like the 16 X zoom.  I really have not had a chance to try it out as the battery died as soon as I turned it on!  SO...I need a battery charger, for this camera, along with a multiple batteries,and a correct computer cable from camera to computer.  I think it is a good little camera...just off to a bad start.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: It came missing the charging cable which was a good excuse to return it. I couldn't believe how small it was.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Easy to use.  Good picture quality.  The ability to charge the battery in the camera is also a plus. I like the small size.  I can carry it in a pocket.  I am happy I made the purchase.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Pictures are crystal clear. Picture quality similar to miniature Hasselblad. Has Zeiss Lenses..great quality.  Better for outdoor shots than indoor and still life situations.  Color Filters is a nice feature that allows you to highlight a single color in a photo (special effect).  The negative of this camera is it has limited close focus capability.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: after some research, bought this one for my 14 year old to log with, it takes awesome photos, great video, good audio, is VERY small and has image stabilizer. wow. great price, quick shipping thank you!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The camera worked well for a month or so.  It is a cheap camera that is cheap.  Just after the return period, the screen acted up rendering it useless. The camera has an overall cheap feel and the screen was never all that great.  I hope the warranty will fix it.  Other cameras are much better overall.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I use my camera phone for everything, but decided I wanted something with higher MP for when I go on vacation.  The size is great, nice and compact!  Fits easily in your pocket!  Holds a charge pretty well, and takes good enough pictures without having to spend more than $200 on a camera!  Fun features including panoramic and the one where you make a certain color stand out too!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: It is considerably smaller in size than it looks in the picture. Also, it seems like made of cheap plastic and very light, almost like a toy camera. I do not think SONY should even built a camera of this quality. However, picture/shooting quality is not bad. The pictures looked decent enough. It came with a battery and charger. There was no memory card included in the package, neither did any carrying pouch.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: After reading the reviews I was skeptical about the zoom/focus.  After using the camera on a family outing...sure enough when I zoomed in on a subject..it was difficult to maintain a steady hand...and it appeared that my "close ups" were not going to be so good.  To my surprise, when I went to transfer the pictures to a folder..ALL the close ups were in focus and crystal clear. (Just make sure the shutter speed is set faster)  Every thing was delivered on time...seems to be a great "Beginners" camera for those who wish to be a little better than the average "Family Photographer".

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Awesome picture quality ! Not the most intuitive,,,there is a learning curve ! But if you stick with it it pays off with photo quality of far more expensive cameras. I called an 800 Canon number and the technical support tech was OUTSTANDING in her knowledge and patience ! Then there was a hawk in the tree in front of our condo, and I zoomed, and zoomed, and zoomed !!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Love this camera, great price. Love the zoom on this. The picture was taken from Garret Mountain in Paterson, 15 miles from New York City but I still got a great zoom on it.

review: Takes great pictures/video and the zoom lens is absolutely super. In fact, I gave my Nikon DSLR to my grandson as this does everything I need and the picture quality is just as good. I particularly like the case that comes with it, very sturdy ballistic nylon fabric that holds what you need and is nicely padded with a strong removable strap. It zippers and snaps closed.,Very, very pleased so far

review: I have been getting some great shots with it. Some out of my boat in high winds with boat rocking. The zoom is great. Here is one shot, I used the zoom in a very rocky boat at about 150 yards.

review: I LOVE THIS CAMERA. it's excellent for a beginer b/c you just turn the knob and does all the work for you. it also has a good zoom, but not one you can take off and replace with a better one when you b/come a better photographer. i can live with that, except that i want to take pictures of hummingbirds, dragonflies, tiny blooms on native plants and other small birds but if you zoom to much it b/comes blurry. still, i HIGHLY recommend this camera for its beautiful colors and excellent quality.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Great pictures and the app on my i-phone works great with the camera.  I can take picture using my phone and easily upload pics to app and can email or text them right away.  Highly recommend this camera

review: I absolutely love this camera. The camera I had before was the previous model, the SX500IS and I loved that one as well. I'm a professional photographer and filmmaker and felt lost without my camera. Was thrilled when it arrived the day of the Lunar Eclipse and I was able to capture this shot from my home. Easy to use, easy to handle, great results.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: I purchased this camera to make Youtube Videos. For the most part, it was very easy to use. I didn’t need to look at an instruction manual to figure out all the settings.,The pictures may look a bit blurred the moment you take a photo, but after you view your Photo Gallery, it looks really good.,For recording videos, I recommend this for beginner Youtubers. It captures a lot, it comes out pretty good, and you can add-on features to it like a microphone. I do recommend the microphone as it’s better for sound quality.

Best Buy) you would only be offered the camera and the price was about the same.,This camera replaces a Panasonic Lumix that has not been working properly and doesn't have near the scene modes as my Panasonic but the clarity of the pictures from this camera (powershot) along with the larger viewing screen has me excited that I purchased it.,The Imaging World was wonderful in providing quality products as well in the additional items.,I would have given it 5 stars if the camera itself had more scene modes, but I will say the The Imaging World deserves a 5 star rating. product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: I've never owned a camera like this before so I was a little nervous about making a purchase.  I have found this camera super easy to use.  I've played around with the different lens and am just so excited about using it this weekend for a graduation.  I took pictures over the weekend of a family gathering and the pictures are wonderful.  This is a wonderful product with all of the accessories for the price. Thanks!!  Sorry for posting a shed shot, but it was the farthest shot still on our property.  One shot is with the 300 mm and the other is the 500mm lens.  I love this camera so much.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: One of 3 filters(infra red, etc.) in 1 package is broken on arrival. Any possible for replacement?? Please inform me!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: I used this camera in highschool for my photography class but was not there for when they tought you all the tricks on how to use. Plus it didnt have as much stuff. So with the years of rust growin on my photo skills picking up this camera felt natural. Its not to big for my little hands and its super easy to use. Im learning new things every time i play with it. And for the price. Its 100% worth the buy!! I would deff recommend this camera to a new user or expericed one! So excited to start taking pictures again!!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: Bought for my daughter to learn photography with. Best purchase ever for her. This package has taught her a ton and she loves every minute. Picture quality is amazing. 😍

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Wife loves this camera, now can turn photos into bigger pictures.  Loads of options that she can/will use. Only draw back is there is no optical viewfinder.  But she said it wasn't hard to get used to.  Great deal for this camera! It comes with USB cable & battery. Just be sure if you get extra batteries, that they are the right ones.  Great upgrade from her 8MP!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: So for the price, its well worth it, the camera itself is great and all the extra accessories it comes it is just a big plus. The bad does not fit everything but it sure does come close. The only thing is that the 500mm lens does not zoom, i thought it would but it only focuses.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: I am so glad I bought this camera. Super easy to use. Beautiful pictures. Easy to manual focus. I love this camera. I would recommend this camera for anyone who wants to start doing photography.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Cute, lightweight camera! Easy to use!

review: This is a great easy to use digital camera. Especially good for people that are not technophiles but still want a decent way to take pictures without trying to learn how to use an overly complicated camera. As with most low priced cameras of this type there is is a delay between the time you press the button and the time the picture takes so action shots take a bit of thought.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

I went fishing this weekend 3/14/15 and it [the camera] work fine. Its good for making your point concerning property problems.  When a person needs proof just use the sony w800/B. Just think of all of the shots that a person can take and an added bonus its a video camera as well. I work in the freight buss. and as a union empl. a person needs proof or as they say in the business world documentation.,"JUICE"

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

review: ordered this camera after my old one was stolen-this is small, lightweight and has very high resolution. Easy to use and carry in shirt pocket. as a basic camera, I am very pleased! 5x zoom is clear and easy, and the battery lasts a long time between charges. The free online sony software for photos is good for organizing your pictures, converting for e-mail or facebook and saving albums and categories.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: My camera is only 6months old and it does not open and close. The lenses is stuck at half open and the camera does not stay on. I can t even get it to stay open or closed. What's wrong with it. I changed the batteries twice and it still does the same thing. I have barely used it these 6 months and I am so disappointed. Please advise me on what can be done to fix this problem. Thank you.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Purchased this for my 7 year old granddaughter.  It was easy for her to learn to use, and produced reasonably good photos.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
