product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Simple, easy to handle, and takes great pics.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This little camera is great for a point and shoot. My daughter has been begging me to get her a camera and I wanted something nice but not expensive in case she breaks it. This camera is far better than I expected. The zoom is good and the quality is great. It’s lightweight and takes great photos.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Bought this camera to shoot the video.  Was looking for pocket size camera with nice fixtures, not too pricey.  It is not a well known brand however quality is nice.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Since long time I was looking to buy a mini digital camera that is handy, easy to use and small in size and then I found this mini digital camera and I decided to give it a try. After using it for several days, I feel that this is one of the best camera that one can expect to have. It is really small in size, exactly what I was looking for which easily fits in your pocket. This camera takes the best quality picture at 18 Mega pixels. It also has 8X zoom feature which is really great. I have uploaded couple of sample pictures that I have taken with this camera. I am not a professional photographer but this digital camera is so awesome that anyone can become a photographer. It is very easy to carry around this camera and this camera is better than other bulky and expensive cameras. So far I am using it without any problems and enjoying taking pictures with this camera. It comes with the software CD for editing, printing and sharing photos. I haven't used that software because I use another software for that purpose. Overall, I am highly satisfied with this digital camera and I think this camera is a great value to your money as you can take good quality pictures with it. I highly recommend this camera to everyone and I am sure that you will not be disappointed with your purchase.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: We have been wanting a cheap camera for a while, when we just don't want to use our phones or our big camera.  This one seemed to fit the bill, but I was surprised because of the price being so low. We used this on a trip to Washington, but also took some pictures around the house. The pictures came out surprisingly well! Each file is about 1 to 2 megabytes in size, and the videos are as long as you take a video. The video was what surprised my daughter the most, who takes tons of pictures. She has a $800 camera, but doesn't always like to take it out while we are walking. She used this one the entire trip and was very happy with it. It is not grainy like some other cameras, and takes very nice pictures. Not blow up 2 wall size quality, but you could blow it up to a small poster and be very happy. Specially if your picture is still. It is a solid camera, and feels like it will stand up. And for the price, you cannot beat it. It does take a SD card and not a micro SD card, but nowadays that is not a problem because they all come with adapters. We are actually going to keep this in our car for when we take short trips that way we always have it with us.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: We as a family have been doing more outdoorsy events and I hate always bringing my phone because I am afraid to lose it or break it. I wanted to get a small, lightweight camera to take with us for when we go on hikes or even for camping which we do a lot. This takes some fairly nice pictures. It zooms well, however when you zoom if you do it too close it does appear to be a little fuzzy. Maybe I just can't figure out how to use it properly, it's been a long time since I have used a real camera and not an iPhone. Overall I think this was a great product and a good price point. Well worth the money. Plus, i don't have to get scared to let my 2 year old or 7 year old take pictures.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I wasn't expecting much from this, I only wanted a camera that was a) cheap and b) would provide a better quality image than the average smart phone camera. But the image quality is truly amazing. I will upload a few customer images of my hiking trip as an example. An SD card is absolutely necessary, the internal storage can only hold 3 maximum quality images.I did have one problem with the camera, the battery that came with it refused to take a charge. Amazon made up for this by offering me a 40% refund to buy a new battery, and the battery was much cheaper than the $31 refund I got so this issue wasn't even reason enough to take a star off. Overall great camera and great customer service from Amazon.I've only owned this for a month and only used it for 2 days for a hiking trip so I can't speak on long term survival of this camera. I will update my review if I have any other issues. Be sure to check for my customer images if you want an idea of the maximum image quality.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is a very simple designed camera with very easy to use interface. Though my phone can shoot great photos and videos, I like the appeal of simple point and shoot camera like this one. The image and video quality is decent, it would be foolish to compare it with a DSLR. I guess it works well as an introductory camera for kids. I remember my first digital camera when I was a teenager, it reminded me of those days. Good value when bought with discounts or coupons. I wish it came with a sd card though. This camera made me nostalgic and I am thinking of gifting it to my 10 year old nephew. I think he will love it. Flash is super bright, night mode is bit grainy but okay.  I do not do much digital zoom, but it works. Display is basic and bit laggy, so viewing on desktop would be wiser. Very simple camera, very handy, can have it as a back up or can use it just for fun. Loved the simplistic appeal and nostalgia.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: The description leads you to believe that this isn't a pro level camera and it isn't. However, it does make for an excellent first-time camera for my kids. The focus and flash work very well and while the photos may tend to be a little pixelated if you zoom too much, it's very adequate otherwise. Battery charge holds for a good time. Since the video is 720p, it's not going to provide UHD level quality but the playback suited the kids just fine. Great deal for the features you get.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I really liked that this camera has a sleek design and fits comfortably in your hand, it’s not bulky like a lot of the cameras. It's super thin. It came with easy to follow set up instructions. Taking pictures was easy and anyone can do it. My 4 year old  even took pictures with this camera.,Its come with a 2.7 inch LCD screen and 8X digital zoom, 18 mega pixels and it's can take pictures or record video.  Also it is Multifunction: Anti-Shake, Face Detection, Smile Capture, Continue Shot, and Self-timer.,The pictures were clear and looked to be the same quality of any other digital camera I have purchased in the past. For the price and convenient of it I recommend this digital camera.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This camera takes great pictures for the price. It also has a pretty good zoom on it. When you soon it doesn’t distort the picture like other cameras do. I am impressed how many megapixels it is for how compact it is and how low cost it is.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I thought since the camera was a 20.1mp it would be a great camera but my iPhone 6S Plus takes better photos. The photos are not clear and a lot of the time it’s blurry. It’s not operator error either I’ve used many cameras and never have they been as bad as this one. I’m going on vacation so I’m going to use my iPhone for the photos. Don’t waste your time or money on this horrible camera.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: We got this camera for a 7 year old. It's compact and easy to use, but takes at least a second to respond after you press the shutter button. It also tends to select slow exposures (like 1/30 sec), even when using the flash. And it often simply does not focus. The result is that around 2/3 of the photos from it are either badly out of focus or show motion blur. It's frustrating because our daughter has a knack for photography and loves having her own camera, but this one is thwarting her efforts. I don't know if there are any good cameras in this price range; this one is pretty much a waste of money.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Takes great photographs, easy to use,  light, compact.  I think the screen on the back is a good size.  Nice zoom. 5x.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I am editing this review on 9-16-18 after having trouble with the auto focus and exposure. I have set the camera exposure to spot with much better results on the focus and the color/exposure of the photos under fluorescent lighting.  Photos look nice when exposure is correct and it is focused. Kinda slow to turn on.  I take photos of engines I build and am turning it on and off a  lot.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Before I begin, my previous camera was a Sanyo vpcT1496R 14MP camera.,The people that say their phones are better either have brand new phones, which some of them come with 13MP+ cameras....or got a defective camera.,This is a good camera. I can actually use the zoom and it isn't always a blurry blob. (It can still be a blurry blob depending on settings, but it doesn't have to be) I haven't really messed with any settings. I've put it to where the display shows standard and not the actual quality of the photo to save battery, and the pictures still look way better than my old camera. I can't wait to someday go to the zoo and take pictures with this thing.,The battery life is fine.,I bought this from Focus Camera on Amazon. I mention this due to the one problem. I got the European version and I live in America. It came with a European charger which isn't compatible with American plugs. It came with an adapter that isn't even listed in the parts that can come with the camera....which means this could've been a used camera (albiet one that was taken care of) since someone had to open it to add the adapter that doesn't come with it. The adapter could be a POS and cause problems. Amazon did fix it by letting me order a charger and refunding me the amount (Amazon, not the seller). Note: the authentic looking chargers (the ones that look like the one it was supposed to come with) are the ones where you take the battery out to charge it. Which I dislike because that means every charge....gotta put the date in and everything (warning for those who get the correct charger),Minus the charger thing, it's a good camera. It's fairly cheap as well. Sony usually has good quality in their electronics, though you can always get a dud.,Edit: Since reviewing this, things have changed: This thing is flimsy. Out of NOWHERE the part that pushes out and pulls in the lens broke so now the camera refuses to do anything beyond tell me to turn it off and on again. So I can't suggest you buy this camera unless it's the only half decent one in your price range.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: This camera is crap.  The pictures are so blurry that I get disappointed every time I even try to use it.  I am better off just using my phone because the quality is better.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: It takes wonderful pictures but it has a terrible glitch!  The button used for taking the pictures gets stuck and you have to do it twice to get a picture!  As I bought this to take pictures of my puppy (now a dog), it's very frustrating because he is not going to stick around for me to get the pic!  I usually end up with a picture of the ground because he is gone by the time I punch the button twice.  Sadly, I have missed out on so many great pictures of him.  I have put up with this for a few years now but I am going to start looking for a new one now.  :(

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Okay, but not great.  For the cost of this camera and the specs it listed, I expected a better produce.  The camera itself feels cheaply made and the quality of the pictures were average.  It was also difficult to take pictures without getting blurry shots.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I bought this little camera for a trip because I knew I'd run out of storage space on my iPhone. It fits in a pocket, so it's easy to carry and handy. I could take all the pictures I wanted with this camera, but my iPhone is easier to use and those pictures were of better quality. Since the trip, this camera just sits. Eh.I'll take it on another trip, in case, but now I have a new phone with more storage, so this will just be my backup.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: no manual control of flash or focus. Focus impossible trying to focus on a ring stone when camera insisted on focusing on background. I could find no way to control lighting. Long wait for shutter to fire, couldn't tell exactly when. Normal snapshot operation & software o.k.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I have to admit I am pleasantly pleased with this camera. It came with everything described and it even came with extra non rechargeable batteries so I could turn it on and start shooting. Everything except the tripod was able to fit into the case, which is fine because where I'm using it I won't need a tripod.  Connecting it to my android phone with the Nikon Smart Bridge App was simple and easy. Being able to download the pictures to my phone so I can share them without a computer is an amazing feature. I would recommend this camera to friends and family.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I love the camera itself. My daughter is just getting into photography and saved up her money to buy this bundle. It came with the items shown, although not the exact items. The only thing we didn’t receive was the Paint Shop Pro x9 as displayed. I also checked the bundle items to make sure I didn’t misunderstand the picture and reached out to the seller and haven’t had much luck yet. I’ve read that there were download codes, but we got nothing. I’m willing to change my review to 5 if I can get this part fixed.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: My daughter saved all of her birthday, Christmas, and chore money to buy this camera for herself, and even at 12 years old, she takes really good pictures with it! She has only looked at a page or two in the manual, plus my husband has given her some pointers. The camera does all of the work for her.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Great first camera. Plenty of filters and options for my use as a vacation/family camera. For the money I like the value. Zoom is beyond expectations. Dislike the screen as I wish it would flip around to front  facing, however it is clear and works fine. Zipper pulls on case broke off immediately. Came up with homemade replacements easily. All in all though I would recommend.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: This package came very quickly and the camera works great. The only reason for the one star, however, is that I was under the impression that I would be receiving a digital download of Paintshop Pro, which was sort of a deciding factor for me to buy this product. I did not receive any card or disc or anything of the sort which is very irritating.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Wi-Fi connectivity is advertised, and I bought this camera based on that premise so pictures could be uploaded to the computer in that manner. There is no Wi-Fi connectivity. What it does have is some proprietary connection using an app that is not even available for a Windows PC. Wouldn't have made this purchase had this information been clearer.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Just learning but the camera is almost easy to use right out of box.  The camera arrived a day early. My husband took it out the box and we started using it. The picture quality is great and love the movable screen,  Can take pics from any direction.  The availability of using  wifi and connecting to phone is also great. Can't  believe the price for the package deal.  Well worth it.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Got the camera in for a trip we are taking to Europe. Everything is great, could not think of anything I would need to buy outside of this bundle except more memory cards. The camera took great pictures and videos, auto focus is good. The only downside for us was that the microphone would not pick up sound (conversation and narration) well, unless the photographer was doing the speaking. We anticipated this, so we bought an external microphone, unfortunately this camera (and all those in its class, Canon, etc) do not allow for external microphones, so we are returning it, as we have to buy a much more expensive camera to accomplish this.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Excellent seller. Everything was delivered on time and packed up nicely. All things in the photo were included. Great deal. I could not be any happier. Camera works perfectly and today I'll head into the mountains to give it the real test of quality.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: The camera has all the features that I need such as Wi-Fi am Bluetooth features. I'm able to control the camera from both my smartphone and my iPad  simply amazing.  I would have preferred to get a mean you will with the camera however I was able to go one line and download the manual

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Don't waste your time if you actually want sharp clear pictures.  This thing is horrible.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: A really compact digital camera which has reasonable results. Easy to operate it fits well into shirt pockets avoiding bulky transportation issues. Excellent price and fast delivery. Highly recommended for general picture taking. Wouldn't suit purists, though! If you don't want to be bothered with carrying around bulky equipment and get a reasonable set of holiday photos, this could be for you.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I bought this camera for my daughter to use. She loves taking pictures and the price was right! Only $40 was a great deal. This camera is lightweight and perfect for her or anyone. It has great picture quality and comes with 2 rechargeable batteries. It is also small enough for her to put in her pocket or purse. Would recommend this camera to anyone looking for a good quality camera at a low price.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This camera is small, lightweight and easy to use. My kid likes it and it is good enough for beginners to take pictures. Quality is also good at such a price! Happy with the purchase.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I got this for a cruise and it is perfect for a trip because it is so small and portable. It took me a couple of minutes to figure out but the directions were so easy to follow. It comes with 2 batteries as well so I know I will never lose a charge!! Yay

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: It is currently the most cost-effective handheld camera, and the overall use is satisfactory. After I took a few shots, I felt that shooting portability is too important. Let me talk about personal feelings: 1. Anti-shake, this must be praised. The effect is really cool, especially when you look at the lens and face the stabilizer when you shake the camera. 2. Multi-camera, controlled by mobile phone, the current two devices test results are super good. I am prepared to have another one, and unified control is very practical. 3. Tucao power supply design: the battery is not very durable.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I am not happy with the quality of the pictures. The camera seems okay built, but I'm not fond of it.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Very disappointed - my daughter took this camera to camp and every picture is blurry.  So no memories to keep from this one.  We think it's because the slide switch was set to the flower for close-ups, and she did not realize to change that.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Purchased this camera as a gift for my daughter and she will love it! It's small and lightweight and simple to use. As well as inexpensive and a great as a starter camera. I can't wait to see all of the fun she will have capturing her own adventures!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Bought this is March 2019 to prsctuce using before Paris trip May 2019. Camera was great until 2nd day in Paris. Charging failed or blew I don't understand. Charged fine at home and also 1st night in Paris. So sad. This is what I bought it for was Paris.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This camera meets all the basics of a compact, budget digital camera.  The pictures were good quality.  My biggest complaint about this camera is the very slow recharge time between taking photos.  Yes, there is a "burst mode" to take many pictures in just a few seconds, but this will not use the flash.  When you take a picture, there is a short delay, the picture shows for 10-15 seconds for a review, then a short delay before you can take the next picture.  This is not acceptable to me, but what can I do?  I could not find any settings to change this, could not find any instructions that explained this.,I was not too upset when I dropped the camera in the river and fried it.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This camera takes good pictures, but you have to make sure you are in a well-lit area although it has a flash on it.  Otherwise, the pictures come out dark, but overall I am very pleased with it.  Also, please note that it does not come equipped with a memory card, so you have to purchase one separately.  I would recommend this camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I use this camera for writing estimates that have to be sent on the internet. So pictures are taken at very low Megapixels so they transmit without creating large file sizes. Photo taking action is pretty slow but the pictures seem to come out good. We have to let the auto focus finish adjusting before a picture is taken so it doesn't get blurry. I would try and do action photos.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Had an earlier model which doesn't work because I can't recharge it.  I accidentally used the wrong camera's USB plug in on this camera and ruined the recepticle.  So be very careful putting your cord in because Sony's cords do not match other similar type cameras.  Otherwise this model is very easy to use and takes nice pictures.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Great little camera for the money.  It is small enough to fit in a small purse or jacket pocket but takes nice photos.  I got this for a trip to Disney and my photos turned out great.  Recommend this camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This is the neatest little camera.  I bought it for a weekend visit to the  mountains in the fall.  So handy just kept it in my pocket,  So easy  just point and shoot.  I have several other cameras but they are more complicated and take more time.  The pictures turned out as well as my more expensive cameras. This has become my favorite camera  for everything.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I bought this to replace a Sony camera I bought two years ago very similar. I had lost that camera and bought this one as it was similar in the controls and functions.  About a month after this camera came I found the lost camera. Well now I have Two!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Wanted a nice, small camera as I need high quality, clear pictures to do home inspections. This camera has provided that! Pictures always come out great and it is very simple to operate.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The cameras I purchased are very small, well constructed. Picture quality is amazing. Don't let poor quality of the viewing screen deter you from purchase. You will be pleased with actual prints. Battery is very good and easy to charge.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I own another sony camera that takes great photos so I wanted a smaller lighter weight one. This does not take clear photos especially for a 20MP camera. Would not recommend.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Perfect for keeping track of projects, before, during, and after, without a lot of unnecessary functions, easy point and shoot, very clear images, easy to transfer to computer files. Just plain easy!!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: It's a great little point and shoot.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: A great deal with more then you would get if you went shopping for a digital camera.  The case however is too small to carry a few extras, like the tiny tripod.  I had to find another case.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: haven't used it yet, but it is replacing a similar one that I loved,don't like that there is no manual with it though

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: This camera has all the features I had hoped for including 8x optical zoom, great resolution and a movie camera all combined in one very small unit.  Handy to have available for any occasion.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: At my age i have to read the instructions very , very carefully . Son explained some of the advantages .I WILL ENJOY,THIS FOR A VERY LONG TIME.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Works great!  Fun and easy storage portable little cameras.  Thank you

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Like the size of the camera and how easy it is to use. Great bundle. Great picture quality.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Product poorly made  battery cover does not close well. Gaps in closing  Battery would not charge in accompanying charger

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Took pictures of my garden

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I bought this at the big-box retailer with the blue store front and starts with a W. Try as I may, I just am not getting good pictures from this camera. I don't expect super quality, but my dear departed Canon Powershot in the same price range did a far superior job with both clarity, contrast, focus,speed of picture storage, and every other aspect of picture taking.  It is far too late to return it, so it will end up in a drawer somewhere, or I will give it to a child wanting a first camera. I can't recommend this camera.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I ordered this elsewhere because my other digital camera I have been using since 2010 finally kicked the bucket.  I needed something with better megapixels anyhow.  My Canon PowerShot went up to 10MP.  Since this one has 16MP and was very affordable, I decided to give it a whirl.,Great pictures, easy to use, nice features, but one thing that still baffles my mind...NO CABLE!  You mean to tell me for $80+, you couldn't throw in a $5 USB cord?  I'm sorry, but that's awfully cheap of Nikon.  Even my dinky camera from seven years ago included one.  So I had to make, yet, another purchase in order to transfer the pictures onto my PC.  Even though you have a card reader as an alternative solution, I don't know anybody in the world that has one.,I'd also like to mention that, every time you replace the batteries, the darn thing resets back to default, meaning the date and such has to be reprogrammed.  The self-timer doesn't stay.  I have to keep setting it for every single picture.  Again, my last camera didn't do this.  As well, the tripod mount on the bottom is too far to the left, which can cause it to tip over if not balanced correctly.,Overall, it's okay, but come on Nikon, give your customers a cable.  Don't make them go out of their way to purchase something extra for whatever oddball reason you see fit not to include something that's essentially required in order to make full use of your product.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Not worth the money.  You get the camera with batteries and thats it.  No memory card or a battery charger.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: First off, it does not come ready to use out of the box. It does not include a memory card or a cable to transfer images to a computer, as my circa 2011 camera did. Slow to focus and there is no way to override the autoflash to turn the flash on. You can turn it off, but as far as the autoflash, it makes the decision as far as when a flash is needed, and it's often wrong...

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I bought the camera/card package and of course, after turning on the camera for set up, I get a message card cannot be used. No explination of why...just cant use. Totally sucks. Found an old SD Card and put it in took a couple photos with NEW batteries, batteries dead.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Just got the Coolpix camera and the SAMSUNG  EVO SELECT 32  CARD will not word with this camera.  I found an older SD card and it worked okay.  With the older card the photos looked blurred or not sharp.  I'll pick up a new SD card soon and give it another try.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: It a great Nikon

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Returned.  A sad Joke of a preoduct.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Extremely blurry photos. Have never had this problem with any other camera.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: love this camera! so easy to use and lightweight. takes awesome pics!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I think this camera and brand are a little under- rated.  I am not a professional photographer but it has great features some of which a professoinal camera has.  Been very pleased with the quality and performance.  It does struggle a bit with clarity in low light situations, which in my experience is not terribly uncommon.  I have not done enough manual adjustments to exposure and white balance see if this can be overcome.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I like everything about the new camera and despite having owned it for awhile, I am still learning about the many different things that I can do.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This particular camera gives you everything you need.  Not everything great but definitely good enough. Good focus on stills, Easy Video w/4K, great zoom ability, Wi-Fi capability ( to share pictures with others), light weight, Close-up and Action options, Editing, Menu with several different setting to choose from (I'm still learning them all).  If you don't want the heaviness of a DSLR with the versatility of always available zoom and quick switch capability to Video then this is the camera for you.  I haven't missed shots like I use to with my Canon Rebel, great camera itself but sometime to too long to switch zoom lenses, find the right setting to shoot, and instantly ready for whatever.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Very good camera. I was looking for camera with zoom and this camera was within my budget. It has got very good image quality and can focus and shoot at high speed. You can transfer photos to your smart phone using wifi option in this camera.  Just download image app from play store and select camera's SSID from the wifi listing. 4K video is another advantage. You need class 3 xcd memory card for 4k video recording. I recommend this camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I bought this camera for the zoom range, and I am very pleased with that aspect. However, a couple of other things could be improved. For example, the burst rate/buffering is pretty limited. Rapid fire shots (like I am used to doing with my DMC-FZ200) are limited to 2-3 and then there's a substantial wait until the buffer is flushed to the disk. This effectively forces me to be very selective about when I push the release button, especially when I'm shooting action scenes. Another issue is the fixed monitor screen, which isn't much help when the camera is pointed at the sky. Again, I'm spoiled, I suppose, by the FZ200's rotating display. Another surprise came when I tried to take some long exposure night sky shots and found that the camera controls the limits on ISO and shutter speed. This was in P mode, so I need to do some more experimentation before I give up on using it for these sorts of shots.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've used a SLR digital camera for many years and the lite weight of this camera concerns me. This may not be a bad thing just used to a much heftier product. My grandson ,20, picked it up and was using it immediately where I ,63, have been trying to figure it out for days.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Great camera, not a direct competitor to the P900 but definitely faster processing and better all around capabilities. With a teleconverter you can get out to P900 range but you have to use a tripod. The image stabilization is far less capable than Nikon's. The android app is particularly useful when using a tripod, even allowing for control of focus. It puts the Nikon app to shame.,The best teleconverter I've found is the Olympus B-300 1.7x which can be found on ebay. Its lightweight enough that it can be attached directly to the lens without using an adapter. Just understand that your image stabilization doesn't work when you do that, and you'll need to use a tripod. I couple this with a Bescor MP101 pan tilt head to take ultra long range shots.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Camera did great. Wide lense doesn’t work. They won’t just replace this one piece. Amazon wants me to send everything back.This was a gift I got for someone. I am really disappointed.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Pretty nice camera and overall I'm satisfied, but I do have a gripe or two.  The major criticism I have thus far is that the writing on the buttons is already wearing off, despite treating the camera gingerly.  I've had the camera less than 3 months and one button is illegible already.  Very disappointed with that aspect.  Also, soon after my purchase, the lens cap fell apart while attaching it.  One of the tiny springs shot out, never to be found, so the cap no longer stays on the lens.  I've never had similar problems with my Nikon and Canon products.,EDIT:  10/6  - I have to lower my rating again at this point.  The sticker trim that's around the lens has begun pealing off.  I've not even used the camera in a few weeks.  Took it out of its case and it's hanging off.  Can't be "stuck" back on readily.  I think Panasonic really cut corners on the fit and finish of this camera.  Although the image quality is very good, at this point I'm starting to regret my purchase because I'm not confident the thing will hold together over time.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: awesome,  perfect for learning and easy instruction booklet.  i am happy with all the extras this camera came with for such a great price

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I really like the camera so far and have so much to learn.  I really don't know what I'm doing with it yet but the pictures I've taken come out great and it's easy to use.  I love that you can sync the photo's to your smart phone and also control the camera from across the room with your phone.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: My first SLR and I have loved shooting with it. All the extra items are a great addition to the camera. Def a good bargain deal.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Sorry I bought this. I have had two Lumix Point and Shoot cameras and absolutely loved them. They were small and great price and took incredible photos. I avoided buying a DSLR just because they took such good photos. So when I saw this Lumix FZ70, I thought wow, this is going to be a great camera. I didn't like the larger size, but it sounded like it would have such great options and who could pass up that 60X zoom! Sadly, I have been disappointed. In fact I was taking photos at an event with this new camera, and the action photos were so bad, I ended up pulling out my little Lumix DMC-ZS25 and used it to take my photos. We read through the big on-line manual to see how we could take better photos, but to no avail. Absolutely cannot take action shots with this camera. The subjects are always out of focus. The IA setting was useless. We even went to the manual settings, trying every combination, but again no luck. I had bought this to take action shots of dogs running in agility competition. My little Lumix ZS25 camera did such a great job but got dust on the sensor and it would cost more than the price of the camera to fix. So we bought this one as a replacement and sorry we did. Can't return it because the instructions say you can only return unopened products. Of course we opened it. We used it. Should have just put the money toward a DSLR.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've adjusted every setting that I possibly can and it still is noisy inside. Other than that, the camera takes amazing quality pictures for the price!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Great bundle but it’s a Christmas gift for my daughter. I have a Cannon Rebel t2i (a dinasour) but is still an excellent camera. I can only imagine how great this model will be.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This is an excellent camera for the price point.  I have now done over a dozen photo shoots with this camera.  The photo quality is outstanding.  The camera is easy to learn and use.  The instruction manual is well written.  I highly recommend this item!  It shipped fast.  It was packaged extremely well.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this camera a month ago, Every product seen is every product you get in the box. Nothing in the box was damaged, all packaged well. I'm very happy with this purchase. It was a great price for everything you receive. I definitely recommend this product to other photographers.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I’m still learning to use the camera I like all the stuff you get with it.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Best camera ever with an incredible package.  The only thing I bought for it was a an SD card with more memory

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This product fulfills its exact purpose without interuption. Absolutely phenomenal for this price. This review was written several months after use. All of the extra's are not the highest quality but this package destroys the competition.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I just got it and am still learning to use it, but it seems to me fairly straight forward. I’m getting some clear pictures, but also some that are blurry. Learning curve.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: This camera takes AMAZING pictures.  Only rated 4 stars on the zoom because when it zooms to an certain number it’s very pixelated and unrecognizable.  But that’s the only thing I can see with this camera.  I’m in love with it and it’s amazing. I would definitely recommend this camera to friends and family

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is just what I was looking for. Simple to use, not too expensive, lightweight and compact. I bought the package which included a nice case, extra battery and charger, tripod, etc. I am so happy with this camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Love love this camera. Easy to use and great picture. Also great price for having all the bells and whistles included in the package. I could not be happier.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I loved the camera, but I had accidentally bought the wrong one, so I just got around to sending it back.,The zoom on this thing is incredible. I could see people from my second floor apartment across the parking lot when I tested it out.,Very easy to use, light, and solid design.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: It takes for ever to take the picture The  flash  does not even work properly and When the picture is taken the imagine come out so blurry very poor pixels

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: This was purchased as a gift. We were pleased to give such a comprehensive camera gift rather than just the actual camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: This was written sometime in January 2018, but submit was never pushed. Enjoy,Everyone seemed to rave about this camera, but my crappy cell phone takes better pictures. I've tried to take pictures at my grandson's basketball games and any motion creates a blurred picture. I've tried to zoom on him while he's not even moving and that gets blurry. Point and shoot maybe at birds, but this isn't working for me. So far I have been to 3 games with it and the game today I stopped shooting because the pics were only a blur. I hope there is a simple answer because I want to like the camera. Unfortunately so far after a week this is not the case.,Update...Sent a question to the seller and his first response was image stabilization on. Well yes it was, duh. So I told them that and the next response was "Then I’m not sure what to say". Very helpful. Just spend your money on a better product as based on what I have this is junk.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I got this set for my daughter for her birthday. She loves it. It was delivered quickly and in excellent condition. It takes high quality pictures for the ease and the price.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Wife cant put it down.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Best semi-pro camera you can get for its price range, definably a good entry level for semi-pro enthusiasts like my self looking to learn the magic of photography. Take a note and buy some filters with it too, and a nice strong Tripod, amazon offers a nice one from its basics line: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005KP473Q/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o00_s01?ie=UTF8&psc=1

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: I was used to a very expensive DSL for years. It was heavy and took brainpower. As I am now 63 I wanted a cameras with cool features but more user friendly with good pic quality. I was nicely surprised. However it would be wise to watch tutotials on YouTube as it makes it easier to learn the features.  I think this package deal u(is awesome. 2 Batteries and two S cards, as well as other goodies makes this a really sweet deal!!---

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: I bought my first Canon (35 MM) while I was in the USN stationed overseas.  Had found out that the Navy photographers used Canon products and that was enough for me.  That was a used one and heavy....After my retirement, I bought a Canon Rebel which I still have.  (uses film so ..).  My next purchase was a Canon Elph which takes excellent pictures.  And,now this one!,The vision in my right eye has deteriorated and the Elph screen was a little small for me to see the scene like I wanted.  I love to take pictures and decided to purchase this one.  The quality of pictures is excellent, it is easy to use and the battery life is good, so far.  I have taken over 60 pictures and haven't had to charge the battery yet.,I am still in the learning mode but the camera reminds me of the first Canon I owned in the early 1970's.  The service representatives at Canon are outstanding.  I had to call them with the "Elph'" once when I couldn't get the pictures to transfer to the PC.  Most patient with me when I told them I was visually impaired.,This one comes with a small tripod, a nice case plus a few other accessories.  When the eagles soar overhead this summer,  I am in hopes of catching them in flight.  Plus, I live in the 'boonies' so lots of wildlife around my cabin.  Will definitely come back and edit this review if anything changes with this camera.,One other thing is that I don't have a cell phone as they don't work in the area that I live.  So, am unable to make a comparison with a cell phone.,Excellent, just excellent and I couldn't be more pleased with this Canon camera and my purchase.,Edited to add a couple of pictures taken the other night.  The first one is without magnification and the second picture is with the 50 X.  Am still learning the functions on the camera and having a lot of fun in the hills of Vermont...  And, hoping the full moon event will be a clear night...,Most highly recommended.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Has great zoom for a lesser expensive camera. Closeups great too. Everything advertised came with the order. Although I haven't yet used all functions, I am pleased with straight shooting. One question: there is a dial behind the shutter button bur no where in the manual does it tell it's function. Haven't figured out what it does yet.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: I really like this camera!!! I'm not a professional whatsoever and the quality of the camera is fantastic!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: This camera is perfect. I wanted a beginner's camera so I can get used to everything and eventually work my way up to an expensive/pro camera.  The quality is 16mp, but the pictures still come out really good. It came with anything that I needed. 2 rechargeable batteries, the battery charger, mini tripod, 2 ss cards, screen protectors, screen cleaner,  a card reader  and the camera carrier. I'm not sure why people are complaining about the bag size but it fits perfect for my camera and a couple of other things. The couple of things I didnt like was the very complicated straps.. took me a min lol. and the cleaner was leaking. But nothing else was affected

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: This is a great camera at a great price. What I like the best is the true color quality of the pictures. I take a  lot of pictures of sunrises. I've rarely been satisfied with true color quality until I bought this camera. Easy to use. Quick delivery by the seller. This camera is a keeper.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Good quality pictures and video, especially for the price.,Unfortunately, there aren't a lot of options to mess with and getting the pictures off the camera with the wireless features is a bit of a pain the ass.,Would recommend to a beginner photographer or someone who casually likes taking photos.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Pretty good little camera for cloudy days, NOT for sunny days, the LCD screen is difficult to see in bright light.,I lost a great chance for some good close up shots of antelopes due to not being able to focus & aim properly because of the bright light! Selling/trading for camera with a view, finder.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More

review: Needed an inexpensive camera to use on the job.  Since our contracts are "dirty" jobs, we needed something that would give great pics but hold up to a little wear and tear.  We've damaged too many expensive cell phones.  This is small and fits into pockets easily and give great pics.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: i like this product so much.it come with a cute white box.it can record HD video, and clear when i use my computer or projector to play it.i can control it use one hand and the remote control is really helpful.i like the big touch screen and it can do a big angle rotation.the battery is long ,better than every camcorder i used before.it comes with cable to connect TV ,computer and projection.pretty easy.so far it works great.good for travel and daily use. worth the money~

review: On the off chance that you are searching for a decent quality camera that is anything but difficult to utilize this is your camera. Must state I certainly got what I needed. The best part about it is thay it brings a USB wire and for a reward 2 batteries. It doesn't come woth a memory card however you can get one at any drug store or practically any store. I got it as a blessing and when I set it up to make sirr it functioned admirably I chose to keep it 😬. An absolute necessity get and the cost is certainly not terrible.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: My little cousin wanted a camera so I bought him this. The picture quality is good, the zoom is great for the size, and the battery holds. It did take a bit of time to setup. Not sure if I'm slow or there were just too many steps. Regardless, he's been using the camera for a couple of weeks now and loves it.,*You need to buy your own SD card. It does not come with one.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Old fashion camera that can be taken anywhere.,Auto focus is alright and picture quality as well, I can now store my favorite pictures in this small device without having problems worry about my phone memory.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Very interesting and amazing camera!,I'm happy to talk about the camera. Very easy to use and lightweight is very easy to use.,Photo and video quality is great!,Battery charge is very fast. The camera is awesome and shoots. I received my order very soon,customer service isvery good and I give them 5 stars.,I upload an example of the pictures taken with this camera

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This tiny camera is amazingly powerful. It has simple but useful features. I needed one because my phone has been slowing down due to too much photos. It's very slim and light. Picture quality is unbelievable. It also has auto focus and zoom which is a big plus for me. You can choose the quality of picture from  to 18mp. Now I can hold on to my phone while my wife and kids take photo ops. Great stuff to have!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is a perfect starter camera. We bought it for the kids to practice with. Ages 4 to 8 and they all love it. Perfect size for their little hands and it has a long battery life. The picture quality is not amazing but it is pretty good. Long range zoom and auto focus are great features. I like the carrying case that it comes with.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Nice little digital camera. It has 8 times zoom and takes videos. A sd card is needed to save photos and videos. The picture quality is good the pictures are very clear. The videos it takes are clear and the built in microphone has good sound quality. A quality well made and durable digital camera.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Very compact camera with high resolution with zoom capability.  I use it to sparey phone battery when I go outdoor like camping or hiking.  Because sometime, my phone battery would not permit me to last the whole day.  It is just a simple compact camera, nothing fancy.  Good value and it works.  Need to get one regular size as card.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: It's so good to know I own the right to regret my purchase. Too many times I buy things and have to get permission for buyers remorse. Now, with this product, I can buy it and regret it right away or even wait some time if I choose. Thanks so much for this amazing change in business practices. It's long overdue.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I purchased this camera on February 20th. I was looking for an easy and affordable camera that I could use for small trips and figured that I could use it for when my niece is born in August. Well, that’s probably not going to happen, because it is already not charging properly. The first few weeks it worked fine, and the pictures were decent. Not the best, but not bad either. Good for the price. I have only used this camera three times too! I assumed it would work good for at least a year, and so obviously a problem like this so soon after buying it, I’m extremely disappointed.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: This camera takes decent if not good pictures or absolute crap, depending on what? Can't figure it out.,The exposure, white balance, the focus and sharpness is either a complete mess or acceptable.  For the price, it works ok, to keep in the glove box to take pictures after an accident.,Our other two Sonys are great, and so is the full frame Nikon, but this little bastard is a hit and miss all the way.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Got this for my 11yr old to take for her 2 week trip to aunt and uncles.  She absolutely loves it!  Great size to fit in her purse as well

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Bought this camera on April 19, 2017 worked great up until November 2018.  Wow what a disappointment. don't know how long this was suppose to work, but it should work for longer than it has. I never dropped it or did anything that would cause this to happen. It was very handy to grab and go. Pictures all turn out blurry even though it beeps to take the picture. Wish it still worked.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I took a gamble and ordered this camera despite poor reviews about blurry photos. I was hoping others were having operator error issues. I am an intermediate photographer and shoot with a DSLR most of the time. I was looking for a pocket camera for quick snaps when a bulky camera is not convenient. I tried every possible setting on this camera and 99% of the time captured blurry images. I returned the camera within 2 days of purchase.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: The size is great, fits in my little leather cell phone case so I can clip it on my belt.  Seems to be made well.  My other one, similar size & features crashed at my sons wedding.  Very disappointing as thats why I bought it.  Had no problems what so ever with this one.  Have many Sony products, never had any problems.  Happy Camper.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I got this camera for my elderly mom who has limited dexterity and degraded vision after reading a review that rated it good for that case. You don't need to remove the battery to recharge it and also, it recharges through the USB data cable. It has a usable auto mode so she just turns it on and presses the shutter, that's it.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I bought 2 units, one for my 7 year old and one for my 9 year old.  We took a trip to San Diego and I thought t would be cool if they could create their own scrap books based on their pics.  The cameras held up well and they are still using them (it’s only been ~4 months but they use them a lot).  Great buy.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: The camera is great.  it's nice and small, it functions easily and the battery is still lasting off of the initial charge from almost a month ago.  The photo quality if great and I would highly suggest this camera.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Very bad pictures... Returned.

review: I purchased this camera as a gift for my husband.  I knew it was not top of the line, but the reviews looked seemed to lead the way to an 'ok' product and that is what it is, 'ok'!  There are times that the focus isn't the greatest, but for the money it is good!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle

My only reason for giving a 4 was due to the photo paint shop editing software. I am unable to download it because the website says it's unavailable. Other then that the camera is great!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle

I will say though, that the pics of stained glass windows in cathedrals were better capture from our iPhone. Other than that, this captured more than 2,000 WONDERFUL pics on our vacation! I love it's ease of use. I bought it one month before the trip and played a lot with it.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle

This camera is very small, I finally put it on a lanyard and its great. I take my small camera with me everywhere, you just never know when that awesome photo is going to appear.

review: Was in a cave tour, and ONE DROP of water landed on the multi-function button.  The camera went berserk, and started toggling between all of its modes.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Purchased this camera for my 86 years young mother's birthday.  I set it all up on automatic so she doesn't have to fiddle with anything.  She LOVES it.  I'm happy -- she's happy!  It takes wonderful pictures.  The LCD screen makes it easy for aging eyes to see what they're going to take a picture of.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Boy, I really didn't like this camera. At only 8x Optical Zoom, it doesn't take good photos of things more than 10 feet away. My phone took better photos.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The camera is tiny (in a good way), it fits in smallest pocket. Picture quality is superb. I also like the fact that it comes with both US and European charger.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Handy little companion. Fits in a pocket easily yet takes big camera pictures. I had a 16 MP Sony that was easier to use and seemed to take clearer pictures but broke less than 6 months after purchase. This one is its replacement and is serving me well.  My travels have taken it to six countries and thousands of pictures. Great little work horse and so easy to carry along.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: As a former professional photographer, I was seriously underwhelmed by this camera. For $120, you'd expect something that would, at the very least, produce sharp images. This one doesn't. But there are times when I don't want, or can't, or didn't bring along my big Nikons with all of my interchangeable lenses, filters, lens hoods and tripods; times when I simply want something small, portable to take quick images, to record a place I might want to lug all of my equipment back to, or simply to quickly record an event. Well...I spent a week testing the DSC W830, both indoors and outdoors. I do mostly nature and wildlife photography, not people. I don't need a camera that detects smiles or faces: trees, rocks, mountains, wildflowers, and squirrels don't smile! I just wanted something to take some quick, but sharp images. The autofocus on this camera is less accurate than expected. And though it supposedly focuses at about five centimeters (two inches), this unit did a very poor job. Frankly, the camera in a smartphone can do a better job.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Buenas fotos. La batería dura poco.  Los videos no duran más de 30 minutos.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I have the RX100 (which I love) but I wanted a second, truly pocketable, camera that I can carry around and won''t have to worry about at all. But a camera that still takes good pictures.  This camera does exactly what I wanted it to do.  I don't have to worry about it, it is small, and it still makes excellent images.  Sometimes I have to tweak the images but that's true with any camera that I have owned, including the RX!00.  I simply import the images to my iPad, and then I play around with them.  Great camera, amazing price!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I originally did not like this camera but after using it a few more times realized it was me not the camera. I am use to Canon cameras.
