I have not had a chance to use the camera extensively and find it is different than other camera brands in the way it operates or even uploads on line. I bought it for the zoom and the zoom does not disappoint.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I wanted a super zoom bridge camera because I take a lot of bird photos but couldn't justify the cost of upgrading to a DSLR right now.  Before I bought the LUMIX, I had been using a Fujifilm SL300, which I loved but which didn't quite have the power I wanted at 30x zoom.  The Panasonic camera has mostly met my expectations, with clear optics for the zoom (with a tripod, of course) and options for manual settings that allow me to tweak my shots.  The Intelligent Auto setting is surprisingly good in selecting the correct settings for the scene you're shooting, although it doesn't always give me what I want, hence the need for the manual settings.  With a 60x optical zoom and macro lens settings, this camera gives me both power and versatility.,Some reviewers have mentioned how big it is, and because I couldn't find it in stores, I was nervous.  I was relieved to discover that it's NOT big for a bridge camera, only in comparison to a point-and-shoot.  The LUMIX is the same size as my Fujifilm, just with a wider lens.  There's a bump out on the right for gripping with a nice area for my thumb on the back of the case -- we lefties have always had to adjust for a mostly righty world, and I have no issue holding the camera with my right hand.  I'm not going to stash this inside of a handbag, but then again, I didn't expect to.  When I'm using this, I wear it around my neck or over my shoulder.,The LUMIX has too many features to include in a customer review; however, several of them are worth noting, especially for those who want to use this as more than a point-and-shoot:  manual settings for aperture and shutter speed; the ability to program shift; focus locking; the option to switch from LED screen to traditional viewfinder; pop-up flash; shoe for separate flash; continuous ("burst") shooting mode, with or without autofocus, up to nine shots.  Point-and-shooters will be familiar with the scene options, and, of course, the camera also takes video, although I never use it for that.  I also never use the "creative control" feature since, if I really wanted special effects, I'd do it on my computer, not with the camera itself.  Although anyone can pick up and use this camera, it takes some practice to get used to the settings and features for a more enhanced photography experience.  Don't expect the LUMIX DMC-FZ70 to equal a DSLR, but do expect it to be much better than a point-and-shoot.  My only disappointment, and hence the half-star deduction, is the inability to use a remote shutter.  Most people won't care about this; however, for bird photography, I could really use it at times.,The camera comes with a battery (buy a spare!), a wall charger, a lens cap, and a neck strap.  You'll have to buy a case if you want to protect it and don't already have one.  And don't forget the memory card.,In comparison to the Fujifilm I already owned, the Panasonic is almost interchangeable except for the zoom power.  Both are excellent bridge cameras with roughly the same size and features.  The stability feature on the Panasonic might be slightly better, and it includes a few extra options; however, I consider them to be comparable cameras.  The real issue is deciding on the maximum optical zoom power and whether you need it.,-- Debbie Lee Wesselmann

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have it now for 3 months and it does not do what it promises to do. Pictures are blurred, no matter what setting you take. You take 5 pictures, same light, same motive, within 10 seconds (not talking about lighting), but 2 out of 5 are blurred and pixelated.  Truly disappointing. Had professional photographers test it and they are also not happy with it. If I could, I would return and get another one!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Brought this camera with me to Europe for a backpacking trip. Couldn't be happier! It was easy to use, durable, and really portable. The picture quality was fantastic. The panoramic function was probably my favorite, I've attached my favorite as an example. I was also really pleased with the battery life, over a month of constant use I only had to charge it twice. The lens pops off a lot, which is a downside but the camera bag is a good protector.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Really like this camera.  Was worried it might be too clunky, but quickly got used to it, and it's actually easier to steady and handle.  Picture quality is not the best when using full zoom, but pretty good considering what I paid for this.  The best feature is the ability to use a viewfinder which most times is missing in the small compact point and shoot.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Already have the ZS40 but find it a bit small for my gorilla hands.  The 70 is absolutely perfect.  Getting rid of all my Nikon DSLR gear, two bodies, five lenses and many pounds in the bag.  Hardly know the FZ is hanging from my neck.  Don't think I am giving up much picture quality for the savings in weight and inconvenience of dragging around all that stuff.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I waited awhile to review my Lumix because I wanted to spend some time with it. I want to preface that I am not a professional nor am I aspiring to be a professional photographer. I will say that I am an artist so I know how to frame a photo and I know lighting and color. I am also obsessed with wildlife and macro photography which is the reason that I chose this camera.,I will tell you that I have had this camera for over a year and have taken pictures indoors in lowlight (with and without flash) sunlight, artificial light, etc... and has given me beautiful photos every time. My last camera, Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX150, couldn't handle any of my photography in lowlights.,The zoom is wonderful for outdoor photography. The colors are crisp. If you flip it onto auto it will do most everything for you.,Lumix DMC-FZ70 is no muss, no fuss. It is wonderful point and shoot for those are new to the photography world and would like a starter camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I'm not a professional photographer by any stretch. But I have had numerous cameras in my lifetime and this is by far the best one I've ever had. The zoom length is amazing, the color and clarity are SO sharp and "right on". I highly recommend this camera.,It's also quite eay to use. BUT you have to read the lengthy manual to take advantage of all of its capabilities.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have a DSLR and I have a pocket camera. The pocket camera does what it was designed to do. Sit in your pocket and take pictures. They were never great but...I purchased the DMC-FZ70 after several weeks of research and I must say I am very impressed. I have had it for three weeks now and I am still finding new features. In fact the only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because I have to "find" the new features the manual could be better in explaining all the camera does. Shooting in RAW format is great and works well. Great camera smaller and lighter than a DSLR and much better quality pictures than a pocket camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Works well when you don't want to carry a phone and charger.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I had to replace a Canon PS A560 and I chose this one for very occasional light use. I miss the little view finder window (or whatever it's called). On this camera you need to use the display window to frame your shot and sometimes in bright light it is nearly impossible to do this. Also I notice that pictures taken with full zoom are not clearly focused even with a solid support of the camera to eliminate shaking. But it works and you don't need to worry about batteries since it is rechargeable. I just used the 1GB card from the old camera and that is enough for 195 pictures set on the highest ("L) setting, or 24 minutes of video (8 minutes of HD video). This is more than enough for my needs. I can't imagine why anyone would need anything bigger. Seems that it is not available in BLUE which is unfortunate.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Bought this for my 13 year old nephew who is a budding photographer and he is very pleased with it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This camera has great megapixels and takes really nice photos. It's small and compact, but packs a lot of power for the price. My only complaint is it doesn't have an automatic lens protector that closes when it's off.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Great little camera that takes quality pictures ! I kept this in my purse for a vacation trip to Santa Barbara and it came in handy to capture some beautiful views and awesome memories for my family!

review: This mini digital camera is compact, portable and easy to use. 8x digital zoom, face detection, continue shot and you can put sd card as external memory. Auto focus and has a good quality picture.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: So cool to have such a cool, convenient and high-quality camera.  It is absolutely not problematic to take it on any journey.  At the same time, the quality of the photo is excellent, I am very pleased.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is a awesome little camera , better than a phone camera. Great as a gift for teens or aspiring photographer before a DSLR. The pictures quality is good and better than aoem phone.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is good but needs fine tuning especially on quality and fits good and very light weight and even 1 year old kid can hold this ,imagine this is the future of cam .Rest works great.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Great compact camera. The quality of pictures is clear and the camera is super light weight so your not holding a very heavy object. Sleek design and easy to use with minimal buttons.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: inside pictures with electric lights on are terrible! I really dislike this camera and wish I had not spent any money on this. I can only use it with plenty of natural light. I'm sticking with a phone camera which takes much better and faster pictures!

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Simply the easiest camera to use.  Very best photos and battery life. A+++++

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Camera did not come with a functioning charger or memory card, had to spend at least an extra $40. My canons have always come with what is needed to just turn it on. I seemed to get the one with the European cord, nothing was mentioned about that. That was very misleading. Overall the pictures are nice but not as high resolution as one would think. Overall was not a good deal but it works fine.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: This is great camera if you need a cheap price daily carry snapshot camera or as gift for someone don't have one.  I order this camera for my parents as daily carry camera so they can capture some interesting photo of their daily life while I am not with them.  They love it because they are not tech person, they not even know all the features on their smartphone. I spend 5 mins to reading manual and setup the camera 10mins to explain to them how to use. After one hour they are good to go with this camera.,Pros:,1. Easy to use, nothing complicate on/off, shutter, zoom and menu button.,2. Super lightweight, maybe been use DSLR for while this camera just too lightweight for me, even lighter than my mobile phone.,3. Better than mobile phone quality picture (If you are mobile phone photographer NVM),4. Good battery life. This will save some battery juice for my parents smartphone.,Nothing is prefect there still something need to watch out.,Cons:,1. Poor quality on the LCD screen. If you loading your photo to your computer it will look so much better than you check it on the LCD screen on the camera.,2. So lightweight mean sometime you can't get a stable shot,3. Menu language limitation there only few major languages are available not many choice as other model.,4. Video quality is kind of noise but still acceptable.,Over all me and my parents both are happy with this camera.  They can always carry a camera to anywhere they going now. I mean for this price range and the quality we got I am happy with it. Of course if you are look for better image quality and rich features camera, look for other this just good enough for daily snapshot, you have to pay the right price to get the right quality tool.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Camera would not charge battery, plugged into electrical outlet or by computer, battery would not engage and stay engaged due to defective battery clip. Charge indicator light was never lit up to show a charge. Camera's only use is as a paperweight..

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I purchased this camera for our vacation.,My last high end camera was a bust, I wish I had replaced it years ago.,The price was appealing, our vacation included a lot of out door adventures.,I didn't't want to invest a lot of money in a camera that could have been damaged.,It held up to the task. I'd recommend investing in multiple memory cards & cary your charger.,We had an extra charger for the car so battery life was good.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I lowered the resolution on mine.  I have so many files that some space conservation is needed.  I still get great photos.  Just more of them in the space.  (yes I have large and extra memory)

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: the problem was the power button, had to press it 9-4 times to open ...

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Still getting to "know" it, but it's light and seems very easy to run.  Would be nice to have a more inclusive guide book, but will check online!

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: It takes great pictures which I have downloaded on my laptop  !

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I've been wanting to dabbel in photography and this camera is amazing! Wish it would auto focus better but I'm still learning so it may have something to do with me. But I love this camera I would buy it again! It came quicker than expected as well

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Straight out of the box easy to use.  Everything to help a beginner get started.  It was a gift for my daughter so it was really nice having the bag, batteries, SD card,and much more included.  WiFi feature is AWESOME!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I thought I was getting a red one but got a purple one but it’s alright. I like purple too.,The camera came in a 2 days early.,The best thing about this camera is that it comes with a ton of accessories which in turn saves you money because you don’t have to shop for accessories separately.,If you are just getting started with photography and you are on a budget, this camera is for you.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Amazing amazing amazing that is the best way to describe this camera in package just the camera alone at Walmart will set you back three hundred bucks you get this whole package for less than that and it will blow your mind. A great investment

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Nice set, its not a professional camera by any means but it's good for someone who wants good quality pictures without breaking the wallet.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: Only had this a few days, but so far I am impressed. I wanted a small camera that I could carry at all times, with a descent optical zoom and not pay to much for. Picture quality is great for this size of camera and it is very easy to use.Has some great settings on it to get some cool effects and the video quality is brilliant. I transfer pictures straight to my IPad.Which means I can put pictures straight onto FB or send pictures to friends and family straight away. I have not had a chance to test all of the camera functions, but the ones I had needed have worked well

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: I love that it has a wrist strap and little bag to store the camera in. She's having a grand time taking photos. We bought an SD card for 10 bucks to store the photos on; I'm not sure the camera would store them without it. Since it isn't marketed for children with a colorful kid-proof body or built-in games (which I really didn't want), it feels like the grown-up item that it is. It's easy enough to operate without reading the manual although some of the butttons are tiny and hard to see without reading glasses. The pictures are clear. I'd even recommend this for an adult who wants a basic camera with few frills.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: I purchased this camera as a gift for my daughter-in-law to take pictures of my new grandson. The only camera she had was her phone. This camera is small enough to fit inside a diaper bag or small purse. The only thing is it does have to be periodically charged and one may forget to check it before that "must have" picture. Still, it's a good camera & she loves it!

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: Got this camera to use on vacation. The image stabilization is good if you only have minor movement and the zoom works pretty well. The camera struggle a little in low lighting but most shot footage outside which worked great. Overall, this camera was exactly what we were looking for. It was something cwe could take over seas to capture memories with but wouldn't hurt the bank if it was lost, broken or stolen.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: I’m a fairly lazy person when it comes to returns, but I’m actually returning this purchase. To be fair to the company, shipping was much faster than expected which was great since I purchased this for my impatient 6 year old. However, quality of the product is FAR below the reviews. The camera is very cheaply made and feels like it’ll break in your hands at any moment. There is a switch on the side of the camera that changes between close up and scenic views that feels like it’s going to break the whole camera every time I use it. The camera never focused for any image (I’m experienced with photography and couldn’t get it to focus) and after fully charging the battery for over 15 hours it died after only 3 pictures. I would strongly urge you to reconsider purchasing this product and go with a better known proven point and shoot. For the time being my 12 year old Olympus point and shoot is still a significantly better option for my son and I’m disappointed that I even gave this a try.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: I used this camera from previous employer. I am no longer at that company so off I went to my local Amazon and now I am the proud owner of this wonderful camera! Size of camera is GREAT! Easily slips into my purse or pocket. Removable memory card (need to purchase separately). Quickly down loads all images and videos on computer.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: If I could give 0 stars I would. I got this camera to take to Disney and it wasn't good at all. The camera on my phone is way better. Pictures came out super fuzzy and ittook pictures very delayed. I know this wasn't going to be top of the line but i was expecting something a little better

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: This is such a cute camera. It is similar in size to my phone so I can carry it around with me.The pictures it takes are pretty good! Not the highest quality digital camera, but I got this for the nostalgia feel and the instant photos. The camera acts more like a printer where the images come out fully developed compared to the slow develop of older instant photos.I love the fact that I can have a digital copy of the photos so I can give them away to friends.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: This will make a perfect birthday gift for my 11-year-old nephew, who enjoys taking "professional" photos and videos for his family and friends. 18 Mega Pixels,1080P high definition resolution, and a LCD display, this camera is a professional device. And extended storage should be enough for him to take many photos and videos. I've played with it for a little bit. It was easy to operate, and the picture/video quality were great. I'm sure he'll be very excited and happy to receive this gift.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: My daughter who is 7 took pics of all the family, the pictures are so retro ( and flattering) , yes the film can be pricey but the pictures everyone was admiring! We will keep them forever in a lovely pink album!,The chunky, easy to use design means all ages can manage it- not a lot can go wrong! Would definitely recommend a present that keeps on giving and encourages creativity

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: There was a learning curve but it turned out to be a decent camera!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This is a awesome little camera for the price. The picture quality is amazing. My only complaint is that the battery life is kinda sucks on it. I was it would last longer between charges

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This takes very nice pictures. I bought this cause my camera on my iPhone wasn't working. But this does the job better, plus it holds more pictures.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: Got this for my 8 year old daughter for birthday gifts as she loves taking pictures. She was so happy with it and has taken lots of pictures. Some aren’t always great but the majority of them are great for the size. I think she will capture lots of memories with this.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I brought this camera for my kid.  It didn’t cost much, but it is a nice entry-level point-and-shoot camera.  Very easy to use and large rear display screen.  Picture quality is impressive though, with good detail and bright, dynamic images.  Video function brings lot of fun to kids.  This camera is a perfect choice for kids.

review: Not super thrilled with this camera. I feel like it lags quite a bit too. It frustrates me every time I use it!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Took this to the national parks. More settings than a point and shoot normal camera that you can accidentally get lost in. The factory default is the best. Great clarity and quality pictures.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Love this camera. It is light, 16 mp and the zoom is fantastic. There are so many features that I will have to study the manual for a while to know how to use them all. I can hardly wait to take this camera on my next trip. I should get some amazing nature pictures. Zoom is 60x for optical and another 60x for digital (120x). Wide angle is 20 mm and it zooms out to 1200mm at full extension. I looked at various cameras with a mega zoom feature including the Canon SX50. This Lumix has most of the features of the Canon as well as a few extra, a larger optical zoom (60x as opposed to 50x on the Canon) and is priced about $35 less than the Canon. I am very happy with my purchase.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Bought this for my husband because of the huge zoom feature.  He loves it!  You definitely have to be careful to be VERY steady when it's zoomed all the way out because the image can tend to be grainy in certain lights and if there's any movement.  But, he's taken some really great images at full zoom and it's always surprising how close he can get.  It's lightweight and small enough to carry around all day; all the other buttons & functions are easy to find and similar to our other camera.  Not top of the line, but definitely a good value.  Recommended for an affordable camera with lots of function.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I owned a Lumix camera before but due to some unfortunate events it was broken, and instead of getting it repaired my husband decided to get me a brand new camera. I knew right away I wanted a new Lumix because the photos come out amazing, the camera is easy to use and all the extra features are all so fun to play with. I have a family of 5 and nothing is more important than the memories we make, and with my Lumix those memories will not only be saved, but look as crystal clear as the day they happened.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: large magnifying lens 60x,focus while zooming,allows adjustment of focus and SLR cameras,not interchangeable lens fixed,internal memory of 4 gb,has all the modes and effects of a point and shoot camera,easy to use,comes with protective lens cap, battery and strap,manual in multiple languages,packed in its original box.,the display is not moveable,brings optical viewfinder.,Recommended for intermediate photograph experience,gran lente de 60x de aumento,enfoca mientras se hace zoom,permite ajustes de enfoque como camaras reflex,de lente fijo no intercambiable,la memoria interna de 4 gb,tiene todos los modos y efectos de una camara apunta y dispara,facil de usar,viene con tapa protectora de lente, bateria y correa,con manual en multiples lenguajes,empacada en su caja original.,la pantalla es fija,trae visor optico.,recomendada para el fotografo de experiencia intermedio

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love this camera in every way. It's fun, versatile and a lot of bang for your buck. It's great quality and yet cheap enough to take to the beach, camping, hiking or vacation. If it gets lost it won't cripple you financially. It has enough professional features to let you experiment with photography for years.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Bought this for my daughter to take to camp for her photography skill. A great product that can be added to. She is still raving about it and using it every day. I think we have a photographer in the making.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I'm a long time Panasonic fan.  I like to take travel / tourist pics and have no mad photography skills.  Just got back from San Diego where I took pics at the zoo and the Safari Park.  This camera zoomed in to the big cats faces so well.  I got some great shots.  And, best of all maybe, it did a good job of getting past the wire to the animal at the zoo.  The larger size is a little unwieldy to compared to the pocket cameras but it really takes great pics.  Recommend!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: The wife and I didn't need a Digital SLR with all of the bells, lights, and whistles. Nearing retirement with grandchildren we want to continue to add pictures of, and a need to keep it simple. This camera does that and is capable of so much more than we will ever use, and the price, wow. We are extremely happy with it. Upon retirement, with a little time on my hands I plan on exploring some of its' fancier abilities.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)

review: Similar to the other negative reviews for this product, I was unable to get indoor pictures to be in-focus.  The center of the frame was decent (although not as sharp as I'd like), but the entire 360 degrees in the rest of the frame was blurry.  I played around with all the focus, resolution, and "scene" settings, but the results were consistently poor.  I'd say 1 picture in 5 was borderline acceptable -- the rest were not.,I'm just a family guy (not a photographer), and was looking for an affordable point-and-shoot camera.  This was certainly affordable, but the indoor pictures are bad enough that I'm returning this camera.

review: Yay! Easy to use, nice pictures, it even steadies my blur! If you are a photographer and expect perfection spend your money on pro equipment! Don't knock this sweet little camera that is great for travel, spur of the moment pics when you need to catch the scene quick. Battery recharges quickly after you connect the camera to an outlet but I bought a spare battery for no disappointing surprises.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Good looking camera (hence the 2 stars). Camera was set in Spanish (which I cannot read).  Went online to see how to reset it and camera went blank. It was for a gift so I waited several months to check it out - but has been 100% non-usable.

review: Perfect for a very small pocket camera.Just be realistic in your expectations. No small sensor camera will do well in low light conditions.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: We've gotten used to the ubiquity and usability of cameras on smartphones and tablets, so this is in some ways a step back but the ease of use and picture quality makes up for it. Plus, it's a low-cost device that can go many other places I have no intention of taking a more expensive device to (beach trips, hello).

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I took this with me on vacation.  It was easy to use and I was able to take great photos even from the train.  There is a slight delay between pushing the button and getting the picture, which made taking photos from a moving vehicle a challenge.  The battery life was great, but I do recommend carrying an extra.  You also need a memory disc because the camera's storage capacity is very small without it.  Picture sharpness and color are excellent.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Takes good photos and worked great for the couple months I had it. Dropped the camera from about waist height and it wouldn’t work anymore. Ended up getting a more durable camera after. Even tho me dropping the camera is obviously my fault, I feel like a minor drop shouldn’t be so serious.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: My daughter had a baby is October and was wanting a camera other then her cell phone . I was impressed by this little camera. The pictures are good quality and the camera is easy to use. Love seeing the pictures of my grand baby taken on this nice little camera.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: This is a decent camera for under a hundred. I use it to take pictures for art related things, it works well for my budget.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: My son has a developmental disability, and can not use a smart phone. This is very easy for him to use, and he is very happy with it.

review: Foolishly bought a camera in summer as Christmas gift for daughter. It's was unusable within 10 days. It keeps shutting off and when it is on, the lens continuously retracts and opens. Expected more from Kodak! Read similar reviews prior to purchase, but just couldn't believe it would be a common issue. It is...heed warnings. Too late to return to Amazon. Have spent three days trying to reach Kodak to resolve and learned that this model camera will only work properly with Energizer or Duracell batteries. I explained that I used the batteries that came with the camera and was informed that they are only good for a couple of hours to get the camera running. If this solution works, I will update this post.

review: Images were worse than the prior model.  Compared to a Nikon d3500 - the images were awful.  The video was okay, but then if you zoom in or out you can hear the mechanical sound of the zoom.  Returned because of that.  Did not feel good in my hand - the camera body is very similar to others, again, nearly identical in feel to the Nikon D3500, but the images on the Nikon are much much better.  I used to have a prior Lumix model - a point and shoot that was flat so you could put in your pocket.  Not sure that one is still available, but that was better than this.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Yeah, shame on me for not reading the fine print, or on someone else for not getting how basic and important including one would be.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This was purchased as a gift for my husband and he loves it! We are avid birders and he is using this to take photos of birds. The photos are clear even at the maximum zoom (even though you REALLY need to keep your hands steady at this point) and the quality is incredible for the price. The photos have aided us in identification, and we end up seeing more than we thought we saw (my husband snapped a picture of what he thought might have been a chickadee, and it turned out to had been a prothonotary warbler!!) If you are hesitating about getting this, don't! Just get it! It is amazing bang for your buck!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Wow, what a zoom! I added on another zoom lens that attaches right to the front of the existing lense, with no adapters or anything needed, and now I have over 100X zoom on a compact digital camera! Now, I am not a professional photographer by any means, and can't tell you any technical stuff, but this camera is AWESOME! I had two Nikon DSLR's in the past, and they were just very complicated and very heavy for me to use all the time, this is fairly lightweight, and takes stunning photos. I'm in love. Between this and my LX7 I am set for awhile with cameras!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: So much in such a small package!  It will be awhile before I get to use all the features that this camera has to offer.,I do like that I do not have to haul around extra lenses.  I have found that if I go tele all the way, I will need a tripod.  I just cannot hold the camera still for that distance.  The menu in the camera allows all kinds of adjustment to pictures taken, if not done in the camera I can wait until processing in the computer.  So much can be done with this camera, it's like having a mini-computer!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I bought the Panasonic LUMIX because I was tired of using my phone to take all of my pictures and I wanted something that had better quality and zoom range. I think I set my expectations a little too high though. The camera itself is nicely made; light and small enough to fit in my tiny woman hands. But i wouldn't call this a professional camera. It takes quality pictures most of the time but sometimes I feel as if I NEED a tripod to take second pictures. Especially if the lighting isn't perfect or its dark out. I've taken beautiful close up pictures of full moons with this camera and it's given me plenty of stunning pictures for my cousins wedding. But when I have tried to take far away night shots, you definitely need a steady hand because it doesn't seem to focus nearly as well as during the day. It's a nice little camera for beginners but I wouldn't recommend for someone who's trying to do photo shoots. All in all, I'll keep my little Panasonic but hopefully I'll be able to upgrade in the future.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: This camera is great for beginners and pros alike who do not want the complications of a SLR camera! The SLR camera was to complicated for me and this camera solved that problem with it's ease of use and quality photos!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: I love the clarity of the photographs! When I can get a good picture, they are stunning! However, I find I am very old fashioned and was disappointed to discover that this camera does not have a traditional viewfinder. This has made it very difficult for me to take pictures - so, if you are used to such things, this camera might not be the best choice. Otherwise, it has served very well as a beginner camera.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: The other half loves this because its easy to work, and that is all he needed ..but ... he got more?He got beautiful clear pictures too, that I'm able to enlarge (quite extensively) for him in Adobe PS without hardly any pixel blur.A nice little camera that does what it was meant for: point and shoot and you get a Brucey bonus with wonderful clear pictures to boot!

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: This was for my daughter - a camera cheap enough that I wouldn't cry too much if it got lost or stolen.,So I wasn't expecting much.,I did expect it to work all the time. In 30 minutes of trying, I got 2. After which it totally froze both times.,And those were the times it didn't:,Turn off as soon as you pressed the shutter,Screen turned solid blue (been a long time since I've seen a BSOD) upon trying to format the memory card,Went to a solid crosshatch and was unresponsive,Just turned right back off as soon as it powered on.,Turned on and froze and wouldn't turn off unless you held the power down for 10 seconds.,Turned on and froze and wouldn't turn off unless even if you held the power button for 30 seconds, requiring a battery pull.,The battery was horrible tight, and there's no way you can get fingers in, nor could you do even the gentlest of taps to help it out a little, because the skinny, flimsty, waiting-to-be-broken-off battery cover hinges on the narrow side, making it super weak. Luckily, I hadn't trimmed my nails in a few days...,Repeat ad nauseum for a full 30 minutes.,Then it let me take 2 pictures.,Well, maybe I won't right a stinker of review if the pics are OK.,They're awful, look at the grain, blurriness - and this only at ISO 640!,If this was 10 years ago, it'd be fine.,But I can spend $40 and get a action camera with WiFi, with a waterproof case, that I bought because I wanted something I was less afraid to take risks with. It's been to Hawaii, snorkeling, it's been on a 30ft selfie stick tacking pictures in a factory, mountain biking, hung out the side of a convertible - flawless. And the image quality on that is MUCH better.,The only reason I got this instead, is that the action cam is a fixed, super-wide fisheye - not great for photography, but fine for oddball landscapes or action shots - it's pretty niche.,The unreliability I can forgive, but I know what the bathtub curve is and sometimes it just sucks to be one of the people at the top, on the start of that graph.,But this is 2005 CMOS camera quality. I dunno how the heck everyone else can think this is passable quality. A dirt-cheap 'burner' phone does better. A lot better.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: Smaller is definitely NOT better - especially when it comes to inexpensive electronics.  To begin with, the micro-font instruction manual states that the package includes a digital camera, ProTags Express Software Installation CD, USB cable, User's instruction manual, Strap, Camera bag, Lithium battery, and a charger.  There is no CD nor is there a charger in the kit.  In fact, I called Amazon to send a second camera for the missing parts, and they were not in the second shipment either.  Second, it is nearly impossible to configure the camera with optimum settings.  I am not unfamiliar with cameras and electronics, but I had trouble paging through the settings.  I even had a highly skilled techie friend try to set up the camera and the best we could get out of any of the pictures were grainy shots less than 2 megabytes.  This product is not worth the time it takes to open the box. Don't waste your money. No way this camera shoots a 21 MP image.  I think they are missing a decimal point in the description.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: I have got it as a present from my partner and was absolutely thrilled when I opened up the box.,It is rarely easy to use something for the first time. Probably the first 5-10 photos you’ll take won’t be perfect but be patient because it is so much fun to use this camera once you get a hold of it.,Pretty good quality for the price and I really like that I can just give the photos to people and they can keep it in their phone cases or wallets. Many great memories kind of get lost in your phone but these can be close to you all the time

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: Just got this camera today. I've been shooting video on it and taking photos. I think it's a good quality. Obviously there are better cameras but this is just perfect for what I need right now.Great for the price

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: Ok some photos are a mass of white or dark but isn’t that part of the art when trying to get the shot. It’s all learning.,This camera is owned by an 8 year old and she loves it. She took the pic in this review as well. It’s a piece of independence and you actually have a physical product for once amongst everything else that’s now digital. Just don’t be expecting iPhone X quality and just appreciate this for what it is.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: Great little camera and quite simple to use. You need to buy a suitable SD card when you buy this camera. Really compact which makes it easy to carry around. Was easy to download the software on my PC to enable photos to be downloaded. For such a small camera I am very impressed with the photo quality and the zoom feature is very smooth

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: This was very easy to setup, it connected straight to my wifi in the house and I could view the video clearly on my android phone. I tested it for a few days looking out the utility room window and all was well. I then installed into the coop and even though this is 70ft from my wifi router it connected ok and the video is nice and clear.,Pan & tilt work as they should, all round a good camera and does all that I need it too.,My only gripe is that I can't find any software that runs on a Mac to view this camera, which is a shame. If anyone know of any please let me know.,Photo taken in the pitch black, pretty good hey.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: I bought this camera for our unplanned trip. During the past years my husband and me we take our holiday in the same time but we do not plan were to go. I install the camera very easy – it can be see that in order to see how it makes pictures or videos I used in our yard. The image and video are qualitative and as can be see in the attached pictures from our holiday

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: This camera is great! I bought it as a backup as I had bought a cheaper one and wasn’t sure whether it would work properly.,This camera is fantastic; it’s easy to set up, gives you a 360 view, and the quality of the picture is brilliant.,I went to my sisters who lives about five to ten miles away and the camera connected flawlessly and I managed to scare my dad with it!,I will be using this to keep and eye on my baby when I can not be in the same room with him.,I am extremely happy with this purchase

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Build quality is also very good and the camera is easy to operate with intuitive controls.Well packaged, got this because of the great reviews and the pricetag.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is my first full Digital camera I have ever had. I always loved photography, and I have been using all kinds of different types of smartphone and tablets for taking pictures. While lots of those handheld mobile devices did very good at taking pictures, this it DSC-W800 beats all the smartphone and tablet cameras especially with the image processing like (exposure etc.) Also the 5x Optical Zoom is awesome lots of smartphone cameras don't have any Optical Zoom and the ones that do are very limited on the distance because of the focal length. Most new high end smartphone cameras have 1x-2x Optical Zoom which is barely noticeable. And digital zoom just sucks. So coming from tablets and smartphone cameras I have to say this is my best first digital camera I have ever had! The camera has auto focus, 5x Optical Zoom, has a proprietary USB cable for data transfer and changing. The pictures are very good which I will attach in this review.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is a very good camera for everyday use. I keep it with me at all times at work and its' 'predecessor' cybershot was extremely reliable and although it still works well, developed an issue after 6 years and I figured it was time to replace it, so I purchased the next closest clone in the it line which I expect will serve as well. Purchase was fine and delivery fast.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Wonderful camcorder!!! The video turned out very clear. It is an fabulous camera for outside filming. It has powerful zoom to help filming outside. I know everyone uses smartphones to record videos and photos, but when we have a big or special events going on I think we should have a DV. It is not heavy at all so your don't have to worry carrying all day. The view screen rotate, easy to operate, touch screen and it has the night vision.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I recieved my dv yesterday . I love the camera but i have an issue with it . I try to zoom in and it works but when i try to zoom back out it wont go back out Im sending it back today . Other than that its a great video camera . Its light weight , great screen easy to work . I would recommend this to everyone but just make sure your zoom works ..

I learned most of the operating procedures from the manual.,After I learned how to take photos, I had to learn how to transfer them to my PC.,I was lost until a young neighbor showed me how to do it.  Photos can be accessed either by using the memory card or connecting the camera to the PC via a USB port.,If an old guy like me can operate this camera, so can you.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I am searching for the original box so I can return this. (Hopefully I didn't throw it out, ugh). My daughter has had this since her birthday mid july, so about 3 weeks. On her memory card she has 30 pictures and 4 short, less than 30 seconds each, videos. I have replaced the batteries a total of 7 times in this thing already!!! That is crazy! No she isnt lraving it on. She takes a few pics, then she goes to turn it off . It turns off but the lens never goes fully back into the camera bc the batteries have died. I so wish I had bought a different camera for my 10 year old. The pictures are fine for the price of the camera. We don't need a camera that takes pro pictures . The camera is my 10 year old daughter's camera.  But I shouldn't need to put batteries in it every 10 pictures! That's insane.,Choose another camera. Spend a little more and save yourself some aggravation.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: this camera is AMAZING!  I can't say enough about how many beautiful shots I have taken with it.  Last night I tried it out at the 4th of july fireworks.  I got some beautiful shots!  it's way technical and I know very little about anything other than the Auto menu, but I am very happy with the results.  The idiot button works!  happy, happy, happy!!!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have a very lengthy history with point and shoot cameras. I am a professional photographer so I suppose that I am spoiled by DSLR quality however Panasonic has never let me down. I bought a Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS3 when it first came out. I was thoroughly impressed with the quality for the price that I had paid. Concert videos came out great and a lot of the photos were really good too. I still have that Lumix and my son now uses it.,After dabbling with DSLRs for a while I decided that I wanted a more professional level point and shoot. I bought a Canon G12 and while it had some impressive features it just was not what I expected from the reviews I had seen. It was okay during concerts (one of the main reasons I have a point and shoot) but it wasn't something I was excited to use. After I sold the Canon I went to a Nikon Coolpix. I am an avid Nikon fan. That is the only DSLR I shoot with so I figured the point and shoot would be just as good. I was wrong. The quality of the photos was horrible and I couldn't get a clear shot to save my life. The Coolpix quickly went back. I stuck with the Panasonic Lumix ZS3 for a while and then went to a Nikon N1 J3. Again, not great. I did not like how it handled but I have kept it around for a year.,I was browsing reviews for cameras that are great for my upcoming trip to Disney. I saw this Lumix FZ70 listed so I did some more research. After reading reviews here on Amazon as well as other sources such as Ken Rockwell I decided that I would jump on the low price that I paid. Yet again Panasonic did NOT disappoint. I got the camera this morning so I have not been able to fully test it and will definitely update when I do, but from what I have done so far today...IMPRESSIVE. The zoom is ridiculous and much clearer than I expected it to be at 1200mm!,Below I posted a macro shot (holy crap!) and also posted a shot where the lens was at the shortest and then the longest length to show the power of the zoom. In the shot where you can see the entire street I put a red circle around the car that I zoomed in on. The red circle is in the center of the photo, far far down the street. I cannot wait to get out there and test this camera's capabilities in Disney in a few months and then at a concert in May.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This has been the most wonderful experience with this camera.  I love the zoom.  The macro is working for me.  The Creative filter setting has been a great experience.  I cannot say enough about this camera.  If you want a camera at a great price with so many features it boggles my mind, then this is the one!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love this camera and find any excuse I can to take it out and take pictures. The quality is amazing and the zoom is incredible. It takes some time to get to know how to use its features which I am still learning but I love it.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I purchased this Panasonic LUMIX Digital Camera for my husband, as a Christmas gift. After extensive, research, online and in retail stores for several months, and asking for advice from several family members whom...enjoy photography and have experience with various camera brands...I made my choice. Not only for the specifications that I wanted, but also, for the affordable price, that included accessories, this Digital camera...has met our expectations. At this time...we are still 'working with all its' capabilities'...am amazed. We live in South Texas, and have not yet, explored all of what Nature has to offer...we are excited to venture out!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I'm a serious rookie when it comes to photography but this is definitely a great starter camera. It takes beautiful photos effortlessly and the range/zoom this camera has is unbelievable! Well worth the price. Which is a fair price at that!,Best of luck! ♥

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Incredible camera....telescope really gets you up close for razor sharp pictures......this is my second one......have one at each house...love this cam....

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Used for heavy real estate photography. Amazing wife angle without fish bowl effect. Handles backlight issues and great without flash. Great camera for the price-blows away past two canond

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love this camera.  For just about 30% more cost than a pocket camera, it way outperforms one.  I got this before my Alaska trip, and boy was I happy to have it.  I got some bear pictures that look like I am in dangerous territory even though I could barely see the bear with my naked eye.  Awesome zoom.  The quality of the pictures are also quite good.  You can digitally zoom up by quite a bit and still have resolution adequate for printing.  It has lots of bells and whistles that I've yet to start digging in.  On the down side, It feels like it would probably break if I dropped it from a foot.  I've been careful so far.  So I don't know if it would handle a drop.  Since I don't really know, I cannot knock it.  Due to the picture quality per price alone, I highly recommend this camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Well...I can't wait to upload some pictures I bought because with the 3D feature, the possibilities are endless and you don't have to be a "rocket scientist" to figure the gizmo out. I'm a Writeographer and the 60X zoom is the reason I went the Lumix route, without paying an "arm and a leg"! I'm a major budgeter and with my hubby retiring at 53, taking pictures to me is very important right now to look back on in our prime. Why pay $$500 on up for camera's because of the "brand" name or because it has more features than one could even use with knowhow. I love it so far and it's only been a week....will let ya know if this glee lasts. To me, nothing is any good if it doesn't go at least 3 years electronically minus any headache malfunctions:-)

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: This camera is one of the best deals going.  It has everything that anyone could want.  It has lots of features that no other single camera has.  The one features that I like very much is Panorama.  It is very easy to learn to operate.  I really can't say anything bad about this Sony W800/S Digital Camera. I would highly recommend it for anyone that likes to take pictures or video.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Nice enough camera. Easy to setup. Good picture quality. Biggest drawback is the camera was received with a type g plug for the power adapter. Fine if you live in the UK, but I live in the states. Contacted Amazon and they promptly issued a refund for the price of buying a new adapter plug. Thanks Joanne G @ Amazon for all the help.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: While taking video, right out of the box, the autofocus constantly refocuses. I have tried everything I can figure. I am not a professional, just an advanced amateur, techy person. Very dissatisfied. I own an A6000 and am very happy. I use this camera for carrying around in the pocket for general shooting. Not happy at all. Will give it away and buy another non-Sony camera.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: My best camera so far. Crisp clear pictures and videos, a definite keeper

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: ttook some time to learn how to operate camera  just really wanted a point and shoot

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Small and neat, takes good close ups.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I purchased this camera to take on a cruise and it was great.  It far exceeded my expectations.  The battery life is great and it takes wonderful pictures and movies.  I am very pleased with it.

review: Bought this for my 11-yr old granddaughter and she loves it. Works perfectly!  Easy to operate - she figured out the most important functions intuitively without referring to the instructions.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)

review: I was very unhappy that it took so long to ship and when my grandson received it the item had to be returned because it was defective.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: "Such a handy little camera! Fits so easily in your pocket or handbag, and is lightweight.,Takes very clear photos, and has a good variety of scenes/settings.,A great wee camera for the money. Excellent quality camera as you would expect from this little camera"

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: Just got this camera today. I've been shooting video on it and taking photos. I think it's a good quality. Obviously there are better cameras but this is just perfect for what I need right now.Great for the price

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: Bought this camera to replace an old snapshot camera. Really like this one! Great photos. Takes pictures quickly so you don't lose that special shot. Good quality too. Telephoto works great and is intuitive. Pull the lever toward you to get closer to your subject, push to decrease. Takes video too although I haven't used it for that yet. Lightweight, slim and compact. Great all around snapshot camera!

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: or snapshots use the auto settings.zoom in on them and you see the oil painting ISO boost artefacts.for perfect pictures go to program mode and limit ISO to 200it is in my pocket or camera bag all the time.for full zoom my shaky grip needs a lightweight tripod but it pays off in buckets.battery life incredible, I only charge it when I am bored!video is amazing for the size and pricethe motion shot function is not a real option, get the app for your phone instead.never use it with phone link or wifi so not much to say.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: This camera is perfect for trips, parties, and really any thing that you would love to have a portable memory of. The pictures are credit card sized and are actually pretty cool because you can fit them into your wallet, but just as easily combine them for a collage or scrapbook or something. Every single place I've brought this thing, it's been a hit, and people love taking instant pictures that they can carry around with them everywhere. Almost like a portable photo booth. The only downside to this camera is that if you use it a whole lot, the film packs can get pretty expensive, and they sort of fluctuate on pricing from time to time. But hey, if a picture is worth a thousand words, then the memories made from the pictures are absolutely priceless!

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: Ok some photos are a mass of white or dark but isn’t that part of the art when trying to get the shot. It’s all learning.,This camera is owned by an 8 year old and she loves it. She took the pic in this review as well. It’s a piece of independence and you actually have a physical product for once amongst everything else that’s now digital. Just don’t be expecting iPhone X quality and just appreciate this for what it is.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: My 9 year old loves this camera. We have yet to make prints from it, and the photos look very grainy on the screen at the back, so fingers crossed they come out better than they initially look. The camera itself is easy to use and a nice little item.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: It's surprisingly good for such a small, cheap camera. this to introduce the grand-kids to photography as they are now taking an interst in wildlife and the garden. If anything it could do with being a bit simler for them initially but they learn quickly.this camera is good as a first one for the kids. It is small, probably fairly robust due to its light weight and simple to operate in automatic mode.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: It's not a Sony, Cannon nor is it a Nikon Camera. Honestly, it does not have a name...BUT it does everything that these brand name cameras do. Picture is nice and Video is better. It is small in size and it's perfect if you don't like carrying bulky equipment with you. For the price and the good quality of this camera, I do highly recommend this product from this seller

review: Camera is pretty lightweight and does fit nicely in your hands.In terms of quality of video, I would say its pretty good when bumped up to the highest. You do get some grainy images in the night but this is normally the result of bad lighting. I found this has improve the overall quality of the images quite dramatically. Light are so bright that if you are in a room with a normal bulb that has that very popular yellow tint Zooming in and out does tend to distort the quality but I guess that an acceptable fact with these types of devices and even your smart phone

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: The size is great for a teenager. But the shutter button is far too sensitive. You can just brush your finger by it and take a photo. You don't need to press it. So you cannot press it halfway to focus first. It just focuses on whatever it wants to - which is 99% of the time not what you want it to focus on. The photo quality is terrible. I'm no professional, but I know what I'm doing with a camera and even I cannot get a photo in good focus. And you can accidently brush the shutter button and end up taking 2-4 photos in a row without meaning to... you don't have to press, take a photo, press, take a photo. You can press press press (not meaning to do it multiple times) and get photo taken, photo taken, photo taken... all slightly delayed but one after another... if that makes sense. We returned it immediately.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: This looks pretty cool - I bought it for my daughter to monitor a quite traumatised rescue dog she’s recently acquired, both during the night and during the day sometimes too. We had no problems setting it up and linking it to an app – all fairly intuitive.,Once set up it was really easy to access the camera. Picture quality is good and night vision is clear and very useful. It also adjusts well between colour and black-and-white low-light mode.,The speaker and microphone and 360 degree movement are also very useful features and it has been working fine for several days now with no problems. All-in-all it does the job she wanted it for and she’s found it so useful and convenient she now needs another one for another room

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: I think it's a good quality. Obviously there are better cameras but this is just perfect for what I need right now. It videos, does panoramic shots and multi shots. Good battery life capable of up to 600 photos from fully charged, would recommend this one.

review: I got this package right away and it had many useful items in it besides the camera and some I would not use but I was most excited about getting another Coolpix as the one I used to use was awesome for simplicity of use but took incredible pictures. When I unwrapped the camera, it appeared smaller than I expected but that was a good thing. It had a great feel in my hand and I was looking forward to trying it out. I went through all the steps in the instruction manual, attaching the straps, downloading the bluetooth app for my phone, installing the 64G card that came with it and the batteries. I turned the camera on, I was led through instructions on connecting my phone with the camera via bluetooth. I accomplished a connection and moved to the next screen which was "Turn off the camera and then turn it back on". Which I did...many many times, each time it would only return to the same message to restart the camera. I even removed the batteries and restarted it twice only to the same effect so I asked for a refund. I was sent an RMA label but it cost me 34.00 more dollars to send it back since it was not a prepaid label. so my rating is more for the experience and not for the way the camera works, obviously. I would like to try one more again because I hope this was a rare anomaly for this camera...

review: I love this camera because of the anti-shake feature. I teach photography and Photoshop. I stopped buying Sony 10 years ago because of expensive proprietary memory. This one uses a standard SD card. I am very happy with it and tested it at Disney. It did well.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Seems to work fine as a small point and shoot.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: After reading the positive reviews and seeing the price, I decided to purchase this camera for a trip. It's very easy to use out of the box. Simply install the battery and your memory card and start using. The memory card is sold separately. As an amateur photographer, I loved how easy it was to snap pictures. All you have to do is aim and press the button. I was also impressed with the battery. My first digital camera was a Kodak that required Double-A's, which ran down very quickly. I used over three dozen batteries on that trip, which wasn't cheap. That wasn't the case with the battery. I never once had to recharge it during my 1.5 week trip. The reason I give it three stars is because of the picture quality and the screen. The screen was hard to view in a variety of lights because it was dim. The picture quality was too light, and some of them came out soft and blurry, even when I was standing still. That said, I managed to get some good shots that I was able to improve with Photoshop. I love the compact design, which is perfect for traveling.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

Great seller to do business with!,The camera itself has been great indoors and out doors, I got it for a vacation I am going on so I'll will 're update once I use it more. But so far so good! Easy to use
