After the trip, I was proven right that this had better quality than our smart phone's video. And it had more adjustable functions than smart phone to do more effect. It's easy to use with stable quality. Would recommend to anyone who needs a camcorder.

product_name: Camcorder Video Camera Full HD 1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 18X Digital Zoom Vlogging Camera with 3 Inch Screen 270 Degree Rotation Screen (V10-GB)
review: I bought this camera for my teenage son to take a video on his favorite live show. I think he has started to love it. It is lightweight and in small size, with very high picture quality and audio quality is also fine. Functions and usage are not complex, and my son can handle it by his own.

product_name: Camcorder Video Camera Full HD 1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 18X Digital Zoom Vlogging Camera with 3 Inch Screen 270 Degree Rotation Screen (V10-GB)

review: This camera is absolutely horrible! Yes, it can fit in my pocket, which is nice. Yes, it doesn't require batteries. But that's as far as the good qualities go. All the pictures I take are dark, dingy, and blurry. I've read the manual and changed the settings - nothing improves the crappy quality of the photos. I'm not asking for anything super fancy or HD, I just want a decent, non-blurry picture of my family on vacation. The video is horrible as well. I like that there is no time limit on how long the video can be, but it doesn't matter when the image goes in and out of focus the entire video. This was the biggest waste of money!!! I'm so disappointed. I hate this camera so much that I wouldn't even re-sell to somebody at a reduced price.

review: So far this has been a great little camera.  It even fits a 15 year old elph case I had from my old original elph.  Fits in my pocket. My last other popular brand point-and-shoot had a terrible blur problem, no matter what I did with it.  So I went back to Canon, and could not be happier with the performance.

Perfect for informal photography although I wouldn't compare it with any DSLR in either quality or detail.

product_name: [16GB Memory Card Include] RegeMoudal Kids Digital Camera Gifts for Child Boys Girls,Mini Rechargeable Children Shockproof Digital Camcorders Little Kid Toys Gift 8MP with Battery 2 Inch,Pink
review: My 6 year old loves taking pictures with my camera and iPad and really wanted a camera of her own. We all know how children of that age do not understand the value of things so I was very cautious when letting her use my expensive items. She unfortunately dropped my iPad at one point causing a chipped corner. I wanted to find something for her that if she accidentally dropped it, it wouldn't break. This camera is perfect for that with its rubber sides. It takes good pictures and has different borders and other things that she can do with the pictures and she loves it. We told her if she can take care of this camera for a few years, she can get an adult camera but she has to prove she can be responsible with this one. So far so good and it's a great price for this type of situation.

Its great that it comes with the memory card so I can use it almost immediately. One of my favorites about this camera is the secret button that's hidden from a little kids plain eye. It locks it from being turned on.,I'm going to give it to a young camper to be a 'photographer' and use it tomorrow at our camp mock wedding. review: Good camera, but the lens is not impressive. Macro photos come out rounded or disproportionate. The lighting is also not great with this camera. Unless there is a lot of light, photo coloring tend to come out very "warm" and not true to the actual colors of the portrait you're taking. I would suggest looking at the models with the **Leica** lens. Lumix makes amazing cameras, but they should leave lens crafting to the professionals.

review: I bought this camera to replace my canon powershot that broke when I dropped it on the beach. I was super obsessed with buying a camera that had at least 16 megapixels or higher for a low price. The camera is pretty light weight and made of plastic, thus why it is so cheap. However, when comparing the camera to a12mp DSLR, the pixel rates for the sony camera are still lower. It's a great point and shoot if that's what you're looking for and pictures are really crisp. Just wouldn't be able to zoom into it to much even though its 20.1 mp.

review: This camera/video is very easy to use and it takes good pictures and videos with sound if you prefer. I need it for all the birthdays and holidays in my life because I still have a flip phone with undesirable pictures, new phone costs too much.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Camera with 3 Inch TFT LCD Display,Digital Point and Shoot Camera Video Camera for Kids/Beginners/Seniors (Black)
review: I wanted an inexpensive snapshot camera for my wife, the technophobe.  This Vmotal unit will probably do the job but it is definitely only good for casual snapshots.  The camera is labeled "12 Megapixels"  Maybe, but even with everything set to the highest resolution looks like 10 of those 12 megapixels got lost in the process.  Files are JPG format and show a lot of compression artifacts, probably because of processor speed limitations.  Using auto-exposure, highlights are blown out unless the scene has a very low dynamic range.  Auto-focus isn't a problem because I don't think it has any, just the old Kodak Brownie style fixed-focus lens.  Sensitivity seems low and normal indoor lighting seems to be barely adequate, with long exposure time requiring a very steady hand to minimize motion blur (I'm still playing with settings, but the "anti-shake" setting doesn't seem to help at all).  Overall, best results seem to be using highest detail settings all around coupled with manually setting ISO to 400, the highest setting.,I'm not saying you shouldn't consider buying this camera, just be very aware it isn't anywhere as good as, for example, your iPhone's camera, and if left with all settings at default the results on many scenes won't be too great.  On the other hand, if it gets lost or dropped in the lake, it won't hurt like losing the iPhone, or a Canon camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I purchased this black Sony DSC-W800 Cyber-shot in May 2016. Since then I have used this camera just a handful of times, and always in a safe manner. Today after not using it for about a month I turned it on to find that the buttons are not working properly. Flash turns on the recording rather than flash. The menu button does nothing. The playback button brings up the last picture I took but the back/next and delete buttons do nothing. Basically my recently purchased camera is already not working properly. I contacted the seller asking for a replacement and they dismissed me and told me to contact Amazon? DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA, IT'S A PIECE OF JUNK and DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER, THEY DO NOT CARE ABOUT CUSTOMER SERVICE.

review: It is a very cute camera, my daughter likes it very much. So with it, my phone is free right now. It is very easy to use, and would be a very good start.

product_name: [16GB Memory Card Include] RegeMoudal Kids Digital Camera Gifts for Child Boys Girls,Mini Rechargeable Children Shockproof Digital Camcorders Little Kid Toys Gift 8MP with Battery 2 Inch,Pink
review: This is excellent kids camera for all ages. I bought this one for my 7 y.o daughter, she's obsessed with taking pictures. Before we bought this camera she would take my phohe and keep it for hours, taking 100+ puctires of her thumbs or nose. It was supper annoying for me, especially I need to work from my phone sometimes and couldn't find it anywhere. Finaly my patience has broken and I got this camera. What can I say, hurray, finaly nobody touches my phone. She loves it, she takes pictures of EVERYTHING! But to tell the truth quality of the camera is not bad at all, colors are great, not grainy, even in low light environments. There's very simple menu, lots of stickers you can add to the pictures before you take a shot. You can record a video. Camera comes very well packed, the kit includes: camera itselt, USB charger, flash card for 16GB, special adaptor for conputer, manual and neckband.,The camers is very easy to use. It has impressive battery life, since we got it we haven't even changed ot yet. And it's more the a week. So I definitely recommend this camera for kids to give them happy experience and great memories and to help parents save their peace and keep being stress free :)

product_name: [16GB Memory Card Include] RegeMoudal Kids Digital Camera Gifts for Child Boys Girls,Mini Rechargeable Children Shockproof Digital Camcorders Little Kid Toys Gift 8MP with Battery 2 Inch,Pink
review: It's a very nice little children's digital camera. It's small enough to put in your pocket. Easy to take out. And it's safe and healthy.When my children received it. They couldn't wait to open it. Even if they didn't read the instructions. Simple and easy to use. I heard their laugh.They've stopped until the electric went out. There are 33 kinds of stickers.They chose many different ones and took many interesting pictures. There is a 16GB memory card in it, which can save many photos. It can be uploaded to the computer and archived. I'm looking forward to taking it with me on the weekend and having a good time with my children.

product_name: [16GB Memory Card Include] RegeMoudal Kids Digital Camera Gifts for Child Boys Girls,Mini Rechargeable Children Shockproof Digital Camcorders Little Kid Toys Gift 8MP with Battery 2 Inch,Pink
review: I do photography as a hobby and use some expensive interchangeable lens cameras. My Kids always watch me and interested to use my camera. I wanted to encourage their interest and at the same time, didn't want to do take a chance with DSLRs. So searched in Amazon and got this cool little camera. This is little creative camera designed for kids. Takes Photos and Videos. The Quality of the Photos are OK considering this is designed for Kids and the price point. The camera can add stickers while they shoot the pictures and videos. My Kids are enjoying this and taking many pictures. The inbuilt Battery can be recharged using mini usb cable and it's included with the camera. Full Charge keep the camera running for few hours of shootings. Recommended for fun loving kids.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've owned this camera for seven months now.  For the most part, it has been satisfactory.  Colors are usually pretty accurate, exposure is good. My main issue is that the focus, especially the auto focus, is rarely sharp.  I have to post process sharpen every photo, which is a pain in the neck. And yes, I do use a tripod most of the time.  As a side note,I wish someone would make one of these "advanced bridge" cameras with an aperture smaller than f8.  That just isn't good enough for landscape shots.  All in all, if you want to take tack sharp photos, suck it up and save for a DSLR with a set of good lenses.

No matter how still I stayed or what setting it was on..pictures came out blurry and resembled an early flip phone camera quality..I was shocked because I have owned a few Sony cybershot cameras but there are different variations and this one is on the very low spectrum...Do not buy this..it isn't worth it!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 Digital Camera w/ 42x Optical Zoom - Wi-Fi & NFC Enabled (Black)
review: I love this little camera.  The zoom is amazing. It's not the best in low light, such as indoors, but outdoors it works fine.  I have not printed any pictures yet but the shots look fine on the monitor and on my computer.  The battery drained faster than I expected.  Apparently the trick is to minimize monitor usage.  Unfortunately, there is no viewfinder.  It does not take panorama shots or have forced flash in AUTO mode.  I haven't used the manual mode(s).  The video works fine.,This is a good, little, point and shoot super-zoom camera.  Cheaper ones used AA batteries.  I wanted a camera with a rechargeable battery pack, so I spent a little more.  Plus I got extra zoom power (i.e., 42x) and 20 MP resolution.  I assume that the more expensive cameras are better but this one will be fine for hiking and vacations.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I got this Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ70 digital camera earlier this year here to replace a similar digital camera that died on me & I needed a good replacement digital camera. I chose this camera & several spare batteries over many others. I have had other  compact Panasonic Lumix digital cameras over the past few years with generally good luck with those.,This digital camera looks very nice & rather professional-looking. This is a sizable super-zoom bridge digital camera and it feels very good when I use it. Nice sizable grip on it helps a lot too when picture-taking.,Pros: Pretty extensive menu system that's fairly easy to use, great wide lens and decent 60X optical zoom, long battery life, optical view finder, external flash attachment, looks pretty well-built and professional looking as well and seems durable. Many photo scene modes and full manual modes also included on this camera. Uses the easy to find SD or SDHC cards. Nice photo qualities also even tho it cannot compare against DSLR cameras. Focuses pretty quick for me and really no operational issues at all with this camera. Everything seems to work well on this digital camera for me.,Cons: Short burst shooting modes, LCD screen is fixed into the camera & does not tilt out or flip out like Canon & Nikon comparable digital cameras.,Photo qualities with this camera varies: outdoor photos with no flash I get fantastic photos, low light photos is a bit trickier with this camera & photo qualities suffer quite a bit, indoor photos with flash ends up quite nice with this camera....but can be a bit washed-out if you're too close to the subject you're photographing. Overall photo qualities with this Panasonic digital camera are very good and I am very pleased with what photos I have taken so far with this camera. Video qualities with this camera are as good as any other digital camera I have had....very good.,I did get a few extra batteries and an extra charger plus a lens hood for this camera....the lens hood makes the camera look a bit more professional and does help photos a bit in bright sunny weather. Plus I got a case for this camera.,If you want a decent super zoom digital camera and cannot afford a larger CMOS sensor [1 inch CMOS] super zoom digital camera or DSLR digital camera and still get fairly good photos at a pretty good price, I think this camera will do the job just fine.,The only other rival digital cameras I think that can compare with this camera is a Canon SX-50 HS and maybe the Canon SX-60 HS. I have both of those cameras and photo qualities are comparable between all 3 digital cameras at this point. Nikon's P600 may be a rival too, but from what I have heard from other users is that Nikon camera has focusing issues.,This is my third redo of this review & originally I gave it 3 stars, then 4 stars....now I am giving this Panasonic FZ70 digital camera 5 of 5 stars because I have had it long enough & used it enough now....and I am still getting consistently good photos with this camera . So now I can finally finalize this review once and for all.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: So the piece that attracted me to this package versus the other Canon packages on Amazon was the 3 included lenses. I should have known better. It DOES come with the 1 Canon kit lens. The other 2 lenses are XIT brand and the two of them together can be purchased for less than $20. They actually make the pictures worse. Also, just to note, these are not stand alone lenses. They screw onto the front of the lens like a filter would. These are completely not usable for any kind of quality pictures. An average point and shoot camera takes higher quality pictures than you will get through these lenses.,If this is your first DSLR, the kit provides a decent value. All of the components are cheap, but will give you an idea if those are things you will use and should replace with better versions.,The camera itself is (so far) awesome. The camera alone would have been a 5 star purchase. The package alone would be a 2 star purchase. The way it's listed and pictured is deceptive. Overall, it's worth the $10 over just the camera, but be sure to keep your expectations low.,All the included components are as follows:,$10.69 xit macro lens xt58wab,$8.93 xit telephoto lens xt2x58,$19.75 vivitar large gadget bag,$22.46 xit tripod xt60trb,$4.50 vivitar 4in pocket tripod,$9.16 transcend 16gb flash card,$16.99 transcend 32gb flash card,$8.68 xit remote shutter release,$4.93 xit SD/microSD card reader,$7.46 pro series digital filter set,$3.95 lens cap keeper (stick on),$2.94 xit universal screen protector,$3.99 xit digital ultraviolet filter,$3.00 vivitar cleaning kit and card wallet,$14.95 slave flash,Total accessories: $142.38,$449 Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera Kit with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens (Black)

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: First things first: I love the camera. I have been using it for about a month now, and it has been wonderful. It is a fantastic first time camera and does a great job at helping you learn it. The rating is due to what comes with the camera, so please beware.,Pros: The SD cards alone provide good value, as they can get expensive as you need bigger cards, for a first-timer, and as long as you aren't shooting raw+jpeg like I am, you won't need anything else. Also helps to mention you get a sd card wallet and a usb reader/writer. The uv and other filters are also nice if you want to use filters in your shots, when I first started out I was using a uv filter on my kit lens. I have since bought a much better lens, and do not use a filter anymore. The cleaning kit is very handy, I have no problems there but also bought a professional cleaning kit. The mini tripod is quite cute and has been handy a few times, beware, I have had trouble getting it to hold up my camera sturdy enough with anything other than the kit lens. As stated above, the camera and everything it comes with is good. It also comes with a remote shutter which is very nice as well. I tried it out with my silly little tripod and was pleased with the result.,Cons: My biggest issue with my purchase is it sounded like you are getting two extra lenses with the purchase. You're not. The picture you see of the three lenses grouped together: the bigger one is the kit lens and the two extras next to it are them. They are not lenses, they do not attach to the camera. I would call these "lens extensions", as they screw onto your kit lens like a uv filter does. They are also 100% worthless, please take it from someone who has already tried them, and then bought other lenses and compared the difference. I would upload the bad pictures they took, but have since deleted them out of my library. The bag it comes with is incredibly small, and barely fits all of your accessories, heaven forbid you go and get more equipment to add to it. I have since purchased a backpack that I can grow into, and the bag is now a spare parts bag. The bigger tripod is a cheap plastic, and while it is just fine for indoor photography and videos, I wouldn't dare use it on a windy day taking landscape shots. The flash could be a pro or con depending on your personal thoughts. It is not an ETTL, meaning that you have to manually adjust your settings to match the flash and how it fires, the camera will not do it for you. It also is completely stationary, it is brighter than the built-in flash, which is better for outdoor shots that you need to light up. I can imagine it would be difficult for a beginner, it was difficult for me.,Conclusion: If I had known better at the time, I would have either spent less money to get a kit without "lenses" or spent a little bit more to get real lenses included in the kit. The camera itself and the SD cards provide wonderful value, but I would not make this purchase again and wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Will keep this review short and simple. This is my first camera, this bundle has everything you need if you're into photography. This, in my opinion is a great camera to start learning on. Super easy to use and very high quality pictures. I've been out shooting the past few days and have taken some amazing pictures. Worth every penny! If you're thinking about buying it, do it! You won't be disappointed.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This is a great camera. Easy to use and take great pictures. The accessories are useful. However, the flash is not compatible with this camera (see alert). I read that this flash is not compatible with the camera. Therefore, they are sending accessories that are not compatible in a bundle which is not fair. Other than the accessories, this is a great camera.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: If you are looking for a great entry level camera and kit for photography look no further! They say that a picture can speak a thousand words. I will let the pictures do just that.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I highly recommend this product!,I am no pro when it comes to photography, but I do want my own slr and want to learn! This is perfect for a beginner like me, it came with so much accessories. Love it!,It came in a box, of course! Lol see picture below, everything has its own case. Seriously, everything a beginner would need is here.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: We love this camera. I bought it for my wife and after a couple days of learning how to use it she was taking professional quality photos.  The camera is easy to use and comes with everything you need to get started.  The bundle package is a good deal.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Bought this set for the youth group at the local church. Works great but my only complaint is that the extra flash that comes with this bundle does not work!?!? Why would the seller even sell it with this camera if it does not work?? I saw other reviews stating the same thing but I Figured ok maybe I will be the lucky one that has one that will work, nope. But that will not deter me from using this camera. 4 stars. Good camera with a dollar store extras. Dollar tree at that. If you find this review helpful click the helpful button.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is an excellent choice for a step up from point-and-shoot, or a first camera for a novice DSLR.  It's fully automatic but you can gradually take creative control of every aspect of your photography as you become more comfortable with the settings and features.  The tiny instruction manual included in the package gives just the basics and can be frustrating, but download the PDF file and there are your clear directions, step by step and in color.  For an experienced amateur photographer some of the items included in the kit will be redundant (who doesn't have at least two tripods?) but buying the camera, lenses, flash and cards separately would be more expensive than what you receive in this packed bundle.  The only thing I would change is one feature of its WiFi capabilities.  Unlike the Canon SX60HS, it can't wirelessly download to the hard drive of a computer.  You would use your cable or card reader.  But it's just a minor annoyance.  It can easily send your photos to any mobile device.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Absolutely love my camera 110%.... The quality is great and not to mention all the accessories it comes with that are very handy. I am really happy with this camera and I am looking to buy another lens just to take more awesome shots.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)

review: Still figuring out all the options

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I was so scared to put it in the water because I don’t know what made it water proof. But I did. And it still works! The picture quality was poor at the beginning and then I realized I can adjust the quality. It doesn’t come with SD card so I have to order a card to see the quality. But so far it works great!

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I love the budget price, easy for kids to use, front facing camera for selfies and video, lightweight, great color, lots of setting, zoom works well. No water got in on my test. A waterproof camera is a must for vacation, rain, or any water activity. I did not like that the battery compartment was a bit hard for me to open, had to buy a separate micro SD card, no carry strap, and most of all the microphone is not that great and no way to attach an external mike for videos. Great camera for kids, around water, and good price!

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I originally purchased this camera only to use when I went to the beach it arrived and I am happy to say this camera has already shown its many uses! My kids went to the splash pad and I was able to get some really good pictures while they're having fun And didn't have to worry about ruining the camera. I am looking forward to bringing it to the beach and the lake. It is very lightweight which is perfect for my little guy and I don't have to worry about it banging around too much.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: received this bundle about a month ago but have not flown it yet due to the bad weather up here in PA. Everything looks good except for the light kit connectors. they are very very thin and broke off both sets trying to set up the lights, the company was very helpful when I had a question about hook up. They emailed me very good pics of how to set them up. in the mean time I will use a 3s 1000mah lipo to run them mounted in back if the camera. will make my final review after the maiden flight......well the maiden flight went extremely well. This platform is very good for a beginner and can grow into it. Landings do take a little practice but with the prop guard s no worry so. again very happy..

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Our family was so excited to see how it works in the pool yesterday. Really happy with the performance of this, Yes you get what you pay for, and battery life and sound quality are not as good as the top of the range, but thats easy to work around and the images are good quality. For a camera likely to see hard use and abuse, the price versus quality makes it a great choice.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: At first, I was wondering why my pics all turned out blurry. Then I pulled out the little instruction manual. I needed to turn it to mountain mode. After that, the photos came out good. The camera is surprising light weight.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I was looking for a simple camera for my boyfriend, who recently love to take a picture while swimming. He loves this camera--it's easy, and it's waterproof.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I bought for my son. He always wants a camera of his own. Now he finally owns one. It is of very nice color and is really easy to operate. The quality of the image is decent. He is absolutely in love with it and has taken lots of pictures for his toys. He is excited for tomorrow's vocation because he wants to take pictures of the beach and the sea.

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: I am satisfied both with the underwater photos and video, I also used it above the water a dozen times during a cavern exploration.The quality is Okay and there is no blurriness, noise or bad quality to the image or video. By saying Ok I mean that for this price I expected it to be a lot worse but to my surprise it far exceeded my expectations. It's a good camera for its price,

product_name: Waterproof Camera Full HD 1080P Underwater Camera 24 MP Video Recorder Selfie Dual Screen DV Recording Waterproof Digital Camera for Snorkeling
review: Purchase this for my trip. Did a water test to it on my tub. No water leak to the camera.  Everything is in fuction order  and good picture under water. Will test it later in real life.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have been a professional photographer since 1983 and I never get excited by any non-professional cameras.  It seems like there are always too many compromises with them.  Now imagine a 20 to 1200 mm lens that you can take to a concert, sports games, etc. that focuses fast at any zoom level.  The panoramic feature is better than my pro camera (actually use this camera to do interiors to make good money with it).  If you want a great camera at an unbelievable price for all of the features it has, then this camera is for you.  It has a flash mount so I bought a good Metz flash.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)

review: Very nice camera, not all the bells and whistles of my Sony which I had to replace, accidentally drove over it.  :(  But meets my needs well.  The shipper was excellent, no complaints.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Great video!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: So far, I am very happy with my new Panasonic Lumix.  I am mostly a point and shoot photographer.  The clarity is beautiful, crisp and clear. I take mostly landscape, sunrise and sunset shots.  I also pre-ordered this Lumix -and got a credit for the price difference.  The zoom is great! Last evening, I had the opportunity to take some long range pictures down the beach - and they came out very clear for the distance I was shooting.  Love the panoramic setting on the top dial of the camera for taking multiple shots of the beach side... A few pix came out with funny lines but most came out beautifully...,Amazon Customer service staff were so helpful with all my questions.  I ordered the free shipping (5-8 days).  I received my camera in 3 days! Just in time for my trip!,Back with an update.  Again, I've only been taking photos for a couple of years, so I'm still fairly new at all this. Took the Lumix to the beach last weekend... The camera performed well in the blue sky weather that prevailed. The panoramic setting is great for beach shots although I found some images had lines with some different light exposures.,The biggest problem I'm having is red diagonal lens flares when I shoot sunset shots.  My Lumix (DMC-ZS10 w/ 16x zoom) or my husband's Canon Power Shot cameras never showed that much flare...As most of my pix are sunrises and sunsets, this is a big problems....any suggestions would be appreciated.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Of all the cameras I have had, this is the absolute best.  From now on, I do not think that I will ever use my other camera.
